title_en: Zain Anti-Lice Comb Z-311045 - The Ultimate Solution for Lice Removal

description_en:
Say goodbye to irritating lice with the **Zain Anti-Lice Comb Z-311045**, the ultimate solution for lice-free families. This meticulously designed comb, crafted from pure stainless steel, offers an effective and gentle experience for the scalp. Its fine and tight teeth are specially engineered to effectively remove lice and nits without causing hair damage. Lightweight and compact, you can take it with you wherever you go. Its ergonomic design ensures a secure grip during use, making it an indispensable tool for hair care.

**Features:**
â­ Made from high-quality, pure stainless steel.
â­ Fine and tight teeth for maximum effectiveness in removing lice and nits.
â­ Lightweight and compact design for easy portability and use anywhere.
â­ Attractive pink shade.
â­ Durable and long-lasting for years of use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Zain Anti-Lice Comb Z-311045**:
â­ Shampoo hair thoroughly before use.
â­ Apply conditioner to make combing easier.
â­ Towel dry the hair.
â­ Place an extra towel on shoulders to catch falling lice.
â­ Divide hair into small sections and secure with clips.
â­ Start combing each section from the scalp to the ends, getting as close to the scalp as possible.
â­ Wipe the comb with a towel or tissue after each stroke to remove lice and nits.
â­ Rinse hair with plain water after finishing.
â­ Repeat the process every few days for complete lice eradication.
â­ Clean and disinfect the comb thoroughly after each use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Zain Anti-Lice Comb Z-311045**:
â­ 100% Pure Stainless Steel.

#AntiLice #LiceTreatment #HairCare #KidsEssentials #HealthyHair #SaudiArabia #Jeddah #Riyadh #Dammam #HairHealth

description_en:
Experience ultimate foot care with the **KillyS Pedicure File Ergonomic Shape Double-Sided Grit**. Its comfortable, ergonomic shape effectively and gently removes dead skin and calluses, leaving your feet feeling smooth and rejuvenated. With its 80/100 grit double-sided design, you can effortlessly tackle rough patches and achieve salon-quality results at home.

â­ Efficiently removes dead skin and calluses.
â­ Ergonomic design for comfortable handling.
â­ Double-sided with varying grits (80/100) for tailored exfoliation.
â­ Suitable for use on dry or wet skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **KillyS Pedicure File Ergonomic Shape Double-Sided Grit**:
â­ Gently use the file on dry or damp, rough areas of your feet.
â­ Start with the coarser side (80 grit) to remove thick, hardened skin.
â­ Follow with the finer side (100 grit) to smooth and refine the skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **KillyS Pedicure File Ergonomic Shape Double-Sided Grit**:
â­ Ethylene-vinyl acetate.
â­ High-quality sandpaper.
â­ Polypropylene.

#Killys #PedicureFile #FootCare #HomePedicure #SmoothFeet #DeadSkinRemoval #FootExfoliation #FootMoisturizing #FootBeauty #SaudiBeauty

description_en:
Discover the perfect finish for your makeup with the **KillyS Bubble Powder Brush**.

Part of the chic Bubble Brushes collection, this brush features fashionable pastel shades inspired by the rainbow reflections of soap bubbles. Infuse your skin with positive energy with this subtle and sweet collection.

The **KillyS Bubble Powder Brush** is designed with high-quality bristles and a specially profiled, rounded head, providing a smooth and uniform application for loose, pressed, and mineral powders. Achieve a flawless, even makeup finish that lasts.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **KillyS Bubble Powder Brush**:
â­ Dip the brush into your favorite powder.
â­ Gently tap off any excess.
â­ Sweep the brush across your face in light, circular motions for even powder distribution.
â­ Focus on areas where you want to set your makeup or reduce shine.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **KillyS Bubble Powder Brush**:
â­ Aluminum
â­ Wood
â­ PBT - Polybutylene terephthalate

#KillySBubbleBrush #PowderBrush #MakeupTools #SaudiMakeup #BeautySaudi #KillySMakeup #ProfessionalMakeup #MakeupBrush #FlawlessFinish #BeautyEssentials

title_ar: ÙƒÙŠÙ„ÙŠØ² Ù…Ø¨Ø±Ø¯ Ø£Ø¸Ø§ÙØ± ÙƒØ±ÙŠØ³Ù†Øª Ø§Ù„Ø£Ø±Ø¬ÙˆØ§Ù†ÙŠ - ØªØ´ÙƒÙŠÙ„ Ø§Ø­ØªØ±Ø§ÙÙŠ Ù„Ø£Ø¸Ø§ÙØ±Ùƒ
description_en:
Discover elegance and effectiveness with the **Killys Floralove Crescent Nail File Purple**, your perfect tool for achieving beautifully shaped and smooth nails. Its delightful floral design adds a touch of joy to your nail styling routine.

â­ 180/240 Grit: Ideal for shaping and smoothing natural nail edges.
â­ 240-360 Grit: Ultra-fine for gently shortening brittle, thin, and delicate nails.
â­ 160-230 Grit: Classic medium grit for effective shortening and shaping of natural nails.
â­ Ergonomic design for easy handling and control.
â­ Delivers smooth, flawless nail edges.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Killys Floralove Crescent Nail File Purple**
â­ Choose the appropriate grit or coarseness based on your nail type and needs.
â­ Hold the file securely, positioning it at the edge of your nail.
â­ Gently file your nails in one direction, starting from the outer edge towards the center.
â­ Avoid a sawing motion to prevent splitting.
â­ Shape nails to your desired length and style, keeping them symmetrical.
â­ Smooth rough edges by buffing lightly.
â­ Clean with a soft brush or damp cloth after each use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Killys Floralove Crescent Nail File Purple**
â­ Ethylene
â­ Vinyl Acetate
â­ Sandpaper
â­ Polypropylene

#Killys #NailFile #NailCare #Nails #NailStyling #Pedicure #Manicure #BeautySalon #NaturalNails #SaudiBeauty

description_en:
Discover natural beauty with the **KillyS Pastelove Green Tea Powder Brush 01**. Inspired by the colors of life and feminine joy, this brush offers you a luxurious makeup experience. The brush bristles are enriched with green tea powder, known for its soothing and antibacterial properties, in addition to its antioxidants that nourish your skin. The brush ensures precise application of loose, pressed, and mineral products, while its specially shaped rounded head with high-quality bristles provides a uniform and flawless finish.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **KillyS Pastelove Green Tea Powder Brush 01**
â­ For light coverage, gently sweep over the face starting from the center.
â­ For a higher level of coverage and a perfectly smooth complexion, first blend the powder into the T-zone, then sweep outwards from the face in circular motions.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **KillyS Pastelove Green Tea Powder Brush 01**
â­ Aluminum
â­ Wood
â­ Nylon
â­ Green tea extract

description_en:
Introducing the **Killys Neon Shine Flexible Orange Hair Brush**, the perfect tool to transform your hair styling experience. This brush features an innovative design that offers exceptional flexibility, making it gentle on the scalp and effective at detangling hair. Its vibrant orange color adds a splash of fun to your hair care essentials.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Killys Neon Shine Flexible Orange Hair Brush**:
â­ Start by brushing the ends of your hair, gradually moving towards the roots to gently detangle.
â­ Use the brush on wet or dry hair, as per your preference.
â­ To clean the brush, remove trapped hair and rinse with mild soap and water, then allow it to air dry.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Killys Neon Shine Flexible Orange Hair Brush**:
â­ High-quality flexible bristles designed to minimize hair breakage.
â­ Comfortable and durable handle in a vibrant orange hue.
â­ Specially designed construction for detangling all hair types.

#HairBrush #Killys #HairCare #HealthyHair #Hairstyles #SoftHair #ShinyHair #HairStyling #DetanglingBrush #KillysKSA

title_ar: ÙƒÙŠÙ„ÙŠØ² Ø¥Ø³ÙÙ†Ø¬Ø© Ù…ÙƒÙŠØ§Ø¬ Ø«Ù„Ø§Ø«ÙŠØ© Ø§Ù„Ø£Ø¨Ø¹Ø§Ø¯ - ØªØµÙ…ÙŠÙ… Ø±Ø®Ø§Ù…ÙŠ Ø£Ø²Ø±Ù‚/Ø¨Ù†ÙØ³Ø¬ÙŠ
description_en:
Experience perfection with the **KillyS 3D Makeup Sponge**, featuring a unique blue/violet marble design. This latex-free makeup sponge boasts an innovative structure and shape, designed to effortlessly apply cosmetics across the entire face and into all its contours. It flawlessly blends products without leaving streaks. Upon dampening, the **KillyS 3D Makeup Sponge** becomes exceptionally soft and does not absorb makeup, ensuring economical and effective use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **KillyS 3D Makeup Sponge**:
â­ Apply cosmetics with a dabbing motion on larger areas of the face such as cheeks and forehead.
â­ Use the sponge tip to reach difficult areas around the eyes, nose, and mouth.
â­ Clean your makeup sponge after each use with gentle soap and water.
â­ Allow the sponge to air dry thoroughly before storing it.
â­ Replace the sponge every few months to maintain hygiene and ensure optimal makeup application.
â­ Store in a dry place away from sunlight.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **KillyS 3D Makeup Sponge**:
â­ HYDROPHILIC POLYURETHANE

description_en:
Discover radiance with the **KillyS Metallic Glow** Makeup Brushes Set, a luxurious collection of essential makeup tools housed in a chic metallic bag. Expertly designed for both aspiring beginners and seasoned professionals, this set ensures flawless makeup application every time.

â­ Professional-grade quality for seamless makeup application.
â­ Soft, gentle bristles for a comfortable experience.
â­ Elegant design with a luxurious metallic bag for storage.
â­ Perfect for various makeup stages: foundation, contouring, eyeshadow, and more.
â­ Empowers you to achieve diverse makeup looks with ease.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **KillyS Metallic Glow**:
â­ Utilize each brush for its intended purpose, such as the foundation brush for foundation and the eyeshadow brush for eyes.
â­ Blend and sweep makeup gently for optimal results.
â­ Clean brushes regularly to maintain hygiene and performance.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **KillyS Metallic Glow**:
â­ High-quality, ultra-soft synthetic bristles.
â­ Durable and ergonomic handles for comfortable grip.
â­ Stylish and practical metallic bag.

title_ar: ÙƒÙŠÙ„ÙŠØ² Ø¨Ø§ÙÙŠ Ø¨Ù„ÙˆÙƒ Ù…Ø¨Ø±Ø¯ Ù„Ù„Ø£Ø¸Ø§ÙØ± Ø°Ø§Øª 4 Ø¬ÙˆØ§Ù†Ø¨
description_en:
Achieve perfectly polished nails with the **KillyS Buffy Block 4-Sided Nail Buffer Block**. This versatile tool is designed to smooth, refine, and buff your nails to a natural shine. Ideal for mattifying the nail plate before applying gel polish, tips, or artificial nails, it's also perfect for leveling nail unevenness and achieving a healthy, glossy finish on natural nails. For both professional and home use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **KillyS Buffy Block 4-Sided Nail Buffer Block**:
â­ Start with the coarse side to smooth out any ridges or imperfections.
â­ Move to the medium side for refining the nail surface.
â­ Use the fine side for a brilliant, high-gloss finish.
â­ Gently glide each side over the nail surface, avoiding excessive buffing to maintain nail health and strength.
â­ Perfect for both professional salon and home manicures.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **KillyS Buffy Block 4-Sided Nail Buffer Block**:
â­ Ethylene-vinyl acetate sponge.
â­ Aluminum carbide.

#KillyS #NailBuffer #NailBuffing #NailCare #HealthyNails #PedicureTools #Manicure #BeautyTools #SalonQuality #SaudiBeauty

title_en: Killys Nail File 180/240 Curved Pink Floral Design
title_ar: ÙƒÙŠÙ„ÙŠØ² Ù…Ø¨Ø±Ø¯ Ø£Ø¸Ø§ÙØ± 180/240 Ù…Ù†Ø­Ù†ÙŠ Ø¨Ù†Ù‚Ø´Ø© Ø²Ù‡Ø±ÙŠØ© ÙˆØ±Ø¯ÙŠØ©
description_en:
Experience a touch of elegance with the **Killys Nail File 180/240 Curved Pink Floral Design**. This classic 180/240 grit nail file is ideal for the natural nail plate, expertly shortening, shaping, and smoothing nail edges. Its charming floral design transforms nail styling into a delightful experience. The delicate, very fine-grained 240-360 grit side is perfect for shortening brittle, thin, and delicate nails. For best results, file nails in one direction from side to tip to prevent splitting, then use the finer side for a perfectly smooth finish.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Killys Nail File 180/240 Curved Pink Floral Design**:
â­ Choose the appropriate grit or coarseness based on your nail type and needs.
â­ Hold the file securely, positioning it at the edge of your nail.
â­ Gently file your nails in one direction, starting from the outer edge towards the center.
â­ Avoid using a sawing motion to prevent splitting.
â­ Shape nails to your desired length and style, keeping them symmetrical.
â­ Smooth rough edges by buffing lightly with the finer side.
â­ Clean with a soft brush or damp cloth after each use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Killys Nail File 180/240 Curved Pink Floral Design**:
â­ Ethylene
â­ Vinyl acetate
â­ SANDPAPER
â­ Polypropylene

description_en:
Discover the difference with the **KillyS Biodegradable Round Hairbrush Made From Coffee Grounds**, expertly designed to offer a superior brushing experience while being kind to the planet. This brush boasts a unique composition, with 70% natural ingredients including coffee grounds, making it a sustainable and earth-friendly choice. Its ergonomic oval shape is perfect for all hair types, and the comfortable handle ensures ease of use and control during styling.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **KillyS Biodegradable Round Hairbrush Made From Coffee Grounds**
â­ Ideal for use on both dry and wet hair, simplifying your grooming routine.
â­ To tackle tangles, start brushing from the ends, gradually working your way up to the roots for smooth, manageable hair.
â­ Clean the hairbrush regularly with warm water and mild shampoo, gently removing any hair or product buildup.
â­ Allow the brush to air dry completely before using it again.
â­ Store the hairbrush in a clean, dry place away from sunlight to maintain its quality.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **KillyS Biodegradable Round Hairbrush Made From Coffee Grounds**
â­ Coffee Grounds
â­ NYLON
â­ Polypropylene
â­ Thermoplastic rubber

#KillyS #Hairbrush #HairCare #HairStyling #SustainableBeauty #EcoFriendlyProducts #HairGoals #HealthyHair #BeautyTools #SaudiBeauty

description_en:
KillyS Flexi Hair Brush Pink: Unmatched detangling for a healthy scalp and lustrous hair. This flexible brush features an innovative design with airflow, making it perfect for scalp massage while you comb. Its springy pins are specifically designed to gently detangle knots, making it suitable for all hair types, including fine and damaged hair. It's also a fantastic tool for evenly distributing conditioner or hair masks onto wet hair. The KillyS Flexi Hair Brush Pink is lightweight, easy to clean, and has a comfortable handle for a smooth styling experience.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **KillyS Flexi Hair Brush Pink**:
â­ Use on both dry and wet hair for effective detangling.
â­ Start brushing from the ends and work your way up to the roots for smooth, manageable hair.
â­ After each use, remove accumulated hair to keep the brush clean and prevent germ buildup.
â­ Wash the brush regularly with lukewarm water and a little mild shampoo or soap.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **KillyS Flexi Hair Brush Pink**:
â­ Acrylonitrile Butadiene Styrene (ABS)
â­ Nylon

description_en:
Achieve perfect nails with the **Killys Professional Dual-Ended Nail Pusher Rose Gold**. This hybrid tool is designed for efficient hybrid nail polish removal, crafted from durable stainless steel in a trendy rose gold color that adds a touch of elegance. Recommended for both professional and home use, it is suitable for sterilization, ensuring the highest hygiene standards. The anti-slip grip guarantees superior accuracy and unparalleled comfort during use, making nail care an enjoyable and effortless experience.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Killys Professional Dual-Ended Nail Pusher Rose Gold**:
â­ Start by gently pushing back cuticles using the curved end, being careful not to apply too much pressure.
â­ Use the flat end to clean under the nails, gently lifting away any debris or buildup.
â­ For best results, use after soaking hands in warm, soapy water to soften the cuticles and nails.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Killys Professional Dual-Ended Nail Pusher Rose Gold**:
â­ High-quality stainless steel.

title_ar: ÙƒÙŠÙ„ÙŠØ² Ù…Ø¨Ø±Ø¯ Ø£Ø¸Ø§ÙØ± Ø§Ø­ØªØ±Ø§ÙÙŠ 240/180 - Ù„Ù„Ø£ÙƒØ±ÙŠÙ„ÙŠÙƒ ÙˆØ§Ù„Ø·Ø¨ÙŠØ¹ÙŠØ©
description_en:
Introducing the professional **Killys** nail file, meticulously designed for the natural nail plate. This file is perfect for efficiently shortening, shaping, and smoothing your nail edges. Featuring active aluminum oxide, **Killys** boasts superior durability and hardness, ensuring long-lasting performance. Its innovative shape allows for precise, quick, and safe nail filing, even close to the cuticles, while its wide surface provides up to 30% more abrasive area for faster results.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Killys**:
â­ Choose the appropriate grit based on your nail type and needs.
â­ Hold the file securely and position it at the edge of your nail.
â­ Gently file your nails in one direction, starting from the outer edge towards the center.
â­ Avoid a sawing motion to prevent nail splitting.
â­ Shape your nails to your desired length and style, maintaining symmetry.
â­ Smooth rough edges with light buffing.
â­ Use the finer side to refine and polish the edges.
â­ Clean the file with a soft brush or damp cloth after each use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Killys**:
â­ Ethylene-vinyl acetate
â­ SANDPAPER
â­ Polypropylene

description_en:
Discover professional nail care wherever you go with the **Killys Set Of 5 Manicure Tools In Case**. This compact and elegant set is perfect for travel, providing you with everything needed to maintain impeccably shaped nails. The set includes high-quality tools designed for precision and comfort.

â­ Sharp scissors for precise trimming.
â­ Robust nail clippers for comfortable use.
â­ Gentle cuticle nippers for tidying cuticles.
â­ Sapphire file for shaping nails.
â­ Probe for cleaning under the nail.
â­ Cuticle pusher for lifting cuticles.
â­ Additional cuticle trimmer for precise detailing.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Killys Set Of 5 Manicure Tools In Case**:
â­ Use the tools regularly to maintain the cleanliness and beauty of your nails.
â­ After each use, thoroughly dry the tools and store them in the elegant case.
â­ It is recommended to keep the set out of reach of children.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Killys Set Of 5 Manicure Tools In Case**:
â­ ZINC
â­ POLYURETHANE 100%
â­ STAINLESS STEEL
â­ STEEL
â­ SUEDE

title_en: KillyS Nail File 180/240 Curved - Softness and Elegance for Your Nails
title_ar: ÙƒÙŠÙ„ÙŠØ² Ù…Ø¨Ø±Ø¯ Ø£Ø¸Ø§ÙØ± 180/240 Ù…Ù†Ø­Ù†ÙŠ - Ù†Ø¹ÙˆÙ…Ø© ÙˆØ±Ù‚Ø© Ù„Ø£Ø¸Ø§ÙØ±Ùƒ
description_en:
Achieve perfectly shaped nails with the **KillyS Nail File 180/240 Curved**. Specifically designed for natural nail care, this file, with its balanced 180/240 grit combination, effectively shortens, shapes, and smooths your nail edges. Its floral design adds a touch of joy to your nail styling routine, making it a delightful experience. It features a 240-360 grit side for delicate, thin, and brittle nails, and a 160-230 grit side for shortening and shaping natural nails. For optimal results, use the coarser grit sections to shorten nails, then transition to the finer sections to smooth edges and prevent splitting.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **KillyS Nail File 180/240 Curved**:
â­ Choose the appropriate grit or coarseness of the nail file based on your nail type and needs.
â­ Hold the file securely, positioning it at the edge of your nail.
â­ Gently file your nails in one direction, starting from the outer edge towards the center.
â­ Avoid using a sawing motion to prevent splitting.
â­ Shape nails to your desired length and style, keeping them symmetrical.
â­ Smooth rough edges by buffing lightly.
â­ Use the finer side to refine and polish edges.
â­ Clean with a soft brush or damp cloth after each use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **KillyS Nail File 180/240 Curved**:
â­ Ethylene
â­ Vinyl Acetate
â­ Sandpaper
â­ Polypropylene

#KillyS #NailFile #NailCare #NaturalNails #NailBeauty #HealthyNails #BeautyTools #SaudiArabia #Dubai #Kuwait

title_ar: ÙƒÙŠÙ„ÙŠØ² Ø§Ø³ÙÙ†Ø¬Ø© Ù…ÙƒÙŠØ§Ø¬ Ù‚Ø·Ø±Ø© ØºÙ†ÙŠØ© Ø¨Ø®Ù„Ø§ØµØ© Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø§Ù†Ø¬Ùˆ - Ù†Ø¹ÙˆÙ…Ø© ÙØ§Ø¦Ù‚Ø© ÙˆØªØ·Ø¨ÙŠÙ‚ Ø§Ø­ØªØ±Ø§ÙÙŠ
description_en:
Experience unparalleled softness with the **KillyS Makeup Sponge Drop Shape Infused With Mango Extract**. This ultra-soft sponge is designed to distribute cosmetics precisely and evenly, giving you perfectly smooth skin. Enriched with mango extract, known for its potent antioxidants, the **KillyS Makeup Sponge Drop Shape Infused With Mango Extract** helps protect your skin from sun damage, while intensively moisturizing, smoothing, and firming the epidermis. Achieve a professional, long-lasting makeup application with this essential tool.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **KillyS Makeup Sponge Drop Shape Infused With Mango Extract**

â­ Use the precise tip to apply cosmetic around the eyes and hard-to-reach places.
â­ Using the round surface, apply cosmetic to larger parts of the face in a stamping motion.
â­ Wet and squeeze the sponge before use.
â­ Clean your makeup sponge after each use with gentle soap and water.
â­ Allow the sponge to air dry thoroughly before storing it.
â­ Replace the sponge every few months to maintain hygiene and ensure optimal makeup application.
â­ Store in a dry place away from sunlight.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **KillyS Makeup Sponge Drop Shape Infused With Mango Extract**

â­ SILICONE ASH POWDER
â­ Polyurethane
â­ Water

#KillyS #MakeupSponge #Makeup #SmoothSkin #Mango #Cosmetics #MakeupTools #SaudiArabia #Jeddah #Riyadh

description_en:
**KillyS 3D Makeup Sponge Slanted Edge Pink** is an innovative tool featuring a unique structure and shape to facilitate the application of cosmetics on the entire surface of the face and in all its folds. The **KillyS 3D Makeup Sponge Slanted Edge Pink** perfectly distributes cosmetics without leaving trails. When combined with water, it becomes exceptionally soft and does not absorb cosmetics, ensuring a flawless application with every use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **KillyS 3D Makeup Sponge Slanted Edge Pink**
â­ Use the slanted edge for larger parts of the face, such as the cheeks and forehead.
â­ Use the conical edge for areas that are more difficult to access, like around the eyes, nose, and mouth, for precise and even coverage.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **KillyS 3D Makeup Sponge Slanted Edge Pink**
â­ HYDROPHILIC POLYURETHANE

description_en:
Discover versatility and style with **Killys Small Hair Clips**, the perfect solution for securing your hair safely and elegantly. These colorful clips, in a pack of 18, are crafted from premium materials to ensure durability and long-lasting use, all while keeping your hair healthy without any damage. Their practical design guarantees a secure hold, making it easy for you to create trendy and attractive hairstyles with ease. Whether you're looking for a daily beauty touch-up or a practical solution to keep your hair in place during showering, face washing, or makeup application, **Killys Small Hair Clips** are your ideal choice. Suitable for all age groups, from young girls to women, and adaptable to various hair types and styles, including curly hair, long hair, and ponytails.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Killys Small Hair Clips**
â­ Use the clips to secure sections of hair for various hairstyles.
â­ Can be used to hold side or front hair away from the face.
â­ Ideal for securing hair during makeup application or showering.
â­ Easy to apply and remove without pulling or tugging the hair.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Killys Small Hair Clips**
â­ High-quality and durable materials.
â­ Hair-safe design.
â­ Assorted and attractive colors.

description_en:
Achieve an unforgettable eye look with **KillyS Eyeshadow Applicators 6 Pcs**. This luxurious set, inspired by the "Botanical Inspiration" collection, is specifically designed to give you a professional eyeshadow application. Crafted from premium-quality latex, the sponges ensure even product distribution on your eyelid, while the applicator's conical shape provides absolute precision for defining your eyes with stunning accuracy. Whether you're using loose or pressed eyeshadows, these applicators will be your secret weapon to enhance your eye beauty.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **KillyS Eyeshadow Applicators 6 Pcs**:
â­ Choose your desired eyeshadow colors, tapping off any excess.
â­ Apply the eyeshadow using the flat side of the applicator, beginning from the inner corner and blending outwards.
â­ Use the rounded or tapered end to blend multiple colors along the crease for a seamless, professional look.
â­ Layer eyeshadow for added intensity and depth, if desired.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **KillyS Eyeshadow Applicators 6 Pcs**:
â­ Polypropylene
â­ Sponge
â­ Aluminum

#KillyS #MakeupTools #Eyeshadow #EyeMakeup #EyeshadowApplication #MakeupBrushes #BeautifulEyes #Cosmetics #ProfessionalMakeup #SaudiBeauty

title_ar: ÙƒÙŠÙ„ÙŠØ² Ù…Ø¨Ø±Ø¯ Ø£Ø¸Ø§ÙØ± Ø§Ø­ØªØ±Ø§ÙÙŠ Ù„Ù„Ø£ÙƒØ±ÙŠÙ„ÙŠÙƒ ÙˆØ§Ù„Ø·Ø¨ÙŠØ¹ÙŠØ© - 2 Ù‚Ø·Ø¹Ø©
description_en:
Achieve perfect nails with the professional nail file set from **Killys**! Designed for both artificial and natural nails, the 100/180 grit file effectively shortens nails, while the 240/320 grit file precisely shapes and smooths nail edges. The files feature active aluminum oxide, providing superior durability and hardness. Their rounded shape ensures precise and safe filing close to the cuticles without irritation. This set includes two files with different gradations to meet all your nail care needs.

â­ Features & Benefits:
â­ Professional files for artificial and natural nails.
â­ Contains active aluminum oxide for enhanced durability.
â­ Rounded shape for precise and safe use near cuticles.
â­ Includes two files with different gradations (100/180 & 240/320).
â­ Ideal for shortening, shaping, and smoothing nails.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Killys**:
â­ Choose the appropriate grit or coarseness based on your nail type and needs.
â­ Hold the file securely, positioning it at the edge of your nail.
â­ Gently file your nails in one direction, starting from the outer edge towards the center.
â­ Avoid a sawing motion to prevent nail splitting.
â­ Shape nails to your desired length and style, ensuring symmetry.
â­ Smooth rough edges by buffing lightly.
â­ Use the finer side to refine and polish edges.
â­ Clean the file with a soft brush or damp cloth after each use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Killys**:
â­ Ethylene-vinyl acetate
â­ SANDPAPER
â­ polypropylene

description_en: Discover the magic of feminine beauty with the **Killys Highlighter Brush 03 Pastelove Gr Tea**. This unique collection is inspired by vibrant colors and the happiness of life, specifically designed to enhance your natural beauty. This brush features bristles enriched with green tea powder, known for its soothing, antibacterial, and antioxidant properties, offering your skin extra care. The **Killys Highlighter Brush 03 Pastelove Gr Tea** allows you to apply loose and wet products with exceptional precision. Its ultra-soft, specially shaped bristles make it easy to highlight your cheekbones and illuminate your complexion, giving you a healthy, luminous look.

description_en:
Say goodbye to tangles with the Killys Tangle Brush&Go Ombre Brush! Detangle and smooth your hair with this innovative brush. Its flexible and resilient bristles gently massage your scalp while combing, effectively separating hair strands for a smooth and shiny finish. Featuring two-length flexible bristles with double the power, you can comb your hair without any pulling or dragging. The Killys Tangle Brush&Go Ombre Brush is perfect for all hair types â€“ straight and curly, natural and colored. It's also ideal for brushing wet and dry hair without breaking your hair structure.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Killys Tangle Brush&Go Ombre Brush**:

â­ Hold the hairbrush firmly and gently brush through your hair, starting from the ends and working your way up to the roots.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Killys Tangle Brush&Go Ombre Brush**:

â­ POLIPROPYLENE

description_en:
Discover the magic of radiance with the **KillyS Bubble Highlighter Brush**, expertly crafted to give your skin a natural, healthy glow. This luxurious brush features ultra-soft bristles and a specially profiled shape that effortlessly applies highlighter to your cheekbones, brow bones, and the bridge of your nose, accentuating your best features with the enchanting, pastel hues inspired by soap bubbles. Infuse your look with positive energy and vibrant life with this elegant tool.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **KillyS Bubble Highlighter Brush**:
â­ Gently swirl the highlighter brush into your chosen highlighter product, tapping off any excess.
â­ Apply the highlighter to the high points of your face, such as the cheekbones, brow bones, and the bridge of the nose, using light sweeping motions.
â­ Blend the highlighter for a natural, captivating glow.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **KillyS Bubble Highlighter Brush**:
â­ Aluminum
â­ Wood
â­ PBT - Polybutylene terephthalate

description_en:
Experience precision and hygiene with the **Killys Handy Nail Clipper With Container**. This nail clipper is designed to cut your nails with ultimate accuracy, giving you a perfect rounding with every use. Its practical container ensures your trimmed nails stay contained, preventing scattering and maintaining cleanliness. Enjoy an easy and comfortable nail care experience with the **Killys Handy Nail Clipper With Container**.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Killys Handy Nail Clipper With Container**
â­ Hold the clipper firmly in your dominant hand.
â­ Position the clipper's blades at the edge of your nail.
â­ Gently squeeze the handles to trim the nail in a smooth, straight line.
â­ Avoid cutting too close to the skin to prevent injury or ingrown nails.
â­ Repeat the process for each nail, ensuring to trim them evenly and to your desired length.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Killys Handy Nail Clipper With Container**
â­ Acrylonitrile Butadiene Styrene (ABS)
â­ Polypropylene (PP)
â­ STAINLESS STEEL
â­ Carbon Steel

description_en:
Introducing the **Killys Nail Scissors**, your go-to tool for perfectly shaped nails and healthy cuticles. Crafted from premium stainless steel with a sleek glossy-matt finish, these scissors boast sharp, straight blades and comfortable handles for precise and effortless cuticle trimming. The **Killys Nail Scissors** are ideal for both professional salon use and everyday home manicures.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Killys Nail Scissors**:
â­ Ensure your nails are clean and dry before trimming.
â­ Hold the scissors firmly and position the blades at the edge of your nail or cuticle.
â­ Gently squeeze the handles to cut the nail or cuticle with precision.
â­ For best results, trim nails straight across to prevent ingrown nails.
â­ Use a nail file to smooth any rough edges after trimming.
â­ Can be sterilized in an autoclave for optimal hygiene.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Killys Nail Scissors**:
â­ High-quality stainless steel with a glossy-matt finish.

description_en:
Achieve perfect makeup with the **KillyS Makeup Sponge Violet**. This 3D, latex-free makeup sponge boasts a unique structure that becomes ultra-soft when damp, ensuring no product absorption. Its specialized shape makes flawless makeup application effortless, blending smooth and creamy products seamlessly.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **KillyS Makeup Sponge Violet**:
â­ Apply makeup with a stamping motion on larger areas of the face like cheeks and forehead.
â­ Utilize the precision tip for hard-to-reach areas around the eyes, nose, and mouth.
â­ Clean your makeup sponge after each use with gentle soap and water.
â­ Allow the sponge to air dry thoroughly before storing.
â­ Replace the sponge every few months to maintain hygiene and ensure optimal makeup application.
â­ Store in a dry place away from sunlight.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **KillyS Makeup Sponge Violet**:
â­ Hydrophilic Polyurethane.

description_en:
Elevate your style with the Killys Blue Pastel Butterfly Scrunchie. Featuring a soft pastel blue hue and a charming butterfly design, it adds a gentle and elegant touch to any hairstyle. Designed for a comfortable and secure hold, it keeps your hair in place without causing damage or pulling. Perfect for everyday use, this versatile scrunchie is ideal for creating stylish ponytails, chic buns, or as a trendy accessory on your wrist.

â­ Soft blue pastel color adds a gentle, stylish touch.
â­ Unique and charming butterfly design.
â­ Provides a comfortable and secure hold without hair damage.
â­ Ideal for everyday use and versatile for various hairstyles.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Killys Blue Pastel Butterfly Scrunchie**:
â­ Simply gather your hair and wrap the scrunchie around your ponytail or bun to secure it.
â­ Wear it on your wrist as a stylish accessory when not in use.
â­ Suitable for all hair types to create a variety of looks.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Killys Blue Pastel Butterfly Scrunchie**:
â­ High-quality fabric (e.g., polyester or cotton blend).

description_en:
Experience unparalleled softness with the **KillyS Makeup Sponge** Drop Shape, enriched with avocado extract. This ultra-soft sponge is designed for precise application and even blending of your favorite cosmetics, leaving your skin looking flawlessly smooth and silky. The hydrating avocado extract works to enhance skin elasticity, reduce the appearance of fine lines, and boost skin's immunity against stress.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **KillyS Makeup Sponge**:
â­ Use the precision conical tip to apply makeup around the eyes and hard-to-reach areas.
â­ Apply cosmetic to larger parts of the face with the round surface using a stamping movement.
â­ Wet and squeeze the sponge before use for optimal results.
â­ Clean your makeup sponge after each use with gentle soap and water.
â­ Allow the sponge to air dry thoroughly before storing it.
â­ Replace the sponge every few months to maintain hygiene and ensure optimal makeup application.
â­ Store in a dry place away from sunlight.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **KillyS Makeup Sponge**:
â­ SILICONE ASH POWDER
â­ Polyurethane

**KillyS Nail Clipper Large** features a perfectly profiled blade that easily cuts even hard toenails. Its elegant and aesthetic design makes it not only an indispensable tool for foot care but also a nice gadget in every woman's makeup bag.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **KillyS Nail Clipper Large**

â­ Hold the clipper firmly in your dominant hand and position it at the edge of your nail.
â­ Gently squeeze the handles to trim the nail in a smooth, straight line.
â­ Be careful not to cut too close to the skin to avoid injury or ingrown nails.
â­ Repeat the process for each nail, ensuring to trim them evenly and to your desired length.

Discover your ultimate hair companion with the **Killys Biodegradable Hairbrush Made Of Coffee Grounds - Vent**. Designed with the environment in mind, this brush is biodegradable and made from 70% natural, sustainable ingredients, making it a perfect choice for eco-conscious individuals. Its oval shape ensures a perfect fit for all hair types, while the ergonomic handle provides a smooth and enjoyable user experience. It's more than just a brush; it's a step towards a more sustainable future.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Killys Biodegradable Hairbrush Made Of Coffee Grounds - Vent**:
â­ Versatile for use on both dry and wet hair, our hairbrush simplifies your grooming routine.
â­ To tackle tangles, begin brushing from the ends, working your way up to the roots for smooth, manageable hair.
â­ Clean the hairbrush regularly with warm water and mild shampoo, gently removing any hair or product buildup.
â­ Allow the brush to air dry completely before using it again.
â­ Store the hairbrush in a clean, dry place to maintain its quality.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Killys Biodegradable Hairbrush Made Of Coffee Grounds - Vent**:
â­ COFFEE GROUNDS
â­ NYLON
â­ Polypropylene
â­ Thermoplastic rubber

#Killys #Hairbrush #EcoFriendly #Haircare #HairStyling #SustainableProducts #MadeInKSA #HealthyHair #Beauty #SaudiBeauty

description_en:
Achieve perfectly shaped nails with the **KillyS Nail Scissors Floralove Collection**. Designed with safe and sharp blades, these scissors ensure maximum cutting precision, leaving your nails smooth without chipping or damage. The practical, profiled handles offer superior maneuverability during your manicure routine, making them an essential tool for nail care. 

â­ Sharp, precise blades for perfect cuts.
â­ Ergonomic handle design for comfortable use.
â­ Leaves nails smooth and free from damage.
â­ Ideal for professional manicures and pedicures.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **KillyS Nail Scissors Floralove Collection**:
â­ Ensure your nails are clean and dry before trimming.
â­ Hold the nail scissors firmly and position them at the edge of your nail.
â­ Gently squeeze the handles to cut the nail in a straight line.
â­ Trim nails in small sections to avoid overcutting.
â­ For best results, trim nails straight across to prevent ingrown nails.
â­ Use a nail file to smooth any rough edges after trimming.
â­ Clean scissors with mild soap and water after use and dry thoroughly.
â­ Store in a dry, clean place.
â­ Replace if dull or damaged for safe use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **KillyS Nail Scissors Floralove Collection**:
â­ STAINLESS STEEL

description_en:
**KillyS Eyeshadow Blending Set Pastelove Collection Green Tea**

Discover the secret to feminine beauty with the **KillyS Eyeshadow Blending Set Pastelove Collection Green Tea**. Crafted with passion, these premium brushes are enriched with green tea powder, renowned for its soothing, antibacterial, and antioxidant properties. This set allows for precise blending and seamless application of shadows and pigments, with specially shaped bristles that conform to the eyelid for flawless application.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **KillyS Eyeshadow Blending Set Pastelove Collection Green Tea**

â­ For a perfectly highlighted eye, use brush #04 to apply eyeshadows all over the eyelid, usable wet or dry.
â­ With brush #05, precisely apply the darker shade at the crease of the eyelid and the outer corner of the eye.
â­ Smudge the borders between the shadows and blend the colors for a seamless transition.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **KillyS Eyeshadow Blending Set Pastelove Collection Green Tea**

â­ Aluminum
â­ Wood
â­ Nylon
â­ Green tea extract

description_en:
Discover elegance and practicality with **KillyS Hair Snap Clips, Shades Of Red, 10 Pcs**. These carefully designed clips offer superior hair hold without any damage. Their smooth, polished teeth ensure they do not harm your delicate hair structure, making them ideal for separating hair strands during styling. Enjoy this set of stylish hair clips in vibrant shades of red that will add a touch of beauty to your hairstyle.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **KillyS Hair Snap Clips, Shades Of Red, 10 Pcs**:
â­ Use the clips to secure hair strands while styling or to hold hair away from the face.
â­ Gently place the clips onto the hair to ensure ease of use and prevent pulling.
â­ Can be used to section hair when applying makeup or during hair treatments.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **KillyS Hair Snap Clips, Shades Of Red, 10 Pcs**:
â­ High-quality materials for durability and longevity.

description_en:
Discover elegance and distinction with the **KillyS Bubble** Eye & Eyebrow Brush Set, a collection of seven brushes in fashionable pastel shades inspired by the enchanting reflections of soap bubbles. This delicate and positive energy-filled set provides you with the perfect tools to enhance the beauty of your eyes and eyebrows.

Each brush in the **KillyS Bubble** collection excels at precisely applying wet and dry cosmetics onto the eyelid and eyebrows. The soft and flattened bristles ensure an ideal distribution of eye makeup base, eyeshadows, and concealer, while the dense, precisely cut bristles allow for effective product application on the eyebrows, achieving perfect definition.

â­ Consists of seven brushes in trendy pastel shades.
â­ Design inspired by the rainbow reflections of soap bubbles.
â­ Soft and flattened bristles for even eye makeup distribution.
â­ Dense and precise bristles for professional eyebrow application.
â­ Ideal for applying both wet and dry products.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **KillyS Bubble**
â­ Clean your **KillyS Bubble** brushes regularly with a gentle cleaner or mild soap and water.
â­ Reshape the bristles after cleaning and allow them to air dry completely.
â­ Store the brushes in a dry place away from sunlight.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **KillyS Bubble**
â­ Aluminum
â­ Wood
â­ PBT - Polybutylene terephthalate

description_en:
Add a touch of elegance and gentleness to your hairstyle with the Killys Lavender Pastel Scrunchie. This scrunchie features a soft lavender hue, offering a uniquely stylish accent to any hairdo, making it the perfect everyday accessory. Crafted from ultra-soft fabric, it ensures a comfortable and secure hold without causing any damage to your hair. Whether you desire a chic ponytail, a neat bun, or even a trendy wrist accessory, the Killys Lavender Pastel Scrunchie meets all your needs.

â­ Elegant lavender pastel color adds a sophisticated and gentle touch.
â­ Soft, comfortable design protects your hair from damage.
â­ Secure and comfortable hold for daily use.
â­ Versatile: ideal for ponytails, buns, or as a wrist accessory.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for Killys Lavender Pastel Scrunchie:
â­ Simply gather your hair and wrap the scrunchie around your ponytail or bun to secure it.
â­ For an ideal hold, position the scrunchie where desired and gently stretch it around the hair.
â­ Can be worn as a playful wrist accessory when not in use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of Killys Lavender Pastel Scrunchie:
â­ Soft fabric (such as polyester or a cotton blend).

description_en:
Discover playful elegance with the **Killys Kids Pink Checkered Headband With A Bow**. This headband adds a trendy and captivating touch to your child's hairstyle with its cute pink checkered design and charming bow, crafted from soft, comfortable fabric for ultimate all-day wear. It's the perfect choice to add a special flair to everyday occasions or special celebrations, keeping hair neatly styled and enhancing your child's look.

â­ Attractive pink checkered pattern with a stylish bow for a playful, chic touch.
â­ Soft and comfortable design ensures a secure fit without any discomfort, ideal for extended wear.
â­ Perfect for school, play, or special occasions, this headband keeps hair neatly in place and beautifully styled.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Killys Kids Pink Checkered Headband With A Bow**:
â­ Place the headband on your child's head, adjusting it for a comfortable fit.
â­ Use the bow to adorn a ponytail, bun, or loose hairstyle.
â­ Ideal for various looks, from casual to formal, to add a distinctive touch of elegance.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Killys Kids Pink Checkered Headband With A Bow**:
â­ High-quality fabric with a pink checkered pattern for the bow and design.
â­ Elastic material to ensure a secure and comfortable fit without pulling.

title_ar: Ù…Ø¬Ù…ÙˆØ¹Ø© ÙØ±Ø´ Ø¸Ù„Ø§Ù„ Ø§Ù„Ø¹ÙŠÙˆÙ† ÙƒÙŠÙ„ÙŠØ² Ø¨Ø§Ø¨Ù„
description_en:
Discover the magic of color with the **KillyS Bubble Eyeshadow Brush Set**. This elegant collection features seven brushes in delicate pastel shades, inspired by the rainbow reflections of soap bubbles, to give you a dreamy look full of positive energy. These brushes are meticulously designed for precise and smooth application and blending of pressed, loose, and cream eyeshadows. The soft bristles ensure even color distribution across your entire eyelid, providing professional results with a light touch.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **KillyS Bubble Eyeshadow Brush Set**
â­ A brush designed for precise application of eyeshadows.
â­ The practical, rounded shape of the bristles allows for precise shadow application to the lower eyelid and the eyelid crease.
â­ To maintain brush quality, clean regularly with a gentle brush cleaner or mild soap and water.
â­ Reshape the bristles while wet as needed.
â­ Allow the brush to air dry completely before storing in a clean, dry place.
â­ Store in a dry place away from sunlight.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **KillyS Bubble Eyeshadow Brush Set**
â­ Aluminum
â­ Wood
â­ PBT - Polybutylene terephthalate

title_en: Zain Anti-Lice Comb With Hand - The Ultimate Solution for Lice-Free Hair
title_ar: Ø²ÙŠÙ† Ù…Ø´Ø· Ø§Ù„Ù‚Ù…Ù„ Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø¹Ø¯Ù†ÙŠ Ø¨ÙŠØ¯ - Ø§Ù„Ø­Ù„ Ø§Ù„Ø£Ù…Ø«Ù„ Ù„Ø´Ø¹Ø± Ø®Ø§Ù„Ù Ù…Ù† Ø§Ù„Ù‚Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Getting rid of lice is no longer a difficult task with the **Zain Anti-Lice Comb With Hand**. This innovative comb is designed for highly efficient removal of lice and nits, even the most stubborn ones. It features fine, closely spaced needles made of stainless steel to ensure all lice are captured. Its compact and lightweight design with a comfortable handle makes it easy to carry and use anywhere.

**Product Features:**
â­ Fine and closely spaced needles for maximum effectiveness.
â­ Made from high-quality stainless steel.
â­ Compact and lightweight design for easy portability.
â­ Available in an elegant green color.
â­ Comfortable handle for a better grip during use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Zain Anti-Lice Comb With Hand**:
â­ Wash hair thoroughly with a medicated shampoo and conditioner.
â­ Dry hair with a clean towel, and avoid using a hairdryer.
â­ Place a towel over the shoulders to catch falling lice.
â­ Section the hair into small parts using clips.
â­ Begin combing each section from the scalp to ensure thorough removal of lice and nits.
â­ After finishing, safely dispose of the used towel.
â­ Rinse hair again with shampoo to remove any residue.
â­ Dry hair with a clean towel.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Zain Anti-Lice Comb With Hand**:
â­ Stainless Steel (Needles).
â­ Plastic (Handle).

#LiceTreatment #AntiLiceComb #HairHealth #HairCare #HealthyHair #SaudiArabia #HairProducts #LicePrevention #HairLoss #HairHygiene

The **Killys** Kids Set offers a stylish and practical hair accessory solution for your child, featuring a comfortable headband and snap clips in a versatile navy blue. The navy blue color complements a wide range of outfits and occasions, adding an elegant touch. The headband ensures a comfortable fit, while the snap clips keep hair securely in place for a neat and fashionable style throughout the day.

â­ The set includes 1 headband and 2 snap clips in navy blue for a complete hair accessory solution.
â­ The navy blue color provides a versatile and elegant look that matches various outfits.
â­ The headband offers a comfortable fit, while the snap clips keep hair securely in place for a neat and stylish look all day.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Killys**:
â­ Use the headband to gently hold hair back or add a stylish touch to your child's hairstyle.
â­ Secure sections of hair with the snap clips for a polished and well-organized look.
â­ Ideal for both everyday wear and more formal occasions, adding elegance and practicality to any hairstyle.

description_en:
**Killys Set Of 15 Brushes For Nail Art** is your ultimate toolkit to unleash your creativity in the world of nail art. This comprehensive set features 15 meticulously designed brushes, perfect for precise gel application and crafting beautiful artistic decorations. Whether you're a professional nail artist or enjoy DIY nail art at home, these brushes will help you achieve stunning results and master various techniques.

â­ A complete set of 15 professional nail art brushes.
â­ Ideal for gel application, French manicure design, and creating intricate decorations.
â­ Includes a dotting tool, angled brushes for French manicure and gel application, straight brushes for one-stroke techniques, fans for glitter and rhinestones, and fine brushes for detailed lines.
â­ High-quality construction suitable for both professional and home use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Killys Set Of 15 Brushes For Nail Art**:
â­ Utilize the appropriate brushes for each nail art technique to create unique and magnificent nail styles.
â­ Select the right brush for the desired line length or pattern size.
â­ Let your creativity flow to achieve the most beautiful patterns and decorations.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Killys Set Of 15 Brushes For Nail Art**:
â­ High-quality Nylon bristles for excellent durability and flexibility.
â­ Comfortable and sturdy handles made from Aluminium and Polypropylene.

title_ar: Ù…Ù‚Øµ Ø£Ø¸Ø§ÙØ± ÙƒÙŠÙ„ÙŠØ² ÙÙ„ÙˆØ±Ø§Ù„ÙˆÙ Ø§Ù„ÙˆØ±Ø¯ÙŠ - Ø¯Ù‚Ø© ÙˆØ¹Ù†Ø§ÙŠØ© ÙØ§Ø¦Ù‚Ø©
description_en:
Experience precision and beauty with the **KillyS Nail Scissors Floralove Collection Pink**. Featuring safe and sharp blades, these scissors ensure maximum cutting precision, leaving your nails smooth, without chipping or damage. The practical, profiled handles make manicure tasks easier and more comfortable.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **KillyS Nail Scissors Floralove Collection Pink**:
â­ Ensure your nails are clean and dry before trimming.
â­ Hold the nail scissors firmly and position them at the edge of your nail.
â­ Gently squeeze the handles to cut the nail in a straight line.
â­ Trim nails in small sections to avoid overcutting.
â­ For best results, trim nails straight across to prevent ingrown nails.
â­ Use a nail file to smooth any rough edges after trimming.

Beauty Tips:
â­ Remember to give your nails time to rest after invasive procedures and painting.
â­ The manicure detox is a great way to make your nails look healthy and natural.
â­ Massage your favorite oils into the nails and cuticles daily (for a minimum of 2 weeks) for strong and shiny nails.

Caution & Warnings:
â­ Clean scissors with mild soap and water after use and dry thoroughly.
â­ Store in a dry, clean place.
â­ Replace if dull or damaged for safe use.
â­ Store away from sunlight.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **KillyS Nail Scissors Floralove Collection Pink**:
â­ STAINLESS STEEL

description_en:
Add a touch of joy and elegance to your little one's hairstyles with the **Killys** Kids Hair Snap Clips set. This pack of 4 features vibrant pink and white colors adorned with playful pom-pom details, adding a trendy and cheerful flair to any look. Crafted from high-quality, durable materials, these hair clips ensure long-lasting use and a secure, comfortable hold throughout the day without causing any discomfort. Their lightweight design makes them perfect for everyday wear, combining beauty and functionality to keep hair stylishly in place.

â­ Set includes 4 hair snap clips in vibrant pink and white colors with playful pom-pom accents.
â­ Made from high-quality materials for durability and safe use on children's hair.
â­ Provides a strong yet comfortable hold to keep hairstyles in place all day.
â­ Lightweight design is perfect for everyday use and keeps your child's hair neatly styled.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Killys**:
â­ Simply slide the snap clip into the hair at the desired position.
â­ Press the sides of the clip to open it, then release to secure the hair in place.
â­ For best results, use on dry or lightly styled hair.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Killys**:
â­ Metal
â­ Plastic
â­ Fabric

description_en:
Introducing the **KillyS Popsy** Ultra-Light Brush, expertly designed for effortless hair detangling with soft nylon pins that end in gentle massage balls. Its unique, springy, and flexible body provides a soothing scalp massage as you comb, adapting to your head's shape to improve circulation and stimulate hair roots. This promotes healthy hair growth and reduces excessive hair loss. The ergonomic brush shape fits perfectly in your hand, making hair brushing a comfortable and smooth experience. Its super-elastic bristles effectively tackle even the tightest knots without pain or tugging, making it ideal for all hair types â€“ whether straight, curly, fine, or colored.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **KillyS Popsy**:
â­ Gentle brushing without pulling or tugging.
â­ Start by separating small sections of hair and gently comb through, beginning at the ends and working your way up towards the roots.
â­ Can be used on both dry and wet hair.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **KillyS Popsy**:
â­ Acrylonitrile Butadiene Styrene (ABS): 95%
â­ Nylon: 5%

#Killys #HairBrush #DetanglingBrush #HairCare #HealthyHair #HairLoss #HairGrowth #Hairstyling #HairProducts #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Achieve beautifully detangled hair with the **Killys Popsy Ultra-Light Brush**. This ultra-light brush features gentle nylon pins with massage balls on a springy, elastic body. Its unique design massages your scalp as you brush, improving circulation and stimulating hair roots to promote healthier growth and reduce hair loss. The ergonomic shape fits perfectly in your hand, while the super-elastic bristles effortlessly tackle even the most stubborn tangles without pain or pulling. It's the perfect brush for all hair types.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Killys Popsy Ultra-Light Brush**:
â­ Start by separating small sections of hair and gently comb through, starting from the ends and working your way up towards the roots.
â­ Can be used on both dry and wet hair.
â­ Brush gently without pulling or tugging.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Killys Popsy Ultra-Light Brush**:
â­ Acrylonitrile butadiene styrene 95%
â­ Nylon 5%

description_en:
Give your hair the perfect care with **Killys Thin Hair Elastics**, specially designed to suit thin and medium hair types. These elastics are metal-free, ensuring a secure and effective hold without any damage or pulling on your hair strands, allowing you to enjoy a stylish and firmly held ponytail all day long. They are also durable and highly stretchy, as the ponytail holder can easily stretch and quickly resume its original shape, making them an economical and practical choice.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Killys Thin Hair Elastics**:
â­ Gather your hair into your desired hairstyle, whether it's a ponytail, braid, or bun.
â­ Use a **Killys Thin Hair Elastics** to tie your hair securely but gently.
â­ Avoid over-stretching the elastic to maintain its flexibility for the longest possible time.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Killys Thin Hair Elastics**:
â­ High-quality, metal-free elastic materials.
â­ Thin design for ease of use and a discreet look.
â­ Assorted color mix to match all your looks.

The **Killys Kids Butterfly Snap Clips & Scrunchie Set** includes one scrunchie and two butterfly snap clips, providing versatile styling options for your little one's hair. The playful butterfly design adds a touch of whimsy, while the scrunchie offers a gentle and secure hold.

â­ The playful butterfly-shaped clips add a pop of color and fun to any hairstyle.
â­ The scrunchie provides a comfortable and secure hold for your child's hair without causing pulling or damage.
â­ Perfect for both everyday wear and special occasions, keeping your child's hair neat and stylish.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Killys Kids Butterfly Snap Clips & Scrunchie Set**:
â­ Use the scrunchie to create stylish hairstyles like ponytails or buns, ensuring a comfortable, no-damage hold.
â­ Attach the butterfly snap clips to sections of hair for a decorative touch or to secure stray strands.
â­ These accessories are ideal for various looks, from casual to dressed-up, maintaining a neat and attractive hairstyle.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Killys Kids Butterfly Snap Clips & Scrunchie Set**:

description_en:
Add a touch of elegance and joy to your little one's look with the **Killys** Pink Bracelets set, featuring 3 beautifully crafted pieces. Specially designed for young girls, these bracelets boast soft and captivating pink tones that complement any outfit. Thanks to their adjustable design, the **Killys Kids Pink Bracelets 3 Pcs** ensure a comfortable and secure fit for all wrist sizes, making them the perfect choice for daily wear and special occasions. Made from high-quality materials for durability and longevity, these bracelets are the ideal gift for your daughter.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Killys Kids Pink Bracelets 3 Pcs**
â­ Adjust the size of the bracelets to fit your child's wrist comfortably and securely.
â­ You can wear all three bracelets together for a complete look, or style them individually with other outfits.
â­ To maintain their quality, avoid exposing them to harsh chemicals.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Killys Kids Pink Bracelets 3 Pcs**
â­ High-quality elastic string for comfort and durability.
â­ Decorative plastic beads in attractive pink colors.
â­ Easy clasps or ties for simple wearing and removal.

Add a touch of fun and style to your child's look with the **Killys Kids Butterfly Set**. This complete set includes 2 chic Click Clack hair ties, 2 durable elastic bands, and an enchanting butterfly bracelet, offering perfect hair accessories for all occasions. The vibrant butterfly design adds a cheerful touch to any hairstyle, making it the ideal choice for young girls. 

â­ The set includes 2 Click Clack hair ties, 2 elastic bands, and a butterfly bracelet.
â­ The fun and colorful butterfly design adds a unique touch to your child's look.
â­ Durable and secure elastic bands and hair ties ensure a perfect hold without damaging hair.
â­ Ideal for everyday wear and special hairstyles, adding a distinctive aesthetic touch.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Killys Kids Butterfly Set**:
â­ Use the Click Clack hair ties to secure hair or create fun, stylish looks.
â­ Wear the elastic bands for a simple, neat look or to add extra flair to hairstyles.
â­ The butterfly bracelet can be worn on the wrist as a matching accessory to complete the look.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Killys Kids Butterfly Set**:
â­ Durable plastic Click Clack hair ties.
â­ Flexible, high-quality elastic bands.
â­ Charmingly designed butterfly bracelet with safe materials.
â­ Soft fabrics for the butterfly design.

These vibrant and stunning stickers are the perfect choice to express your creativity and give your look a unique flair. **KillyS Rainbow Glow Jewelry Stickers** are suitable for all nail types, whether natural, gel, acrylic, or hybrid, ensuring easy application and professional results every time.

â­ Diverse and dazzling rainbow color designs.
â­ Easy to apply and stick.
â­ Perfect for all nail types.
â­ Give nails a shiny and attractive appearance.
â­ Long-lasting.

description_en:
Discover the power of hold and durability with **KillyS Thick Hair Elastics, Mix Color, 12 Pcs**. Designed to provide a secure and comfortable hold without pulling or damaging hair, making them the perfect choice for your little ones' delicate hair or even your own styling needs. These amazing elastics are easy to put on and take off gently, causing no hair-aches. Perfect for fixing everyday hairstyles like elegant ponytails, beautiful braids, or neat buns. Whether you're looking for a practical solution for fine children's hair or a chic accessory for women, the **KillyS Thick Hair Elastics, Mix Color, 12 Pcs** are your ideal choice.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **KillyS Thick Hair Elastics, Mix Color, 12 Pcs**:
â­ Gently use the hair tie to gather and style hair.
â­ Avoid pulling the hair forcefully when putting on or taking off.
â­ Suitable for all hair types and everyday hairstyles.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **KillyS Thick Hair Elastics, Mix Color, 12 Pcs**:
â­ High-quality elastic material for superior durability.
â­ Vibrant and assorted colors.
â­ Thick design for stronger hold.
â­ Free from sharp metal parts.

**Killys** Kids Hair Snap Clips include 2 glittery heart-shaped clips that add a fun, sparkling touch to any hairstyle. Crafted from durable metal and plastic, these clips provide a secure hold, keeping hair in place comfortably throughout the day. Perfect for everyday use, these stylish clips combine practicality and charm, making them an essential accessory for young girls.

**Product Features:**

â­ Set includes 2 glittery heart-shaped snap clips, perfect for adding sparkle and style to any hairstyle.
â­ Made from durable metal and plastic, ensuring a secure and comfortable hold for all-day wear.
â­ Ideal for everyday use, these clips offer both functionality and a cute, fashionable design for young girls.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Killys**:

â­ Simply slide the snap clip into the hair, positioning it where you want to secure the style.
â­ Press the clip's sides together to open it, then release to close and hold hair in place.
â­ For best results, use on dry or lightly styled hair to keep the clip securely fastened all day.

**Cautions & Warnings:**

â­ Keep out of reach of small children to avoid choking hazards.
â­ Avoid pulling or twisting the clips excessively to prevent damage.
â­ Do not use on wet or damp hair to ensure the clips remain secure and function properly.
â­ Discontinue use if any part of the clip becomes damaged or sharp to prevent injury.

â­ Metal, Plastic, Fabric.

â­ Provides a strong and reliable hold for your hair.

â­ Ideal for sectioning hair strands during styling and creative hairdressing.
â­ Comes in a stylish set of attractive shades of blue.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Killys Hair Snap Clips**:
â­ Use the clips to hold desired sections of hair during haircuts or styling.
â­ Apply them to hair strands for easy separation while applying treatments or styling.
â­ Gently comb the hair after using the clips to detangle any knots.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Killys Hair Snap Clips**:
â­ High-quality, durable plastic materials.
â­ Stylish design in various blue colors.
â­ Carefully polished teeth to ensure no hair scratching.

description_en:
Introducing the **Killys Kids Hair Ties Neon Pink (2 pcs)**, the perfect solution for secure and fun hair ties for your little one. These ties offer a strong, gentle hold without pulling or damaging hair, making them the ideal everyday companion. The vibrant neon pink color adds a splash of joy and liveliness to any hairstyle, delighting children and making hair styling a fun experience.

â­ Features durable and elastic material for a strong, secure hold.
â­ Neon pink color adds a playful and bright touch.
â­ Pack of 2 provides convenience and continuous use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Killys Kids Hair Ties Neon Pink**:
â­ Gather your child's hair and wrap the tie around it securely.
â­ Use on dry or damp hair for comfortable hold throughout the day.
â­ Store in a cool, dry place to maintain elasticity.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Killys Kids Hair Ties Neon Pink**:
â­ High-quality elastic material.
â­ Safe and colorfast dye.

title_en: Zain Anti-Lice Comb with Lens - Effective Lice Removal Solution
title_ar: Ø²ÙŠÙ† Ù…Ø´Ø· Ù‚Ù…Ù„ Ù…Ø¹Ø¯Ù†ÙŠ Ø¨Ø¹Ø¯Ø³Ø© - Ø§Ù„ØªØ®Ù„Øµ Ø§Ù„ÙØ¹Ø§Ù„ Ù…Ù† Ø§Ù„Ù‚Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Say goodbye to pesky lice with the **Zain Anti-Lice Comb with Lens**! This advanced comb is meticulously designed for maximum effectiveness in removing lice and nits from hair and scalp. What sets the **Zain Anti-Lice Comb with Lens** apart is its integrated magnifying lens, allowing you to precisely locate and easily remove lice, ensuring complete eradication. Crafted from high-quality stainless steel, this comb guarantees durability and longevity. Its compact and lightweight design makes it perfect for carrying anywhere, and its bright pink color adds a touch of comfort and appeal.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Zain Anti-Lice Comb with Lens**
â­ Wash hair thoroughly with shampoo (medicated shampoo can also be used).
â­ Apply conditioner to make hair smooth and easier for the comb to pass through.
â­ Dry hair with a towel.
â­ Place a towel over shoulders to collect fallen lice.
â­ Part hair into sections using clips or bands.
â­ Slowly run the comb from the scalp to the ends of each section, avoiding roughness.
â­ Repeat the process at regular intervals for complete lice elimination.
â­ A final shower is recommended after completion.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Zain Anti-Lice Comb with Lens**
â­ High-quality stainless steel.
â­ Integrated magnifying lens.
â­ Comfortable handle (please do not boil the comb in hot water).

#AntiLice #LiceTreatment #HeadLice #HairCare #HairComb #MagnifyingComb #LiceAndNits #HealthyHair #HairProducts #SaudiArabia

title_en: K18 Leave-In Repair Mask - 15ml
title_ar: ÙƒÙŠÙ‡ 18 Ù…Ø§Ø³Ùƒ Ù„Ø¥ØµÙ„Ø§Ø­ Ø§Ù„Ø´Ø¹Ø± Ù„ÙŠÙ Ø§Ù† - 15 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Discover transformative results with the **K18 Leave-In Repair Mask**. This innovative, no-rinse treatment mask is formulated for all hair types, clinically reversing damage in just 4 minutes. Leveraging patented peptide technology, the **K18 Leave-In Repair Mask** restores hair's strength, softness, smoothness, and bounce, repairing damage caused by bleaching, coloring, chemical services, and heat.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **K18 Leave-In Repair Mask**:
â­ In the shower: Shampoo, do not condition.
â­ Out of the shower: Towel dry thoroughly.
â­ Begin with 1 pump of the **K18 Leave-In Repair Mask**, adding more as needed depending on hair length, thickness, and condition.
â­ Work evenly into hair from ends to roots, one pump at a time.
â­ Let sit for 4 minutes to activate.
â­ Do not rinse out.
â­ Style as usual.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **K18 Leave-In Repair Mask**:
â­ Water (Aqua) (Eau), Alcohol Denat., Propylene Glycol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Dicaprylyl Ether, Cetyl Esters, Behentrimonium Chloride, Polysorbate 20, sh-Oligopeptide-78 (K18Peptide), Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, Hydrolyzed Wheat Starch, Isopropyl Alcohol, Tocopherol, Phenoxyethanol, Potassium Sorbate, Citric Acid, Fragrance (Parfum), Geraniol, Linalool, Hexyl Cinnamal, Benzyl Alcohol.

#K18 #HairRepair #HairMask #HealthyHair #HairTreatment #HairCare #HairProducts #SaudiBeauty #HairGoals #DamageRepair

description_en:
Experience transformative repair with the **K18 Leave-In Repair Mask**, a no-rinse treatment mask for all hair types that clinically reverses damage in just 4 minutes. Powered by patented peptide technology, the **K18 Leave-In Repair Mask** works to restore strength, softness, smoothness, and bounce by repairing damage caused by bleach, color, chemical services, and heat.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **K18 Leave-In Repair Mask**:
â­ Shampoo, do not condition.
â­ Towel dry hair thoroughly.
â­ Begin with 1 pump of the mask, adding more as needed depending on hair length, thickness, and condition.
â­ Work evenly into hair from ends to roots, one pump at a time.
â­ Let sit for 4 minutes to activate.
â­ Do not rinse out.
â­ Style as usual.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **K18 Leave-In Repair Mask**:
â­ Water (Aqua) (Eau), Alcohol Denat., Propylene Glycol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Dicaprylyl Ether, Cetyl Esters, Behentrimonium Chloride, Polysorbate 20, sh-Oligopeptide-78 (K18Peptide), Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, Hydrolyzed Wheat Starch, Isopropyl Alcohol, Tocopherol, Phenoxyethanol, Potassium Sorbate, Citric Acid, Fragrance (Parfum), Geraniol, Linalool, Hexyl Cinnamal, Benzyl Alcohol.

description_en:
Experience ultimate purity with **K18 Shampoo Detox**, expertly formulated to deeply cleanse your hair and scalp. This innovative shampoo effectively removes 99% of product buildup, 95% of sebum, and 76% of copper*, revealing revitalized, detoxified hair. Its unique formula, featuring the **K18PEPTIDEâ„¢**, works to unclog hair follicles, banishing dirt, oils, silicones, and residual impurities without stripping essential moisture. It's the perfect prep step for maximum results from the **K18** Molecular Repair Leave-In Treatment or for enhancing color and styling services. Color-safe and pH-optimized, this clarifying shampoo provides a deep cleanse without causing tangles or damage, leaving your hair strong and pristine.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **K18**:
â­ Use in place of your regular shampoo once a week.
â­ Massage into hair, focusing on the scalp.
â­ Leave in for a few minutes.
â­ Rinse thoroughly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **K18**:
â­ Water (Aqua) (Eau), Sodium C14-16 Olefin Sulfonate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Methyl 2-Sulfolaurate, Sodium Lauryl Sulfoacetate, sh-Oligopeptide-78, Panthenol, Glycerin, Sodium Phytate, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Disodium 2-Sulfolaurate, Caprylyl Glycol, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Benzoic Acid, Citric Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Fragrance (Parfum), Limonene.

description_en:
Experience renewed vitality with the **K18 Damage Shield Protective Shampoo 250ml**. This innovative, color-safe shampoo optimizes hair's pH levels with the patented K18PEPTIDE for effective cleansing while maintaining hair health and protecting it from damage. Its unique pH-optimized formula helps reduce excess swelling of the hair cuticle during washing to prevent frizz, preserve color, and enhance natural shine.

â­ Effectively cleanses hair while maintaining its health.
â­ Optimizes pH levels for protected color-treated hair.
â­ Reduces frizz and enhances shine.
â­ Recommended for damaged hair and all hair types.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **K18 Damage Shield Protective Shampoo 250ml**:
â­ Massage the shampoo into wet hair, focusing on the scalp.
â­ Rinse thoroughly.
â­ Repeat if necessary.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **K18 Damage Shield Protective Shampoo 250ml**:
â­ Water (Aqua) (Eau), Sodium C14-16 Olefin Sulfonate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Methyl 2-Sulfolaurate, Sodium Lauryl Sulfoacetate, sh-Oligopeptide-78, Panthenol, Glycerin, Sodium Phytate, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Disodium 2-Sulfolaurate, Caprylyl Glycol, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Benzoic Acid, Citric Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Fragrance (Parfum), Limonene.

description_en:
Experience the transformative power of the **K18 Professional Mask 150ml**, a revolutionary leave-in hair treatment designed to effectively repair and rejuvenate damaged hair. Clinically proven to work from the inside out, this mask tackles chemical damage, strengthening hair and improving its elasticity in just 4 minutes. The **K18 Professional Mask 150ml** is vegan, cruelty-free, safe for colored hair, and suitable for all hair types, making it an essential addition to your hair care routine.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **K18 Professional Mask 150ml**
â­ Shampoo, do not condition.
â­ Towel dry thoroughly.
â­ Begin with 1 pump of the mask and add more as needed depending on the length, thickness, and condition of your hair.
â­ Work evenly into hair from ends to roots, one pump at a time.
â­ Let sit for 4 minutes to activate.
â­ Do not rinse out.
â­ Style as usual.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **K18 Professional Mask 150ml**
â­ Water (Aqua) (Eau), Alcohol Denat., Propylene Glycol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Dicaprylyl Ether, Cetyl Esters, Behentrimonium Chloride, Polysorbate 20, sh-Oligopeptide-78 (K18Peptideâ„¢), Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, Hydrolyzed Wheat Starch, Isopropyl Alcohol, Tocopherol, Phenoxyethanol, Potassium Sorbate, Citric Acid, Fragrance (Parfum), Geraniol, Linalool, Hexyl Cinnamal, Benzyl Alcohol.

description_en:
A nourishing, protective conditioner designed to shield hair from daily damage, promoting hair health, smoothness, and shine.

Product Features:
â­ The K18PEPTIDEâ„¢ replenishes lost protein during washing for healthier hair.
â­ A biotech-produced polysaccharide acts as a biomimetic shield against pollution and environmental aggressors.
â­ Fortifying Ceramide Blends seal damage sites in the hair cuticle, smoothing and protecting hair from further damage.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **K18 Damage Shield Protective Conditioner 250ml**:
â­ Apply a small amount of the protective conditioner from mid-lengths to ends.
â­ Rinse thoroughly.
â­ For best results, use after shampooing with DAMAGE SHIELD shampoo.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **K18 Damage Shield Protective Conditioner 250ml**:
â­ Water (Aqua) (Eau), Isopropyl Palmitate, Stearyl Alcohol, Propanediol, Isopentyldiol, Behentrimonium Chloride, Tocopherol, Tocopheryl Acetate, sh-Oligopeptide-78, Alteromonas Ferment Extract, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Phospholipids, Jojoba Esters, Calcium Gluconate, Hydroxypropyl Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Ceramide NP, Phytosteryl/Isostearyl/Cetyl/Stearyl/Behenyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Polyquaternium-16, Stearalkonium Chloride, Isopropyl Alcohol, Butylene Glycol, Gluconolactone, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Benzoate, Citric Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Fragrance (Parfum), Hydroxycitronellal.

title_en: K18 Leave-In Hair Repair Mask - Revitalize Your Hair with Peptide Power
title_ar: ÙƒÙŠÙ‡ 18 Ù…Ø§Ø³Ùƒ Ù„ÙŠÙ Ø§Ù† Ù„Ø¥ØµÙ„Ø§Ø­ Ø§Ù„Ø´Ø¹Ø± - Ù‚ÙˆØ© Ø¨Ø¨ØªÙŠØ¯ÙŠØ© Ù„Ø´Ø¹Ø± Ù…ØªØ¬Ø¯Ø¯
description_en:
Discover the secret to healthier, revitalized hair with the **K18 Leave-In Hair Repair Mask**. This revolutionary treatment mask is suitable for all hair types and clinically proven to reverse hair damage in just 4 minutes. Featuring K18's patented peptide technology, it works to repair damage caused by bleaching, coloring, chemical services, and heat, restoring strength, softness, smoothness, and bounce to your hair. As a leave-in treatment, it seamlessly integrates into your styling routine.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **K18 Leave-In Hair Repair Mask**:

â­ In the shower: Shampoo, do not condition.
â­ Out of the shower: Towel dry thoroughly.
â­ Begin with 1 pump of the **K18 Leave-In Hair Repair Mask** and add more as needed depending on the length, thickness, and condition of your hair.
â­ Work evenly into hair from ends to roots, one pump at a time.
â­ Let sit for 4 minutes to activate.
â­ Do not rinse out.
â­ Style as usual.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **K18 Leave-In Hair Repair Mask**:

â­ Water (Aqua) (Eau), Alcohol Denat., Propylene Glycol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Dicaprylyl Ether, Cetyl Esters, Behentrimonium Chloride, Polysorbate 20, sh-Oligopeptide-78 (K18Peptide), Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, Hydrolyzed Wheat Starch, Isopropyl Alcohol, Tocopherol, Phenoxyethanol, Potassium Sorbate, Citric Acid, Fragrance (Parfum), Geraniol, Linalool, Hexyl Cinnamal, Benzyl Alcohol.

#K18 #HairRepair #HairMask #HealthyHair #HairProducts #SaudiArabia #HairCare #DamagedHair #K18Hair #BeautySaudi

title_en: K18 Airwash Dry Shampoo: Long-Lasting Freshness for Healthy Hair
title_ar: K18 Ø´Ø§Ù…Ø¨Ùˆ Ø¬Ø§Ù Ø§ÙŠØ±ÙˆØ§Ø´: Ø§Ù†ØªØ¹Ø§Ø´ ÙŠØ¯ÙˆÙ… Ø·ÙˆÙŠÙ„Ø§Ù‹ Ù„Ø´Ø¹Ø± ØµØ­ÙŠ
description_en:
Discover the future of hair clean with **K18 Airwash Dry Shampoo**, the innovative solution powered by biotech to revive your hair's freshness. This non-aerosol dry shampoo, featuring patented odorBINDâ„¢ technology, effectively eliminates odors and controls oil for up to 3 days, leaving your hair feeling refreshed and clean. Its translucent microbeads absorb excess oil without leaving any white cast or starchy buildup. Unique ingredients work to trap and eliminate odor-causing molecules, replacing them with a subtle fragrance. It supports scalp health by balancing sebum, leaving your hair feeling clean and effortlessly styled. A high-performance, long-lasting formula that's highly concentrated for economical use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **K18 Airwash Dry Shampoo**:
â­ Shake the can for at least 5 seconds before spraying.
â­ Hold the bottle 4-6 inches away from the scalp for even distribution on most hair types, closer to 4 inches for coily textures.
â­ Section hair and apply just 1 spray per section.
â­ Massage into the scalp and brush or style as usual.
â­ If hair feels gritty, you may have used too much product; brush to distribute.
â­ Replace the cap when not in use to keep the nozzle protected.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **K18 Airwash Dry Shampoo**:
â­ Water (Aqua) (Eau), Alcohol Denat., Silica, Tetraselmis Suecica Extract, Arginine, Lactic Acid, Sodium Hyaluronate, Glycerin, Mannitol, Gellan Gum, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Sodium Phytate, Tromethamine, Escherichia Coli Extract/Sr-(Methionyl Tripeptide-46 Hexapeptide-40 Decapeptide-27 Methionyl, S-Pig Polypeptide-2 Oligopeptide-234 Sh-Oligopeptide-78), Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Citric Acid, Sodium Chloride, Fragrance (Parfum), Linalool, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Benzyl Alcohol.

title_ar: Ø¨Ø®Ø§Ø® K18 AstroLift Ù„Ø²ÙŠØ§Ø¯Ø© Ø§Ù„ÙƒØ«Ø§ÙØ© ÙˆØ¥ØµÙ„Ø§Ø­ Ø§Ù„Ø´Ø¹Ø± 118 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Discover the transformative power of the **K18 AstroLift** Reparative Volume Spray, the ultimate solution for boosting hair volume, repairing damage, and restoring vitality. This innovative spray from K18 is expertly formulated to deliver incredible volume while deeply treating each strand, making it an indispensable addition to your hair care routine.

The **K18 AstroLift** spray features a lightweight formula that provides your hair with a voluminous, lively look without weighing it down or leaving any residue. Infused with advanced technology, it works to strengthen hair from within, offering you healthier, more resilient, and easier-to-style hair.

â­ Instantly boosts hair volume while repairing damage and strengthening each strand.
â­ Lightweight formula that provides natural movement without buildup.
â­ Enriched with advanced technologies to revitalize and fortify hair.
â­ Suitable for all hair types and simplifies styling.
â­ Delivers healthier, fuller-looking hair from the first use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **K18 AstroLift**

â­ Start with clean, towel-dried hair for optimal absorption.
â­ Shake the bottle well to activate the active ingredients.
â­ Spray evenly onto hair, focusing on the roots and areas where more volume is desired.
â­ Use a comb to distribute the spray from roots to ends.
â­ Style your hair as desired, with the option to use a blow dryer for added volume.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **K18 AstroLift**

â­ Contains advanced reparative ingredients for hair restoration.
â­ Enriched with proteins and vitamins that nourish the scalp and hair.
â­ Free from parabens and sulfates for gentle care.

#K18 #HairSpray #HairTreatment #HairCare #VoluminousHair #HealthyHair #Beauty #SaudiArabia #Jeddah #Riyadh

title_ar: Ù…Ø¬Ù…ÙˆØ¹Ø© Ø¯ÙŠØªÙˆÙƒØ³ Ø±ÙŠØ¨ÙŠØ± Ù…Ù† ÙƒÙŠÙ‡ 18: Ø´Ø§Ù…Ø¨Ùˆ ÙˆÙ…Ø§Ø³Ùƒ Ù„Ø¥ØµÙ„Ø§Ø­ ÙˆØªÙ†Ø´ÙŠØ· Ø§Ù„Ø´Ø¹Ø±
description_en:
Experience the dual power of the **K18** Detox Repair Kit, your ultimate solution for deep cleansing and hair rejuvenation. This unique set is designed to detoxify your hair, rebuild its structure, and strengthen it from root to tip. Enjoy healthier, more vibrant, and stronger hair with every use.

â­ Includes a detoxifying shampoo and a restorative hair mask.
â­ Enhances vitality and repairs damaged hair.
â­ Suitable for all hair types.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **K18**:
â­ Begin by washing your hair with the dedicated **K18** shampoo to ensure thorough cleansing of the scalp and hair from impurities. Follow up with the repair mask, focusing on the ends and most damaged areas. Leave on for a few minutes and rinse well.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **K18**:
â­ Detox Shampoo: Water (Aqua), Sodium C14-16 Olefin Sulfonate, Cocamidopropyl Hydroxysultaine, Salicylic Acid, Charcoal Powder, sh-Oligopeptide-78, Panthenol, Glycerin.
â­ Repair Mask: Water (Aqua), Alcohol Denat., Propylene Glycol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Behentrimonium Chloride, sh-Oligopeptide-78 (K18Peptide), Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein.

#K18 #HairCare #Shampoo #HairMask #HairRepair #HairTreatment #HealthyHair #BeautyProducts #HairGoals #SaudiArabia
