description_en:
Experience the ultimate clean and balance with the **K18** Peptide Prep pH Maintenance Shampoo. This peptide-powered, pH-optimized shampoo is expertly formulated to gently and effectively cleanse hair and scalp while preserving hair's health and vibrancy. Its color-safe formula ensures your hair color stays brilliant, while the balanced pH (4.5-5.5) helps to reduce frizz and maintain smooth, strong, healthy-looking hair. The **K18** shampoo is ideal for all hair types, especially damaged hair, as it helps restore hair and scalp equilibrium, making it a fantastic daily option for optimal hair health. It contributes to a healthy scalp microbiome, leaving your hair feeling clean and refreshed with every wash.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **K18**:
â­ Cleanse hair and scalp gently every time you shampoo.
â­ Massage shampoo into hair, focusing on the scalp.
â­ Rinse thoroughly.
â­ Repeat as needed for optimal cleansing.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **K18**:
â­ Water (Aqua) (Eau), Sodium C14-16 Olefin Sulfonate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Methyl 2-Sulfolaurate, Sodium Lauryl Sulfoacetate, sh-Oligopeptide-78, Panthenol, Glycerin, Sodium Phytate, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Disodium 2-Sulfolaurate, Caprylyl Glycol, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Benzoic Acid, Citric Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Fragrance (Parfum), Limonene.

#K18Shampoo #HairCare #HealthyHair #StrongHair #ShinyHair #SmoothHair #HairTreatment #pHBalancedShampoo #HairHydration #SaudiHair

description_en:
Say goodbye to frizz and flyaways with the **Labelle Hair Straightening Brush**! Enjoy silky-smooth, sleek hair that lasts thanks to its innovative technology and smart brush design that adapts to your hair's needs. This brush guarantees a safe and effective straightening experience without causing any damage, eliminating the need for salon visits.

The **Labelle Hair Straightening Brush** features five adjustable temperature settings to suit all hair types, giving you a professional look in the fastest time possible. Achieve straight, frizz-free, and perfectly smooth hair with just one easy and quick pass.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Labelle Hair Straightening Brush**
â­ Ensure hair is completely dry before use.
â­ Select the appropriate temperature setting for your hair type.
â­ Glide the brush slowly through hair sections.
â­ The device can be used by children under the supervision of parents.
â­ Do not wash the device with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Labelle Hair Straightening Brush**
â­ Smart straightening brush with innovative technology.
â­ Five different temperature settings.
â­ Thermal insulated velvet bag to store the device.
â­ Four hair clips.
â­ A small hairbrush to easily detangle hair.
â­ Premium quality packaging material.

#Labelle #HairStraightener #SmoothHair #HairCare #StylingTools #BeautySaudi #SaudiArabia #Riyadh #Jeddah #HairGoals

title_ar: Labelle Curly Pro: Ø¬Ù‡Ø§Ø² ØªÙ…ÙˆÙŠØ¬ Ø§Ù„Ø´Ø¹Ø± Ø§Ù„Ø§Ø­ØªØ±Ø§ÙÙŠ Ø¨Ø®Ù…Ø³ Ø±Ø¤ÙˆØ³ Ù‚Ø§Ø¨Ù„Ø© Ù„Ù„ØªØ¨Ø¯ÙŠÙ„
description_en:
The **Labelle Curly Pro** is your ultimate tool for achieving a variety of wavy hairstyles with ease and speed. This advanced device offers a professional styling experience right at home.

With the **Labelle Curly Pro**, you can change your look every day thanks to its five different, easily interchangeable heads, giving you the flexibility to style your hair in multiple ways to suit any occasion. The device is designed to be suitable for all hair types, with adjustable temperature settings to ensure safe and effective styling.

The **Labelle Curly Pro** comes with an elegant cloth bag for easy storage and portability, as well as a heat-resistant glove to protect your hands during use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Labelle Curly Pro**:
â­ Select the desired curl attachment for your style.
â­ Adjust the temperature setting appropriate for your hair type.
â­ Use the included glove for heat protection.
â­ Wrap sections of hair around the barrel to create the desired waves.
â­ Allow hair to cool slightly before touching.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Labelle Curly Pro**:
â­ Ceramic or tourmaline barrels to minimize hair damage.
â­ Heat-resistant handles for greater comfort.
â­ Durable external casing.
â­ On/Off switch.
â­ Temperature control buttons.
â­ Interchangeable curling heads (5 different sizes).
â­ Heat insulation glove.
â­ Stylish storage bag.

#HairCurler #WavyHair #HairStyling #BeautyTools #HairGoals #SaudiBeauty #KSA #Riyadh #Jeddah #Fashion

description_en:
Discover the power of transformation with the **Labelle** Hair Dryer Brush, designed to impress with healthy, shiny hair. This smart brush boasts a powerful 1100 watts and advanced technologies to deliver a professional styling experience in minutes.

â­ Heat-conductive ceramic surface for superior smoothness and natural shine.
â­ Gentle silicone head for scalp comfort.
â­ Features two types of brush bristles: thin for detangling and thick for perfect styling.
â­ Comfortable, heat-insulating silicone-coated handle for your safety.
â­ 1100 watts power for fast and efficient drying and styling.
â­ Three different temperature settings to suit all hair types and styling needs.
â­ 360Â° swivel cord for complete freedom of movement during styling.
â­ Smart brush design with anti-tangle bristles.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Labelle**:
â­ Ensure your hair is slightly damp or towel-dried before use.
â­ Section your hair for easier styling.
â­ Select the appropriate temperature setting for your hair type.
â­ Slowly glide the brush through hair sections from root to tip for optimal results.
â­ The device can be used by children under the supervision of parents.
â­ Do not wash the device with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Labelle**:
â­ Heat-conductive ceramic surface.
â­ High-quality silicone head.
â­ Durable, anti-tangle brush bristles.
â­ Heat-insulating silicone handle.
â­ Powerful 1100-watt motor.
â­ Multiple temperature control system.
â­ Flexible 360-degree swivel cord.

#LabelleBrush #HairDryerBrush #HairStyling #HairCare #BeautyTools #SaudiBeauty #HealthyHair #HairGoals #StylishHair #SalonAtHome

description_en:
Experience ultimate softness with **Labello Moisturizing Lip Balm, Cherry Shine, 4.8G**.

This balm gives your lips a delicate touch of color and prettifies them with a soft, captivating shine, infused with a delightful fruity cherry aroma. It is the perfect solution for dry and chapped lips, providing **Labello Moisturizing Lip Balm, Cherry Shine, 4.8G** with long-lasting moisture for up to 24 hours, enriched with natural oils.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Labello Moisturizing Lip Balm, Cherry Shine, 4.8G**
â­ For best results, apply daily to your lips to maintain their hydration and beauty.
â­ Avoid licking your lips to prevent dryness.
â­ Occasionally use a lip scrub for extra smooth lips.
â­ Recycle the packaging appropriately.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Labello Moisturizing Lip Balm, Cherry Shine, 4.8G**
â­ Enriched with natural oils and Shea Butter for deep hydration.
â­ Contains Cherry Juice extract for added benefits.
â­ Provides a soft shine and natural color.

#Labello #LipBalm #LipCare #MoisturizedLips #NaturalBeauty #DailyCare #SaudiBeauty #KSA #BeautySaudi #Hydration

title_ar: Ø¨Ù„Ø³Ù… Ø´ÙØ§Ù‡ Ù„Ø§Ø¨ÙŠÙ„Ùˆ Ø¨Ø§Ù„ØªÙˆØª â€“ ØªØ±Ø·ÙŠØ¨ ÙˆÙ„Ù…Ø¹Ø§Ù† Ø·Ø¨ÙŠØ¹ÙŠ
description_en:
Indulge your lips with **Labello Moisturizing Lip Balm, Blackberry**, which adds a delicate touch of color and a soft shine. Enriched with natural oils and free from mineral oils, it's perfect for dry and chapped lips. Enjoy long-lasting moisture for up to 24 hours, and a refreshing blackberry aroma that delights your senses. **Labello Moisturizing Lip Balm, Blackberry** is your go-to for healthy, attractive lips all day long.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Labello Moisturizing Lip Balm, Blackberry**:
â­ For best results, apply daily to your lips.
â­ Avoid licking your lips to prevent dryness.
â­ Occasionally, use a lip scrub for extra smooth lips.
â­ Recycle the packaging accordingly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Labello Moisturizing Lip Balm, Blackberry**:
â­ Ricinus Communis Seed Oil
â­ Polyisobutene
â­ Octyldodecanol
â­ Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate
â­ Hydrogenated Polydecene
â­ Candelilla Cera
â­ Butyrospermum Parkii Butter
â­ Cera Microcristallina
â­ Isopropyl Palmitate
â­ Synthetic Wax
â­ Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate
â­ Glycerin
â­ Aqua
â­ Mica
â­ Silica
â­ Propylene Glycol
â­ BHT
â­ Benzyl Alcohol
â­ Linalool
â­ Aroma
â­ CI 77891, CI 15850, CI 77491, CI 42090

description_en:
Discover the nourishing power of the **Labello Pomegranate Lip Balm**. This balm delivers a subtle hint of color and a soft shine, leaving your lips beautifully enhanced with the refreshing scent of pomegranate. Experience intensive care and long-lasting moisture for up to 24 hours, ideal for dry and chapped lips. Enriched with natural oils for noticeably soft and smooth lips. Skin compatibility dermatologically approved.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Labello Pomegranate Lip Balm**:
â­ For best results, apply daily to your lips.
â­ Keep your lips refreshed by moisturizing them regularly.
â­ Avoid licking your lips to prevent dryness.
â­ For extra smooth lips, use a lip scrub occasionally.
â­ Recycle the packaging accordingly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Labello Pomegranate Lip Balm**:
â­ Octyldodecanol
â­ Ricinus Communis Seed Oil
â­ Cera Alba
â­ Cocoglycerides
â­ Butyrospermum Parkii Butter
â­ Helianthus Annuus Seed Cera
â­ Persea Gratissima Oil
â­ Simmondsia Chinensis Seed Oil
â­ Punica Granatum Fruit Juice
â­ Ascorbyl Palmitate
â­ Tocopherol
â­ Natural Oils

Experience ultimate lip care with **Labello Original Care Lip Balm**, your go-to for beautifully soft and hydrated lips all day. This essential balm protects against dryness and chapping, enriched with natural oils for up to 24 hours of continuous moisture. It applies clear, leaving no color residue, making **Labello Original Care Lip Balm** perfect for daily use. Achieve healthy, irresistibly smooth lips with **Labello Original Care Lip Balm** â€“ the ideal solution for dry and cracked lips.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Labello Original Care Lip Balm**:
â­ Apply daily for best results, ensuring soft and protected lips.
â­ Avoid licking your lips to prevent them from drying out.
â­ Use a lip scrub occasionally for extra smooth lips.
â­ Please recycle the packaging appropriately.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Labello Original Care Lip Balm**:
â­ Enriched with natural oils and butters for deep hydration.
â­ Gentle formula cares for dry and chapped lips.

â­ Leaves lips looking healthy and feeling smooth.

description_en:
Achieve irresistibly soft and radiant lips with **Labello Fruity Shine Strawberry Moisturizing Lip Balm**. This balm bestows a delicate rosy tint and a soft shine, delighting your senses with its refreshing strawberry aroma. It effectively treats dry and chapped lips, providing deep hydration that lasts up to 24 hours, thanks to its formula enriched with natural oils. Pamper your lips with a touch of softness and allure using **Labello Fruity Shine Strawberry Moisturizing Lip Balm**.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Labello Fruity Shine Strawberry Moisturizing Lip Balm**:
â­ Apply daily to lips for best results.
â­ Avoid licking your lips to prevent dryness.
â­ Use a lip scrub occasionally for extra smooth lips.
â­ Recycle the packaging accordingly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Labello Fruity Shine Strawberry Moisturizing Lip Balm**:
â­ Ricinus Communis Seed Oil
â­ Polyisobutene
â­ Octyldodecanol
â­ Butyrospermum Parkii Butter
â­ Candelilla Cera
â­ Glycerin
â­ Fragaria Ananassa Fruit Juice
â­ Natural Oils
â­ Vitamin E
â­ Strawberry Aroma

description_en:
Experience the ultimate lip care with **Labello Lip Oil Dress Nude**. This luxurious lip oil provides instant hydration and a natural glossy finish for soft, fuller-looking lips. Its unique vegan, non-sticky formula ensures long-lasting moisture, free from mineral oils and enriched with nourishing natural oils like organic Jojoba Oil.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Labello Lip Oil Dress Nude**
â­ Apply the lip oil regularly for moisturized and shiny lips.
â­ For more intense color, apply multiple layers.
â­ Use a lip scrub periodically for extra smooth lips.
â­ Ensure responsible recycling of the packaging.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Labello Lip Oil Dress Nude**
â­ Ricinus Communis Seed Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Cocoglycerides, Octylododecanol, Vegetable Oil, Ethylcellulose, Simmondsia Chinensis Seed Oil, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil, Mica, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Tocopherol, Propyl Gallate, Aroma, CI 77491, CI 15850, CI77891.

description_en:
Experience the delightful **Labello Moisturizing Lip Balm, Watermelon, 4.8G**, designed to give your lips a subtle touch of color and a soft shine. Indulge in the refreshing watermelon aroma that invigorates your senses. This **Labello Moisturizing Lip Balm, Watermelon, 4.8G** is enriched with natural oils and is free from mineral oils, making it perfect for dry and chapped lips. It provides long-lasting moisture for up to 24 hours, ensuring your lips stay hydrated and healthy.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Labello Moisturizing Lip Balm, Watermelon, 4.8G**
â­ For best results, apply daily to your lips.
â­ Avoid licking your lips to prevent dryness.
â­ Use a lip scrub periodically for extra smooth lips.
â­ Please recycle the packaging accordingly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Labello Moisturizing Lip Balm, Watermelon, 4.8G**
â­ Ricinus Communis Seed Oil
â­ Polyisobutene
â­ Octyldodecanol
â­ Shea Butter
â­ Watermelon Fruit Extract
â­ Glycerin
â­ Aqua
â­ Enriched with natural oils

description_en:
Experience ultimate lip care for men with **Labello Active Care Lip Balm for Men**. Specially formulated for men, this fragrance-free balm leaves no shine or color on your lips, ensuring a natural look. **Labello Active Care Lip Balm for Men** provides superior protection with SPF 15 against UVA and UVB rays, effectively treating dry and chapped lips while delivering long-lasting moisture for up to 24 hours. Enriched with natural oils, it promotes lip health and ensures exceptional smoothness with daily application.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Labello Active Care Lip Balm for Men**
â­ For best results, apply daily to your lips.
â­ Avoid licking your lips to prevent dryness.
â­ Use a lip scrub occasionally for extra smooth lips.
â­ Recycle the packaging accordingly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Labello Active Care Lip Balm for Men**
â­ Enriched with natural oils for superior nourishment.
â­ Contains SPF 15 for advanced sun protection.
â­ Fragrance-free formula with no shiny finish.
â­ Treats and protects dry, chapped lips.
â­ Provides up to 24-hour hydration.

description_en:
Discover soft, radiant lips with **Labello Moisturizing Lip Balm, Soft Rose**. This balm enhances your natural rosy lip color, imparting a subtle rose shine and a velvety soft feel. Formulated without mineral oils and enriched with natural oils, it deeply moisturizes your lips, providing effective protection against dryness and chapping. Enjoy long-lasting moisture for up to 24 hours for a superior care experience.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Labello Moisturizing Lip Balm, Soft Rose**:
â­ For best results, apply daily to your lips.
â­ Avoid licking your lips to prevent dryness.
â­ Use a lip scrub occasionally for extra smooth lips.
â­ Please recycle the packaging accordingly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Labello Moisturizing Lip Balm, Soft Rose**:
â­ Enriched with natural oils for intense moisture.
â­ Free from mineral oils.
â­ Contains Shea Butter and Rose Extract for supreme comfort.
â­ Provides natural shine and a subtle rose tint.
â­ Long-lasting formula that keeps lips hydrated.

#Labello #LipBalm #LipCare #SoftLips #Rose #Moisturizing #Beauty #Cosmetics #SaudiArabia #Riyadh

description_en:
Experience the perfect blend of care and color with **Labello Crayon Lipstick, Colour Lip Balm, Red, 3G**. This vibrant red lip balm instantly melts into your lips, providing deep hydration and a beautiful, natural-looking hue that complements any skin tone.

â­ A vibrant red colour that suits any skin tone.
â­ Gorgeously moisturised lips and vibrant colour in a single product application.
â­ Lipstick with intensive colour pigments.
â­ Lip balm with unique moisturizing formula.
â­ Instantly melts into lips.
â­ Free of mineral oils, enriched with natural oils.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Labello Crayon Lipstick, Colour Lip Balm, Red, 3G**
â­ Apply directly to your lips.
â­ Avoid licking your lips to prevent drying.
â­ Use a lip scrub occasionally for extra smooth lips.
â­ Recycle the packaging accordingly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Labello Crayon Lipstick, Colour Lip Balm, Red, 3G**
â­ Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate for smooth application.
â­ Olus Oil for intense moisturization.
â­ Candelilla Cera for a natural sheen.
â­ Enriched with natural oils and Vitamin E for nourishment.

#Labello #LipBalm #RedLipstick #LipCare #MoisturizingLips #SaudiBeauty #MakeupKSA #LipColor #DailyCare #HydratedLips

description_en:
Discover the secret to hydrated, soft lips with **Labello Hyaluron Lip Moisture Plus Rose**. The formula enriched with pure hyaluron gets quickly absorbed by your lips while keeping them deeply moisturised, offering a super-smooth application and a non-sticky, ultra-light, dewy texture for an immediate noticeable moisture boostâ€‹. Enjoy long-lasting moisture and a vegan formula for super-soft and visibly smooth lips with less creases. Achieve healthy, attractive lips with **Labello Hyaluron Lip Moisture Plus Rose**. Skin compatibility dermatologically approved.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Labello Hyaluron Lip Moisture Plus Rose**:
â­ Apply lip balm regularly for moisturized lips.
â­ Layer it for glowy looking lips.
â­ Once in a while, use a lip scrub for extra smooth lips.
â­ Caution & Warnings: For external use only.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Labello Hyaluron Lip Moisture Plus Rose**:
â­ Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis Oil, Glycerin, Ricinus Communis Seed Oil, Cocos Nucifera Oil, Aqua, Behenyl Behenate, Butyrospermum Parkii Butter, Helianthus Annuus Seed Cera, Diisostearoyl Polyglyceryl-3 Dimer Dilinoleate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Centella Asiatica Extract, Menthol, Tocopherol, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Copernicia Cerifera Cera, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil, Polyglyceryl-4 Diisostearate/Polyhydroxystearate/Sebacate, Citronellol, Geraniol, Aroma, CI 15850, CI 77491.

#Labello #LipBalm #HyaluronicAcid #PinkLips #LipCare #DeepHydration #SoftLips #SaudiBeauty #RiyadhBeauty #DailyCare

description_en:
Experience ultimate softness with the **Labello Peach Shine Lip Balm**. It provides 24-hour moisture, keeping lips smooth and supple with an attractive coral tint and a refreshing fruity peach aroma. Its rich formula, enriched with shea butter and natural oils, protects your lips from dryness and offers deep, long-lasting hydration, making it the perfect choice for daily care. It absorbs quickly to provide immediate softness and shields your lips from external factors like cold, wind, and dry air. Dermatologically approved and mineral oil-free, it is suitable for all skin types.

The **Labello Peach Shine Lip Balm** cares for your lips and the planet; it's cruelty-free, and its packaging is made from fully recyclable mono-material polypropylene.

â­ 24-hour moisture with a melt-in moisture shield.
â­ Enriched with shea butter and natural oils for lip nourishment and protection.
â­ Cruelty-free formula with fully recyclable packaging.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Labello Peach Shine Lip Balm**
â­ Twist up the lip balm stick to reveal the product.
â­ Apply evenly to lips, gliding the balm smoothly across the surface.
â­ Reapply as needed throughout the day for continuous moisture and shine.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Labello Peach Shine Lip Balm**
â­ Contains shea butter and natural oils.
â­ Mineral oil-free formula.

description_en:
Discover the magic of vibrant lips with **Labello Crayon Lipstick Cherry**. This crayon lipstick delivers a bold Black Cherry shade with hints of purple and brown, making it perfect for a captivating evening look. Achieve gorgeously moisturised lips and vibrant colour in a single application with **Labello Crayon Lipstick Cherry**. It features intensive colour pigments and a unique moisturizing formula that instantly melts into lips, providing comfort and freshness.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Labello Crayon Lipstick Cherry**:
â­ For best results, apply daily to your lips.
â­ Apply directly onto lips.
â­ Avoid licking your lips to maintain hydration.
â­ For extra smooth lips, use a lip scrub occasionally.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Labello Crayon Lipstick Cherry**:
â­ Enriched with natural oils for deep moisture.
â­ Unique moisturizing formula.
â­ Instantly melts into lips.
â­ Intensive colour pigments.

description_en:
Experience instant hydration and a radiant smile with **Labello Lip Oil Clear Glow**. This unique formula provides long-lasting moisture, leaving your lips soft and vibrant. **Labello Lip Oil Clear Glow** features a vegan, non-sticky composition, enriched with natural oils like organic Jojoba Oil, and is free from mineral oils for a nourishing and fuller-looking pout. For best results, apply daily to your lips.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Labello Lip Oil Clear Glow**
â­ Apply the lip oil regularly for cared-for, glossy lips.
â­ Layer for increased color intensity.
â­ Use a lip scrub periodically for extra smooth lips.

description_en:
Indulge your lips with the enchanting **Labello Wild Cranberry Lip Balm**, a limited edition that combines superior care with a touch of Disney Princess magic. Enjoy soft, hydrated lips thanks to its formula rich in natural oils and a refreshing wild cranberry scent. This balm is suitable for children aged 3 years and above, and its skin compatibility is dermatologically confirmed.

â­ Unique formula with wild cranberry extract for a refreshing and nourishing feel.
â­ Natural oils for superior protection against dryness.
â­ Free from mineral oils.
â­ Attractive fruity aroma adds a touch of joy.
â­ Suitable for all skin types.
â­ Safe for use from 3 years old.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Labello Wild Cranberry Lip Balm**:
â­ **Labello Wild Cranberry Lip Balm** can be used several times a day as needed.
â­ Gently apply to your lips for intensive hydration and a hint of color.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Labello Wild Cranberry Lip Balm**:
â­ Helianthus Annuus Hybrid Oil, Ricinus Communis Seed Oil, Helianthus Annuus Seed Cera, Hydrogenated Rapeseed Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii Butter, Aroma, Tocopherol, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil, Lecithin, CI 15985, CI 15850.

description_en:
Indulge your lips with **Labello Lip Caring Scrub Wild Rose 4.8 gm**, the perfect solution for achieving soft, deeply hydrated lips. This scrub features a unique formula with naturally derived exfoliating particles, making it suitable for daily use and all skin types. It can also be used as an ideal primer before applying lipstick for a flawless finish. Experience silky-smooth lips with **Labello Lip Caring Scrub Wild Rose 4.8 gm**.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Labello Lip Caring Scrub Wild Rose 4.8 gm**
â­ Before use: Gently rub the first layer until you feel the exfoliating particles.
â­ Application: Apply the product onto your lips.
â­ Non-wipe off application: Rub your lips together to let the particles dissolve and feel the care of **Labello**!
â­ Daily: This caring scrub is suitable for daily usage.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Labello Lip Caring Scrub Wild Rose 4.8 gm**
â­ Octyldodecanol, Ricinus Communis Seed Oil, Cera Alba, Helianthus Annuus Seed Cera, Butyrospermum Parkii Butter, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Aroma, Tocopheryl Acetate, Tocopherol, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Neohesperidin Dihydrochalcone, BHT, Benzyl Alcohol, Citronellol, CI 15850.

description_en:
Discover unparalleled softness with **Labello Lip Caring Scrub Aloe Vera**. Specially formulated with natural exfoliating particles that dissolve upon lip-to-lip friction, requiring no wiping. Enriched with Vitamin E and organic Aloe Vera, it leaves your lips feeling silky smooth and revitalized. Use it daily as a perfect base for lipstick or as a standalone treatment for plump, hydrated lips.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Labello Lip Caring Scrub Aloe Vera**
â­ Before Use: Rub off the first layer until you feel the gentle exfoliating particles.
â­ Application: Apply the product directly to your lips.
â­ Non-Wipe Off Application: Rub your lips together to dissolve the particles and experience the care of **Labello Lip Caring Scrub Aloe Vera**!
â­ Daily Use: This nourishing scrub is suitable for daily usage.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Labello Lip Caring Scrub Aloe Vera**
â­ Enriched with Vitamin E and Organic Aloe Vera for superior nourishment.
â­ Natural exfoliating particles that dissolve automatically.
â­ Free from mineral oils.
â­ Octyldodecanol, Ricinus Communis Seed Oil, Cera Alba, Hydrogenated Rapeseed Oil, Helianthus Annuus Seed Cera, Butyrospermum Parkii Butter, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Hydrolyzed Corn Starch, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder, Tocopheryl Acetate, Tocopherol, Ascorbyl Palmitate, BHT, Linalool, Benzyl Alcohol, Aroma, CI 77891, CI 19140, CI 42090.

#Labello #LipScrub #LipCare #SoftLips #LipHydration #AloeVera #VitaminE #SaudiBeauty #SkincareKSA #DailyBeauty

description_en:
Discover the power of **Lacalut Toothpaste Active**, specially formulated to reduce plaque, strengthen enamel, prevent gum inflammation, and effectively treat gum bleeding. Give your teeth comprehensive protection with this innovative toothpaste that works to tighten gums and reduce bleeding thanks to its unique composition.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lacalut Toothpaste Active**:
â­ Brush your teeth with a pea-sized amount of **Lacalut Toothpaste Active** twice daily.
â­ Use gentle circular motions for 2-3 minutes.
â­ Rinse your mouth thoroughly with water after use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lacalut Toothpaste Active**:
â­ Fluoride: For strengthening tooth enamel and preventing cavities.
â­ Aluminum Lactate: For tightening gums and reducing bleeding.
â­ Chlorhexidine and Antibacterial Agents: To combat bacteria causing gum inflammation and plaque buildup.

description_en:
Discover a brighter smile with **Lacalut White**, the toothpaste designed for gentle whitening, enamel remineralization, and effective plaque removal. Restore your teeth to their natural color while providing superior protection against cavities and tooth decay. **Lacalut White** offers deep cleaning with its advanced formula, ensuring healthier and whiter teeth day by day.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lacalut White**
â­ Brush your teeth with a pea-sized amount of **Lacalut White** toothpaste twice daily.
â­ Use gentle circular motions for 2â€“3 minutes.
â­ Rinse your mouth thoroughly after brushing.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lacalut White**
â­ Sodium Fluoride (1360 ppm F): Strengthens enamel and prevents tooth decay, safe for daily use.
â­ Phosphate Compounds: Soft, non-abrasive particles that gently clean and restore teeth to their natural whiteness.
â­ RDA 100 (Medium Abrasiveness): Ensures effective cleaning while remaining safe for everyday use.

description_en:
Discover the power of **Lacalut Mouthwash Aktiv** 300 ml, your ultimate solution for maintaining optimal oral health. This potent mouthwash acts as an anti-plaque and anti-inflammatory agent, offering comprehensive treatment for gingivitis and bleeding gums. Achieve a healthy, fresh smile with every use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lacalut Mouthwash Aktiv**:
â­ Rinse with 10â€“20 ml of the mouthwash daily after brushing your teeth.
â­ Swish for 30â€“60 seconds.
â­ Spit out the rinse without water for maximum efficacy.
â­ Use twice daily.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lacalut Mouthwash Aktiv**:
â­ Contains fluoride to strengthen tooth enamel.
â­ Aluminum lactate to help reduce gum inflammation.
â­ 0.05% Chlorhexidine for broad-spectrum antibacterial action.
â­ Additional antibacterial agents to prevent plaque buildup.

description_en:
Experience ultimate comfort with **Lacalut Sensitive Toothpaste 75 ml**, specifically formulated to relieve tooth sensitivity, strengthen enamel, tighten gums, and prevent cavities.

â­ Provides immediate relief from tooth sensitivity.
â­ Strengthens tooth enamel and protects against erosion.
â­ Tightens gums for optimal oral health.
â­ Effectively prevents tooth decay.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lacalut Sensitive Toothpaste**:
â­ Brush your teeth with a pea-sized amount of **Lacalut Sensitive Toothpaste** twice daily.
â­ Use gentle circular motions for 2-3 minutes.
â­ Rinse your mouth thoroughly after use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lacalut Sensitive Toothpaste**:
â­ Aluminum Lactate: To reduce tooth sensitivity and tighten gums.
â­ Olaflur: To create a protective barrier on enamel.
â­ Sodium Fluoride (1476 ppm F): For enamel remineralization and cavity prevention.

#Lacalut #SensitiveToothpaste #OralCare #Toothpaste #DentalHealth #HealthyGums #CavityProtection #SmileCare #SaudiArabia #DentalHygiene

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lacalut Aktiv 75 ml + 25 ml (33% Extra)**

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lacalut Aktiv 75 ml + 25 ml (33% Extra)**

â­ Promotes gum health and reduces inflammation.

description_en:
Experience soothing relief with **Lacalut Sensitive Toothpaste 75ml**, expertly formulated to alleviate tooth sensitivity, strengthen enamel, tighten gums, and effectively prevent tooth decay. Its unique formula ensures a gentle cleansing experience for sensitive teeth and delicate gums.

â­ Effectively relieves tooth sensitivity.
â­ Strengthens tooth enamel for better resistance.
â­ Helps tighten gums and promote their health.
â­ Prevents tooth decay with its protective ingredients.
â­ Gently cleanses teeth without irritation.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lacalut Sensitive Toothpaste 75ml**
â­ Brush your teeth with a pea-sized amount twice daily.
â­ Use gentle circular motions for 2-3 minutes.
â­ Rinse your mouth thoroughly after brushing.
â­ Do not swallow the toothpaste and keep it out of reach of children.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lacalut Sensitive Toothpaste 75ml**
â­ Aluminum lactate: to block pain receptors and tighten gums.
â­ Olaflur: to create a protective barrier on enamel.
â­ Sodium fluoride (1476 ppm F): for enamel remineralization and cavity prevention.

description_en:
Experience long-lasting fresh breath and healthy gums with **Lacalut Flora toothpaste**. This effective toothpaste combats bad odor, reduces plaque buildup, and helps maintain strong, healthy tooth enamel. Its innovative formula provides superior cavity protection and enduring freshness.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lacalut Flora toothpaste**
â­ Brush your teeth with a pea-sized amount twice daily.
â­ Use gentle circular motions for 2â€“3 minutes.
â­ Rinse your mouth thoroughly after brushing.
â­ Do not swallow and keep out of reach of children.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lacalut Flora toothpaste**
â­ Sodium Fluoride & Olaflur: For cavity protection.
â­ Zinc Gluconate: To neutralize odor-causing compounds.
â­ Hydroxyapatite: For enamel remineralization and strengthening.
â­ Mint Flavor with Menthol: For instant and long-lasting freshness.

description_en:
Discover gentle whitening and effective protection with **Lacalut White Toothpaste**. This innovative toothpaste is formulated to gently restore your teeth's natural radiance, focusing on enamel remineralization and effective plaque removal. **Lacalut White Toothpaste** leaves your teeth whiter, healthier, and protected against cavities and decay.

â­ Gently whitens teeth and restores their natural color.
â­ Strengthens tooth enamel and promotes remineralization.
â­ Effectively removes plaque for superior protection.
â­ Protects against cavities and tooth decay.
â­ Provides long-lasting freshness.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lacalut White Toothpaste**
â­ Brush your teeth with a pea-sized amount of toothpaste.
â­ Use twice daily with gentle circular motions for 2-3 minutes.
â­ Rinse your mouth thoroughly after brushing.
â­ Recommended to use with the complimentary toothbrush for optimal results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lacalut White Toothpaste**
â­ Sodium Fluoride (1360 ppm F): To strengthen enamel and prevent cavities.
â­ Phosphate Compounds: Soft, non-abrasive particles for gentle cleaning and restoring natural whiteness.
â­ RDA 100 (Medium Abrasiveness): Ensures effective cleaning while remaining safe for everyday use.

#Lacalut #Toothpaste #TeethWhitening #OralCare #WhiteTeeth #DentalCare #SaudiArabia #Jeddah #Riyadh #DentalBeauty

description_en:
Experience ultimate oral freshness with **Lacalut Flora Mouthwash 300ml**. Specially formulated to promote healthy gums and a clean mouth, this mouthwash delivers long-lasting freshness and a feeling of deep cleanliness. **Lacalut Flora Mouthwash 300ml** effectively combats bacteria responsible for bad breath and helps maintain the natural oral flora balance.

â­ Provides a clean and fresh mouth all day long.
â­ Promotes healthy gums and protects against inflammation.
â­ Helps maintain the natural oral flora balance.
â­ Effective formula for a long-lasting refreshing taste.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lacalut Flora Mouthwash 300ml**
â­ Use 10ml of the mouthwash undiluted.
â­ Rinse your mouth for 30 seconds.
â­ Use twice daily after brushing your teeth.
â­ Do not swallow the mouthwash.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lacalut Flora Mouthwash 300ml**
â­ Distilled Water
â­ Glycerin
â­ Sorbitol
â­ Ethanol
â­ Natural Mint Flavor
â­ Sodium Fluoride
â­ Chlorhexidine Gluconate

description_en:
Achieve a brighter, whiter smile with **Lacalut White Toothpaste**, expertly formulated for gentle whitening and effective plaque removal, while promoting enamel remineralization. **Lacalut White Toothpaste** helps restore your teeth to their natural color, protecting them from cavities and decay.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lacalut White Toothpaste**:
â­ Brush your teeth with a pea-sized amount twice daily using gentle circular motions for 2-3 minutes.
â­ Rinse your mouth thoroughly after use.
â­ Keep out of reach of children and avoid contact with eyes.
â­ Discontinue use if irritation occurs.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lacalut White Toothpaste**:
â­ Sodium Fluoride (1360 ppm F): To strengthen enamel and prevent tooth decay.
â­ Phosphate Compounds: For gentle cleaning and restoring natural whiteness.
â­ RDA 100 (Medium Abrasiveness): For effective cleaning and safe daily use.

#Lacalut #WhiteningToothpaste #Toothpaste #OralCare #WhiteTeeth #DentalHealth #Beauty #Saudia #SaudiArabia #HealthySmile

description_en:
Experience superior relief from tooth sensitivity with **Lacalut Sensitive** toothpaste. This innovative formula actively strengthens tooth enamel and promotes healthier gums, making it your ideal daily oral care companion.

â­ Reduces tooth sensitivity for comfortable eating and drinking.
â­ Strengthens enamel and protects against wear and tear.
â­ Tightens gums, aiding in the prevention of gum disease.
â­ Prevents cavities and maintains overall oral health.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lacalut Sensitive**
â­ Use a pea-sized amount of toothpaste twice daily.
â­ Brush your teeth using gentle circular motions for 2-3 minutes.
â­ Rinse your mouth thoroughly after brushing.
â­ Do not swallow.
â­ Keep out of reach of children.
â­ Avoid eye contact.
â­ Discontinue use if irritation occurs.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lacalut Sensitive**
â­ Aluminum Lactate: Blocks pain receptors and tightens gums.
â­ Olaflur: Creates a protective barrier on the enamel.
â­ Sodium Fluoride (1476 ppm F): Promotes enamel remineralization and cavity prevention.

#Lacalut #Toothpaste #SensitiveTeeth #OralCare #GumHealth #DentalHealth #TeethWhitening #CavityPrevention #StrongTeeth #SaudiArabia

Achieve a healthy, strong smile with **Lacalut Aktiv Toothpaste**. This innovative toothpaste is specially designed to effectively reduce plaque, strengthen tooth enamel, prevent gum inflammation, and treat gum bleeding. Enjoy an advanced formula for comprehensive oral care.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lacalut Aktiv Toothpaste**
â­ Brush your teeth with a pea-sized amount of **Lacalut Aktiv Toothpaste** twice daily.
â­ Use gentle circular motions for 2-3 minutes.
â­ Rinse your mouth thoroughly after use.
â­ Do not swallow.
â­ Keep out of reach of children.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lacalut Aktiv Toothpaste**

â­ Antibacterial agents for comprehensive protection.

description_en:
Discover the new Panorama Mascara by Volume Million Lashes, an exceptional volumizing experience for wider-looking eyes. **L'Oreal Paris Volume Million Lashes Panorama Mascara** delivers corner-to-corner panoramic volume, making your lashes look fuller and your eyes 1.4x bigger thanks to its new ultra-flexible formula. Infused with 5% stretchflex complex, it allows for seamless stretches, lifting each lash for maximum panoramic volume without clumping.

Product Features:
â­ Provides lashes that look fuller and eyes that appear 1.4x bigger.
â­ 5% stretchflex complex allows for seamless stretches while extending each lash up and out with maximum panoramic volume.
â­ Suitable for sensitive eyes.
â­ No-clump Mascara.
â­ Innovative brush with short & long bristles to volumize and fan out lashes.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **L'Oreal Paris Volume Million Lashes Panorama Mascara**:
â­ Place the mascara brush at the base of your eyelashes.
â­ Gently sweep the brush upward, moving back-and-forth from root to tip.
â­ Layer multiple mascara coats to build desired volume.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **L'Oreal Paris Volume Million Lashes Panorama Mascara**:
â­ Ultra-flexible formula.
â­ 5% stretchflex complex.
â­ Short & long bristles for a panoramic brush.

#LOrealMascara #VolumeMillionLashes #EyeMakeup #VoluminousLashes #SaudiMakeup #BiggerEyes #LOrealParis #LashVolume #Beauty #Fashion

description_en:
Discover the power of **Lovera Nail Polish Remover with Aloe Vera**, the ultimate solution for superior nail care. Our unique, vitamin-rich formula moisturizes and softens your nails, effectively protecting them from cracking and dryness. Infused with Vitamin E and Vitamin B5, your nails will look elegant, strong, and healthy with every application.

Product Features:
â­ Enriched with essential vitamins for deep nourishment.
â­ Nourishes and strengthens nails from root to tip.
â­ Moisturizes and provides a healthy shine and noticeable strength.
â­ Easy and quick to use, effectively removing polish without hassle.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lovera Nail Polish Remover with Aloe Vera**:
â­ Apply a sufficient amount of **Lovera** Liquid Nail Polish Remover to a small piece of cotton.
â­ Gently glide the cotton over your nail surface to effectively remove nail polish residue.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lovera Nail Polish Remover with Aloe Vera**:
â­ Vitamin E for nail nourishment and repair.
â­ Vitamin B5 for deep hydration and nail strengthening.
â­ Aloe Vera extract to soothe and protect nails and surrounding skin.
â­ Gentle ingredients that effectively remove polish without drying.

Caution & Warnings:
For external use only. Store in a cool, dry place out of reach of children.

#Lovera #NailPolishRemover #NailCare #StrongNails #NailHydration #Vitamins #HandCare #BeautyRoutine #SaudiBeauty #HealthyNails

Discover the power of care with **Lovera Nail Polish Remover**, the ultimate solution for healthy, beautiful nails. Its unique formula, enriched with vitamins and almond oil, deeply moisturizes and softens your nails, while effectively protecting them from cracking and dryness. Give your nails the nutrition they deserve to look elegant and strong, thanks to the potent blend of Vitamin E and Vitamin B5. **Lovera Nail Polish Remover** is characterized by its ease and speed of use, providing you with a perfect care experience.

â­ Enriched with vitamins and almond oil.
â­ Provides deep nail nutrition.
â­ Moisturizes and strengthens nails, protecting them from damage.
â­ Easy and fast to use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lovera Nail Polish Remover**:
â­ Open the cap with ease.
â­ Dip your nails into the soft sponge one by one.
â­ Gently move your finger to effectively remove polish.
â­ Ensure the package is securely closed after use to preserve the product.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lovera Nail Polish Remover**:
â­ Vitamin E

â­ Other moisturizing and nourishing ingredients.

Discover the captivating beauty of your nails with **Lovera Nail Polish #72**. Its luxurious formula provides a shiny, effortlessly chic finish. **Lovera Nail Polish #72** boasts a long-lasting, quick-drying formula in just one swipe, giving you a unique look for your daily beauty and special occasions. It lasts for days without chipping or fading, keeping your hands looking elegant.

Product Features:
â­ Carefully selected bright, modern colors
â­ Dries quickly
â­ Long-lasting formula
â­ Easy-to-use brush for perfect application

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lovera Nail Polish #72**:

â­ Carefully selected bright, modern colors

Discover the attractive color and luxurious shine for your nails with **Lovera Nail Polish #37**. This innovative formula provides a glossy, chic finish that lasts. **Lovera Nail Polish #37** is quick-drying and offers perfect coverage in just one swipe, giving you a unique look for your daily beauty and special occasions.

Product Features:
â­ Carefully selected bright, modern colors for a stunning look.
â­ Dries quickly to save you time.
â­ Long-lasting formula ensures color stays vibrant for hours.
â­ Easy-to-use brush for precise and professional application.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lovera Nail Polish #37**:
â­ Shake the container well before use to ensure color consistency.
â­ Apply a thin, even layer of polish to your nails.
â­ Allow it to dry completely for one minute before applying another coat or touching surfaces.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lovera Nail Polish #37**:
â­ Ethyl Acetate
â­ Butyl Acetate
â­ Nitrocellulose
â­ Acetyl Tributyl Citrate
â­ Isopropyl Alcohol
â­ Acrylates Copolymer
â­ Ferric Ammonium Ferrocyanide
â­ Yellow 5 (CI 19140)
â­ Red 7 (CI 15850)
â­ Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891)

description_en:
Discover the attractive color for your nails with **Lovera Nail Polish #23**. The luxurious formula gives your nails a shiny finish that looks effortlessly chic. **Lovera Nail Polish #23** is a long-lasting, quick-drying nail polish in just one swipe, giving you a unique look for your daily beauty and special occasions.

â­ Carefully selected bright, modern colors for a stunning effect.
â­ Quick-drying formula to save you time.
â­ Long-lasting wear without chipping or fading.
â­ Easy-to-use brush designed for precise application.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lovera Nail Polish #23**:
â­ Shake the container well before use.
â­ Apply an even layer onto clean, dry nails.
â­ Allow to dry completely for one minute.
â­ For external use only. Store in a cool, dry place and out of reach of children.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lovera Nail Polish #23**:
â­ High-quality formulations for rich, vibrant color.
â­ Quick-dry ingredients for perfect nails in moments.
â­ Long-lasting components to maintain your beautiful look for hours.

Discover the attractive color of your nails with **Lovera Nail Polish #48**. The luxurious formula gives your nails a shiny finish that looks effortlessly chic. **Lovera Nail Polish #48** is a long-lasting, quick-drying nail polish in just one swipe, giving you a unique look for your daily beauty and occasions, and it lasts for several days without chipping or fading.

Product Features:
â­ Carefully selected bright, modern colors
â­ Dries quickly
â­ Long-lasting
â­ Easy to use brush

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lovera Nail Polish #48**:
â­ Shake the container before use.
â­ Apply an appropriate amount, pass the brush over your nails.
â­ Let it dry for a minute.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lovera Nail Polish #48**:
â­ Luxurious formula for exceptional shine.
â­ Quick-drying ingredients for high durability.
â­ Rich and varied colors.

Caution & Warnings:
â­ For external use only.
â­ Store in a cool, dry place and out of the reach of children.

description_en:
Discover radiant beauty with **Lovera Nail Polish #3**. This luxurious polish provides a chic, shiny finish for your nails, designed to dry quickly and last long without chipping or fading. Perfect for your daily look and special occasions, **Lovera Nail Polish #3** gives you a unique appearance that stays for days.

â­ Carefully selected bright, modern colors to suit your style.
â­ Quick-drying formula to save time and effort.
â­ Long-lasting wear to keep your nails beautiful for longer.
â­ Ergonomically designed brush for precise and easy application.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lovera Nail Polish #3**
â­ Shake the bottle well before use to ensure color consistency.
â­ Apply one thin, even coat to your nails using the brush.
â­ Let the nail polish dry completely for one minute.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lovera Nail Polish #3**
â­ Provides instant and attractive shine.
â­ Safe formula for nail care.
â­ Store in a cool, dry place away from children.
â­ For external use only.

description_en:
Discover the attractive color of your nails with **Lovera Nail Polish #12**. The luxurious formula gives your nails a shiny finish that looks effortlessly chic. This is a long-lasting, quick-drying nail polish in just one swipe. It gives you a unique look for your daily beauty and occasions, and it lasts for several days without chipping or fading.

Product Features:
â­ Carefully selected bright, modern colors
â­ Dries quickly
â­ Long-lasting
â­ Easy to use brush

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lovera Nail Polish #12**:
â­ Shake the bottle well before use.
â­ Apply one coat to your nails.
â­ Let it dry completely.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lovera Nail Polish #12**:
â­ Butyl Acetate
â­ Ethyl Acetate
â­ Nitrocellulose
â­ Adipic Acid/Neopentyl Glycol/Trimellitic Anhydride Copolymer
â­ Acetyl Tributyl Citrate
â­ Isopropyl Alcohol
â­ Benzophenone-1
â­ Dimethicone
â­ Titanium Dioxide

It lasts for several days without chipping or fading, making it your perfect choice for an unparalleled beauty experience.

Product Features:
â­ Carefully selected bright, modern colors
â­ Dries quickly
â­ Long-lasting without chipping or fading

â­ Moisturizing agents to maintain nail health.

description_en:
Discover the captivating beauty of your nails with **Lovera Nail Polish #42**. This luxurious formula provides your nails with a shiny, effortlessly chic finish. **Lovera Nail Polish #42** is long-lasting and quick-drying in just one swipe, offering you a unique look for your daily beauty and special occasions. It lasts for several days without chipping or fading, giving you a perfect finish.

Product Features:
â­ Carefully selected bright, modern colors.
â­ Dries quickly, saving you time.
â­ Long-lasting formula ensures color stays put for days.
â­ Easy-to-use brush designed for precise application.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lovera Nail Polish #42**:
â­ Shake the bottle well before use to ensure color consistency.
â­ Apply one even coat of polish to your nails.
â­ Let the polish dry completely for one minute.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lovera Nail Polish #42**:
â­ (Placeholder ingredients as not provided in original data) Cellulose Nitrate, Butyl Acetate, Ethyl Acetate, Propyl Acetate, Adipic Acid, Dimethicone, Titanium Dioxide.

Caution & Warnings:
â­ For external use only.
â­ Store in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight.
â­ Keep out of reach of children.

description_en:
**Lovera Nail Polish #64** delivers an attractive color and a shiny finish that enhances your nail's elegance. Its luxurious, quick-drying formula is long-lasting, providing a distinctive look that stays vibrant for days without fading.

Product Features:
â­ Carefully selected bright, modern colors
â­ Dries quickly for immediate results
â­ Long-lasting wear
â­ Easy-to-use brush for perfect application

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lovera Nail Polish #64**:
â­ Shake the container well before use.
â­ Apply a single coat of polish to your nails.
â­ Allow it to dry completely for a few minutes.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lovera Nail Polish #64**:
â­ Luxurious formula for exceptional shine.
â­ High-quality pigments for vibrant color.
â­ Fixatives for durability and long wear.
â­ Quick-drying components.

Caution & Warnings:
â­ For external use only.
â­ Store in a cool, dry place away from children.

description_en:
Discover the attractive color for your nails with **Lovera Nail Polish #27**. The luxurious formula gives your nails a shiny finish that looks effortlessly chic. **Lovera Nail Polish #27** is a long-lasting, quick-drying nail polish in just one swipe, providing you with a unique look for your daily beauty and occasions, and it lasts for several days without chipping or fading.

Product Features:
â­ Carefully selected bright, modern colors.
â­ Dries quickly for a flawless finish.
â­ Long-lasting wear.
â­ Easy-to-use brush for perfect application.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lovera Nail Polish #27**:
â­ Shake the container well before use.
â­ Apply a thin, even coat to your nails.
â­ Allow it to dry for one minute.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lovera Nail Polish #27**:
â­ Special formula for rich color and a shimmering effect.
â­ Quick-drying agents for instant results.
â­ High-quality ingredients for durability.

description_en:
Add a touch of elegance to your nails with **Lovera Nail Polish #65**. Discover its attractive color and luxurious formula that gives your nails a shiny finish and an effortlessly chic look. **Lovera Nail Polish #65** features a long-lasting, quick-drying formula, providing you with a unique look that lasts for days without chipping or fading.

Product Features:
â­ Carefully selected bright, modern colors to suit all your looks.
â­ Quick-drying formula to save time and effort.
â­ Long-lasting hold ensures vibrant color for days.
â­ High-quality brush for easy application and even polish distribution.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lovera Nail Polish #65**:
â­ Shake the container well before use to ensure color uniformity.
â­ Apply a thin, even layer to your nails.
â­ Allow it to dry completely for one minute before engaging in any activity.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lovera Nail Polish #65**:
â­ Innovative formula for rich color and shine.
â­ Quick-drying ingredients for instant results.
â­ Stable components to prevent fading and cracking.
â­ High-quality brush for professional application.

Cautions:
â­ For external use only.
â­ Store in a cool, dry place, out of reach of children.

Discover the enchanting beauty with **Lovera Nail Polish #68**. This luxurious formula provides your nails with a shiny, effortlessly chic finish. **Lovera Nail Polish #68** is long-lasting and quick-drying in just one swipe, giving you a unique look for your daily beauty and special occasions. It lasts for several days without chipping or fading, maintaining its beauty.

â­ Carefully selected bright, modern colors to complement your look.
â­ Quick-drying formula for efficient and fast application.
â­ Long-lasting to keep your nails beautiful for days.
â­ Easy-to-use brush for smooth and precise application.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lovera Nail Polish #68**
â­ Shake the bottle well before use.
â­ Apply a thin, even layer to your nails.
â­ Allow to dry completely for one minute.

â­ Titanium Dioxide
â­ Red 7 Lake)

Discover radiant beauty with **Lovera Nail Polish #33**. Enjoy an attractive color and a luxurious formula that gives your nails a shiny, effortlessly chic finish. This long-lasting, quick-drying nail polish in just one swipe offers a unique look for your daily beauty and special occasions, lasting for days without chipping or fading.

Product Features:
â­ Carefully selected bright, modern colors for a stunning look.
â­ Dries quickly for time-saving application.
â­ Long-lasting formula for perfect nails over days.
â­ Easy-to-use brush ensures a smooth, flawless application.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lovera Nail Polish #33**:
â­ Shake the container well before use.
â­ Apply a thin, even coat to your nails.
â­ Allow it to dry completely.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lovera Nail Polish #33**:
â­ High-quality formula providing rich color and shine.
â­ Quick-drying agents for convenience.
â­ Long-lasting ingredients to maintain the look.

Achieve flawlessly applied and long-lasting artificial nails with **Loca Nail Glue**. This transparent nail adhesive offers superior hold and a natural finish, ensuring your nails stay put. The included precision brush allows for easy and even application.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loca Nail Glue**:
â­ Ensure your natural nail surface is clean and dry.
â­ Apply a thin, even layer of **Loca Nail Glue** to the natural nail or the artificial nail tip.
â­ Press the artificial nail firmly onto the natural nail and hold until dry.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Loca Nail Glue**:
â­ Aqua
â­ Acrylate Adhesive
â­ Methacrylate
â­ Adhesion-promoting agents

description_en:
Introducing **Loca - Glue Off**, the ultimate solution for effortless and safe removal of false nails. Experience the nourishing power of Vitamin E, an instant false nail remover that not only dissolves glue quickly but also provides essential nutrients and moisturization for your natural nails, keeping them healthy and strong.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loca - Glue Off**
â­ Apply a generous amount of the product to the tips of the nails using the attached tool.
â­ Gently lift the nail tips.
â­ Re-apply the product to the ends until the false nail is completely removed.
â­ Remember to re-moisturize your nails after completion for optimal nourishment.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Loca - Glue Off**
â­ Vitamin E for enhanced nail health and hydration.
â­ Effective formula to remove glue without damaging natural nails.
â­ Gentle and safe ingredients for regular use.

description_en:
Achieve salon-quality nails in minutes with **Loca Self-Adhesive Press-On Nails**.

These exquisite false nails boast a chic pink ombre color and a trendy oval shape, coming in a set of 24 pieces with various sizes to perfectly fit every nail. Their self-adhesive design makes application effortless and quick, giving you a flawless look without the need for glue.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loca Self-Adhesive Press-On Nails**:
â­ Ensure your hands are clean, dry, and free from lotions or oils.
â­ Select the appropriate size for each natural nail.
â­ Peel off the backing from the adhesive and press the false nail firmly onto your natural nail.
â­ Hold for 30 seconds to ensure a secure bond.
â­ You can gently file the edge to smooth or reshape it if desired.

Caution & Warnings:
â­ Avoid getting your hands wet for at least an hour after application for best results.
â­ Keep the product out of reach of children.

Product Details:
â­ Brand: Loca
â­ Quantity: 24 pieces
â­ Color: Pink Ombre
â­ Shape: Oval

Achieve instant elegance with **Loca Self-Adhesive Press On Nails - French Ombreh Oval #29**. These nails feature a captivating French Ombreh oval design and come with a self-adhesive backing for easy application in minutes. The pack includes 24 pieces in various sizes to perfectly fit all your nails, offering you a professional and attractive look without the hassle. Ideal for special occasions or for adding a daily touch of beauty.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loca Self-Adhesive Press On Nails - French Ombreh Oval #29**:
â­ Ensure your natural nails are clean and dry, free from any creams or oils.
â­ Select the perfect size for each nail from the 24 available pieces.
â­ Peel off the protective backing from the self-adhesive and apply the false nail directly onto your natural nail, pressing firmly to secure.
â­ If you wish to adjust the shape, you can gently file the edge of the nail.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Loca Self-Adhesive Press On Nails - French Ombreh Oval #29**:
â­ High-quality artificial nails.
â­ Strong and durable medical-grade adhesive.
â­ Modern French Ombreh oval design.
â­ A pack containing 24 pieces in assorted sizes.

Keep **Loca Self-Adhesive Press On Nails - French Ombreh Oval #29** out of reach of children. For best results, avoid wetting your hands for at least one hour after application.

description_en:
Achieve an elegant instant manicure with **Loca French Stiletto Press On Nails**. These reusable nail tips are perfect for special occasions, parties, celebrations, or as a wonderful gift. Crafted from high-quality ABS material, they are non-toxic and odorless, offering a healthy and safe alternative to acrylic nails that can damage your natural nails.

**Loca French Stiletto Press On Nails** feature a full cover, salon-quality pre-painted finish, and come in 20 pieces across 10 different sizes to fit everyone. You can easily customize their length and shape by cutting or filing them to your preferred style.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loca French Stiletto Press On Nails**:
â­ Buffer, clean, and dry your natural nails thoroughly to ensure they are free of oils.
â­ Apply a thin layer of glue to your natural nail.
â­ Hold the tip of the press-on nail and press firmly onto your natural nail for about 10 seconds.
â­ Gently file the tip to smooth or reshape as needed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Loca French Stiletto Press On Nails**:
â­ High-quality ABS material.
â­ Safe and non-toxic coating.
â­ Elegant French stiletto design.

shortdescription_en: Elegant French stiletto press-on nails by Loca. Reusable, 20 pcs/10 sizes. High quality, healthy acrylic alternative.

title_en: Loca Ready Nails - Ombre Colour - Coffin Shape (18 Pcs)
title_ar: Ù„ÙˆÙƒØ§ Ø£Ø¸Ø§ÙØ± Ø¬Ø§Ù‡Ø²Ø© - Ù„ÙˆÙ† Ø£ÙˆÙ…Ø¨Ø±ÙŠÙ‡ ÙƒÙˆÙÙ† (18 Ù‚Ø·Ø¹Ø©)
description_en:
Achieve an elegant instant manicure with **Loca Ready Nails**. These reusable artificial nails are perfect for special occasions, featuring a stunning ombre colour and a trendy coffin shape. They make a wonderful gift for your wife, mother, or sisters, and are excellent for parties, weekends, weddings, Halloween, and Christmas.

**Loca Ready Nails** are made from high-quality ABS material, which is non-toxic and has no smell. These nails offer a healthier alternative to salon acrylic nails as they donâ€™t damage your natural nails.

These high-quality, salon-finish, pre-painted full cover nails are exactly as pictured and come in a pack of 20 pieces across 10 different sizes to fit all nails. **Loca Ready Nails** can be customized and resized by cutting or filing them down to your preferred length.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loca Ready Nails**:
â­ Buffer, clean, and dry your natural nail to ensure there are no oils.
â­ Apply a thin layer of glue on the natural nail.
â­ Hold the handle of the tip, press and hold the tips on the nail for 10 seconds.
â­ File the tip lightly to smoothen or to reshape if needed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Loca Ready Nails**:
â­ High-quality ABS material.
â­ High-quality coating.

title_ar: Ù„ÙˆÙƒØ§ Ø§Ø¸Ø§ÙØ± ØµÙ†Ø§Ø¹ÙŠØ© Ù„ØµÙ‚ Ø°Ø§ØªÙŠ Ù„ÙˆÙ† ÙƒØ±ÙˆÙ… ÙˆØ±Ø¯ÙŠ Ø´ÙƒÙ„ ÙƒÙˆÙÙ† (2)
description_en:
Achieve an instant, elegant manicure with **Loca Press On Nails Pink Chrome Coffin Shape**. These reusable nails are perfect for special occasions, parties, holidays, and weddings. **Loca Press On Nails Pink Chrome Coffin Shape** are made from high-quality, non-toxic ABS material, offering a healthy alternative to acrylic nails that won't damage your natural nails.

These pre-coated, full-coverage nails come in 20 pieces across ten different sizes. You can customize their length by trimming or filing them to your preferred style.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loca Press On Nails Pink Chrome Coffin Shape**:
â­ Clean and dry your natural nails to ensure they are free of oils.
â­ Apply a thin layer of adhesive to your natural nail.
â­ Hold the artificial nail by its tab and press firmly onto your natural nail for 10 seconds.
â­ Gently file the edge to smooth or reshape if necessary.
â­ Avoid getting your hands wet for at least an hour to strengthen the bond.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Loca Press On Nails Pink Chrome Coffin Shape**:
â­ High-quality ABS (Acrylonitrile Butadiene Styrene) material.
â­ Glossy pink chrome finish.
â­ Self-adhesive backing (not included in the package).

description_en:
Achieve a professional nail look in minutes with **Loca Press On Nails Nude Oval #28**. These press-on false nails feature a chic nude color and an elegant oval shape, coming with 24 pieces in assorted sizes to fit all nails. Their self-adhesive design makes application quick and easy, giving you gorgeous nails without glue or fuss.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loca Press On Nails Nude Oval #28**
â­ Ensure your hands and natural nails are completely clean and dry before application.
â­ Select the appropriate size for each of your nails from the press-on set.
â­ Peel off the protective backing from the adhesive strip on the back of the false nail.
â­ Apply the press-on nail directly onto your natural nail and press firmly for 15-30 seconds for optimal adhesion.
â­ Gently file the edge to smooth or reshape if desired.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Loca Press On Nails Nude Oval #28**
â­ High-quality artificial nails.
â­ Strong and reliable self-adhesive.
â­ Trendy nude color.
â­ Elegant oval shape.
â­ 24 pieces in assorted sizes.

**Caution & Warnings:** For best results, avoid getting your hands wet for at least an hour after application. Keep out of reach of children.

description_en:
Achieve a professional look with **Loca Acrylic Nails A1**. These acrylic nails are designed for ultra-flexibility and a flawless fit, delivering a salon-quality acrylic result. The chic almond shape in a trendy nude color adds a touch of sophistication to your style.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loca Acrylic Nails A1**:
â­ Select the correct size for each nail from the **Loca Acrylic Nails A1** set.
â­ Apply a small amount of nail glue to the inner surface of the false nail.
â­ Press the false nail onto your natural nail for several seconds to set.
â­ Ensure to moisturize your hands after you finish for optimal care.
â­ For removal, use LOCA's specialized glue remover.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Loca Acrylic Nails A1**:
â­ High-quality acrylic material for durability and flexibility.
â­ Precisely sculpted to conform to the natural nail shape.
â­ Elegant and versatile nude shade.
â­ Pack includes various nail sizes for a perfect fit.

description_en:
Say goodbye to nail troubles with **Loca** self-adhesive artificial nails! Tired of chipped nail polish or broken nails? We offer you the perfect solution: **Loca** self-adhesive press-on nails that give you a professional manicure in minutes. These nails feature an elegant deep red color and a natural shape, making them ideal for everyday use and coordinating with most of your outfits. No need for troublesome glue, as each nail comes with pre-applied adhesive for easy application and removal. The set contains 24 nails in various sizes to fit all your fingers, while minimizing damage compared to strong glues.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loca** Self-Adhesive Natural Shape Press On Nails - Deep Red (11)
â­ Prepare your natural nails thoroughly clean.
â­ Choose the appropriate nail size for each finger.
â­ Apply the nails in order, ensuring they are placed at the cuticle of the natural nail.
â­ Press firmly on the adhesive nail to ensure adhesion.
â­ You can trim or shape them after application as desired.

title_ar: Ù„ÙˆÙƒØ§ Ø£Ø¸Ø§ÙØ± ØµÙ†Ø§Ø¹ÙŠØ© Ù„Ø§ØµÙ‚Ø© Ø°Ø§ØªÙŠØ© Ø¨Ù„ÙˆÙ† Ø£Ø­Ù…Ø± Ø·Ø¨ÙŠØ¹ÙŠ
description_en:
Achieve an elegant instant manicure with **Loca Self-Adhesive Red Natural Shape Press-On Nails**. Perfect for special occasions, parties, holidays, and weddings, they also make a wonderful gift for your loved ones. Crafted from high-quality, non-toxic, and odorless ABS material, these nails offer a healthier and safer alternative to salon acrylics, preventing damage to your natural nails. **Loca Self-Adhesive Red Natural Shape Press-On Nails** boast a premium salon finish and full cover design as pictured, available in a pack of 20 pieces across 10 different sizes to suit everyone. Customize and resize them by trimming or filing to your preferred length. Please note that glue is not included.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loca Self-Adhesive Red Natural Shape Press-On Nails**:
â­ Buffer, clean, and dry your natural nail thoroughly to ensure it's free of oils.
â­ Apply a thin layer of glue onto your natural nail.
â­ Hold the tip by its handle and press the artificial nail firmly onto your natural nail for 10 seconds.
â­ Gently file the tip to smooth or reshape as needed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Loca Self-Adhesive Red Natural Shape Press-On Nails**:
â­ High-quality ABS material.
â­ Premium quality coating.
â­ Full cover design.
â­ Comes in 20 pieces in 10 different sizes.

#Nails #PressOnNails #NailArt #ArtificialNails #Manicure #Beauty #NailCare #Fashion #SaudiBeauty #NailGoals

Discover natural beauty with **Loca Small Nails #N4 Oval Shapre Red**. These self-gluing nails are designed to give your small nails a natural and attractive look, inspired by LOCA's best-selling colors and shapes. Quick and easy application in seconds, with multiple sizes to fit all nails. Enjoy changing your nail look easily and effortlessly. **Loca Small Nails #N4 Oval Shapre Red** is your perfect choice for an elegant and modern look anytime.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loca Small Nails #N4 Oval Shapre Red**:
â­ Ensure your hands are dry and free from any cream or water.
â­ Choose the appropriate size for each nail from **Loca Small Nails #N4 Oval Shapre Red**.
â­ Stick the nail directly onto your natural nail and press firmly to set.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Loca Small Nails #N4 Oval Shapre Red**:

description_en:
Achieve an elegant instant manicure with **Loca** Red Stiletto Press-On Nails. These reusable tips are perfect for special occasions, parties, weddings, or as a wonderful gift. They boast a high-quality finish and attractive colors, offering a healthy and safe alternative to acrylic nails. Each set includes 20 pieces in 10 different sizes to fit all nails, and can be customized and trimmed to your preferred length.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loca** Red Stiletto Press-On Nails:
â­ Buff, clean, and dry your natural nails thoroughly to ensure no oils are present.
â­ Apply a thin layer of glue to your natural nail.
â­ Hold the tip by its tab and press firmly onto your nail for 10 seconds for optimal adhesion.
â­ Gently file the tip to smooth or reshape it to your desired length and style.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Loca** Red Stiletto Press-On Nails:
â­ High-quality ABS (Acrylonitrile Butadiene Styrene) material.
â­ Chic red stiletto design.
â­ Premium pre-painted finish for a professional salon look.

description_en:
Discover the natural beauty of your nails with **Loca Small Nails #N6 Oval Shape Nude**. Specifically designed for smaller nails, these self-adhesive nails offer a natural and captivating look, inspired by LOCA's best-selling colors and shapes. Enjoy a quick and easy application in seconds, with a variety of sizes to ensure a perfect fit. **Loca Small Nails #N6 Oval Shape Nude** are also easy to remove, making them your ideal choice for a quick and distinctive change.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loca Small Nails #N6 Oval Shape Nude**
â­ Ensure your hands are dry and free from any creams or oils.
â­ Select the appropriate size for each nail from the **Loca Small Nails #N6 Oval Shape Nude** set.
â­ Apply the nail directly onto your natural nail and press gently to secure it.
â­ You can gently file the edge to smooth or reshape as desired.
â­ For best results, avoid getting your hands wet for at least an hour after application.
â­ Keep the product out of reach of children.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Loca Small Nails #N6 Oval Shape Nude**
â­ High-quality artificial nails.
â­ Safe and reliable adhesive for long-lasting hold.

description_en:
Achieve an elegant, instant manicure with **Loca Ready Nails**. These reusable nail tips are perfect for special occasions, parties, weekends, weddings, Halloween, and Christmas, and make a wonderful gift for your loved ones.

Crafted from high-quality ABS material, **Loca Ready Nails** offer a healthier and safer alternative to salon acrylics, being non-toxic, odorless, and gentle on your natural nails. These pre-painted, full-cover nails feature a professional finish exactly as pictured, and come in a pack of 20 pieces across 10 different sizes to ensure a perfect fit. Customize your desired length by trimming or filing the nails.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loca Ready Nails**:
â­ Prep your natural nails by cleaning and drying them thoroughly to ensure they are oil-free.
â­ Apply a thin layer of glue to your natural nail.
â­ Hold the tip by its handle, press and hold the artificial nail firmly onto your natural nail for 10 seconds.
â­ Gently file the tip to smooth or reshape it if needed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Loca Ready Nails**:
â­ High-quality Acrylonitrile Butadiene Styrene (ABS) material.
â­ Professional French natural color coating.

#NailExtensions #FrenchNails #NaturalNails #LocaNails #QuickManicure #PartyNails #NailBeauty #NailCare #FalseNails #HomeSalon

description_en:
Experience ultimate hydration and a natural tint with the **Loca Lip Balm 04 Deja Brew Amber Brown**. This creamy, moisturizing formula leaves lips feeling soft and non-sticky, boasting a subtle amber brown hue that blends seamlessly for an effortlessly chic everyday look. It's the perfect choice for anyone seeking soft, hydrated lips all day with a touch of natural color.

â­ Super moisturizing and nourishing for long-lasting hydration.
â­ Lightweight, non-greasy formula for ultimate comfort.
â­ Natural amber brown color blends gently with lips for a subtle, everyday look.
â­ Protects and softens lips, ideal for dry or chapped lips.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loca Lip Balm 04 Deja Brew Amber Brown**

â­ Simply apply the **Loca Lip Balm 04 Deja Brew Amber Brown** directly to your lips as needed.
â­ Reapply throughout the day for continuous hydration and a touch of color.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Loca Lip Balm 04 Deja Brew Amber Brown**

â­ Jojoba Seed Oil.
â­ Hyaluronic Acid.
â­ Vitamin E.

description_en:
Indulge your lips with **Loca Lip Balm 05 The Serve Terracotta Nude**, the ultimate solution for dry and chapped lips. It features a rich, non-sticky formula that provides deep, long-lasting hydration. The subtle terracotta nude hue adds a beautiful, natural touch to your lips, perfect for an effortlessly chic everyday look. Enriched with Jojoba Seed Oil, Hyaluronic Acid, and Vitamin E, **Loca Lip Balm 05 The Serve Terracotta Nude** deeply nourishes your lips, leaving them soft, plump, and protected from environmental damage. Enjoy a comfortable, lightweight finish that you'll barely feel on your lips.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loca Lip Balm 05 The Serve Terracotta Nude**

â­ Simply apply **Loca Lip Balm 05 The Serve Terracotta Nude** directly to your lips as needed. Reapply throughout the day for continuous hydration and a touch of color.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Loca Lip Balm 05 The Serve Terracotta Nude**

â­ Jojoba Seed Oil
â­ Hyaluronic Acid
â­ Vitamin E
â­ Moisturizing, Non-Sticky Formula
â­ Natural Terracotta Nude Shade

#LocaLipBalm #LipHydration #LipCare #LipBalm #Makeup #HealthyLips #NaturalLook #Skincare #BeautyProducts #SaudiBeauty

title_ar: Ù„ÙˆÙƒØ§ Ø£Ø¸Ø§ÙØ± ØªØ±ÙƒÙŠØ¨ Ø°Ø§ØªÙŠØ© Ø§Ù„Ù„ØµÙ‚ØŒ Ù„ÙˆÙ† Ù…ÙˆÙ Ù…Ø·ÙÙŠØŒ Ø´ÙƒÙ„ Ø¨ÙŠØ¶Ø§ÙˆÙŠ (9) - 24 Ù‚Ø·Ø¹Ø©
description_en:
Achieve a salon-quality manicure in minutes with **Loca press on nails**. These beautifully crafted matte mauve, oval-shaped press-on nails are perfect for any occasion, whether it's a party, wedding, or everyday wear. **Loca press on nails** are made from high-quality, non-toxic ABS resin, offering a healthy and safe alternative to traditional acrylics without damaging your natural nails. Each pack contains 24 pieces in various sizes to fit all your fingers, and you can customize their length to your preference. Enjoy a long-lasting, professional, and chic look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loca press on nails**:
â­ Clean and dry your natural nails thoroughly to ensure they are free of oils.
â­ Choose the correct size that best fits each finger.
â­ Apply the press-on nail in the correct order, starting from the cuticle.
â­ Press down firmly on the nail for 10 seconds to ensure complete adhesion.
â­ You can file or trim the nails after application to your desired length and shape.
â­ Avoid getting your hands wet for at least an hour after application for optimal bonding.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Loca press on nails**:
â­ High-quality Acrylonitrile Butadiene Styrene (ABS) resin.
â­ Pre-applied self-adhesive.

description_en:
Elevate your nail game with **Loca Acrylic Nails A2-Almond Shape White Pearl Color**. These premium acrylic nails are expertly sculpted for a flawless fit and a salon-quality finish, offering ultimate flexibility and a beautiful white pearl hue.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loca Acrylic Nails A2-Almond Shape White Pearl Color**:
â­ Select the correct nail size for each finger.
â­ Apply a small amount of nail glue to the inner surface of the false nail.
â­ Press the nail onto your natural nail for a few seconds until secure.
â­ Remember to moisturize your hands after application.
â­ For removal, use the designated glue remover from LOCA.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Loca Acrylic Nails A2-Almond Shape White Pearl Color**:
â­ High-quality acrylic.
â­ Luxurious white pearl pigment.
â­ Strong adhesive formula.

description_en:
Achieve a professional nail look with **Loca Acrylic Nails A5**. These ultra-flexible nails offer a flawless fit, delivering a stunning salon acrylic result. Sculpted to perfectly mimic the natural nail shape, they come in an elegant pink French shade for a touch of sophistication. Ideal for special occasions or everyday wear for a radiant appearance.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loca Acrylic Nails A5**:

â­ Select the appropriate nail size for each finger.
â­ Apply a small amount of nail glue to the inner surface of the false nail.
â­ Press the false nail onto your natural nail for several seconds to set.
â­ To maintain hand health, moisturize your skin after application.
â­ To remove, use a specialized glue remover from LOCA.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Loca Acrylic Nails A5**:

â­ High-quality acrylic.
â­ Safe pink French pigment.

Self-adhesive nails, **Loca Small Nails #N3** offers you a natural and attractive look inspired by LOCA's best-selling colors and shapes. Enjoy a quick and easy application in seconds, with various sizes to fit all your nails. Easy to use and remove, to change your look whenever you wish.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loca Small Nails #N3**

â­ Ensure your hands are dry and free from creams or oils.
â­ Choose the perfect size for each nail from **Loca Small Nails #N3**.
â­ Apply the artificial nail directly onto your natural nail and press firmly to secure.
â­ You can gently file the edges to smooth or reshape them as desired.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Loca Small Nails #N3**

â­ High-quality, safe adhesive materials.
â­ Artificial nails made from durable materials that mimic natural nails.
â­ Design inspired by the latest nail trends.

description_en:
Achieve a luxurious salon look with **Loca Acrylic Nails A8**, expertly crafted in an extra glossy, short coffin shape in a stunning pink shade. These ultra-flexible nails offer a flawless fit and a sculpted design that perfectly contours to your natural nail shape, delivering a professional acrylic result.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loca Acrylic Nails A8**:
â­ Select the correct size **Loca Acrylic Nails A8** for each finger.
â­ Apply a small amount of nail glue to the inner surface of the artificial nail.
â­ Position and press the artificial nail onto your natural nail for several seconds until secure.
â­ Remember to moisturize your hands after application for soft, supple skin.
â­ For removal, use LOCA's specialized glue remover.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Loca Acrylic Nails A8**:
â­ High-quality acrylic material.
â­ Glossy pink pigment.
â­ Chic short coffin design.
â­ Safe adhesive formula (when used with accompanying or recommended LOCA glue).

description_en:
Achieve an elegant instant manicure with **Loca press on nails**, the reusable nail tips featuring a sophisticated white matte finish and a chic oval shape. Perfect for special occasions, parties, weekends, weddings, and Halloween. **Loca press on nails** make a wonderful gift for your wife, mother, or sisters. Crafted from high-quality ABS material, these nails are non-toxic, odorless, and offer a healthier alternative to salon acrylic nails that can damage your natural nails. Each set comes with a full cover and is ready to wear, exactly as pictured, including 20 pieces in 10 different sizes to ensure a perfect fit for everyone. Customize and resize your nails by cutting or filing them down to your preferred length. Glue is NOT included.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loca press on nails**:
â­ Buff, clean, and thoroughly dry your natural nails to ensure they are free from any oils.
â­ Apply a thin, even layer of glue to your natural nail surface.
â­ Hold the tip by its handle, then press and hold the artificial tip firmly onto your natural nail for 10 seconds to ensure a strong bond.
â­ Gently file the edges of the nail to smooth or reshape it as desired for a perfect finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Loca press on nails**:
â­ High-quality Acrylonitrile Butadiene Styrene (ABS) material.
â­ Premium white matte coating.
â­ Chic oval design.
â­ Full cover nail application.
â­ 20 pieces in assorted sizes.

description_en:
Achieve a professional look with **Loca Acrylic Nails A3**, meticulously designed to give you a luxurious salon acrylic result. These artificial nails boast ultra-flexibility and a sculpted design to perfectly complement your natural nail shape, ensuring a flawless fit. Enhance the beauty of your hands with **Loca Acrylic Nails A3** in its captivating ombre color and trendy coffin shape.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loca Acrylic Nails A3**:
â­ Select the appropriate nail size for each finger.
â­ Apply a small amount of glue to the inner surface of the artificial nail.
â­ Press the nail onto your natural nail and hold for a few seconds to set.
â­ To maintain hand hydration, use a moisturizing cream after application.
â­ For safe removal, use LOCA's specialized glue remover.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Loca Acrylic Nails A3**:
â­ High-quality acrylic.
â­ Nail-safe adhesive.

Achieve a professional look with **Loca Acrylic Nails A9**. These ultra-flexible nails offer a flawless fit and a salon-quality acrylic result, sculpted to take the natural nail shape with a stunning glossy finish and an elegant pink ombre hue.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loca Acrylic Nails A9**:

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Loca Acrylic Nails A9**:

â­ Glossy pink ombre color for a trendy touch.
