description_en:
Achieve a professional nail look at home with **Loca Acrylic Nails A10**. These precisely designed nails feature a natural oval shape and elegant French color, offering a salon-like result due to their high flexibility and perfect fit to your nail shape.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loca Acrylic Nails A10**:
â­ Select the appropriate size for each nail.
â­ Apply a small amount of specialized nail glue to the inner surface of the nail tip.
â­ Press it onto your natural nail, holding for a few seconds to ensure a strong bond.
â­ Moisturize your hands after application for best results.
â­ To remove the nails, use the dedicated **Loca** glue remover.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Loca Acrylic Nails A10**:
â­ High-quality acrylic
â­ Natural oval design
â­ Elegant French color
â­ Superior flexibility for lasting comfort
â­ Easy application and removal

description_en:
Achieve an instant, chic manicure with **Loca**'s reusable press-on nails. Available in a variety of colors and designs, they are perfect for special occasions and make a wonderful gift for your wife, mother, or sisters. Ideal for parties, weekends, weddings, Halloween, and Christmas.

**Loca** press-on nails are crafted from high-quality, non-toxic, and odorless ABS material, offering a healthy alternative to salon acrylics without damaging your natural nails. These pre-coated nails feature full coverage and come in 20 pieces across 10 different sizes, ensuring a perfect fit for everyone. You can easily customize their length and shape by trimming or filing.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loca** Press On Nails Nude & White Almond Shape #25
â­ Prepare your natural nails: Clean and dry them thoroughly to ensure they are free of oils.
â­ Apply a thin layer of the included adhesive to your natural nail.
â­ Hold the press-on nail by its tab and press it firmly onto your natural nail for 10 seconds to ensure a secure bond.
â­ Gently file the edges of the nail to smooth or reshape as desired.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Loca** Press On Nails Nude & White Almond Shape #25
â­ High-quality ABS (Acrylonitrile Butadiene Styrene) material.
â­ Chic nude and white design in an almond shape.
â­ 20 pieces in 10 different sizes.
â­ Glue not included.

description_en:
Discover the beauty of natural nails with **Loca Small Nails #N2 Natural Shape French**. Achieve a sophisticated and elegant look inspired by LOCA's best-selling colors and shapes. These artificial nails feature quick, self-adhesive application in mere seconds, making them perfect for everyday wear and special occasions. They come in various sizes to fit all nail shapes and are easy to apply and remove without damaging your natural nails.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loca Small Nails #N2 Natural Shape French**:
â­ Ensure your hands are completely dry and free from any cream or oil before application.
â­ Select the perfect size for each of your natural nails.
â­ Peel off the protective backing from the adhesive.
â­ Apply the artificial nail directly onto your natural nail and press firmly for 10-15 seconds for optimal adhesion.
â­ You can gently file the edge of the nail to smooth it or reshape it as desired.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Loca Small Nails #N2 Natural Shape French**:
â­ High-quality materials for durability and a natural appearance.
â­ Strong and safe nail adhesive.
â­ Classic and elegant French colors.
â­ Comfortable and natural design, feeling just like your real nails.
â­ Assorted shapes to suit all preferences.

description_en:
Achieve a flawless salon-quality manicure at home with **Loca Acrylic Nails A6-Oval Shape Ombre**. These ultra-flexible acrylic nails offer a perfect, natural fit, sculpted to mimic the shape of your natural nails for a stunning, seamless look. Experience the luxury of salon-perfect acrylic nails without the salon visit. The ombre design adds a touch of chic elegance to your fingertips.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loca Acrylic Nails A6-Oval Shape Ombre**:
â­ Select the correct nail size for each finger.
â­ Apply a small amount of glue to the inner surface of the artificial nail.
â­ Press the nail onto your finger for several seconds to set.
â­ Remember to moisturize your hands after application.
â­ For removal, use a specialized glue remover from Loca.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Loca Acrylic Nails A6-Oval Shape Ombre**:
â­ High-Quality Acrylic
â­ Skin-Safe Adhesive
â­ Ombre Color Pigments

title_ar: Ù„ÙˆÙƒØ§ Ø§Ø¸Ø§ÙØ± ØµÙ†Ø§Ø¹ÙŠØ© Ù„ØµÙ‚ Ø°Ø§ØªÙŠ Ù„ÙˆÙ† ÙˆØ±Ø¯ÙŠ ØºØ§Ù…Ù‚ Ù„ÙˆØ²ÙŠ #23 - Ø£Ù†Ø§Ù‚Ø© ÙÙˆØ±ÙŠØ©
description_en:
Achieve a perfect, instant manicure with **Loca** press-on nails. These self-adhesive artificial nails come in a stylish dark pink almond shape, ideal for special occasions or adding a touch of glamour to your day. **Loca** nails are reusable, making them an economical and chic choice. They make a wonderful gift for your wife, mother, or sisters, and are perfect for parties, holidays, weddings, Halloween, and birthdays.

**Loca** press-on nails are crafted from high-quality, non-toxic, and odorless ABS material, offering a healthy and safe alternative to salon acrylics, as they do not damage your natural nails. These pre-painted, full-cover nails come in a pack of 20 pieces across 10 different sizes, ensuring a perfect fit for every finger.

Customize the length of your nails by trimming or filing them to your preferred style.

â­ Achieve an instant, professional-looking manicure.
â­ Reusable for long-lasting style.
â­ Made from high-quality, natural-nail-friendly materials.
â­ Includes 20 pieces in 10 assorted sizes.
â­ Chic dark pink almond shape for a sophisticated look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loca**:
â­ Prepare your natural nails: Clean and dry them thoroughly to ensure no oils are present.
â­ Apply a thin layer of nail glue (not included) to your natural nail.
â­ Hold the tip of the artificial nail and press firmly onto your natural nail for 10 seconds.
â­ Gently file the edge to smooth or reshape if desired.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Loca**:
â­ High-quality ABS (Acrylonitrile Butadiene Styrene) material.

description_en:
Achieve an elegant, instant manicure with **Loca Ready Nails**. These reusable artificial nails are perfect for special occasions, making a wonderful gift for your loved ones, and adding a touch of glamour to weddings, holidays, or any celebration. **Loca Ready Nails** are crafted from high-quality ABS material, ensuring they are non-toxic, odorless, and gentle on your natural nails, providing a healthier alternative to traditional acrylics. Featuring a salon-quality finish and full cover as pictured, these nails come in 20 pieces across 10 different sizes to ensure a perfect fit for every hand. You can easily customize the length by trimming or filing them to your preferred style. Glue is not included.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loca Ready Nails**:
â­ Buffer, clean, and dry your natural nails thoroughly to ensure they are free from oils.
â­ Apply a thin layer of glue to your natural nail.
â­ Hold the tip by the handle and press firmly onto the nail for approximately 10 seconds.
â­ Gently file the edge to smooth or reshape if needed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Loca Ready Nails**:
â­ High-quality Acrylonitrile Butadiene Styrene (ABS) material.
â­ Premium quality coating.
â­ Classic oval design in an attractive red shade.

description_en:
Achieve a stunning, instant manicure with **Loca Press On Nails**, the self-adhesive artificial nails designed in a chic oval shape in a rich deep red color. Perfect for special occasions, parties, weddings, or as a delightful gift for your loved ones. **Loca Press On Nails** are crafted from high-quality, non-toxic, and odorless ABS material, offering a healthy and safe alternative to salon acrylics, without damaging your natural nails.

â­ Get a professional manicure in minutes.
â­ Elegant oval shape in an attractive deep red hue.
â­ Reusable and offer excellent value.
â­ Made from high-quality, safe materials that are gentle on natural nails.
â­ Easy to apply and remove without causing damage.
â­ Customizable by trimming or filing to your preferred length and shape.
â­ Comes in a pack of 20 pieces in 10 different sizes to fit all fingers.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loca Press On Nails**:
â­ Prepare your natural nails: Clean and thoroughly dry them to ensure they are free of oils.
â­ Apply a thin layer of the pre-applied adhesive to the natural nail.
â­ Choose the size that best fits the finger you are applying the nail on.
â­ Place the artificial nail firmly, applying pressure for 10 seconds, starting from the cuticle.
â­ You can gently file the edge to smooth or reshape it if needed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Loca Press On Nails**:
â­ Acrylonitrile Butadiene Styrene (ABS) material.
â­ Pre-applied self-adhesive.

Achieve a professional look with **Loca** Acrylic Nails A7. These nails offer ultra flexibility, a flawless fit, and a salon-quality acrylic result. Sculpted to perfectly mimic the natural nail shape, they provide a glossy, attractive appearance in a chic nude shade.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Loca** Acrylic A7:
â­ Select the appropriate nail size for each finger.
â­ Apply a small amount of glue to the inner surface of the nail.
â­ Press the nail onto your finger for several seconds to ensure it sets.
â­ After application, remember to moisturize your hands for lasting softness.
â­ To remove, use **Loca**'s specialized glue remover.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Loca** Acrylic A7:
â­ High-quality, durable acrylic material.
â­ Glossy finish and elegant nude color.
â­ Sculpted design for a natural oval shape.
â­ Safe ingredients for nail application.

description_en:
Indulge in the exquisite, long-lasting scent of **Lux Shower Gel Magical Orchid**. Infused with our expertly crafted Everscentâ„¢ Essential Oil â€“ a unique blend of luxurious juniper oil and exotic black orchids. Feel unstoppable all day with a fine fragrance that leaves your skin perfumed for up to 24 hours after your shower.

Discover the different layers of notes and ingredients that make up the beautiful scent in **Lux Shower Gel Magical Orchid**:

â­ TOP NOTE: Peach, Kumquat Peel, Red Currant
â­ HEART NOTE: Black Orchid, Peony, Jasmine, Tuberose
â­ BASE NOTE: Musk, Amber, Woods, Vanilla, Patchouli

**Lux Shower Gel Magical Orchid** is the #1 bodywash in Arabia, powered by EVERSCENT ESSENTIAL OILS. Its intense fragrance deposits on the skin during shower and is released slowly throughout the day, giving you 24 HOURS LONG-LASTING FRAGRANCE. Experience all-day confidence.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lux Shower Gel Magical Orchid**:
â­ Pour a drop of this fragranced body wash.
â­ Gently lather with a pouf.
â­ Massage all over your body to let the luxurious lather and its enchanting fragrance embrace your skin and senses every day.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lux Shower Gel Magical Orchid**:
â­ Everscentâ„¢ Essential Oil
â­ Black Orchid Extract
â­ Blend of Luxurious Fruit Oils

LUX Soft Rose Body Wash is your answer to soft fragrant skin. Indulge in a sensorial shower experience with Hyaluronic Acid that pampers your skin with 2X moisturizing ingredients. Experience a delicate fragrance bloom thatâ€™s two times better than real flowers. Your skin will feel delightfully supple and perfumed, like a garden of French Roses.

â­ Achieve long-lasting soft skin.
â­ Suitable for all skin types, helps moisturize the skin.
â­ Enriched with Hyaluronic Acid for 2X moisturizing benefits.
â­ A luxurious French Rose fragrance that lasts.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lux Shower Gel Soft Rose**:

â­ Apply a generous amount of the body wash onto a wet loofah or directly into your hands.
â­ Gently lather and massage all over your body.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.
â­ For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lux Shower Gel Soft Rose**:

â­ Heart Notes: Rose, Violet Apple.

description_en:
Unveil the secret to velvety smooth skin with **Lux Shower Gel Velvet Jasmine**. Indulge in a luxurious shower experience that stimulates your senses with Hyaluronic Acid, pampering your skin with 2X moisturizing ingredients. Enjoy a delicate floral fragrance that's two times better than real flowers, leaving your skin nourished and beautifully scented with the light fragrance of Jasmine. Perfect for all skin types, this shower gel promises long-lasting softness and a captivating scent.

â­ Velvety smooth skin that lasts.
â­ Enriched with Hyaluronic Acid for double the moisture.
â­ Captivating Jasmine fragrance, twice as good as real flowers.
â­ Nourishes and refreshes your skin.
â­ Suitable for all skin types.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lux Shower Gel Velvet Jasmine**
â­ Pour a small amount of the body wash onto a loofah or your hands.
â­ Gently lather to create a rich foam.
â­ Rinse your body thoroughly with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lux Shower Gel Velvet Jasmine**
â­ Water
â­ Sodium Laureth Sulfate
â­ Hyaluronic Acid
â­ Jasmine Extract
â­ Glycerin
â­ Fragrance
â­ Other ingredients for skin nourishment and hydration.

#Lux #ShowerGel #VelvetJasmine #Skincare #SmoothSkin #SkinMoisture #Fragrance #BodyCare #BathTime #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Experience the ultimate in softness with **Lux Liquid Soap Velvet Touch**, crafted to provide your skin with an unparalleled sensory experience. Immerse yourself in a rich, fragrant lather infused with the essence of velvet jasmine and nourishing almond oil, enveloping your skin in moisture and revitalizing your senses. This liquid soap is more than just a cleanser; it's an invitation to indulge in a lasting, silky-smooth touch.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lux Liquid Soap Velvet Touch**:
â­ Wet your hands with water.
â­ Dispense an adequate amount of the liquid soap.
â­ Gently lather and rub your hands thoroughly for 20 seconds to ensure comprehensive cleansing and a rich foam.
â­ Rinse your hands well with water to remove any residue.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lux Liquid Soap Velvet Touch**:
â­ Water
â­ Sodium Laureth Sulfate
â­ Acrylates Copolymer
â­ Glycerin
â­ Fragrance
â­ Sweet Almond Oil
â­ Jasmine Flower Extract
â­ Moisturizing and softening agents for the skin

Discover the secret to velvety soft skin with **Lux Shower Gel Soft Rose**. Indulge in a luxurious shower experience that tantalizes your senses with 2X moisturizing Hyaluronic Acid. Enjoy a delicate fragrance bloom, twice as potent as real flowers, to nourish your skin and leave it feeling delightfully supple and perfumed with the light, beautiful scent of French Roses.

â­ Achieve long-lasting soft skin.
â­ Suitable for all skin types, it helps in moisturizing the skin.
â­ Enriched with the essence of French Roses for an captivating aroma.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lux Shower Gel Soft Rose**:
â­ Pour a drop of **Lux Shower Gel Soft Rose** onto a wet pouf.
â­ Gently lather to create a rich foam.
â­ Massage all over your body, letting the luxurious lather and its enchanting fragrance embrace your skin and senses every day.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lux Shower Gel Soft Rose**:
â­ Hyaluronic Acid for 2X moisturization.
â­ French Rose extract to enhance softness and fragrance.
â­ A blend of Jasmine, Peach, Geranium, Red Fruits, Magnolia, Watermelon, Apple, Violet, Sandalwood, Amber, Tonka, and Musk.

Experience the ultimate pampering with **Lux Liquid Soap Soft Touch & Smooth**. This luxurious hand wash envelops your skin in the exquisite scent of French Rose, leaving your hands irresistibly soft and beautifully fragranced. Featuring Fragrance Release Pearlsâ„¢, enjoy a burst of captivating scent with every touch, ensuring your hands smell divine for up to 12 hours.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lux Liquid Soap Soft Touch & Smooth**:
â­ Wet your hands with water.
â­ Apply a suitable amount of the soap.
â­ Rub your hands thoroughly for 20 seconds for effective cleansing.
â­ Rinse off well with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lux Liquid Soap Soft Touch & Smooth**:
â­ Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Glycerin, Rosa Gallica Flower Extract, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Citronellol, Linalool, and more, for a rich fragrance and luxurious experience.

description_en:
Elevate your shower ritual with **Lux Revitalizing Grapefruit Body Wash**â€”your daily companion for a refreshing shower experience, boasting 2x the freshness and a lingering scent.

Its unique formula leaves behind long-lasting vitality and a refreshing scent to keep you feeling confident all day. Indulge in the invigorating scent of fresh grapefruit that awakens your senses, leaving you feeling revitalized and refreshed. It's the perfect way to start your day on an energizing note or shake off fatigue.

Enriched with Vitamin C essence, a powerful antioxidant known for its skin-brightening properties, **Lux Revitalizing Grapefruit Body Wash** not only cleanses but also enhances your skinâ€™s radiance. Its rich, creamy lather provides a spa-like experience at home, making it ideal for daily use.

Explore other amazing scents from Lux, including Magical Orchid, Romantic Hibiscus, Tempting Musk, Velvet Jasmine, and Soft Rose.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lux Revitalizing Grapefruit Body Wash**
â­ Wet your body with water.
â­ Apply a sufficient amount of body wash to your hands or a loofah.
â­ Lather the product onto your skin, creating a rich foam.
â­ Rinse your body thoroughly with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lux Revitalizing Grapefruit Body Wash**
â­ Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Sodium Chloride, Cocamide MEA, Parfum, Glycerin, Sodium Benzoate, Citric Acid, Tetrasodium EDTA, PPG-9, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Sericin, Jasminium Officinale (Jasmine) Flower Extract, Rosa Gallica Flower Extract, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Phenoxyethanol, Nelumbium Speciosum Flower Oil, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Potassium Sorbate, Mentha Arvensis Leaf Oil, Cymbopogon Martini Oil, Sodium Sulfate, Benzyl Salicylate, Limonene, Linalool, CI 1470, CI 17200

#Lux #BodyWash #Grapefruit #VitaminC #Freshness #Skincare #RefreshingScent #Hydration #SelfCare #BodyFragrance

description_en:
Indulge in the luxurious experience of **Lux Shower Gel Magical Orchid**.

Discover an exquisite, long-lasting scent with our expertly crafted Everscentâ„¢ Essential Oil, a unique blend of juniper oil and exotic black orchids. **Lux Shower Gel Magical Orchid** leaves your skin perfumed with an enchanting fragrance for up to 24 hours after your shower, giving you all-day confidence. Transform your daily shower into a moment of indulgence and refreshment with this unique formula.

â­ Long-lasting fragrance up to 24 hours.
â­ Infused with Everscentâ„¢ Essential Oil.
â­ Luxurious blend of black orchids and juniper.
â­ Enhances confidence and freshness throughout the day.
â­ Suitable for all skin types.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lux Shower Gel Magical Orchid**:
â­ Pour a small amount of the shower gel onto a wet puff.
â­ Gently lather to create a rich foam.
â­ Massage your body with the luxurious lather and enjoy the enchanting fragrance.
â­ Rinse off with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lux Shower Gel Magical Orchid**:
â­ TOP NOTE: Peach, Kumquat Peel, Red Currant.
â­ HEART NOTE: Black Orchid, Peony, Jasmine, Tuberose.
â­ BASE NOTE: Musk, Amber, Woods, Vanilla, Patchouli.
â­ Everscentâ„¢ Essential Oil.
â­ Gentle cleansing ingredients for the skin.

description_en:
Experience the enchanting allure of **Lux Liquid Hand Soap Magical Beauty**, a luxurious and long-lasting fragrance for your hands. Infused with the captivating scent of rare black orchids, it bewitches your senses and leaves your skin perfumed for hours.

â­ Indulge in an exquisite, long-lasting scent that lingers for up to 8 hours.
â­ Enriched with our specially crafted Floral Fusion Oilâ„¢ and infused with the essence of exotic black orchids.
â­ Leaves your skin enchantingly soft and beautifully perfumed.
â­ Suitable for all skin types.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lux Liquid Hand Soap Magical Beauty**:
â­ Wet your hands with water.
â­ Apply a generous amount of soap.
â­ Rub hands thoroughly for 20 seconds for optimal cleansing.
â­ Rinse off with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lux Liquid Hand Soap Magical Beauty**:
â­ Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Glycerin, Parfum, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Salicylate, Cinnamyl Alcohol, Citronellol, Coumarin, Hexyl Cinnamal, Hydroxycitronellal, Limonene, Linalool, Cocamide MEA, Disodium EDTA, Benzophenone-4, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Methylisothiazolinone, PPG-9, CI 17200, CI 42090.

Discover your secret to velvety smooth skin with **Lux Shower Gel Velvet Jasmine**. Indulge in a luxurious shower experience that awakens your senses with Hyaluronic Acid, pampering your skin with 2X moisturizing power. Experience a delicate floral fragrance, twice as enchanting as real flowers, leaving your skin nourished with long-lasting softness and beautifully scented with the captivating aroma of Jasmine.

â­ Unveils velvety soft skin that lasts.
â­ Enriched with Hyaluronic Acid for double the moisture.
â­ Features a delicate and refreshing Jasmine fragrance.
â­ Suitable for all skin types.
â­ Leaves skin nourished and revitalized.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lux Shower Gel Velvet Jasmine**:
â­ Dispense a small amount onto a wet puff.
â­ Gently lather and massage onto your body.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lux Shower Gel Velvet Jasmine**:
â­ Aqua
â­ Sodium Laureth Sulfate
â­ Cocamidopropyl Betaine
â­ Glycerin
â­ Hyaluronic Acid
â­ Jasmine Fragrance
â­ Essential Oils
â­ Sea Salt

description_en:
Indulge your skin with **Lux Soap Creamy Perfection**. Infused with Swiss moisturisers and the notes of delicate white florals, revel in visibly softer skin. Enjoy a luxurious bathing experience that leaves your skin feeling pampered and beautifully fragranced.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lux Soap Creamy Perfection**:
â­ Gently massage the soap against your skin or lather using a loofah.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with warm water.
â­ Use daily for best results and lasting fragrance.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lux Soap Creamy Perfection**:
â­ Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Glycerin, Lauric Acid, Decyl Glucoside, Parfum, Polysorbate 20, PPG-9, Potassium Hydroxide, PEG-2M, Isopropyl Myristate, Stearic Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Tetrasodium EDTA, Citric Acid, Magnesium Nitrate, Silica, Calcium Oxide, Magnesium Chloride, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Methylisothiazolinone, BHT, Citronellol, Limonene, Linalool.

description_en:
Experience silky soft skin with Lux Liquid Soap Velvet Touch. Its rich, moisturizing lather envelops your skin with the aromatic scent of jasmine and nourishing almond oil, leaving you with skin as soft as silk and a relaxed mood.

â­ Rich and moisturizing lather for velvet skin
â­ Luxurious jasmine fragrance and nourishing almond oil
â­ Delivers exceptionally silky smooth skin
â­ Delicately and long-lastingly perfumes the skin

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lux Liquid Soap Velvet Touch**
1. Wet your hands with water.
2. Dispense a suitable amount of liquid soap.
3. Rub your hands thoroughly for 20 seconds.
4. Rinse your hands with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lux Liquid Soap Velvet Touch**
â­ Water
â­ Sodium Laureth Sulfate
â­ Acrylates Copolymer
â­ Glycerin
â­ Fragrance
â­ Sweet Almond Oil
â­ Jasmine Flower Extract

title_ar: Ù„ÙˆÙƒØ³ Ø³Ø§Ø¦Ù„ Ø§Ø³ØªØ­Ù…Ø§Ù… Ø³Ø­Ø± Ø§Ù„Ø£ÙˆØ±ÙƒÙŠØ¯ 500Ù…Ù„ - Ø¹Ø·Ø± ÙŠØ¯ÙˆÙ… 24 Ø³Ø§Ø¹Ø©
description_en:
Indulge in long-lasting luxury with **Lux Shower Gel Magical Orchid**, featuring the expertly crafted "Everescent" fragrance oil and a lavish blend of black fruit oil and orchid essence. This body wash provides an irresistible confidence boost throughout your day, with its exquisite scent leaving your skin fragranced for up to 24 hours after showering.

Discover the rich aromatic layers that make up the captivating scent of **Lux Shower Gel Magical Orchid**: Top Notes: Peach, Kumquat Peel, Red Currant. Heart Notes: Black Orchid, Peony, Jasmine, Tuberose. Base Notes: Musk, Amber, Woods, Vanilla, Patchouli.

**Lux Shower Gel Magical Orchid** is the #1 selling body wash in Saudi Arabia, enriched with "Everescent" essential oil. Its opulent fragrance settles onto your skin during your shower and slowly diffuses throughout the day, leaving you with a scent that lasts up to 24 hours.

A 24-hour fragrance, giving you confidence all day long.

For nearly a century, **Lux** has offered women the best in beauty, inspiring them to embrace their femininity and express their inner radiance. We have partnered with the world's leading perfumers to create fine fragrances that pamper your skin and transform your daily shower into a special, indulgent experience.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lux Shower Gel Magical Orchid**
â­ Apply a suitable amount of the shower gel to a loofah or your hand.
â­ Gently lather onto wet skin to create a rich foam.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lux Shower Gel Magical Orchid**
â­ "Everescent" Fragrance Oil
â­ Black Fruit Oil
â­ Orchid Flower Extract
â­ Other Natural Skin Care Extracts.

description_en:
Give your hands the luxurious care they deserve with **Lux Satin Grapefruit Hand Wash**. Discover the refreshing and invigorating grapefruit scent that delights your senses with every wash. This hand wash is carefully formulated with skin-loving ingredients, including Natural Myrrh, to effectively cleanse your hands while supporting your skin's health. It contains a blend of Almond Oil and Glycerin to provide deep moisturization, leaving your hands exceptionally soft and silky smooth. Enjoy a gentle and nourishing hand washing experience that leaves your hands beautifully scented and velvety soft.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lux Satin Grapefruit Hand Wash**:

â­ Wet your hands with water.
â­ Apply an adequate amount of the hand wash to your hands.
â­ Lather and rub your hands thoroughly for at least 20 seconds.
â­ Rinse your hands well with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lux Satin Grapefruit Hand Wash**:

â­ Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Glycerin, Sodium Chloride, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Parfum, Sodium Benzoate, Citric Acid, Benzophenone-4, Tetrasodium EDTA, PP-9, Sodium Hydroxide, Sericin, Jasminium Officinale (Jasmine) Flower Extract, Rosa Gallica Flower Extract, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Phenoxyethanol, Nelumbium Speciosum Flower Oil, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Potassium Sorbate, Mentha Arvensis Leaf Oil, Cymbopogon Martini Oil, Sodium Sulfate, Tocopherol, Commiphora Myrrha Resin Extract, Benzyl Salicylate, Limonene, Linalool, CI14700, CI 17200.

#Lux #HandWash #Grapefruit #Skincare #Moisturizing #CleanHands #Freshness #Fragrance #Beauty #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Discover velvety soft skin with **Lux Soft Rose Shower Gel**. Indulge in a luxurious shower experience with Hyaluronic Acid that provides 2X moisturizing power for your skin. Enjoy the captivating, long-lasting fragrance of French Roses, leaving your skin feeling soft and beautifully perfumed.

**Features & Benefits:**
â­ Noticeably soft, silky smooth skin.
â­ Deep hydration with Hyaluronic Acid.
â­ Luxurious and captivating French Rose scent.
â­ Suitable for all skin types.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lux Soft Rose Shower Gel**:
â­ Pour a small amount of the shower gel onto a loofah or directly onto your body.
â­ Gently lather and massage all over your skin.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lux Soft Rose Shower Gel**:
â­ Hyaluronic Acid.
â­ French Rose Extract.
â­ Moisturizing agents.
â­ Luxurious floral fragrances (Top Notes: Jasmine, Peach, Geranium, Red Fruits, Magnolia, Watermelon. Heart Notes: Rose, Apple, Violet. Base Notes: Peach, Sandalwood, Amber, Tonka, Musk).
â­ Skin conditioning ingredients.

description_en:
Indulge your skin with **Lux Soap Creamy Perfection**, crafted to deeply moisturize and leave your skin feeling soft as silk. Infused with Swiss moisturisers and the delicate notes of white florals, revel in visibly softer skin. The innovative Fragrance Release Pearlsâ„¢ technology releases a burst of fragrance with every touch, keeping your skin perfumed for up to 12 hours.

â­ Leaves skin feeling soft and delicately smooth.
â­ Fragrance Touch Technology ensures long-lasting fragrant freshness.
â­ An enchanting fragrance blend leaves an unforgettable impression.
â­ Suitable for all skin types.
â­ Discover the layers of fragrance notes and ingredients that make up the beautiful scent in **Lux Soap Creamy Perfection**.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lux Soap Creamy Perfection**:
â­ Gently massage the soap bar against your skin or lather up using a loofah.
â­ Rinse your skin thoroughly with warm water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lux Soap Creamy Perfection**:
â­ Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Glycerin, Lauric Acid, Decyl Glucoside, Parfum, Polysorbate 20, PPG-9, Potassium Hydroxide, PEG-2M, Isopropyl Myristate, Stearic Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Tetrasodium EDTA, Citric Acid, Magnesium Nitrate, Silica, Calcium Oxide, Magnesium Chloride, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Methylisothiazolinone, BHT, Citronellol, Limonene, Linalool.

description_en:
Indulge your skin with **Lux Shower Gel Camelia & Alovera** for a naturally detoxified and refreshed feel. This luxurious body wash, infused with 100% natural extracts and captivating fragrances, leaves your skin feeling soft, smooth, and beautifully scented throughout the day.

â­ Enriched with Camelia & Aloe Vera extracts for a naturally detoxified skin.
â­ Creates a rich, creamy lather that envelops your skin in softness.
â­ Features a captivating fragrance that lingers.
â­ Made with 100% natural extracts.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lux Shower Gel Camelia & Alovera**
â­ Pour a drop of this fragranced body wash onto a pouf or your hand.
â­ Gently massage all over your body to create a luxurious lather.
â­ Rinse thoroughly and experience cleansed, moisturized skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lux Shower Gel Camelia & Alovera**
â­ Aqua, Sodium laureth sulfate, Cocamide MEA, Parfum, Sodium chloride, Sodium benzoate, Citric acid, PPG-9, Tetrasodium EDTA, Sodium hydroxide, Sodium sulfate, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Flower Extract, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Flower, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Flower oil, Honey, Nelumbo Nucifera Leaf Extract, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Benzoate, Citral, Citronellol, Geraniol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Hydroxycitronellal, Limonene, Linalool, CI 17200, CI 19140, CI 42090.

description_en:
Discover the allure of **Lux Tempting Musk Shower Gel**, where luxury meets a long-lasting fragrance. This exquisite body wash is infused with a unique blend of luxurious floral oils and opulent musk, expertly crafted with Everscentâ„¢ Essential Oil for an unparalleled sensory experience. Indulge in a captivating scent that leaves your skin perfumed for up to 24 hours after showering, empowering you with confidence and charm throughout the day. As the number 1 body wash in the Arab region, **Lux Tempting Musk Shower Gel** offers a sophisticated fragrance that unfolds slowly, enveloping your senses in romance and continuous freshness.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lux Tempting Musk Shower Gel**:
â­ Pour a small amount of the fragranced shower gel onto a bath pouf or your hands.
â­ Gently lather to create a rich and luxurious foam.
â­ Rinse your body thoroughly to enjoy soft, perfumed skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lux Tempting Musk Shower Gel**:
â­ A unique blend of luxurious floral oils.
â­ Opulent musk for an attractive scent.
â­ Expertly crafted Everscentâ„¢ Essential Oil.
â­ Moisturizing ingredients to maintain skin softness.

description_en:
Experience luxurious freshness with **Lux Hand Wash Satin Grapefruit**. This hand wash is designed to give your hands the royal treatment they deserve, with a refreshing grapefruit scent that invigorates your senses and leaves your hands clean and fresh all day long. Its formula, enriched with Natural Myrrh, Almond Oil, and Glycerin, nourishes your skin, providing superior softness and deep hydration. The bottle, made from 95% recycled plastic, supports both your hands' health and our planet.

â­ Invigorating grapefruit fragrance that awakens the senses.
â­ Effective and gentle cleansing thanks to Natural Myrrh.
â­ Deep hydration and soft hands with Almond Oil and Glycerin.
â­ Long-lasting velvety scent.
â­ Eco-friendly bottle made from recycled plastic.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lux Hand Wash Satin Grapefruit**
â­ Wet your hands with water.
â­ Apply a suitable amount of the wash and lather hands thoroughly.
â­ Rinse hands with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lux Hand Wash Satin Grapefruit**
â­ Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Glycerin, Sodium Chloride, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Parfum, Sodium Benzoate, Citric Acid, Benzophenone-4, Tetrasodium EDTA, PP-9, Sodium Hydroxide, Sericin, Jasminium Officinale (Jasmine) Flower Extract, Rosa Gallica Flower Extract, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Phenoxyethanol, Nelumbium Speciosum Flower Oil, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Potassium Sorbate, Mentha Arvensis Leaf Oil, Cymbopogon Martini Oil, Sodium Sulfate, Tocopherol, Commiphora Myrrha Resin Extract, Benzyl Salicylate, Limonene, Linalool, CI14700, CI 17200.

#HandWash #Lux #HandCare #Freshness #BeautifulScent #HandMoisturizer #SoftSkin #Hydration #SkincareProducts #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Elevate your shower ritual with **Lux Revitalizing Grapefruit Body Wash with Vitamin C**, your daily companion for a refreshing shower experience. With 2x the freshness, its unique formula leaves behind long-lasting vitality and a lingering scent to keep you feeling refreshed and confident all day long. Infused with the invigorating scent of fresh grapefruit, this luxurious body wash awakens your senses and leaves you feeling revitalized and refreshed. Indulge in its sparkling fragrance and let it rejuvenate and energize you. It's the perfect way to start your day on an energizing note or shake off fatigue at the end of a tiring day.

Enriched with Vitamin C essence, a powerful antioxidant known for its skin-brightening properties, this body wash not only cleanses but also enhances your skinâ€™s radiance. The refreshing body cleanser is ideal for daily use. Its rich, creamy lather envelops your body for a spa-like experience, ensuring a great shower time at home.

Explore other amazing scents from Lux to pick your favorite fragrance: Magical Orchid, Romantic Hibiscus, Tempting Musk, Velvet Jasmine and Soft Rose.

**Product Features:**
â­ REFRESHING BODY WASH: **Lux Revitalizing Grapefruit Body Wash with Vitamin C** is a daily body cleanser that leaves you feeling refreshed and ready to take on the day.
â­ 2X THE FRESHNESS: The shower gel's unique formula delivers double the freshness for long-lasting vitality and a lingering fragrance.
â­ WITH VITAMIN C ESSENCE: The body wash is enriched with Vitamin C essence, a powerful antioxidant known for its skinbrightening properties.
â­ SPARKLING FRAGRANCE: Crafted with a refreshing scent, the body wash rejuvenates your senses, leaving you feeling refreshed and energized.
â­ INVIGORATING SCENT OF GRAPEFRUIT: Indulge in the revitalizing and fresh grapefruit fragrance. Its bright and citrusy freshness is perfect for stimulating and invigorating your senses.
â­ DISCOVER OTHER EXCITING SCENTS: Explore more from the Lux Body Wash range to find your favorite scent: Magical Orchid, Romantic Hibiscus.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lux Revitalizing Grapefruit Body Wash with Vitamin C**
â­ Wet your skin with water.
â­ Apply a suitable amount of body wash onto your hands or loofah.
â­ Lather the wash and gently massage onto your body.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lux Revitalizing Grapefruit Body Wash with Vitamin C**
â­ Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Sodium Chloride, Cocamide MEA, Parfum, Glycerin, Sodium Benzoate, Citric Acid, Tetrasodium EDTA, PPG-9, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Sericin, Jasminium Officinale (Jasmine) Flower Extract, Rosa Gallica Flower Extract, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Phenoxyethanol, Nelumbium Speciosum Flower Oil, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Potassium Sorbate, Mentha Arvensis Leaf Oil, Cymbopogon Martini Oil, Sodium Sulfate, Benzyl Salicylate, Limonene, Linalool, CI 1470, CI 17200.

#Lux #BodyWash #VitaminC #Grapefruit #Freshness #BodyCare #Hydration #HealthySkin #RefreshingScent #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Discover the softness and freshness of your hands with **Lux Hand Wash Fig Extract**, specially formulated to renew your skin and leave it fragranced with the delightful scent of fig and geranium. Featuring a unique formula with 100% natural extracts, this hand wash offers a superior care experience with a touch of nature.

â­ For renewed and refreshed skin
â­ Long-lasting fragrance of fig and geranium
â­ 100% Natural Extracts
â­ Paraben Free

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lux Hand Wash Fig Extract**:
â­ Wet your hands with water.
â­ Dispense the soap.
â­ Rub hands thoroughly for 20 seconds for deep cleansing.
â­ Rinse off with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lux Hand Wash Fig Extract**:
â­ Aqua, Sodium laureth sulfate, Glycerin, Sodium chloride, Cocamidopropyl betaine, Parfum, Benzophenone-4, Sodium benzoate, Tetrasodium EDTA, Citric acid, Sodium hydroxide, PPG-9, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Flower Oil, Ficus Carica (Fig) Fruit Extract, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Extract, Pelargonium Graveolens Flower Oil, Rosa Canina Seed Extract, CI 17200, CI 42090.

#Lux #HandWash #HandCare #Moisturizing #Fragrance #SkinRenewal #NaturalExtracts #SaudiArabia #SaudiShopping #SkincareProducts

description_en:
Experience the ultimate indulgence with the **Lux Secret Bliss Soap** Bar. Unwind, lather up, and immerse yourself in a long-lasting fragrant shower. This exquisite soap is infused with Floral Fusion Oil, leaving your skin feeling soft, balanced, and mesmerizingly scented all day. Prepare to elevate your senses and enter a whole new world of fine fragrance. The **Lux Secret Bliss Soap** bar leaves an enchanting trail that effortlessly seduces those around you. Suitable for all skin types.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lux Secret Bliss Soap**:
â­ Gently massage the soap onto wet skin to create a rich lather.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with warm water.
â­ For external use only.
â­ Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse thoroughly with plenty of water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lux Secret Bliss Soap**:
â­ Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Glycerin.
â­ Lauric Acid, Decyl Glucoside, Parfum.
â­ Polysorbate 20, PPG-9, Potassium Hydroxide.
â­ PEG-2M, Isopropyl Myristate, Stearic Acid.
â­ Sodium Hydroxide, Tetrasodium EDTA, Citric Acid.
â­ Magnesium Nitrate, Silica, Calcium Oxide.
â­ Magnesium Chloride, Methylchloroisothiazolinone.
â­ Methylisothiazolinone, BHT, Citronellol, Limonene, Linalool.

description_en:
Experience refreshing purity with **Lux Hand Wash Purifying Watermint**. Enriched with glycerin, this hand wash features a rich, creamy lather and a lingering fresh scent, perfect for gently and effectively cleansing your hands. It removes germs and bacteria without over-drying the skin, leaving it soft, fragrant, and protected. It's the ideal solution for soft, fragranced skin protected against bacteria. Its naturally sourced ingredients ensure lasting freshness and deep hydration thanks to glycerin, for soft and pampered hands.

For almost a century, **Lux Hand Wash Purifying Watermint** has offered a unique beauty experience, inspired by collaborations with elite global perfumers to create exquisite fragrances that pamper your skin and transform your daily handwashing routine into a luxurious experience that makes you feel special every day.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lux Hand Wash Purifying Watermint**:
â­ Wet your hands with water.
â­ Dispense an adequate amount onto your palms.
â­ Rub your hands thoroughly for at least 20 seconds, ensuring you scrub the back of your hands, between fingers, and under nails.
â­ Rinse your hands well with clean water until all lather is removed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lux Hand Wash Purifying Watermint**:
â­ Glycerin for superior hydration.
â­ Refreshing mint extracts.
â­ A blend of fragrant floral oils.
â­ Gentle skin-cleansing agents.
â­ Long-lasting fine fragrances.

#Lux #HandWash #Watermint #Freshness #Skincare #Moisturizing #Beauty #Hygiene #Antibacterial #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Experience freshness and radiance with **Lux Hand Wash Honey & Lotus 500 ml**. This hand wash offers a unique sensory experience with a long-lasting fragrance, extracted from the finest natural ingredients to ensure your skin's softness. Its paraben-free formula maintains your hands' health and gives them a bright, attractive look all day long. Enjoy a touch of nature with every wash.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lux Hand Wash Honey & Lotus 500 ml**:
â­ Wet your hands with water.
â­ Use an appropriate amount of hand wash.
â­ Rub your hands thoroughly for 20 seconds.
â­ Rinse your hands well with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lux Hand Wash Honey & Lotus 500 ml**:
â­ Aqua, Sodium laureth sulfate, Glycerin, Sodium chloride, Cocamidopropyl betaine, Parfum, Benzophenone-4, Sodium benzoate, Tetrasodium EDTA, Citric acid, Sodium hydroxide, PPG-9, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Flower Extract, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Flower, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Flower oil, Honey, Nelumbo Nucifera Leaf Extract, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Citronellol, Geraniol, Limonene, Linalool, CI 17200, CI 19140.

#Lux #HandWash #Honey #Lotus #HandHygiene #SkinCare #Moisturizing #NaturalFragrance #SaudiArabia #HealthyHands

Discover the secret to velvety smooth skin with **Lux Shower Gel Velvet Jasmine**. Indulge in a luxurious sensorial shower experience, enriched with Hyaluronic Acid for 2X moisturizing power that pampers your skin. Immerse yourself in a delicate, long-lasting floral fragrance that's two times better than real flowers. Your skin will feel nourished, soft, and beautifully scented with the enchanting aroma of Jasmine.

â­ Achieve long-lasting soft skin.
â­ 2X moisturization with Hyaluronic Acid.
â­ Luxurious Jasmine fragrance, inspired by real flowers.
â­ Suitable for all skin types.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lux Shower Gel Velvet Jasmine**:

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lux Shower Gel Velvet Jasmine**:

â­ Long-lasting luxurious fragrance.

description_en:
Discover the secret to radiant skin with **Lux Shower Gel Lotus & Honey**.

Lux Botanicals Skin Glowing Body Wash, infused with the power of Lotus & Honey, is designed to give your skin a natural glow. Indulge in a luxurious shower experience that nourishes your skin, leaving it soft and revitalized.

â­ Features 100% Natural Extracts.
â­ Paraben Free for gentle care.
â­ Achieve irresistibly smooth, glowing skin.
â­ Soothes your skin with every lather.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lux Shower Gel Lotus & Honey**:
â­ Pour a drop of this fragranced body wash onto a pouf.
â­ Gently lather and massage all over your body to let the luxurious lather and its enchanting fragrance embrace your skin and senses every day.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lux Shower Gel Lotus & Honey**:
â­ Aqua, Sodium laureth sulfate, Parfum, Cocamide MEA, Sodium chloride, Sodium benzoate, Citric acid, PPG-9, Tetrasodium EDTA, Sodium hydroxide, Sodium sulfate, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Flower Extract, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Flower, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Flower oil, Honey, Nelumbo Nucifera Leaf Extract, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil.
â­ May Contain: Citronellol, Geraniol, Limonene, Linalool, CI 17200, CI 19140.

#Lux #ShowerGel #LotusFlower #Honey #GlowingSkin #Skincare #ShowerProducts #SkinMoisture #Beauty #SaudiArabia

title_ar: Ù„ÙˆÙƒØ³ ØµØ§Ø¨ÙˆÙ† Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø³Ùƒ Ø§Ù„Ù…ØºØ±ÙŠ - Ø¹Ø·Ø± Ø§Ù„ÙØ§ÙˆÙ†ÙŠØ§ Ø§Ù„Ø¨Ø±ÙŠØ© 170 Ø¬Ù…
description_en:
Discover the allure of **Lux Tempting Musk Bar Soap** (170g), where the exquisite fragrance of Wild Peony blends with notes of Ylang-Ylang for a unique sensory experience that leaves your skin feeling soft, balanced, and mesmerizingly scented all day. Transform your shower routine into an extraordinary moment that indulves your skin and senses with a rich and distinctive aroma.

â­ Get long-lastingly soft and smooth skin.
â­ Elegantly perfumed with the floral scent of Wild Peony and Ylang-Ylang oil.
â­ Top note: Red Plum, Blackberry, Tuberose.
â­ Heart note: White Peony, Tonka Bean, Ylang Ylang, Coconut Cream, Lily of the Valley, Ambery Musk.
â­ Base note: Tonka bean, Coconut Cream, Ambery Musk.
â­ Suitable for all skin types.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lux Tempting Musk Bar Soap**:
â­ Wet your skin with warm water.
â­ Wet the soap bar under running water.
â­ Rub the soap between your hands or directly onto your skin to create a rich, creamy lather.
â­ Gently massage the lather onto your skin in circular motions.
â­ Rinse your body thoroughly with warm water.
â­ Gently pat your skin dry and enjoy the softness and fragrance.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lux Tempting Musk Bar Soap**:
â­ Sodium Palmate, Aqua, Sodium Palm Kernelate, C12, Sodium Hydroxide, Parfum, Lauric Acid, Sodium Chloride, Glycerin, Tetrasodium EDTA, Etidronic Acid, Citric Acid, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Hydroxystearic Acid, Stearic Acid, Sericin, Rosa Gallica Flower Extract, Jasminum Officinale (Jasmine) Flower Extract, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Nemulbium Speciosum Flower Oil, Prunus Amygdalus Duclis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Mentha Arvensis Leaf Oil, Cymbopogon Martini Oil, Benzyl Salicylate, Geraniol, Coumarin, Linalool, Limonene, CI 12490, CI 74160.

#LuxSaudi #LuxSoap #WildPeonyFragrance #TemptingMusk #Skincare #SkinHydration #FloralScents #LuxuryShower #BodyCareProducts #SaudiBeauty

title_en: Lux Revitalizing Grapefruit Body Wash with Vitamin C, 500ml - Lasting Freshness
title_ar: Ù„ÙˆÙƒØ³ ØºØ³ÙˆÙ„ Ø§Ù„Ø¬Ø³Ù… Ø¨Ø§Ù„Ø¬Ø±ÙŠØ¨ ÙØ±ÙˆØª Ù…Ø¹ ÙÙŠØªØ§Ù…ÙŠÙ† Ø³ÙŠØŒ 500 Ù…Ù„ - Ø§Ù†ØªØ¹Ø§Ø´ ÙŠØ¯ÙˆÙ… Ø·ÙˆÙŠÙ„Ø§Ù‹
description_en:
Discover revitalizing freshness with **Lux Revitalizing Grapefruit Body Wash**, designed to elevate your daily care routine. This unique body wash delivers 2x the freshness with an invigorating grapefruit scent that awakens your senses and leaves your skin feeling refreshed and vibrant all day long. Enriched with Vitamin C, known for its skin-brightening properties, **Lux Revitalizing Grapefruit Body Wash** gently cleanses your skin while enhancing its natural radiance.

â­ REFRESHING BODY WASH: A daily body cleanser that leaves you feeling refreshed and ready to take on the day.
â­ 2X THE FRESHNESS: The shower gel's unique formula delivers double the freshness for long-lasting vitality and a lingering fragrance.
â­ WITH VITAMIN C ESSENCE: The body wash is enriched with Vitamin C essence, a powerful antioxidant known for its skin-brightening properties.
â­ SPARKLING FRAGRANCE: Crafted with a refreshing scent, the body wash rejuvenates your senses, leaving you feeling refreshed and energized.
â­ INVIGORATING SCENT OF GRAPEFRUIT: Indulge in the revitalizing and fresh grapefruit fragrance. Its bright and citrusy freshness is perfect for stimulating and invigorating your senses.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lux Revitalizing Grapefruit Body Wash**
â­ Wet your skin thoroughly with water.
â­ Apply a suitable amount of the body wash onto a washcloth or directly onto your body.
â­ Gently lather to create a rich foam.
â­ Rinse well with water to remove any residue.
â­ Use daily for best results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lux Revitalizing Grapefruit Body Wash**
â­ Aqua
â­ Sodium Laureth Sulfate
â­ Sodium Chloride
â­ Cocamide MEA
â­ Parfum
â­ Glycerin
â­ Sodium Benzoate
â­ Citric Acid
â­ Tetrasodium EDTA
â­ PPG-9
â­ Sodium Hydroxide
â­ Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate (Vitamin C)
â­ Sericin
â­ Jasminium Officinale (Jasmine) Flower Extract
â­ Rosa Gallica Flower Extract
â­ PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil
â­ Phenoxyethanol
â­ Nelumbium Speciosum Flower Oil
â­ Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil
â­ Mentha Arvensis Leaf Oil
â­ Cymbopogon Martini Oil
â­ Sodium Sulfate
â­ Benzyl Salicylate
â­ Limonene
â­ Linalool
â­ CI 1470
â­ CI 17200

#Lux #BodyWash #Grapefruit #VitaminC #Skincare #Freshness #RefreshingScent #ShowerGel #Hydration #SaudiBeauty

title_ar: Ù„ÙˆÙƒØ³ ØµØ§Ø¨ÙˆÙ† Ø¨Ø§Ø± Ø±ÙˆÙ…Ø§Ù†Ø³ÙŠ Ø§Ù„ÙƒØ±ÙƒØ¯ÙŠÙ‡ 170 Ø¬Ù… - Ù†Ø¹ÙˆÙ…Ø© ÙˆØ±Ø§Ø¦Ø­Ø© Ø³Ø§Ø­Ø±Ø©
description_en:
Discover ultimate softness and a captivating scent with **Lux Romantic Hibiscus Bar Soap 170 gm**. This luxurious soap from Lux combines skin care with romantic fragrances for an unforgettable bathing experience. Infused with the scent of hibiscus flowers, it leaves you feeling refreshed and romantic all day long.

Product Features:
â­ Soft and Smooth Skin: Specially formulated to leave your skin exceptionally soft and moisturized.
â­ Hibiscus Flower Scent: A rich and romantic fragrance that adds a touch of magic to your day.
â­ Luxurious Creamy Lather: For a rich and enjoyable cleansing experience.
â­ Nourishing Moisturizers: Helps maintain skin's hydration and vitality.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lux Romantic Hibiscus Bar Soap 170 gm**:
â­ Wet your body and the soap bar with warm water.
â­ Rub the soap between your hands or directly onto your skin to create a rich, creamy lather.
â­ Gently massage the lather into your skin to cleanse and nourish it.
â­ Rinse your skin thoroughly with water, and enjoy its supreme softness.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lux Romantic Hibiscus Bar Soap 170 gm**:
â­ Sodium Palmate, Sodium Palm Kernelate, Aqua, Parfum, Glycerin, Palm Acid, Sodium Chloride, Tetrasodium EDTA, Tetrasodium Etidronate, Limonene, Linalool, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Geraniol, Citronellol, Coumarin, Benzyl Benzoate, CI 12490, CI 11680.

description_en:
Discover the secret to radiant skin with the **Lux Bar Nourished Skin Gardenia Flower Alur 170 gm**. This luxurious soap bar is infused with Vitamin C, E, and Glycerine, offering a triple-benefit formula that deeply brightens and hydrates your skin, revealing a naturally soft glow. Indulge in a rich, creamy lather and the delicate, long-lasting gardenia fragrance for a refreshing sensory experience during your shower. Make the **Lux Bar Nourished Skin Gardenia Flower Alur 170 gm** a part of your daily routine and witness your skin transform into a more nourished and healthy appearance in just a few weeks.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lux Bar Nourished Skin Gardenia Flower Alur 170 gm**

â­ Wet your skin with water.
â­ Lather the soap onto your skin to create a rich foam.
â­ Rinse your skin thoroughly with water.
â­ For best results, use daily.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lux Bar Nourished Skin Gardenia Flower Alur 170 gm**

â­ Vitamin C
â­ Vitamin E
â­ Glycerine
â­ Gardenia Flower Extract

description_en:
NEW Lux Hand Wash Refreshing Verbena, glycerin-enriched perfumed and antibacterial handwash with a luxurious moisturizing lather. Lux liquid hand soap washes away germs and impurities without over-drying skin, keeping hands protected, hydrated, and lightly scented with every wash.

LUX Refreshing Verbena Hand Wash is your answer to soft fragrant skin that is protected against bacteria. Your skin will feel delightfully supple and protected with our naturally sourced ingredients to always smell fresh. It will also be moisturized with Glycerine, for soft & pampered perfumed hands, like a gentle bouquet of scented roses. Experience the rich lather of LUX.

â­ Enriched with Glycerine for superior hydration.
â­ Antibacterial formula for hand protection.
â­ Refreshing Verbena scent that lasts.
â­ Rich creamy lather for a pampering experience.
â­ Naturally sourced ingredients.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lux** Hand Wash Refreshing Verbena
â­ Wet your hands with water.
â­ Apply an adequate amount of the hand wash to your palms.
â­ Rub hands thoroughly for at least 20 seconds, ensuring you clean between fingers and under nails.
â­ Rinse your hands with clean water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lux** Hand Wash Refreshing Verbena
â­ Water
â­ Glycerine
â­ Verbena Fragrance
â­ Antibacterial Agents
â­ Gentle Cleansing Agents

description_en:
Experience unparalleled softness and an enchanting floral scent with **Lux Shower Gel Silky Gardenia**. This luxurious shower gel nourishes your skin, leaving it exceptionally soft and fragrant for a long-lasting silken touch, thanks to its formula enriched with 2X moisturizing ingredients and the captivating Silky Gardenia fragrance.

Indulge in skin that feels irresistibly smooth and is delicately perfumed to make you feel special every day. **Lux Shower Gel Silky Gardenia** is suitable for all skin types and helps to deeply moisturize your skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lux Shower Gel Silky Gardenia**:
â­ Pour a small amount of the gel onto a loofah or your hands.
â­ Gently lather onto your skin to create a rich foam.
â­ Rinse your body thoroughly with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lux Shower Gel Silky Gardenia**:
â­ Top Notes: Ylang Ylang, Bergamot, Tropical Fruits, Apple.
â­ Heart Notes: Rose, Gardenia, Poetâ€™s Jasmine, Orris.
â­ Base Notes: Peach, Sandalwood, Amber, Tonka Bean.
â­ Hyaluronic Acid for superior hydration.

description_en:
Experience pure refreshment and gentle care with **Lux Hand Wash with Camellia & Aloe Vera**. This luxurious liquid hand wash combines the soothing essence of camellia with the hydrating power of aloe vera to leave your hands feeling incredibly soft and delicately fragranced. Formulated with 100% natural extracts and free from parabens, it offers a superior hand care experience. Enjoy the deep cleanse and lasting freshness that **Lux Hand Wash with Camellia & Aloe Vera** provides.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lux Hand Wash with Camellia & Aloe Vera**:
â­ Wet hands with water.
â­ Apply a sufficient amount of soap.
â­ Rub hands thoroughly for 20 seconds.
â­ Rinse off with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lux Hand Wash with Camellia & Aloe Vera**:
â­ Aqua
â­ Sodium laureth sulfate
â­ Glycerin
â­ Sodium chloride
â­ Cocamidopropyl betaine
â­ Parfum
â­ Benzophenone-4
â­ Sodium benzoate
â­ Tetrasodium EDTA
â­ Citric acid
â­ Sodium hydroxide
â­ PPG-9
â­ Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil
â­ Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract
â­ Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Flower Extract
â­ Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Flower
â­ Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice
â­ Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Flower oil
â­ Honey
â­ Nelumbo Nucifera Leaf Extract
â­ Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil
â­ Benzyl benzoate
â­ Citral
â­ Citronellol
â­ Geraniol
â­ Hexyl cinnamal
â­ Limonene
â­ Linalool
â­ CI 17200
â­ CI 19140
â­ CI 42090

#LuxHandWash #HandCare #Camellia #AloeVera #LuxBeauty #HandSoap #NaturalFragrance #SkinDetox #SaudiBeauty #CleanHands

Experience the enchanting scent of **Lux** Magical Beauty body wash. This luxurious formula is infused with rare black orchids, leaving your skin feeling soft and beautifully perfumed for hours. Indulge your senses with this exquisite fragrance.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lux** Magical Beauty:
â­ Pour a small amount of the body wash onto a shower puff.

description_en:
Experience silky smooth skin with **Lux Velvet Smooth Shower Gel 250ml + Puff**. This luxurious shower gel creates a rich, moisturizing lather that envelops your skin with a calming jasmine fragrance and nourishes it with almond oil. Indulge in a silky smooth sensation every day.

â­ Delivers long-lasting velvety soft skin.
â­ Enriched with almond oil and our specially crafted Floral Fusion Oilâ„¢ for superior hydration.
â­ Elegantly perfumed with the floral scent of fresh blooming jasmine, providing a mood-relaxing experience.
â­ Suitable for all skin types.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lux Velvet Smooth Shower Gel 250ml + Puff**:
â­ Pour a drop of this fragranced body wash and gently lather with a puff.
â­ Massage all over your body to let the luxurious lather and its enchanting fragrance embrace your skin and senses every day.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lux Velvet Smooth Shower Gel 250ml + Puff**:
â­ Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Parfum, Sodium Chloride, Cocamide MEA, Glycerin, Sodium Benzoate, Acrylates Copolymer, Glycol Distearate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Citric Acid, Tetrasodium EDTA, PPG-9, Sericin, Jasminum Officinale Flower Extract, Rosa Gallica Flower Extract, Nelumbium Speciosum Flower Oil, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Cymbopogon Martini Oil, Mentha Arvensis Leaf Extract, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Hydroxide, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Salicylate, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Coumarin, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool

#Lux #ShowerGel #BodyCare #VelvetSmooth #Jasmine #AlmondOil #Hydration #Fragrance #Skincare #SaudiArabia

Pamper your lips with a magical touch of **Lip Smacker Unicorn**! Enjoy deep hydration and delicious flavors that leave your lips soft and vibrant. The **Lip Smacker Unicorn** features a fun unicorn design, adding joy to your daily routine and ensuring a bright smile with every application.

â­ Deeply moisturizes lips for superior softness.
â­ Delicious flavors make application a delight.
â­ Cute unicorn design adds a playful touch.
â­ Small, portable packaging perfect for on-the-go.
â­ Ideal as a gift for loved ones.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lip Smacker Unicorn**:
â­ Twist open the balm.
â­ Apply generously to lips as often as desired.
â­ For external use only.
â­ Recommended for ages 6 and up.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lip Smacker Unicorn**:
â­ Mineral Oil
â­ Polyisobutene

â­ Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2
â­ Cera Alba
â­ Phenoxyethanol
â­ Parfum

description_en:
Indulge your lips with **Lip Smacker Cola Cherry Cup**! Experience the refreshing taste of Coca-Cola with a delightful cherry twist and long-lasting hydration. Its unique fountain cup design adds a touch of fun to your daily routine.

â­ Hydrate your lips with the authentic taste of Cola Cherry.
â­ Provides extended hydration for a smooth, luscious feel.
â­ Iconic and fun fountain cup design for everyday use.
â­ Leaves lips feeling soft and moisturized all day long.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lip Smacker Cola Cherry Cup**:
â­ Twist the top of the cup to open the balm.
â­ Apply generously to lips as often as you desire.
â­ For external use only.
â­ Recommended for ages 6 and up.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lip Smacker Cola Cherry Cup**:
â­ Mineral Oil (Paraffinum Liquidum)
â­ Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2
â­ Isopropyl Myristate
â­ Candelilla Wax (Euphorbia Cerifera Candelilla)
â­ Castor Seed Oil (Ricinus Communis)
â­ Beeswax (Cera Alba)
â­ Bis-Dimethicone
â­ Flavor (Aroma)
â­ Sucrose Tetrastearate Triacetate
â­ Sucralose
â­ Cetyl Alcohol
â­ PPG-23/Dimer Dilinoleic Ether Dimethyl Ether
â­ BHT
â­ Sodium Benzoate
â­ Citric Acid
â­ Red 40 (CI 16035)
â­ Yellow 5 (CI 19140)
â­ Blue 1 (CI 42090)

Indulge your lips with the **Lip Smacker Disney Minnie** balm, inspired by your beloved cartoon character! This balm is more than just a moisturizer; it's a playful expression of your emotions. Each balm features a unique design that combines two different expressions, adding a touch of joy to your daily routine.

Enjoy delicious flavors that will delight your senses and keep your lips smooth and moisturized all day long. **Lip Smacker Disney Minnie** is perfect as a small gift or for sharing with friends at parties.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lip Smacker Disney Minnie**:
â­ Twist the top to open the balm.
â­ Apply generously to lips whenever desired.
â­ For external use only.
â­ Recommended for ages 6 and up.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lip Smacker Disney Minnie**:
â­ Paraffin Wax
â­ Castor Oil
â­ Mineral Oil
â­ Beeswax
â­ Natural & Artificial Flavors
â­ Vitamin E
â­ Sunscreen (SPF)
â­ Natural Moisturizers

description_en:
Experience soft, moisturized lips with the **Lip Smacker Repunzel Magical Glow Berry** lip balm. It features a nourishing formula and a refreshing berry flavor that gives your lips a magical touch. The attractive packaging with a beloved character design makes every application a delightful experience, perfect for collecting the whole set. Keep your smile radiant and your lips hydrated all day long with **Lip Smacker Repunzel Magical Glow Berry**.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lip Smacker Repunzel Magical Glow Berry**:
â­ Twist the top to open the balm.
â­ Apply generously to lips as often as you desire.
â­ For external use only.
â­ Recommended for ages 6 and up.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lip Smacker Repunzel Magical Glow Berry**:
â­ Paraffinum Liquidum
â­ Beeswax
â­ Flavor
â­ Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter)
â­ Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E)
â­ Synthetic Beeswax
â­ Ozokerite
â­ Ethylhexyl Palmitate
â­ Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride
â­ Copernicia Cerifera Cera.

description_en:
Indulge your lips with the **Lip Smacker Panda** lip balm, featuring a delightful and tasty flavor that keeps your lips moisturized all day long. The unique packaging boasts an adorable panda animal character on each lip balm; we know you won't be able to resist smiling every time you apply it. Collect our complete range to keep your lips hydrated and your smile happy continuously.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lip Smacker Panda**:
â­ Twist the top to open the balm.
â­ Apply generously to lips as often as desired for hydration.
â­ For external use only.
â­ Recommended for ages 6 and up.

description_en:
Quench your thirst with a Coke Cup lip balm from **Lip Smacker**! Twist open and awaken your senses to the refreshing world of Coke. This dome-shaped lip balm delivers the authentic taste of Coca-Cola while providing extended hydration to your lips. The iconic fountain cup design is sure to make an impression whenever you use it!

â­ Delivers deep, long-lasting hydration to your lips.
â­ Features the authentic taste of Coca-Cola.
â­ Innovative design shaped like a Coca-Cola cup.
â­ Adds an attractive and appealing look to your lips.
â­ Perfect as a gift or a distinctive party favor.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lip Smacker**:
â­ Twist the top of the cup to open the balm.
â­ Apply generously to lips as often as you like.
â­ For external use only.
â­ Recommended for ages 6 and up.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lip Smacker**:
â­ Paraffinum Liquidum
â­ Petrolatum
â­ Ozokerite
â­ Cera Microcristallina
â­ Ethylhexyl Palmitate
â­ Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride
â­ Phenoxyethanol
â­ BHT
â­ Flavor
â­ Red 40 (CI 16035)
â­ Blue 1 (CI 42090)

Each side showcases a cute character with different expressions, adding a splash of joy to your day. With its delicious flavor, **Lip Smacker Disney Cinderella** works to keep your lips smooth, moisturized, and protected all day long.

description_en:
Indulge your lips with the sweet, fizzy taste of Fanta Strawberry using the **Lip Smacker Fanta Strawberry Cup** lip balm. This delightful lip balm not only moisturizes and protects your lips, keeping them soft and smooth, but also brings a burst of fruity fun to your day. Its hydrating formula is perfect for combating dryness and chapped lips, making it an essential part of your daily lip care routine. Experience the vibrant flavor and nourishing benefits of **Lip Smacker Fanta Strawberry Cup**.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lip Smacker Fanta Strawberry Cup**:
â­ Apply liberally to lips as often as desired.
â­ For external use only.
â­ Keep out of reach of children.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lip Smacker Fanta Strawberry Cup**:
â­ Paraffinum Liquidum (Mineral Oil)
â­ Ozokerite
â­ Beeswax
â­ Cetyl Alcohol
â­ Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride
â­ Isopropyl Myristate
â­ Flavor
â­ Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax
â­ Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter)
â­ Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E)

description_en:
Experience all-day freshness and confidence with **Lady Speed Stick Teen Spirit Berry Punch**. This deodorant is specially formulated for active teens, offering a delightful berry punch scent that keeps you feeling invigorated. **Lady Speed Stick Teen Spirit Berry Punch** provides reliable protection against sweat and odor, keeping your underarms dry and fresh, while being gentle on sensitive skin and helping to prevent those annoying yellow underarm stains on clothes.

â­ Powerful, long-lasting protection against sweat and odor.
â­ Invigorating and attractive berry scent for a confident feel.
â­ Gentle formula designed for teen sensitive skin care.
â­ Easy to apply with its convenient stick packaging.
â­ Perfect size for carrying in your bag or for travel.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lady Speed Stick Teen Spirit Berry Punch**
â­ Apply a thin layer to clean, dry underarms.
â­ For external use only.
â­ Avoid applying to irritated or broken skin.
â­ Discontinue use if irritation occurs and consult a doctor.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lady Speed Stick Teen Spirit Berry Punch**
â­ Contains active antiperspirant ingredients for superior protection.
â­ Features a blend of refreshing fruity fragrances for a berry scent.
â­ Includes moisturizers to keep skin soft.
â­ Contains preservatives to ensure product quality and effectiveness.

#LadySpeedStick #TeenSpirit #Deodorant #Antiperspirant #BerryPunch #TeenDeodorant #BodyCare #Freshness #OdorProtection #SaudiBeauty

description_en:
Unleash unstoppable confidence with **Lady Speed Stick Pro 5** antiperspirant spray deodorant. Experience superior protection for up to 48 hours, keeping you feeling fresh and dry all day long. Its unique 0% alcohol formula ensures ultimate comfort without irritation, delivering 5 essential benefits in one product: ultra-dryness, invisible stain-free protection, long-lasting freshness, gentle skin care, and dermatologically tested. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lady Speed Stick Pro 5**:
â­ Shake well before use.
â­ Apply to clean, dry underarms.
â­ Hold the can 15 cm away from your skin and spray for two seconds.
â­ Do not over-apply.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lady Speed Stick Pro 5**:
â­ Butane, Propane, Isobutane
â­ Aluminum Chlorohydrate
â­ Cyclomethicone, Dimethicone
â­ Parfum, Disteardimonium Hectorite
â­ Propylene Carbonate, Dimethiconol
â­ Various Fragrance Ingredients (e.g., Benzyl Salicylate, Hexyl Cinnamal, Citronellol, Geraniol, Coumarin, Limonene, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Linalool, Eugenol, Cinnamyl Alcohol)

description_en:
Experience ultimate comfort and lasting freshness with **Lady Speed Stick Powder Fresh**. Enjoy complete protection against sweat and odor all day long, thanks to its innovative formula that provides you with a constant feeling of confidence and refreshment. **Lady Speed Stick Powder Fresh** is specially designed to offer you effective 24-hour protection, while keeping your skin dry and free from annoying white marks. Say goodbye to worries and wear what you love with complete confidence with this antiperspirant stick that guarantees you stay fresh from morning to night.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lady Speed Stick Powder Fresh**

â­ Apply a sufficient amount to the underarms.
â­ Use daily after showering for best results.
â­ Reapply as needed to ensure continuous freshness.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lady Speed Stick Powder Fresh**

â­ Aluminum Zirconium Tetrachlorohydrex Gly
â­ Cyclopentasiloxane
â­ Stearyl Alcohol
â­ Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride
â­ Dimethicone
â­ Mineral Oil
â­ Hydrogenated Castor Oil
â­ Fragrance
â­ Cotton Extract

description_en:
Experience lasting freshness and confidence with **Lady Speed Stick Teen Strawberry Antiperspirant Deodorant**, specially formulated for today's young girls. This deodorant stick offers effective protection against sweat and odor for up to 48 hours, featuring a skin-friendly formula and a delightful, long-lasting strawberry scent. It helps you feel clean and refreshed all day long, making it your perfect choice for a confident start to every day.

â­ Specially designed for young teen girls
â­ Effectively controls sweat and odor
â­ Provides a lasting feeling of freshness and cleanliness
â­ Sweet, attractive strawberry fragrance that lasts long
â­ Offers 48-hour antiperspirant protection
â­ Gentle on the skin and eliminates bad odors

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lady Speed Stick Teen Strawberry Antiperspirant Deodorant**

â­ Twist the base of the stick to expose the product.
â­ Apply directly to the underarm area.
â­ Swipe the stick a few times on each underarm.
â­ Close the cap tightly after use to preserve the product.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lady Speed Stick Teen Strawberry Antiperspirant Deodorant**

â­ Active Ingredient: Aluminum Zirconium Tetrachlorohydrex Gly (15.9%).
â­ Inactive Ingredients: Cyclopentasiloxane, Stearyl Alcohol, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, PPG-14 Butyl Ether, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, PEG-8 Distearate, Hydrogenated Soybean Oil, Talc, Fragrance, Behenyl Alcohol.

#LadySpeedStick #Deodorant #Antiperspirant #SkinCare #TeenGirls #FreshScent #LongLastingFreshness #SaudiShopping #BeautyProducts #BodyFragrance

description_en:
Experience ultimate freshness with **Lady Speed Stick Shower Fresh**, the deodorant specifically designed to provide long-lasting protection and a refreshing scent all day long. Thanks to its innovative formula, **Lady Speed Stick Shower Fresh** offers effective protection against wetness and odor for 24 hours without leaving any white residue on your clothes. Its quick-drying and easy-to-apply formula ensures absolute comfort and self-confidence to wear your favorite outfits without worry.

â­ Provides 24-hour protection against wetness and odor.
â­ Scent renewal formula to keep you fresh all day.
â­ Leaves no white residue on clothes.
â­ Dries quickly and is easy to apply.
â­ Comfortable and contoured design for underarm use.
â­ Reduces perspiration.
â­ Suitable for all skin types.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lady Speed Stick Shower Fresh**

â­ Twist the base of the stick to dispense the product.
â­ Swiftly apply 2-3 strokes over each underarm.
â­ Let the product dry for a few seconds before dressing up.
â­ Apply after shower for better results.
â­ It is suggested to apply once a day.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lady Speed Stick Shower Fresh**

â­ Aluminum Zirconium Tetrachlorohydrex GLY â€“ 15.8%

#LadySpeedStick #Deodorant #Freshness #24HourProtection #BodyCare #SaudiArabia #Riyadh #Jeddah #Dammam #GCC

description_en:
Feel unstoppable and confident with the empowering scent of **Lady Speed Stick** Dynamic antiperspirant spray. 

**Lady Speed Stick** Dynamic offers reliable, 48-hour protection against sweat and odor, ensuring you stay fresh and dry throughout your day. 

This antiperspirant spray is designed for convenient and easy application, featuring a delightful blend of jasmine, mandarin, and amber notes for a scent that's as awesome as you are.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lady Speed Stick**:
â­ Shake well before use.
â­ Spray on clean, dry underarms.
â­ Hold can at a distance from the body for optimal application of **Lady Speed Stick**.
â­ Avoid spraying directly on clothes.
â­ Keep out of reach of children and avoid contact with eyes.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lady Speed Stick**:
â­ Butane, Propane, Isobutane
â­ Aluminum Chlorohydrate
â­ Cyclomethicone, Dimethicone
â­ Parfum (Jasmine, Mandarin, Amber)
â­ Dimethiconol, Benzyl Salicylate

#LadySpeedStick #Deodorant #Antiperspirant #JasmineScent #AmberScent #BodyCare #Fragrance #LongLasting #Freshness #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Experience ultimate freshness with **Lady Speed Stick Zero Rose Petals** deodorant, a revolutionary formula designed for long-lasting odor protection. Featuring advanced bad odor blocking technology, this deodorant is completely free from alcohol, aluminum, artificial preservatives, and artificial colors. Enjoy powerful 48-hour odor protection in a recyclable package, reflecting our commitment to the environment. Discover the gentle, refreshing scent inspired by rose petals.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lady Speed Stick Zero Rose Petals**:
â­ Spin the screw to raise the stick.
â­ Apply gently to the armpits.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lady Speed Stick Zero Rose Petals**:
â­ Formula derived from natural ingredients.
â­ Bad Odor Blocking Technology.
â­ 0% Alcohol.
â­ 0% Aluminum.
â­ No artificial preservatives.
â­ No artificial colors.
â­ Refreshing Rose Petals scent.
â­ Recyclable packaging.

Discover fresh confidence with **Lady Speed Stick** Teen Pink Crush! Designed with a flirty fragrance to keep up with your playful and girlie side, this antiperspirant offers effective, reliable protection against odor and wetness for 24 hours. **Lady Speed Stick** features a formulation designed to leave no white residue on your skin.

**Product Benefits:**
â­ Offers superior protection against sweat and odor for 24 hours.
â­ Formulated to be free of white marks and residue on clothing.
â­ Keeps you feeling fresh from morning to night.
â­ Boosts your confidence throughout the day.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lady Speed Stick**:
â­ Apply to underarms only.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lady Speed Stick**:
â­ ACTIVE INGREDIENTS: Aluminum Zirconium Tetrachlorohydrex GLY 15.9% (Antiperspirant).

description_en:
Discover reliable protection and a refreshing floral scent with **Lady Speed Stick** Invisible Floral Antiperspirant Spray. It provides an invisible barrier to keep you ultra dry and protected for up to 48 hours, with a formula that leaves no white residue on your skin. Feel amazing and unstoppable at all times thanks to effective protection against sweat and bad odor. **Lady Speed Stick** Invisible Floral is your perfect choice for continuous freshness.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lady Speed Stick**:
â­ Shake well before use.
â­ Spray onto underarm area from an appropriate distance.
â­ For underarm use only.
â­ Keep out of reach of children.
â­ Do not apply to irritated or damaged skin.
â­ Discontinue use if irritation or redness occurs.
â­ Avoid contact with eyes.
â­ Do not apply near flame or heat sources.
â­ Flammable product, do not puncture or incinerate pressurized container.
â­ Do not expose to sunlight or temperatures above 50Â° C.
â­ Do not directly inhale contents.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lady Speed Stick**:
â­ Butane, Propane, Isobutane
â­ Aluminum Chlorohydrate
â­ Cyclopentasiloxane, Parfum
â­ Dimethiconol, Benzyl Benzoate, Citronellol
â­ Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Coumarin, Cinnamyl Alcohol
â­ Benzyl Salicylate, Limonene, Geraniol
â­ Benzyl Cinnamate, Linalool, Isoeugenol, Benzyl Alcohol

#LadySpeedStick #Deodorant #Antiperspirant #BodyCare #Fragrance #Freshness #Spray #Beauty #SaudiArabia #48HourProtection

Experience ultimate freshness with **Lady Speed Stick Zero Coconut Deodorant**, the innovative antiperspirant providing superior 48-hour odor protection. Formulated with 0% alcohol, 0% aluminum, and free from artificial preservatives and colors, **Lady Speed Stick Zero Coconut Deodorant** ensures you feel clean and refreshed all day long. Its recyclable packaging makes it an eco-conscious choice for a healthier lifestyle.

â­ Fresh Coconut scent
â­ Effective 48H odor protection
â­ 0% Alcohol & 0% Aluminum
â­ Does not contain ethanol
â­ Advanced bad odor-blocking technology
â­ Formula derived from natural ingredients
â­ Free from artificial preservatives & colors
â­ Recyclable packaging

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lady Speed Stick Zero Coconut Deodorant**
â­ Spin the screw to raise the stick and apply gently to the underarms for even coverage.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lady Speed Stick Zero Coconut Deodorant**
â­ A blend of natural extracts for lasting freshness and protection.
â­ High-quality ingredients for effective odor blocking.
â­ Free from alcohol, aluminum, ethanol, artificial preservatives, and artificial colors.

description_en:
Experience long-lasting freshness with **Lady Speed Stick Pure Freshness**, the deodorant that provides superior protection against sweat and body odor for 24 hours. Its unique formula prevents sweat patches and wetness, while preserving your favorite fragrance. Suitable for daily use and unisex, it features a lightweight and easy-to-use design. Its refreshing scent keeps you active and energized all day long.

**Product Features:**
â­ Effective antiperspirant deodorant.
â­ Prevents body odor and sweaty underarms.
â­ Does not interfere with your personal perfume.
â­ Ideal for daily use.
â­ Unisex formulation.
â­ Provides 24-hour protection.
â­ Refreshing fragrance to keep you energized.
â­ Lightweight and portable design.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Lady Speed Stick Pure Freshness**:
â­ Carefully pull off the cap.
â­ Remove any plastic coating around the stick.
â­ Rotate the bottom of the stick to raise the appropriate amount of deodorant.
â­ Place the stick in the center of your underarm and slide upwards, downwards, and outwards.
â­ Apply light pressure for even coverage.
â­ Reapply as needed throughout the day.
â­ Ensure the stick is covered with its cap after each use to prevent drying.
â­ In very high temperatures, the product may temporarily haze, but its performance remains unaffected.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Lady Speed Stick Pure Freshness**:
â­ Water, Cyclopentasiloxane, SD Alcohol 40, Tripropylene Glycol, Dimethicone, Propylene Glycol, Phenyl Trimethicone, PEG/PPG-18/18 Dimethicone.

#LadySpeedStick #Deodorant #Antiperspirant #Freshness #BodyCare #SaudiArabia #Riyadh #Jeddah #Fragrance #Health

description_en:
Experience a revolutionary hair transformation with **Laser White 2724 Argan Hair Dye Shampoo Black**. This innovative product seamlessly blends the deep cleansing power of a shampoo with a rich black hair dye, enriched with nourishing Argan oil to strengthen your hair and impart exceptional shine. **Laser White 2724 Argan Hair Dye Shampoo Black** ensures perfect coverage for gray hair and a refresh for black tones, delivering natural-looking results effortlessly.

â­ Combines shampoo and hair dye in one easy step.
â­ Enriched with Argan oil for deep nourishment and conditioning.
â­ Delivers a rich, natural-looking black color.
â­ Suitable for all hair types, maintaining hair health.
â­ Quick and convenient for home use, saving time and effort.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Laser White 2724 Argan Hair Dye Shampoo Black**:
â­ Apply shampoo to wet hair and massage gently to ensure even coverage.
â­ Leave the shampoo on for 5-10 minutes, depending on the desired color intensity.
â­ Rinse hair thoroughly with water until the water runs clear.
â­ Dry and style your hair as usual.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Laser White 2724 Argan Hair Dye Shampoo Black**:
â­ Natural Argan Oil: For deep hydration and protection against damage.
â­ Angelica Extract: An antioxidant that enhances hair smoothness and shine.
â­ Aloe Vera Leaf Extract: Rich in vitamins and minerals for healthy hair growth.
â­ Ginseng Extract: Strengthens hair follicles and promotes hair density.
â­ Sesame Oil: Supports scalp health and boosts hair growth.

#LaserWhite #HairDyeShampoo #BlackHairDye #ArganOil #HairCare #HealthyHair #NaturalDye #GrayCoverage #HairBeauty #RiyadhBeauty
