description_en:
Achieve a natural and attractive dark brown hair color with **Laser White 2717 Argan Hair Dye Shampoo**. It provides complete coverage for white hair in 30 minutes, with a formula enriched with argan oil and natural extracts that care for your hair.

â­ Provides 100% white hair coverage in 30 minutes.
â­ Easy to use like regular shampoo, but on completely dry hair.
â­ Enriched with argan oil and natural berry extracts for superior nourishment.
â­ Helps reduce hair loss and strengthen hair follicles.
â­ Provides intense hydration and prevents hair split ends and breakage.
â­ Color lasts from one to six months depending on hair type.
â­ Economical and effective, saving you salon costs.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Laser White 2717 Argan Hair Dye Shampoo**:
â­ Clean your hair and dry it completely to remove any oils or impurities.
â­ Wear the gloves included in the package.
â­ Turn the container over and shake well before each use.
â­ Squeeze out shampoo and mix the cream on your palm.
â­ Apply shampoo foam evenly to dry hair.
â­ Leave the foam on your hair for 30 minutes.
â­ Rinse your hair well with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Laser White 2717 Argan Hair Dye Shampoo**:
â­ Natural Argan Oil: Moisturizes and prevents split ends and breakage.
â­ Ginseng Root Extract: Stimulates scalp blood circulation and promotes hair growth.
â­ Aloe Vera Extract: Protects hair from harmful oxidation and enhances its growth and density.
â­ Angelica Extract: An antioxidant that moisturizes hair and gives it shine.
â­ Sesame Oil: Strengthens hair follicles and stimulates scalp blood circulation.

#HairDye #DyeShampoo #LaserWhite #DarkBrown #HealthyHair #ArganOil #NaturalDye #HairCare #SaudiArabia #Jeddah

description_en:
Discover the captivating black shade for your hair with **Laser White 2090 Argan Hair Dye Shampoo Black**. This innovative product combines the benefits of a nourishing shampoo with the power of hair dye to impart a rich and vibrant color. Enriched with argan oil, **Laser White 2090 Argan Hair Dye Shampoo Black** not only grants your hair a brilliant black hue but also works to strengthen it from root to tip, leaving it soft, shiny, and healthy. Ideal for covering gray hair or revitalizing your natural black color, it offers an easy application and professional results at home.

â­ Combines hair cleansing and coloring in one simple step.
â­ Enriched with argan oil for superior nourishment and deep hydration.
â­ Delivers a natural-looking, attractive black color with exceptional shine.
â­ Effectively covers gray hair by 100%.
â­ Easy to use, saving time and effort.
â­ Offers a cost-effective solution compared to salon treatments.
â­ Long-lasting color for a great look for weeks.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Laser White 2090 Argan Hair Dye Shampoo Black**
â­ Wash your hair thoroughly to remove any oils or impurities before use.
â­ Wear the included gloves to ensure clean hands.
â­ Turn the container over and shake well before each use.
â­ Apply the shampoo foam evenly to dry hair.
â­ Leave the foam on your hair for 5-10 minutes depending on the desired color intensity.
â­ Rinse your hair well with water until the water runs clear.
â­ Dry and style your hair as usual.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Laser White 2090 Argan Hair Dye Shampoo Black**
â­ Natural Argan Oil: Rich in fatty acids and Vitamin E, it lubricates, moisturizes, and protects hair from damage and split ends.
â­ Angelica Extract: An antioxidant that moisturizes, smoothes, and adds shine to hair.
â­ Aloe Vera Leaf Extract: Rich in vitamins and minerals, it protects hair from harmful oxidation, promotes hair growth and density, and moisturizes.
â­ Ginseng Extract: Stimulates blood circulation to the scalp, strengthens hair follicles, and promotes hair growth and density.
â­ Sesame Oil: Rich in minerals like calcium and magnesium, as well as proteins, it strengthens hair follicles, stimulates scalp circulation, promoting hair growth and reducing hair loss.

#LaserWhite #HairDyeShampoo #BlackHairDye #ArganOil #HairCare #HealthyHair #NaturalDye #GrayCoverage #BeautyHair #HairGoals

description_en:
Achieve a natural and attractive dark brown shade with **Laser White 2038 Argan Hair Dye Shampoo**. This shampoo is specifically designed to effectively and quickly cover white hair in just 8 minutes, making it an ideal alternative to traditional hair dyes.

The **Laser White 2038 Argan Hair Dye Shampoo** is comfortable and easy to use, applying like regular shampoo for a convenient and safe coloring experience. Its formula, rich in Argan oil and Aloe Vera, deeply nourishes the hair, promotes growth, prevents hair loss, and moisturizes it for a healthy and shiny appearance. Sunflower extract also helps to prolong color longevity, keeping your hair vibrant and attractive.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Laser White 2038 Argan Hair Dye Shampoo**:
â­ Ensure hair is completely dry and free of any oils or impurities before use.
â­ Wear the included gloves.
â­ Shake the container well.
â­ Squeeze out the shampoo and mix the creams on your palm.
â­ Apply the shampoo foam evenly to dry hair.
â­ Leave the foam on your hair for 8 minutes.
â­ Rinse your hair thoroughly with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Laser White 2038 Argan Hair Dye Shampoo**:
â­ Natural Argan Oil: Moisturizes hair and protects it from splitting and breakage.
â­ Aloe Vera Extract: Provides intense hydration and promotes hair growth.
â­ Sunflower Extract: Helps to maintain color longevity.
â­ Other natural ingredients.

#HairDye #ColorShampoo #LaserWhite #DarkBrownHair #HairCare #HealthyHair #WhiteHairCoverage #ArganShampoo #ShinyHair #SaudiShopping

description_en:
Product Description:

Experience a superior clean with **LISTERINE Mouthwash Cool Mint Milder Taste 250ml**. Brushing alone only cleans 25% of your mouth, and germs multiply quickly. **LISTERINE Mouthwash Cool Mint Milder Taste 250ml** fights the germs that cause plaque and provides 3x deeper clean than brushing alone. Used twice daily, it offers 24-hour protection against plaque and lasting fresh breath. Clinically proven, **LISTERINE Mouthwash Cool Mint Milder Taste 250ml**:

â­ Fights germs that cause plaque and gingivitis.
â­ Reduces plaque bacteria to maintain healthy gums.
â­ Provides lasting fresh breath confidence.
â­ Improves oral hygiene for a cleaner and fresher mouth.
â­ Is alcohol-free with a milder taste.

Transform your oral care routine with this mouthwash for a complete clean.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **LISTERINE Mouthwash Cool Mint Milder Taste 250ml**:

â­ Use twice daily, in the morning and evening, after brushing.
â­ Pour 20 ml (4 x 5 ml teaspoonfuls) into a glass.
â­ Rinse around teeth and gums for 30 seconds.
â­ Spit out the mouthwash.
â­ For children aged 6-12 years, use 10 ml.

Caution & Warnings:
For external use only. Do not swallow. Not suitable for children under 6 years. If taking fluoride supplements, consult your dentist. Store away from excessive heat and direct sunlight.

Product Details:

â­ Quantity: 1 Pc.
â­ Product Form: Liquid.
â­ Product Type: Mouth Wash.
â­ Brand: Listerine.

#Listerine #Mouthwash #CoolMint #FreshBreath #OralHealth #DentalCare #BadBreath #DailyCare #SaudiArabia #GumHealth

description_en:
Elevate your oral hygiene with **LISTERINE Mouthwash Cool Mint Milder Taste 500ml**, clinically proven to deliver a 3x deeper clean than brushing alone. This powerful mouthwash fights millions of germs responsible for plaque, gingivitis, and bad breath, reaching areas your toothbrush can't. Enjoy 24-hour protection against plaque and lasting fresh breath with its mild, alcohol-free Cool Mint flavor. **LISTERINE Mouthwash Cool Mint Milder Taste 500ml** helps reduce plaque and maintain healthy gums, transforming your daily routine for a cleaner, fresher mouth.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **LISTERINE Mouthwash Cool Mint Milder Taste 500ml**
â­ Use twice daily, morning and evening, after brushing your teeth.
â­ Pour 20 ml (4 x 5 ml teaspoonfuls) into a glass.
â­ Rinse around your teeth and gums thoroughly for 30 seconds.
â­ Spit out the mouthwash.
â­ For children aged 6-12 years, use 10 ml.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **LISTERINE Mouthwash Cool Mint Milder Taste 500ml**
â­ Aqua
â­ Propylene Glycol
â­ Sorbitol
â­ Poloxamer 407
â­ Sodium Lauryl Sulfate
â­ Eucalyptol
â­ Benzoic Acid
â­ Sodium Benzoate
â­ Methyl Salicylate
â­ Thymol
â­ Sodium Saccharin
â­ Sodium Fluoride
â­ Menthol
â­ Sucralose
â­ Aroma
â­ CI 42053

description_en:
Experience ultimate freshness with **LISTERINE Mint Mouthwash for Teeth & Gum Defence 500ml**. Specially formulated to boost your gum health and strengthen your teeth, this mouthwash delivers a healthy smile and comprehensive protection. Featuring a mild, refreshing mint taste and an alcohol-free formula, it's perfect for daily use. **LISTERINE Mint Mouthwash for Teeth & Gum Defence 500ml** effectively reduces plaque, prevents gum inflammation, and shields your teeth from cavities thanks to its fluoride content. Achieve fresh breath and healthy gums with every use.

â­ Protects against cavities and strengthens tooth enamel with fluoride.
â­ Reduces plaque and helps prevent gum problems.
â­ Kills bacteria that cause gum inflammation.
â­ Provides instant and long-lasting fresh breath.
â­ Alcohol-free for gentle and comfortable use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **LISTERINE Mint Mouthwash for Teeth & Gum Defence 500ml**
â­ Use twice daily, morning and evening, after brushing your teeth.
â­ Pour 20 ml into a glass.
â­ Rinse around your teeth and gums for 30 seconds.
â­ Spit out after rinsing.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **LISTERINE Mint Mouthwash for Teeth & Gum Defence 500ml**
â­ Aqua
â­ Sorbitol
â­ Propylene Glycol
â­ Sodium Lauryl Sulfate
â­ Poloxamer 407
â­ Benzoic Acid
â­ Zinc Chloride
â­ Eucalyptol
â­ Methyl Salicylate
â­ Thymol
â­ Sodium Saccharin
â­ Sodium Fluoride
â­ Sodium Benzoate
â­ Menthol
â­ Aroma
â­ Benzyl Alcohol
â­ Sucralose
â­ CI 47005, CI 42053
â­ Contains Sodium Fluoride (220 ppm F).

#Listerine #Mouthwash #OralHealth #DentalCare #Mint #FreshBreath #HealthyGums #ToothProtection #SaudiArabia #TeethWhitening

description_en:
Experience superior oral care with **LISTERINE Mouthwash Total Care Milder Taste** â€“ your complete solution for a healthy mouth. This advanced mouthwash delivers 6 essential benefits in one, featuring a milder taste to suit your daily preferences. **LISTERINE Mouthwash Total Care Milder Taste** works to strengthen tooth enamel, protecting against cavities and preserving gum health by fighting plaque-causing bacteria. It eliminates bacteria found between teeth and provides long-lasting fresh breath for up to 24 hours, effectively reducing plaque and maintaining your natural teeth whitening. Enjoy a comprehensive cleaning experience twice daily for a healthy, radiant smile.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **LISTERINE Mouthwash Total Care Milder Taste**:
â­ Use 20ml twice daily after brushing your teeth.
â­ Swish around your mouth for 30 seconds, ensuring it reaches all areas, including between teeth and along the gum line.
â­ Spit out the mouthwash after use.
â­ For external use only. Do not swallow. Use 10ml for children aged 6-8 years.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **LISTERINE Mouthwash Total Care Milder Taste**:
â­ Aqua, Sorbitol, Propylene Glycol, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Poloxamer 407, Aroma, Eucalyptol, Zinc Chloride, Benzoic Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Saccharin, Sodium Fluoride, Methyl Salicylate, Thymol, Menthol, Sucralose, CI 16035, CI 42090.
â­ Contains Sodium Fluoride (300 ppm F Â¯).

description_en:
Experience complete oral hygiene with **Listerine Miswak** Mouthwash, a powerful blend of science and natural miswak extract designed to fight millions of germs. This alcohol-free mouthwash delivers a pure and clean mouth, combating germs, reducing plaque, and preventing its build-up when used twice daily. It also strengthens your teeth and provides long-lasting fresh breath.

â­ Fights germs effectively.
â­ Provides long-lasting breath freshening.
â­ Strengthens and protects teeth.
â­ Helps reduce and prevent plaque build-up.
â­ Alcohol-free formula for a gentle experience.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Listerine Miswak**
â­ Use twice daily, morning and evening, after brushing teeth.
â­ Pour 20 ml into a glass.
â­ Rinse around teeth and gums thoroughly for 30 seconds.
â­ Spit out after use.
â­ For external use only. Do not swallow. Not suitable for children under 12 years.
â­ Keep away from high heat and direct sunlight.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Listerine Miswak**

description_en:
Experience stronger teeth and healthier gums with **LISTERINE** Mint Mouthwash for Teeth & Gum Defence. This milder, refreshing mint-flavoured mouthwash offers scientifically proven triple protection. It contains fluoride to strengthen teeth and protect against cavities, and helps reduce plaque to maintain gum health. Effective even below the gum line, it prevents gum problems and leaves your breath fresh for longer. It cleans deeply, reaching areas your toothbrush might miss.

â­ Protects against cavities by strengthening tooth enamel.
â­ Promotes healthy gums by killing bacteria that cause gingivitis.
â­ Effectively reduces plaque and removes stains.
â­ Provides a deep clean feeling and long-lasting fresh breath.
â­ Alcohol-free formula.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **LISTERINE** Mint Mouthwash for Teeth & Gum Defence:
â­ Use twice daily, in the morning and evening, after brushing your teeth.
â­ Pour 20 ml into a glass.
â­ Rinse around your teeth and gums for 30 seconds.
â­ Spit out the mouthwash after use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **LISTERINE** Mint Mouthwash for Teeth & Gum Defence:
â­ Contains fluoride for stronger teeth and cavity protection.
â­ Specially formulated to kill harmful bacteria in the mouth.
â­ Refreshing ingredients ensure lasting fresh breath.

#Listerine #Mouthwash #OralHealth #HealthyTeeth #HealthyGums #Mint #CavityProtection #FreshBreath #SaudiArabia #OralCare

title_en: LISTERINE Mouthwash Total Care Milder taste 500ml
title_ar: Ù„ÙŠØ³ØªØ±ÙŠÙ† ØºØ³ÙˆÙ„ Ø§Ù„ÙÙ… Ø¹Ù†Ø§ÙŠØ© ÙƒØ§Ù…Ù„Ø© Ù…Ø°Ø§Ù‚ Ø£Ù‚Ù„ Ø­Ø¯Ø© Ù¥Ù Ù Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Experience superior oral care with **LISTERINE Mouthwash Total Care Milder taste 500ml**. This advanced, all-in-one mouthwash offers 6 benefits for complete mouth care, featuring a milder, refreshing taste. **LISTERINE Mouthwash Total Care Milder taste 500ml** works to prevent cavities, strengthen tooth enamel, and maintain healthy gums by fighting plaque and gingivitis-causing bacteria. Enjoy effective protection against bad breath for up to 24 hours, while reducing plaque and leaving your mouth feeling clean and refreshed. Make **LISTERINE Mouthwash Total Care Milder taste 500ml** a daily essential for a healthier mouth.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **LISTERINE Mouthwash Total Care Milder taste 500ml**:
â­ Use twice daily, in the morning and evening, after brushing your teeth.
â­ Pour 20 ml into a glass.
â­ Rinse your mouth thoroughly for 30 seconds, ensuring the liquid reaches all areas of your mouth, including between teeth and along the gum line.
â­ Spit out the mouthwash.
â­ For external use only. Keep away from excessive heat and direct sunlight.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **LISTERINE Mouthwash Total Care Milder taste 500ml**:
â­ Protects against cavities and strengthens enamel.
â­ Prevents gum inflammation and fights bacteria above and below the gum line.
â­ Fights bacteria left behind after brushing.
â­ Reduces plaque more effectively than brushing alone.
â­ Helps maintain natural tooth whiteness and prevents tartar buildup.
â­ Provides long-lasting fresh breath.
â­ Alcohol-free.

#Listerine #Mouthwash #OralCare #HealthyGums #FreshBreath #TotalCare #TeethWhitening #CavityProtection #DentalHealth #SaudiArabia

description_en:
**Listerine Advanced White Mouthwash Milder Taste** is your ultimate solution for a brighter, whiter smile. Its powerful essential oils help remove 99% of plaque-causing germs, leaving your mouth feeling exceptionally fresh and clean. This mouthwash effectively cleans the tooth surface and protects against future stains with its dual-action whitening technology. Enjoy the non-abrasive whitening technology that preserves enamel integrity, along with fluoride to remineralize and strengthen your teeth. Achieve a whiter smile in just one week with regular use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Listerine Advanced White Mouthwash Milder Taste**:
â­ Use twice daily for optimal results.
â­ Please adhere to the specified dosage.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Listerine Advanced White Mouthwash Milder Taste**:
â­ Aqua, Sorbitol, Propylene Glycol, Tetrapotassium Pyrophosphate, Pentasodium Triphosphate, Citric Acid, Poloxamer, Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, Caprylyl Glycol, Eucalyptol, Thymol, Sodium Saccharin, Menthol, Sodium Fluoride.

description_en:
Experience unparalleled freshness and complete protection with **LISTERINE Miswak Mouthwash**, alcohol-free. This innovative mouthwash combines the power of science with natural miswak extract to give you a clean and healthy mouth. **LISTERINE Miswak Mouthwash** fights millions of germs, reduces gum inflammation, and prevents plaque buildup, contributing to stronger teeth and long-lasting fresh breath. Enjoy comprehensive cleanliness and superior oral health with every use.

â­ Fights germs for 12 hours
â­ Provides long-lasting fresh breath
â­ Strengthens tooth enamel and prevents cavities
â­ Helps reduce gum inflammation and prevent plaque buildup
â­ Alcohol-free for a gentle experience

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **LISTERINE Miswak Mouthwash**
â­ Use twice daily, morning and evening, after brushing your teeth.
â­ Pour 20 ml into a glass, then rinse your mouth for 30 seconds, ensuring the mouthwash reaches all parts of your mouth, between teeth, and along the gum line.
â­ Spit out the mouthwash after rinsing.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **LISTERINE Miswak Mouthwash**
â­ Aqua, Sorbitol, Propylene Glycol, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Poloxamer 407, Eucalyptol, Zinc Chloride, Benzoic Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Aroma, Methyl Salicylate, Thymol, Sodium Fluoride, Sodium Saccharin, Menthol, Caramel, Sucralose, Glycerin, Salvadora Persica Stem Extract.
â­ Contains Sodium Fluoride (220 ppm F Â¯ ).

#Listerine #Miswak #Mouthwash #OralCare #DentalHealth #FreshBreath #SaudiArabia #ToothCare #HealthyMouth #Riyadh

description_en:
Experience nature's goodness with **Listerine Mouthwash Green Tea**, inspired by natural green tea extract. **Listerine Mouthwash Green Tea** offers extra cavity protection with twice the fluoride of regular toothpaste, strengthening enamel even in hard-to-reach areas. **Listerine Mouthwash Green Tea** provides refreshing breath with its natural green tea flavor and helps reduce plaque, the primary cause of gum disease, when used twice daily. Alcohol-free for a gentle and refreshing experience.

â­ Strengthens tooth enamel and protects against cavities.
â­ Helps prevent gum disease and reduce plaque.
â­ Provides long-lasting freshness with a natural green tea flavor.
â­ Alcohol-free for a comfortable experience.
â­ Formula enriched with green tea extract and essential oils.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Listerine Mouthwash Green Tea**:
â­ Use twice daily, especially effective after brushing.
â­ Pour 20 ml (approximately 4 teaspoons) into a glass.
â­ Rinse around teeth and gums for 30 seconds.
â­ Spit out after use.
â­ For children aged 6-8 years, use 10 ml.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Listerine Mouthwash Green Tea**:
â­ Aqua, Propylene Glycol, Sorbitol, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Poloxamer 407, Sodium Saccharin, Aroma, Eucalyptol, Benzoic acid, Sodium Benzoate, Methyl Salicylate, Thymol, Sodium Fluoride, Menthol, Sucralose, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Caffeine, CI 47005, CI 42053.
â­ Contains Sodium Fluoride (220 ppm FÂ¯).

description_en: Achieve a brighter smile with **Listerine Advanced White Milder Taste Mouthwash**. This effective mouthwash, with its unique formula, helps remove 99% of plaque-causing germs and cleans the tooth surface. It features a non-abrasive whitening technology that doesn't harm tooth enamel, with a dual-action effect to remove tough stains and protect against future ones. Enriched with fluoride, it remineralizes and strengthens teeth, giving you a feeling of fresh confidence.

description_en:
Experience deep freshness and complete oral care with **Listerine Cool Mint 500ml + 250ml**. Brushing alone cleans only 25% of your mouth, while **Listerine Cool Mint 500ml + 250ml** goes further to fight plaque-causing germs. Used twice daily, **Listerine Cool Mint 500ml + 250ml** provides 24-hour protection against plaque and long-lasting fresh breath confidence, with an alcohol-free formula for added comfort.

â­ Helps prevent and reduce plaque, a major cause of gum disease.
â­ Fights bacteria between teeth.
â­ Freshens breath for a revitalizing experience.
â­ Gentle, alcohol-free formula.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Listerine Cool Mint 500ml + 250ml**:
â­ Use twice daily, morning and evening, after brushing.
â­ Pour 20 ml (4 x 5 ml teaspoonfuls) into a glass.
â­ Rinse around teeth and gums for 30 seconds, ensuring coverage.
â­ Spit out after use.
â­ For children aged 6-12 years, use 10 ml.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Listerine Cool Mint 500ml + 250ml**:
â­ Aqua, Propylene Glycol, Sorbitol, Poloxamer 407, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Eucalyptol, Benzoic Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Methyl Salicylate, Thymol, Sodium Saccharin, Sodium Fluoride (220 ppm F), Menthol, Sucralose, Aroma, CI 42053.

description_en:
Combat bleeding, swollen, or sore gums with **Listerine Gum Defence Mouthwash**, your daily shield against gum disease. This clinically-proven mouthwash is designed to reduce plaque and strengthen gums, delivering 2x healthier gums versus brushing alone. Enjoy the milder taste with a soft mint flavor, and benefit from its alcohol-free formula for a gentle yet effective clean.

â­ Reduces plaque to keep gums healthy, and even works below the gum line.
â­ Helps to prevent gum problems.
â­ Contains fluoride to strengthen teeth to help protect against cavities.
â­ Milder taste with soft mint flavor.
â­ Alcohol-free.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Listerine Gum Defence Mouthwash**
â­ Especially effective when used morning and evening after brushing.
â­ Pour 20 ml (4 x 5 ml teaspoonfuls) into a glass.
â­ Rinse around teeth and gums for 30 seconds.
â­ Spit out.
â­ For children between 6 and 12 years old, use 10ml.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Listerine Gum Defence Mouthwash**
â­ Aqua, Sorbitol, Propylene Glycol, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Poloxamer 407, Benzoic Acid, Eucalyptol, Methyl Salicylate, Thymol, Sodium Saccharin, Sodium Fluoride, Sodium Benzoate, Menthol, Aroma, Benzyl Alcohol, Sucralose, CI 47005.
â­ Contains Sodium Fluoride (220 ppm F).

description_en:
**Listerine Total Care Zero Alcohol Mouthwash** is the most advanced and complete multi-benefit mouthwash from Listerine. It offers 6 benefits all rolled into one for total oral health, with a less intense, milder taste.

â­ 6-in-1 total care mouthwash with a milder taste.
â­ Protects against cavities and strengthens teeth.
â­ Prevents and reduces gingivitis for healthy gums.
â­ Fights bacteria between teeth.
â­ Provides up to 24 hours of bad breath protection.
â­ Keeps teeth naturally white by preventing tartar buildup.
â­ Alcohol-free.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Listerine Total Care Zero Alcohol Mouthwash**:
â­ Use twice daily, in the morning and evening after brushing.
â­ Pour 20ml into a glass, rinse around teeth and gums for 30 seconds, then spit out.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Listerine Total Care Zero Alcohol Mouthwash**:
â­ Aqua, Sorbitol, Propylene Glycol, Poloxamer 407, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Aroma, Eucalyptol, Zinc Chloride, Benzoic Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Methyl Salicylate, Thymol, Sodium Saccharin, Sodium Fluoride, Menthol, Sucralose, CI 16035, CI 42090.
â­ Contains Sodium Fluoride (220 ppm F).

#Listerine #Mouthwash #OralHealth #DentalCare #FreshBreath #SaudiArabia #TeethWhitening #Cavities #Riyadh #Jeddah

title_ar: ØºØ³ÙˆÙ„ Ø§Ù„ÙÙ… Ù„ÙŠØ³ØªØ±ÙŠÙ† Ù…Ø³ÙˆØ§Ùƒ 750 Ù…Ù„ (500 Ù…Ù„ + 250 Ù…Ù„)
description_en:
Experience natural freshness and complete power with **Listerine Miswak** mouthwash. This unique blend combines advanced science with natural miswak extract to give you a clean and healthy mouth. **Listerine Miswak** effectively fights millions of germs that cause oral problems, helps reduce plaque, and prevents tartar buildup, contributing to stronger and protected teeth. Enjoy long-lasting fresh breath with its alcohol-free formula, giving you unparalleled confidence throughout the day.

â­ Effectively fights germs.
â­ Provides long-lasting fresh breath.
â­ Strengthens and protects teeth.
â­ Helps reduce plaque and prevent tartar buildup.
â­ Alcohol-free for greater comfort.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Listerine Miswak**
â­ Use twice daily, in the morning and evening, after brushing your teeth.
â­ Pour 20ml into a glass.
â­ Rinse thoroughly around teeth and gums for 30 seconds.
â­ Spit out the mouthwash after use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Listerine Miswak**
â­ Aqua, Sorbitol, Propylene Glycol, Poloxamer 407, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Zinc Chloride, Benzoic Acid, Eucalyptol, Aroma, Sodium Benzoate, Methyl Salicylate, Thymol, Sodium Fluoride, Menthol, Sodium Saccharin, Caramel, Sucralose, Glycerin, Salvadora Persica Bark Extract, Sodium Fluoride (220 ppm F).

#Listerine #Miswak #Mouthwash #OralCare #HealthyTeeth #FreshBreath #StrongTeeth #DailyCare #SaudiArabia #DentalHealth

description_en:
Experience natural freshness with **Listerine Green Tea 500 Ml Mouthwash + 250 Ml Free**, the value pack that provides you with ample quantity for stronger teeth and a refreshed breath. Enjoy extra cavity protection with its unique formula enriched with natural green tea extract and essential oils.

â­ Strengthens tooth enamel in hard-to-reach places to help prevent cavities.
â­ Helps reduce and prevent plaque, a major cause of gum disease.
â­ Freshens breath with a natural green tea taste.
â­ Alcohol-free.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Listerine Green Tea 500 Ml Mouthwash + 250 Ml Free**:
â­ Use twice daily, in the morning and evening after brushing.
â­ Pour 20ml into a glass, rinse around teeth and gums for 30 seconds, then spit out.
â­ For children between 6 and 12 years old, use 10ml. Consult your dentist if using fluoride supplements.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Listerine Green Tea 500 Ml Mouthwash + 250 Ml Free**:
â­ Aqua, Propylene Glycol, Sorbitol, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Poloxamer 407, Sodium Saccharin, Aroma, Eucalyptol, Benzoic Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Methyl Salicylate, Thymol, Sodium Fluoride (220 ppm F), Menthol, Sucralose, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Caffeine, CI 47005, CI 42053.

#Listerine #GreenTea #Mouthwash #OralCare #DentalHealth #FreshBreath #CavityProtection #SaudiBeauty #SaudiDeals #HealthAndWellness

âœ… Distinct flavor combining rich licorice and revitalizing mint.

âœ… Provides a long-lasting feeling of freshness.
âœ… Ideal for daily use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Marvis Licorice Mint Toothpaste 85ml**:
â­ Apply a pea-sized amount to your toothbrush.
â­ Brush your teeth gently for two minutes, ensuring all surfaces are covered.

â­ Recommended for use twice daily, morning and evening.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Marvis Licorice Mint Toothpaste 85ml**:

Experience luxurious freshness with **Marvis Jasmin Mint Toothpaste 85ml (Pack of 12)**. Enjoy a unique cleaning experience that combines the delicate scent of jasmine with the powerful freshness of mint, giving you a healthy and radiant smile all day long. **Marvis Jasmin Mint Toothpaste 85ml** is the perfect choice for those seeking premium Italian quality and superior oral care.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Marvis Jasmin Mint Toothpaste 85ml (Pack of 12)**:
â­ Brush your teeth twice daily for two minutes.
â­ Use a pea-sized amount.
â­ Ensure all tooth surfaces and gums are cleaned.
â­ Consult your dentist for best results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Marvis Jasmin Mint Toothpaste 85ml (Pack of 12)**:
â­ Glycerin
â­ Hydrated Silica
â­ Water
â­ Tricalcium Phosphate
â­ Cellulose Gum

â­ Flavor (Jasmine & Mint)

description_en:
**Marvis Ginger Mint Toothpaste** offers a refreshing and clean experience for your mouth. Enjoy the invigorating ginger and cooling mint blend that leaves your breath fresh for hours. Perfect for daily use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Marvis Ginger Mint Toothpaste**:
â­ Apply a small amount of toothpaste onto your toothbrush.
â­ Brush your teeth thoroughly in circular motions for two minutes.
â­ Rinse your mouth with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Marvis Ginger Mint Toothpaste**:
â­ Glycerin
â­ Silica
â­ Aqua
â­ Sorbitol
â­ Cellulose Gum
â­ Natural Ginger Flavor
â­ Natural Mint Flavor
â­ Sodium Fluoride
â­ Sodium Saccharin

description_en:
**Marvis Aquatic Mint Toothpaste** is a refreshing blend that combines the smoothness of mint with an aquatic freshness. Ideal for deep teeth cleaning and providing long-lasting fresh breath. Enjoy a unique oral care experience.

**Product Details:**

*   Brand: Marvis
*   Flavor: Refreshing Aquatic Mint
*   Size: 85ml per tube
*   Quantity: 12 tubes
*   Provides instant and sustained freshness.
*   Effectively cleans teeth and helps prevent cavities.
*   Leaves your mouth clean and healthy.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Marvis Aquatic Mint Toothpaste**:

â­ Use a pea-sized amount on your toothbrush.
â­ Brush your teeth gently for at least two minutes.
â­ Rinse your mouth thoroughly with water.
â­ Recommended for use twice daily for best results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Marvis Aquatic Mint Toothpaste**:

â­ Glycerin
â­ Silica
â­ Aqua
â­ Sorbitol
â­ PEG-400
â­ Sodium Lauryl Sulfate
â­ Aroma (Aquatic Mint)
â­ Cellulose Gum
â­ Tetrasodium Pyrophosphate
â­ Citric Acid
â­ Sodium Benzoate
â­ Sodium Saccharin
â­ Limonene
â­ Linalool

#Marvis #Toothpaste #AquaticMint #OralCare #WhiteTeeth #FreshBreath #CavityPrevention #OralHealth #DentalBeauty #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Experience a refreshing sensation with **Marvis Cinnamon Mint Toothpaste 85ml (Pack of 12)**. This luxurious toothpaste blends the warm notes of cinnamon with invigorating mint for breath that's free from unpleasant odors. Its unique formula effectively cleans teeth, helps protect enamel, and promotes gum health. Make your dental care routine a distinguished moment.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Marvis Cinnamon Mint Toothpaste 85ml (Pack of 12)**:
â­ Apply a pea-sized amount of toothpaste to your toothbrush.
â­ Brush your teeth thoroughly for two minutes, ensuring all surfaces are covered.
â­ Rinse your mouth with water after brushing.
â­ Use twice daily for optimal results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Marvis Cinnamon Mint Toothpaste 85ml (Pack of 12)**:
â­ Water
â­ Glycerin
â­ Hydrated Silica
â­ Sorbitol
â­ Sodium Lauryl Sulfate
â­ Flavor (Cinnamon, Mint)
â­ Carrageenan
â­ Cellulose Gum
â­ Sucrose
â­ Sodium Benzoate
â­ Citric Acid
â­ Sodium Saccharin
â­ Limonene
â­ Linalool

description_en:
Experience superior freshness and brilliant whitening with **Marvis Whitening Mint Toothpaste**. This toothpaste offers a unique oral care experience, enhanced by an advanced formula that ensures a brighter, healthier smile.

â­ Effective and safe teeth whitening.
â­ Refreshing mint flavor for long-lasting fresh breath.
â­ Gentle formula for gums and enamel.
â­ Protects against cavities and promotes oral health.
â­ Elegant packaging with a distinct classic design.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Marvis Whitening Mint Toothpaste**:
â­ Brush your teeth with a small amount of toothpaste for two minutes.
â­ Use the toothpaste twice daily, morning and evening.
â­ For children under 6 years, use a pea-sized amount under adult supervision.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Marvis Whitening Mint Toothpaste**:
â­ Glycerin, Hydrated Silica, Aqua, Tricalcium Phosphate, Cellulose Gum, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Aroma (Peppermint), Tetrapotassium Pyrophosphate, Sodium Fluoride, Carbomer, Sodium Saccharin, Limonene, Linalool.

#Marvis #Toothpaste #TeethWhitening #OralCare #DentalHealth #Mint #BrightSmile #DailyCare #BeautyProducts #SaudiArabia

title_ar: Ù…Ø§ÙØ§Ù„Ø§ Ø³ÙŠØ±ÙˆÙ… Ù…Ø±Ø·Ø¨ ÙˆÙ…Ù‚ÙˆÙŠ Ù„Ù„Ø£Ø¸Ø§ÙØ± 10 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Are you struggling with dry, brittle, and hard nails? Discover the power of **Mavala Mava Flex Hydrating & Strengthening Nail Serum 10ml**, the ultimate solution to restore your nails' resilience and shine. This serum deeply penetrates to hydrate and strengthen nails, combating peeling, thinning, and cracking caused by external and internal factors. Regain your nail health and natural brilliance with this unique formula.

Features:
â­ Contains calcium, vitamin B5, and lemon essential oil for optimal moisture balance and improved nail structure.
â­ Enriched with saccharides and urea to fortify nails and maintain nail plate flexibility.
â­ Deeply penetrates to moisturize and promote nail health, ensuring soft and shiny nails.
â­ Quickly absorbed by the skin to encourage better nail restoration.
â­ A well-balanced formula that promotes overall nail health and well-being.
â­ Free from parabens, formaldehyde, sodium laureth sulfate, phthalates, and fragrance.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Mavala Mava Flex Hydrating & Strengthening Nail Serum 10ml**:
â­ Ensure your nails are clean and free from any dirt, oil, or nail polish.
â­ Apply a thin, even layer covering the entire nail surface.
â­ Gently massage the serum onto your nails with your thumb.
â­ Leave it on to penetrate intensely; it's best used before bedtime to work overnight.
â­ For best results, apply at least twice a week on clean, bare nails.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Mavala Mava Flex Hydrating & Strengthening Nail Serum 10ml**:
â­ Calcium
â­ Vitamin B5
â­ Lemon Essential Oil
â­ Saccharides
â­ Urea

#Mavala #NailSerum #NailTreatment #NailCare #StrongNails #HealthyNails #NailHydration #NailBeauty #HandCare #SaudiArabia

title_ar: Ù…Ø§ÙØ§Ù„Ø§ Ù…Ù‚ÙˆÙ‰ ÙˆØ£Ø³Ø§Ø³ Ù„Ø·Ù„Ø§Ø¡ Ø§Ù„Ø£Ø¸Ø§ÙØ± 10 Ù…Ù„ - Ø´ÙØ§Ù
description_en:
Say goodbye to weak and peeling nails with **Mavala Mava-Strong Nail Basecoat**! This unique formula is specifically designed to strengthen and protect your nails from daily damage caused by environmental factors and harsh products. **Mavala Mava-Strong Nail Basecoat** provides a glossy, colorless finish, improving nail quality and fortifying their structure for a noticeably strong and healthy natural look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Mavala Mava-Strong Nail Basecoat**:
â­ Remove any nail polish or oily residues.
â­ Shake the bottle well to mix the micro-beads.
â­ Apply a layer of **Mavala Mava-Strong Nail Basecoat** to clean nails at least twice a week.
â­ Use as a base coat before applying nail polish or wear it alone for a natural look every two days.
â­ Gradually reduce applications to maintain the desired hardness.
â­ Remove using a nail polish remover, preferably acetone-free for gentler care.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Mavala Mava-Strong Nail Basecoat**:
â­ Essential Tea Tree Oil.
â­ Vitamin E.
â­ Hydrolyzed Vegetable Proteins.
â­ Arginine.
â­ Crystal Resin.

#NailPolish #NailStrengthener #NailCare #StrongNails #Mavala #NailBeauty #Manicure #NailHealth #Cosmetics #SaudiArabia

title_en: Mavala Cuticle Remover: Perfect Nail Care
title_ar: Ù…Ø§ÙØ§Ù„Ø§ ÙƒØ±ÙŠÙ… Ù…Ø²ÙŠÙ„ Ø§Ù„Ø¬Ù„ÙŠØ¯Ø§Øª: Ø§Ù„Ø¹Ù†Ø§ÙŠØ© Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø«Ø§Ù„ÙŠØ© Ø¨Ø£Ø¸Ø§ÙØ±Ùƒ
description_en:
Indulge your nails with **Mavala Cuticle Remover**, the perfect solution to easily and gently get rid of dead skin and overgrown cuticles around your nails. Achieve a professional, salon-like manicure right at home with its advanced alkaline formula. It softens rough, ragged cuticles and dry, weak nails, effectively removing them in a single application for younger-looking, more attractive nails. **Mavala Cuticle Remover** is faster than ordinary removers, giving your nails a smooth, even finish thanks to its moisturizing formula.

â­ Easily removes dead cells and rough tissues.
â­ Easy to use and fast-acting within seconds.
â­ Keeps nails healthy and gives them an attractive, even finish.
â­ Gentle on nails without skin irritation.
â­ Moisturizing formula keeps nails soft and supple.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Mavala Cuticle Remover**:
â­ Prepare your nails first by soaking them in warm water to further soften the cuticles.
â­ Dry your nails with a clean towel.
â­ Apply a small amount of the remover directly onto your cuticles and around the nail tips, ensuring even coverage on all corners and edges.
â­ Wait a few seconds for rough tissues to soften.
â­ Use a cotton-wrapped manicure stick to gently push back cuticles and remove dead tissues.
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly with warm, soapy water after use and dry your nails completely.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Mavala Cuticle Remover**:
â­ Water (Aqua)
â­ Laureth-4
â­ Glycerin
â­ Cetyl Acetate
â­ Laureth-23
â­ Potassium Hydroxide
â­ Lanolin
â­ Acetylated Lanolin Alcohol
â­ Simethicone
â­ Polysorbate 65
â­ Methylcellulose

#NailCare #CuticleRemover #NailExfoliator #ProfessionalManicure #NailBeauty #HealthyNails #NailGoals #NailTreatment #Cosmetics #PersonalCare

title_en: Mavala Scientifique K+ Nail Hardener 5ml
title_ar: Ù…Ø§ÙØ§Ù„Ø§ Ø³ÙƒÙŠÙ† Ø³ÙŠÙ„ Ù…Ù‚ÙˆÙŠ Ø§Ù„Ø£Ø¸Ø§ÙØ± Ø¨Ø§Ù„ÙƒÙŠØ±Ø§ØªÙŠÙ† Ø¨Ù„Ø³ 5 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Discover the secret to strong, healthy nails with **Mavala Scientifique K+ Nail Hardener 5ml**. This uniquely designed and scientifically formulated hardener quickly penetrates and instantly hardens your nails, transforming soft, flaking, and splitting nails into stronger, healthier ones. It works by improving the cohesion of keratin fibers, enhancing the nail's ability to resist breakage and peeling, and restoring its natural growth. It's the perfect solution for treating flaky, soft, or split nails, giving them a strong and healthy appearance. It also helps your nail polish last longer, providing a manicure that stays put.

â­ Suitable for brittle, fragile, soft, flaking, and split nails.
â­ Instantly penetrates and quickly hardens nails.
â­ Makes nails stronger and restores their natural growth.
â­ Aids in the natural keratinization of nails.
â­ Dries quickly and is easy to use with the provided brush applicator.
â­ Helps manicures last longer.
â­ Promotes natural, healthy-looking nails.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Mavala Scientifique K+ Nail Hardener 5ml**
â­ Clean your nails thoroughly and remove any nail polish or residue.
â­ Using the provided brush, apply the hardener along the edges and tips of your nails.
â­ Let it dry for 1 minute.
â­ Apply 2-3 times a week until your nails are healthy and strong.
â­ Subsequently, apply 2-3 times a month as needed.
â­ You can apply nail polish or nail polish remover after it dries.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Mavala Scientifique K+ Nail Hardener 5ml**
â­ Contains crystal resin tears, a natural gum extracted from the pistachio tree.
â­ Reinforces the nail and promotes natural keratinization.
â­ Enhances the cohesion of keratin fibers for improved nail strength.

#NailHardener #NailTreatment #StrongNails #NailCare #MavalaKSA #BeautyProducts #HealthyNails #KSABeauty #Skincare #NaturalBeauty

description_en:
Discover the power of **Mavala Double Lash**, the ultimate solution for denser, longer, and healthier lashes and brows. This innovative enhancer nourishes and strengthens each lash with its vitamin and protein-rich formula, delivering a naturally captivating look. **Mavala Double Lash** is a unique nutritive treatment that targets short, unhealthy-looking lashes, protecting and strengthening them to become luscious and beautiful. Achieve healthy, strong, dense, and fuller lashes with this effective Swiss product. 

â­ Promotes natural lash and eyebrow growth.
â­ Significantly increases lash density and length.
â­ Strengthens lashes and protects them from breakage.
â­ Provides lashes with a healthy, silky appearance.
â­ Formula rich in natural vitamins and proteins.
â­ Free from parabens and fragrances.
â­ Ophthalmologist-tested.
â­ Travel-friendly size (10 ml).
â­ Comes with an easy-to-use applicator brush.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Mavala Double Lash**

â­ Thoroughly cleanse your lashes and brows, removing any makeup residue.
â­ Using the included brush, apply a thin layer to the lash line or brows.
â­ Allow it to dry completely.
â­ For best results, leave it on overnight.
â­ Regular nightly application is recommended.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Mavala Double Lash**

â­ Aqua
â­ Glucose
â­ Magnesium Aluminium Silicate
â­ Propylene Glycol
â­ Gluconolactone Lactic Acid
â­ Phenoxyethanol
â­ Caprylyl Glycol
â­ Chlorphenesin
â­ Butylene Glycol
â­ Disodium EDTA, Glutamate
â­ Sodium Benzoate
â­ Lactococcus Ferment
â­ Xanthan Gum
â­ Ethylhexylglycerin
â­ Calcium Gluconate
â­ Urea

#Mavala #LashEnhancer #ThickLashes #LongLashes #LashCare #EyeMakeup #BeautyProducts #SaudiArabia #Riyadh #Jeddah

title_ar: Ù…Ø§ÙØ§Ù„Ø§ ÙƒØ±ÙŠÙ… Ù…Ø·Ø±ÙŠ ÙŠÙˆÙ…ÙŠ Ù„Ù„Ø­ÙˆØ§Ù Ø§Ù„Ù„Ø­Ù…ÙŠØ© Ù„Ù„Ø£Ø¸Ø§ÙØ± - ØªØ±Ø·ÙŠØ¨ Ø¹Ù…ÙŠÙ‚ Ù„Ù„Ø¹Ù†Ø§ÙŠØ© Ø¨Ø§Ù„Ø¬Ù„Ø¯
description_en:
Achieve healthy and beautiful nails with **Mavala Cuticle Cream**. This specially formulated cream for cuticle care works to soften the skin, providing the necessary suppleness to prevent cracking and improve the overall appearance of hands. It gives your nails a well-groomed look that doesn't interfere with your manicure. **Mavala Cuticle Cream** is the perfect solution for professional nail care at home.

â­ Makes your nails supple by moisturizing them deeply.
â­ Maintains the suppleness of the skin around the nails.
â­ Prevents skin cracking and improves hand appearance.
â­ Provides a well-groomed nail contour that doesn't ruin the manicure.
â­ Easy to use, allowing you to care for your nails effortlessly at home.
â­ Moisturizes nails well by adding suppleness.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Mavala Cuticle Cream**:
â­ Apply a small amount of cream to your nail cuticles, which are damaged or require care.
â­ Gently massage and let it absorb for a few seconds.
â­ Use a cuticle pusher to gently remove any excess, unwanted skin from around the nail.
â­ Wash your hands with water after finishing.
â­ Can be used as part of your hand and foot care routine.
â­ It is advisable to remove any excess residue before applying nail polish for optimal results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Mavala Cuticle Cream**:
â­ Works to soften and smooth the skin around the nails.
â­ Maintains skin hydration for a longer period.
â­ Effectively facilitates the removal of excess cuticles.
â­ Protects the skin from dryness and cracking.

#Mavala #NailCare #NailHydration #CuticleCare #Manicure #Pedicure #HandCare #NailBeauty #BeautyProducts #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Achieve stronger, healthier nails with **Mavala Nail Shield**, the ultimate solution for protecting your nails from daily damage and harmful external factors. The nail plate consists of three layers, with the visible outer layer being particularly sensitive to the elements like sun, cold, and detergents. The unique formula of **Mavala Nail Shield** is developed to provide nails with superior resistance, forming a strong protective barrier against breakage, chipping, and impacts. With this combined treatment, your nails can regenerate and strengthen naturally.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Mavala Nail Shield**
â­ Phase I: Apply one coat over the entire clean nail. Leave on to dry for a few minutes (nylon fibres will then be visible).
â­ Phase II: Apply a coat of sealer and leave on to dry completely. If the surface stays rough, apply a second coat.
â­ Continue with your manicure by applying a nail polish or a top coat only. Allow to dry thoroughly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Mavala Nail Shield**
â­ Advanced technology to protect nails from external elements.
â­ Strengthening formula that prevents breakage and peeling.
â­ Promotes natural nail regeneration.

#Mavala #NailCare #StrongNails #NailShield #Beauty #Manicure #NailTreatment #SaudiBeauty #NailProducts #HandCare

description_en:
Boost your nail growth with **Mavala Mavaderma** oil, designed to enhance circulation at the nail roots for optimal nourishment. This powerful formula works to strengthen and lengthen your nails, revealing their natural beauty.

â­ Unique blend of Wheat Germ, Olive, and Sweet Almond oils.
â­ Stimulates blood circulation in the nail root area.
â­ Promotes longer, more beautiful nails.
â­ Keeps the skin around your nails supple and soft.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Mavala Mavaderma**:
â­ Apply a drop of the oil daily, preferably at night, to the nail root area.
â­ Massage the area with circular motions using your thumb to accelerate absorption.
â­ Leave it on overnight for best results.
â­ Avoid applying before nail polish, as it may weaken adhesion.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Mavala Mavaderma**:
â­ Wheat Germ Oil
â­ Olive Oil
â­ Sweet Almond Oil

#Mavala #NailTreatment #NaturalOils #NailCare #NailBeauty #StrongNails #LongNails #SaudiArabia #HandCare #BeautyProducts

title_ar: Ù…Ø¨Ø±Ø¯ Ø£Ø¸Ø§ÙØ± Ø®Ø´Ø¨ÙŠ Ù…Ø±Ù† Ù…Ù† Ù…Ø§ÙØ§Ù„Ø§ - Ù…Ø«Ø§Ù„ÙŠ Ù„Ù„Ø£Ø¸Ø§ÙØ± Ø§Ù„Ù‡Ø´Ø©
description_en:
Provide your nails with perfect care using **Mavala Emery Boards Carded**. Specifically designed for fragile nails, these emery boards feature two sides with different emery particle sizes. The coarser side is ideal for shaping thicker or coarser nails, including men's and toenails, while the finer side ensures precise and effective filing. Achieve healthy, strong nails with this high-quality nail file.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Mavala Emery Boards Carded**:
â­ Use the finer side with long, supple movements, stroking from the edges to the center to give your nails the desired shape.
â­ To maintain nail strength, avoid filing deep into the sides of the nail tip.
â­ To eliminate any roughness, file with small vertical strokes from top to bottom and vice versa (bevelling) using the tip of the board.
â­ This helps to seal the nail layers again, promoting strength.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Mavala Emery Boards Carded**:
â­ High-quality flexible wood.
â­ Emery particles in two different sizes (coarse and fine).
â­ Ergonomic design for comfortable use.

#Mavala #NailFile #NailCare #StrongNails #HealthyNails #NailBeauty #Manicure #Pedicure #Saudi #BeautyCare

title_en: Mavala Mava-White: Professional Nail Whitener
title_ar: Ù…Ø§ÙØ§Ù„Ø§ Ù…Ø§Ù ÙˆØ§ÙŠØª: Ù…Ø¨ÙŠØ¶ Ø§Ù„Ø£Ø¸Ø§ÙØ± Ø§Ù„Ø§Ø­ØªØ±Ø§ÙÙŠ
description_en:
Restore your nails' natural radiance with **Mavala Mava-White**.

Dull and yellowed nails due to pigments and external factors can affect your appearance. The unique formula of **Mavala Mava-White** conceals these imperfections and gives your nails a healthy, natural look. Thanks to its illuminating properties, it acts as an optical color corrector that reacts with light to give your nails a subtle, attractive bluish tint upon drying, with a final matte finish that suits everyone, including men. Use it as a base under nail polish to enhance its true color, or on its own for a natural and elegant look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Mavala Mava-White**

â­ Apply as a thin base coat over the entire nail surface.
â­ When used alone, it provides a natural, matte effect that also suits men.
â­ Under nail polish, it enhances the original shade and prevents it from turning into a dull beige, yellow, or faded red.
â­ For better hold, apply a base coat (like MAVALA 002) before and a top coat after for added shine.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Mavala Mava-White**

â­ Contains illuminating compounds for optical color correction.
â­ Special formulation that conceals nail yellowing and dullness.
â­ Provides a healthy and natural appearance for nails.
â­ Suitable as a nail treatment for men and women.

#Mavala #NailWhitener #NailTreatment #HealthyNails #NailCare #SaudiArabia #NailBeauty #NailMakeup #NailBrightening #ShinyNails

title_ar: Ù…Ø§ÙØ§Ù„Ø§ ÙƒØ±ÙŠÙ… Ù…ØºØ°ÙŠ Ù„ØªÙ‚ÙˆÙŠØ© Ø§Ù„Ø£Ø¸Ø§ÙØ± - 15 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Achieve strong, healthy nails with **Mavala Nutritive Nail Cream**. The nail plate consists of three layers, with the outer layer being particularly sensitive to external factors like sun, cold weather, and detergents, leading to dryness and brittleness.

**Mavala Nutritive Nail Cream** is the perfect solution for damaged, dry, brittle, and fragile nails. This cream is formulated with essential amino acids, lipids, and fortifying vitamins that promote the balance and strength of your nail plate. Its nourishing and moisturizing action restores flexibility, improves the overall condition of your nails, and makes them more resistant to splitting and breaking, offering long-term protection.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Mavala Nutritive Nail Cream**:
â­ Use as a 4 to 6-week treatment.
â­ Every night, massage the nail root and the nail plate with the cream.
â­ Allow it to work overnight.
â­ For severely damaged nails, continue application for a few months to ensure complete nail regrowth.
â­ Can be applied when wearing nail polish, but it's recommended to apply directly onto bare nails at least once a week.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Mavala Nutritive Nail Cream**:
â­ Essential amino acids.
â­ Nourishing lipids.
â­ Kerato-balancing and fortifying vitamins.
â­ Moisturizing components.

#NailCare #StrongNails #HealthyNails #Mavala #NailTreatment #NailMoisture #NailGoals #BeautySaudi #SaudiBeauty #KSA

description_en:
Discover the secret to soft hands and healthy nails with **Mavala Cuticle Oil**.

We utilize our hands constantly, so it's useful to discover a cuticle oil that would absorb quickly and wonâ€™t make you wait for hours.

This **Mavala Cuticle Oil** gets absorbed rapidly and hence, you would be able to restart your work without leaving any oil stain on an object or surface.

Detailed with sunflower oil, sweet almond oil, and olive oil, it hydrates and renews your cuticles while additionally removing dead skin cells.

Though we donâ€™t pay much heed to our nails each day, it is essential to take care of them, too. Otherwise, the cuticles would solidify, and the nails get broken. The wonderful **Mavala Cuticle Oil** makes the cuticles flexible, relaxes your skin around the nail, and keeps it stable. It also moves the cuticle back inside the nail surface.

Features:
â­ The cuticle oil thickens and reinforces your nails.
â­ The cuticle oil recuperates harsh skin around your nails and helps in the development of your nails.
â­ It provides hydration to your nails and thickens the surface of your nails.
â­ The cuticle oil is created from various minerals that fight off the microorganisms and bacteria that grow on the surface of your nails.
â­ Cuticle oil prevents nail chipping.
â­ Using the cuticle oil would remove off those hard cuticles and give you a smooth nail surface.
â­ It keeps your nail paint exactly like before.
â­ The cuticle oil penetrates through the nail surface and soothes the inner region of your nails.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Mavala Cuticle Oil**:
â­ Take the brush out of the bottle.
â­ Keep your hand on a firm surface. Begin with one hand at a time. Donâ€™t rush the process.
â­ Use the brush to put oil on each nail properly.
â­ Close the bottle and use the finger of your other hand to massage the oil on your nails.
â­ Rub the oil in and donâ€™t let it drip on the surface.
â­ Do the same on the other hand.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Mavala Cuticle Oil**:
â­ Sunflower Oil
â­ Sweet Almond Oil
â­ Olive Oil

#Mavala #CuticleOil #NailCare #HealthyNails #NailHydration #NailBeauty #HandCare #NaturalOils #SaudiBeauty #SaudiMakeup

description_en:
Achieve perfect, dry nails in seconds with **Mavala Mavadry Fast Drying & Shine**. Tired of nail polish chipping or smudging too quickly? Looking for a fast and effective solution for glossy, flawless nails? **Mavala Mavadry Fast Drying & Shine** is your ultimate answer. This product boasts a completely vegan formula, with no animal ingredients and is not tested on animals. It imparts an exceptional shine to your nails and dries polish super fast, making it your perfect nail care companion whether at home or on the go.

â­ Fast Drying: Dries nail polish in seconds.
â­ Provides exceptional shine.
â­ Vegan and cruelty-free formula.
â­ Easy to apply, just like regular nail polish.
â­ Ideal for both manicures and pedicures.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Mavala Mavadry Fast Drying & Shine**
â­ After applying the final coat of nail polish, wait for one minute.
â­ Apply **Mavala Mavadry Fast Drying & Shine** to your nails.
â­ Use for both manicures and pedicures.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Mavala Mavadry Fast Drying & Shine**
â­ Innovative formula for quick drying and superior shine.
â­ Carefully selected ingredients for nail nourishment.

#Mavala #NailPolish #NailDryer #NailCare #ShinyNails #SaudiBeauty #MakeupSaudi #StrongNails #Manicure #Pedicure

description_en:
Break free from the annoying habit of nail-biting with **Mavala** solution, the perfect solution for healthy and beautiful nails. This clear enamel features a bitter taste designed to deter nail-biting and thumb-sucking, helping you break this bad habit and restore your nails' appearance. You can use it on its own or over your favorite nail polish.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Mavala** solution:
â­ Apply a thin coat to the entire nail surface or over nail polish and let it dry completely.
â­ Avoid washing your hands immediately after application for best results.
â­ Re-apply every two days until the habit has stopped.
â­ Before each re-application, remove **Mavala** solution with nail polish remover for a fresh application.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Mavala** solution:
â­ Safe and dermatologically tested formula.
â­ Clear enamel with an effective bitter taste.

description_en:
Achieve a long-lasting manicure with professional shine using **Mavala Colorfix**. This innovative product is the ultimate topcoat for your nail polish, providing superior fixation and a brilliant, enduring shine. Thanks to its unique acryl-reinforced formula, **Mavala Colorfix** forms a glossy, hard yet flexible film that protects nail polish from chipping and peeling, significantly extending the life of your manicure.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Mavala Colorfix**:
â­ After your nail polish color has completely dried, apply a coat of **Mavala Colorfix** over the entire nail. For optimal protection, apply it underneath the nail tip where the enamel is most prone to chipping. This will help delay the wear of your manicure.
â­ Allow to dry thoroughly.
â­ To refresh your manicure and make it last even longer, apply a second coat of **Mavala Colorfix** 24 to 48 hours later.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Mavala Colorfix**:
â­ **Mavala Colorfix** contains high-quality ingredients that ensure superior shine and durable protection for your nail polish.

description_en:
Experience unparalleled freshness with **Mentos White Peppermint** gum, designed to give you refreshing breath and a long-lasting taste. This sugar-free, gluten-free gum, sweetened with healthy alternatives, is perfect for keeping in your office, car, or home thanks to its convenient bottle containing 38 pieces. 

Benefits of **Mentos White Peppermint**:
â­ Provides a refreshing breath and eliminates bad odors.
â­ Aids in cleaning the mouth and teeth, reducing plaque buildup.
â­ Contains xylitol, which may help reduce the risk of tooth decay.
â­ Strengthens jaw muscles through regular chewing.
â­ An ideal choice for smokers to combat unpleasant breath.
â­ Helps curb appetite and reduce feelings of hunger.
â­ Contributes to burning some calories.
â­ Reduces gum inflammation by increasing saliva secretion.
â­ May help alleviate some symptoms related to the middle ear.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Mentos White Peppermint**:
â­ Chew one piece after meals or whenever you need instant freshness.
â­ Keep the bottle in a cool, dry place, out of reach of children under 3 years old.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Mentos White Peppermint**:
â­ Sweeteners (Maltitol, Sorbitol, Xylitol, Maltitol Syrup, Aspartame, Acesulfame K).
â­ Gum base.
â­ Natural, nature-identical, and artificial mint flavour.
â­ Maltodextrin, Glycerol, Calcium Carbonate.
â­ Emulsifier (Soy Lecithin), Thickeners (Cellulose Gum, Gum Arabic).
â­ Starch, Glazing agents (Shellac, Carnauba wax).
â­ Antioxidant (BHT).
â­ Contains Soya.

description_en:
Experience a burst of refreshing flavor with **Mentos Pure Fresh Strawberry Gum**, designed for long-lasting fresh breath and a delightful taste. Sugar-free and packed with rich strawberry flavor, this gum is your perfect companion for a revitalized feeling anytime, anywhere. Its convenient bottle design makes it easy to carry, ideal for your desk, car, or bag.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Mentos Pure Fresh Strawberry Gum**
â­ Enjoy the refreshing strawberry taste after meals or whenever you need a pick-me-up.
â­ Chew regularly to help maintain oral hygiene and may reduce the risk of tooth decay thanks to xylitol.
â­ Ideal for smokers to combat bad breath.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Mentos Pure Fresh Strawberry Gum**
â­ Sweeteners (Maltitol, Sorbitol, Maltitol Syrup, Xylitol, Aspartame, Sucralose, Acesulfame K).
â­ Gum base, Maltodextrin, Humectant (Glycerol).
â­ Acids (Tartaric acid, Malic acid, Citric acid).
â­ Nature identical strawberry and mint flavours.
â­ Emulsifier (Soy lecithin), Strawberry juice powder.
â­ Thickeners (Cellulose gum, Gum arabic).
â­ Green tea extract, Starch.
â­ Glazing agents (Carnauba wax, Shellac).
â­ Antioxidant (BHT), Colour (Carmine).

Experience a refreshing breath and a long-lasting taste with **Mentos Gum Pure Fresh Bottle Watermelon**! Sugar and gluten-free, it's perfect for keeping you fresh anytime, anywhere. Each bottle contains 50 pieces bursting with invigorating watermelon flavor.

â­ Carry the bottle with you for continuous freshness throughout your day.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Mentos Gum Pure Fresh Bottle Watermelon**:
â­ Sweeteners (Maltitol, Sorbitol, Maltitol Syrup, Xylitol, Aspartame, Acesulfame K, Sucralose).

description_en:
Discover the ultimate protection for your baby's delicate skin with **Mustela Bebe-Vit. Barrier Cream 123**. Specially formulated from day one, this cream acts as a rich protective barrier, shielding your baby's diaper area from irritation.

â­ Protects and insulates your baby's skin against irritation and dryness.
â­ Effectively reduces the development of bacteria that can cause inflammation.
â­ Soothes the skin, leaving it soft and smooth for ultimate comfort.
â­ Provides instant relief from diaper rash, ensuring your little one stays comfortable.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Mustela Bebe-Vit. Barrier Cream 123**:
â­ At every diaper change, apply a thick layer of the diaper cream to your baby's clean and dry diaper area.
â­ **Mustela Bebe-Vit. Barrier Cream 123** can be used right from the day your baby is born, including babies newly discharged from neonatal care.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Mustela Bebe-Vit. Barrier Cream 123**:
â­ Bio-active Avocado Perseose to protect daily.
â­ Vitamin B5 (Panthenol) to soothe the skin.
â­ Zinc Oxide to provide a protective barrier.

Experience ultimate gentleness with **Mustela Baby Shampoo 200ml**, the perfect shampoo to cleanse and moisturize your baby's delicate hair from day one. Its tear-free formula ensures a gentle experience, leaving your baby's hair healthy and naturally shiny.

description_en:
Elevate your baby's skincare routine with **Mustela Hydra Bebe Body Lotion 300ml**. This luxurious lotion is specifically designed to hydrate and strengthen your baby's delicate skin from the very first moments. It protects the vital resources of your baby's skin today and for the future, providing long-lasting hydration with its light, non-greasy formula that absorbs quickly. It leaves the skin feeling silky smooth and refreshed with a delicate scent. The practical pump dispenser ensures you get the perfect dose for gently massaging your baby's skin.

â­ Instantly hydrates and nourishes baby's skin.
â­ Strengthens the skin barrier, leaving it feeling silky, supple, and even softer.
â­ Preserves the skin's richness from the first day thanks to natural Avocado Perseose.
â­ Protects the skin and eyes gently.
â­ Suitable for use from birth.
â­ Tested under dermatological and pediatric control.
â­ High tolerance, hypoallergenic formula.
â­ 98% of ingredients of natural origin.
â­ Free from Paraben, phthalate, and phenoxyethanol.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Mustela Hydra Bebe Body Lotion 300ml**
â­ Apply this lotion to your baby's face and body morning and night after gently cleansing the skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Mustela Hydra Bebe Body Lotion 300ml**
â­ Enriched with vegetable oils and vitamins E and F for instant, lasting hydration.
â­ Shea butter leaves the skin feeling supple, silky, and gorgeously soft.
â­ Natural Avocado Perseose to support the skin barrier.

#BabyCare #Skincare #BabyLotion #SkinHydration #BabySkin #BabyProducts #Mustela #BabyEssentials #DailyCare #SaudiArabia

title_ar: Ù…ÙˆØ³ØªÙŠÙ„Ø§ Ø³Ø§Ø¦Ù„ Ù…Ù†Ø¹Ø´ Ù„Ù„Ø¬Ø³Ù… ÙˆØ§Ù„Ø´Ø¹Ø± 200 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Discover the gentle touch of freshness with **Mustela Skin Freshener for Hair and Body**. Specially formulated for use from the very first day, this innovative product combines deep hydration with a delicate, long-lasting fragrance, leaving your baby's skin and hair irresistibly soft and beautifully scented. It's perfect for gently detangling and styling your baby's hair while maintaining scalp health.

**Mustela Skin Freshener for Hair and Body** has been tested under dermatological and pediatric control. It is completely safe for use even on premature infants, with 98% of its ingredients being of natural origin, and it is free from parabens, phthalates, and phenoxyethanol.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Mustela Skin Freshener for Hair and Body**:
â­ Gently apply a small amount of the product to your baby's skin and hair.
â­ Use it to detangle and style your baby's hair.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Mustela Skin Freshener for Hair and Body**:
â­ 98% ingredients of natural origin.
â­ Safe for hair and delicate baby skin from the first day.
â­ Hypoallergenic - formulated to minimize the risk of allergic reactions.
â­ Free of paraben, phthalate, phenoxyethanol.

#Mustela #BabyCare #BabyFragrance #BabyCologne #BabyProducts #HairMoisture #SensitiveSkin #KidsCosmetics #Newborns #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Protect your baby's delicate skin with **Mustela Bebe Vit. Barrier Cream**, the ultimate solution for preventing diaper rash and providing your baby with superior comfort. Specially formulated for daily use from day one, this cream works to protect and insulate your baby's skin against irritation thanks to its unique composition.

â­ Protects and insulates skin against irritation.
â­ Reduces the development of bacteria that cause irritation.
â­ Soothes the skin and leaves it soft.
â­ Effectively prevents diaper rash.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Mustela Bebe Vit. Barrier Cream**:
â­ At every diaper change, apply a thick layer of diaper cream to your babyâ€™s clean and dry diaper area.
â­ **Mustela Bebe Vit. Barrier Cream** can be used right from the day your baby is born.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Mustela Bebe Vit. Barrier Cream**:
â­ Vitamin F to nourish and protect the skin.
â­ Zinc Oxide for its protective and soothing properties.
â­ Sweet Almond Oil to moisturize and soften the skin.
â­ Vitamin B5 to soothe the skin and reduce redness.

#DiaperRashCream #BabyCare #Mustela #BabySkin #BabyHealth #BabyEssentials #SkinProtection #BabyProducts #BabyMoisturizer #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Experience unparalleled relief with **Mustela Cicastela Moisture Recovery Cream 40ml**. This cream is specially formulated to soothe and repair your baby's sensitive and damaged skin.

Whether it's irritation from insect bites, chickenpox, minor burns, superficial cuts, or scratches, **Mustela Cicastela Moisture Recovery Cream 40ml** provides immediate comfort and helps restore skin balance.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Mustela Cicastela Moisture Recovery Cream 40ml**:
â­ Gently apply to clean, dry skin.
â­ Use three times daily for optimal results.
â­ Suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin.
â­ Ideal for irritated areas like around the mouth, scratched knees, and the diaper area.
â­ Avoid applying on open or oozing wounds.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Mustela Cicastela Moisture Recovery Cream 40ml**:
â­ Avocado Perseose: To strengthen the skin's natural barrier and provide deep hydration.
â­ Panthenol: For instant soothing of irritated skin and reduction of itchiness.
â­ Hyaluronic Acid: To rehydrate the skin and promote repair.
â­ Copper & Zinc: To restore skin balance and enhance its health.
â­ Safe for use on infants and newborns.
â­ Made with 91% natural ingredients.
â­ Free from parabens, fragrances, and irritants.

#Mustela #Cicastela #SkinCream #BabyCare #HealthySkin #SkinMoisture #BabyProducts #SaudiArabia #BodyCare #Hydration

description_en:
Experience gentle and effective cleansing with **Mustela Hair & Cleansing Gel 2 in 1**, the perfect wash for your baby's daily hair and body care. Its unique soap-free formula respects your baby's hydrolipidic film and scalp's natural balance, while gently cleansing without irritation or dryness.

â­ Gently cleanses hair and body without causing irritation or dryness.
â­ Leaves hair easy to comb.
â­ Tear-free formula that does not sting the eyes.
â­ Promotes relaxation and eliminates cradle cap.
â­ Tested under dermatological and pediatric control.
â­ High tolerance and hypoallergenic formula.
â­ Free of parabens, phthalates, and phenoxyethanol.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Mustela Hair & Cleansing Gel 2 in 1**:
â­ Wet your babyâ€™s skin and hair with lukewarm water.
â­ Squeeze a few drops of the gel into your hand.
â­ Gently lather onto baby's hair and skin.
â­ Rinse carefully.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Mustela Hair & Cleansing Gel 2 in 1**:
â­ Soap-free formula to ensure maximum safety and gentleness.

description_en:
Discover superior protection for your baby's delicate skin with **Mustela Cold Cream Nutri-Protective Facial Cream**. This cold cream is specially formulated to hydrate and strengthen baby's skin from birth, making it ideal for naturally dry or stressed skin. It immediately nourishes dry skin with a long-lasting effect, moisturizes, restores the skin barrier, and preserves the richness of newborn babies' skin. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Mustela Cold Cream Nutri-Protective Facial Cream**:
â­ Apply morning and night to a clean, dry face, especially on drier areas.
â­ Can be used right from the day your baby is born.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Mustela Cold Cream Nutri-Protective Facial Cream**:
â­ Hypoallergenic and tested under dermatological and pediatric control to minimize the risk of allergic reactions.
â­ Moisturizes the face for up to 36 hours.
â­ Free of paraben, phthalate, and phenoxyethanol.

#Mustela #BabyCream #BabySkin #BabyMoisturizer #Skincare #BabyCare #InfantProducts #DrySkin #BabySkincare #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Discover superior care with **Mustela PhysiobÃ©bÃ© Bebe Cleansing Fluid 300 Ml**. This gentle cleansing water is ideal for cleaning your baby's delicate skin and diaper area, moisturizing the skin and maintaining its natural protective barrier thanks to its formula rich in nourishing plant oils.

â­ Effectively leaves your baby's skin clean and free from impurities.
â­ Extremely gentle on newborn and baby skin, it does not cause dryness.
â­ Dermatologically and pediatric tested and approved for maximum safety.
â­ Provides superior protection for skin and eyes, with a no-tears formula.
â­ Free from parabens, phthalates, and phenoxyethanol for your peace of mind.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Mustela PhysiobÃ©bÃ© Bebe Cleansing Fluid 300 Ml**:
â­ Apply an appropriate amount of cleansing fluid to a round cotton pad.
â­ Gently glide the cotton pad over your baby's diaper area or face and wipe gently.
â­ No rinsing needed, just gently pat dry.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Mustela PhysiobÃ©bÃ© Bebe Cleansing Fluid 300 Ml**:
â­ High tolerance and hypoallergenic formula.
â­ Moisturizing and nourishing plant oils for the skin.
â­ Tested by dermatologists and pediatricians.
â­ Suitable for use from birth.

description_en:
Discover the ultimate protection for your child's delicate skin with **Mustela Sunscreen Lotion SPF 50+ for Children 40ml**. This lotion is meticulously formulated to shield your baby's sensitive skin from harmful sun rays.

**Product Features:**
â­ Enriched with Avocado Perseose, a patented natural ingredient that strengthens the skin barrier and preserves its cellular richness from UV light.
â­ Advanced Photo-Protectant System offers very high protection against both UVA and UVB rays.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Mustela Sunscreen Lotion SPF 50+ for Children 40ml**:
â­ Apply generously 15 minutes before sun exposure.
â­ Reapply every 2 hours for continuous protection.

**Additional Benefits:**
â­ Very water-resistant.
â­ Very sand-resistant.
â­ Suitable for all skin types, including sun-sensitive, irritated, and atopic-prone skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Mustela Sunscreen Lotion SPF 50+ for Children 40ml**:
â­ Avocado Perseose.
â­ Photo-Protectant System.

description_en:
Experience comfortable and worry-free breastfeeding with **Mustela Nursing Comfort Balm with Olive Oil 30ML**. This specially formulated balm is designed to soothe and protect nipples that are cracked or irritated during breastfeeding, offering superior protection and immediate relief for new mothers. Its 100% natural formula makes it completely safe for both you and your baby, ensuring you can enjoy every moment with your little one without discomfort.

â­ Protects sensitive nipples and aids in their repair.
â­ Soothes feelings of discomfort and pain.
â­ Promotes nipple healing after breastfeeding.
â­ 100% natural formula, safe for mother and baby.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Mustela Nursing Comfort Balm with Olive Oil 30ML**
â­ After each feed, apply generously to the nipple.
â­ No need to wash the nipple before the next feeding.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Mustela Nursing Comfort Balm with Olive Oil 30ML**
â­ Olive Oil (source of essential fatty acids).
â­ Vitamin E (antioxidant).
â­ Shea Butter (moisturizing and soothing).
â­ Glycerin (humectant).

#NippleBalm #MaternityCare #Breastfeeding #Mustela #NippleCracks #Moisturizing #MomsHealth #NursingEssentials #SaudiArabia #BabyProducts

description_en:
**Mustela Stretch Marks Prevention Cream** is specially formulated for expecting and new mothers, helping to prevent the appearance of stretch marks and reduce new ones with its unique combination of natural active ingredients. It's the first brand in Europe to prevent stretch marks and is hypoallergenic.

This cream is compatible with breastfeeding, ensuring safe use for new mothers.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Mustela Stretch Marks Prevention Cream**:

â­ Start application from the third month of pregnancy and continue after birth.
â­ Massage the cream onto your abdomen, hips, thighs, and breasts, morning and evening.
â­ Continue massaging until fully absorbed.
â­ Its rich texture is easily and quickly absorbed into the skin.
â­ Compatible with breastfeeding, adhering to proper hygiene rules (clean nipples).

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Mustela Stretch Marks Prevention Cream**:

â­ Prevents stretch marks from the early stages.
â­ Provides deep skin hydration.
â­ Features a gentle, hypoallergenic formula.
â­ Leaves skin soft and supple.

#Mustela #StretchMarks #Pregnancy #NewMom #MaternityCare #Skincare #BeautyProducts #Moisturizer #WomensHealth #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Experience gentle cleansing and soothing care with **Mustela Dermo-Soothing Cleansing Wipes - 60 Count**. These wipes are your perfect companion for changing your baby's diaper, whether at home or on the go. Enriched with natural ingredients, they leave your baby's diaper area perfectly clean and hydrated, providing soothing relief thanks to aloe vera and glycerin. Enjoy a delicate, refreshing scent that pampers your baby's skin.

â­ Leaves your baby's skin clean and soft.
â­ Soothes and softens the diaper area from day one.
â­ Enriched with the patented Avocado PerseoseÂ®.
â­ Clinically tested under dermatological and pediatric control.
â­ Made with 98% natural origin ingredients.
â­ Convenient pack of 60 wipes.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Mustela Dermo-Soothing Cleansing Wipes - 60 Count**:
â­ Use as often as necessary to gently cleanse your baby's diaper area.
â­ No rinsing required.
â­ Safe for use right from the day your baby is born.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Mustela Dermo-Soothing Cleansing Wipes - 60 Count**:
â­ Saponaria leaf and root extract.
â­ Aloe Vera.
â­ Glycerin.
â­ Avocado PerseoseÂ® (patented ingredient).

description_en:
Provide your baby and family with ultimate care using **Mustela Stelatopia+ Cream**, specially formulated for very dry and extremely dry skin, from birth onwards.

This cream features organic certified Sunflower Oleodistillate and BioÃ©coliaÂ® Prebiotics, ensuring 99% natural origin ingredients that offer long-lasting protection and a superior soft touch. Its odorless, vegan, and quickly absorbed texture makes it the perfect choice for daily care.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Mustela Stelatopia+ Cream**:
â­ Comes in a practical and easy-to-use pump format.
â­ Step 1: Dispense the product into your hand by pressing the pump 2 to 4 times.
â­ Step 2: Apply gently to clean and dry skin 2 times a day.
â­ Suitable for application on your entire body.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Mustela Stelatopia+ Cream**:
â­ AQUA/WATER/EAU, HELIANTHUS ANNUUS (SUNFLOWER) SEED OIL, GLYCERIN, CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE, BUTYROSPERMUM PARKII (SHEA) BUTTER, C10-18 TRIGLYCERIDES, SUCROSE STEARATE, HELIANTHUS ANNUUS (SUNFLOWER) SEED OIL UNSAPONIFIABLES, PERSEA GRATISSIMA (AVOCADO) OIL, ALPHA-GLUCAN OLIGOSACCHARIDE, GLYCERYL CAPRYLATE, XANTHAN GUM, SODIUM BENZOATE, SODIUM STEAROYL GLUTAMATE, CITRIC ACID, TOCOPHEROL.

description_en:
Indulge your little one with **Mustela** Gentle Baby Massage Oil, expertly crafted to moisturize and soften skin without a greasy residue. This nourishing oil strengthens your baby's protective skin barrier and cellular source, thanks to its avocado-rich formula.

â­ Hydrates and softens the skin.
â­ Nourishes and soothes delicate baby skin.
â­ Dry oil for an effortless and enjoyable massage experience.
â­ Leaves a protective film on the skin of newborns, babies, and children.
â­ Specially formulated for your baby's delicate skin from day one.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Mustela**:
â­ Spray a small quantity of Massage oil into the palm of your hand, then warm it up before applying it to your baby's body and massaging them.
â­ You can massage your child as often as you wish if they enjoy it.
â­ Massage oil can be used from the day your baby is born.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Mustela**:
â­ Enriched with avocado oil for deep hydration and nourishment.
â­ 99% natural origin ingredients.
â­ Free from parabens, phthalates, and phenoxyethanol.
â­ Dermatologically and pediatrically tested.

#Mustela #BabyOil #BabyMassage #Skincare #GentleCare #BabyProducts #NaturalBaby #BabyLove #SaudiBaby #Parenting

description_en:
Experience instant relief and gentle care for your baby's delicate skin with Mustela Stelatopia Cleansing Gel. Specially formulated for babies and newborns suffering from extremely dry or atopic-prone skin, this ultra-gentle cleansing gel aims to soothe irritations and compensate for water-induced dryness. Featuring a formula with 98% natural origin ingredients, **Mustela Stelatopia Cleansing Gel** leaves your baby's skin soft, supple, and comfortable. Its soothing properties, derived from organic sunflower, make it the ideal choice for daily care. Dermatologist-tested and safe for use from birth.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Mustela Stelatopia Cleansing Gel**
â­ Step 1: Squeeze the desired amount of gel into your hand using the convenient pump bottle.
â­ Step 2: Lather the gel in your hands, then gently wash your babyâ€™s body and hair.
â­ Step 3: Rinse off the gel and avoid rubbing while drying your baby's skin. Use a clean cotton towel for a gentle pat-dry.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Mustela Stelatopia Cleansing Gel**
â­ Sunflower Oil Distillate: The core ingredient, known for its soothing properties and ability to activate the skin's natural repair process.
â­ Avocado Perseose: Combined with shea butter and natural origin glycerine to enhance the skin's hydration and protection.

description_en:
Discover unparalleled softness with the original exfoliating loofah from **Mom's Bath Recipe**, specially designed to rejuvenate your skin. With its unique formula containing 34.11% moisturizing ingredients like yogurt and honey, this loofah provides instant exfoliation and deep hydration, enhanced by the Hinoki Cypress scent that promotes relaxation and stress relief. The **Mom's Bath Recipe** original body peeling pad is an ideal alternative to traditional baths, combining cleansing and exfoliation in one step inspired by ancient Korean bath traditions. It is hypoallergenic, containing willow bark extract and gentle natural exfoliants, eliminating the need for body wash. Designed with two sides to meet all your skin's needs: a green side for exfoliating stubborn areas like elbows and knees, and a white side for the rest of the body, ensuring effective exfoliation without irritation.

Product Features:
â­ The pack contains 8 loofahs, each for single use.
â­ Trusted Brand: Mom's Bath Recipe.
â­ Suitable for adults.
â­ Country of Origin: Korea.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Mom's Bath Recipe** Original Body Peeling Pad:
â­ Rinse your entire body with water.
â­ Open the package, place the loofah on your hand, and start gently rubbing the body with the white, patterned side until foam appears.
â­ Rub your entire body carefully to ensure the keratin-rich foam reaches all over.
â­ Use the green, patterned side for areas requiring intensive exfoliation such as elbows, knees, and ankles.
â­ Rinse your entire body thoroughly with lukewarm water.
â­ It is recommended to use the loofah 2-3 times a week.
â­ Test the loofah on a small skin area first to ensure no allergies occur.

â­ Hinoki Cypress scent.
