shortdescription_en: Instant exfoliating & hydrating loofah with Hinoki Cypress scent by Mom's Bath Recipe. Effective and gentle on skin.

title_en: Mom's Bath Recipe Exfoliating Body Pad - 8 Count Box
title_ar: Ù…ÙˆÙ…Ø² Ø¨Ø§Ø« Ù„ÙŠÙØ© ØªÙ‚Ø´ÙŠØ± Ù„Ù„Ø¬Ø³Ù… - Ø¹Ù„Ø¨Ø© 8 Ø­Ø¨Ø§Øª
description_en:
The original exfoliating loofah from **Mom's Bath Recipe** is the perfect solution for exfoliating and hydrating your body simultaneously, inspired by Korean bath traditions rich in unique blends to remove dead skin and renew the skin. It features a formula rich in natural extracts and moisturizing elements like yogurt and honey, along with a soothing Hinoki Cypress scent to relieve stress. It's designed to be gentle on the skin and hypoallergenic thanks to willow bark extract and natural exfoliants, and it doesn't require the use of body wash. With two sides for exfoliation, one green for stubborn areas and the other white for the entire body, this loofah gives you soft, renewed skin. Each loofah is designed for single use, providing a hygienic and clean exfoliating experience.

â­ Contains 34.11% moisturizing ingredients like yogurt and honey.
â­ Scented with Hinoki Cypress fragrance to calm nerves and relieve stress.
â­ Eliminates the need for special baths and is an ideal alternative to Moroccan and Turkish baths.
â­ Effectively removes dead skin, treats dry skin and chicken skin.
â­ Hypoallergenic due to willow bark extract and natural exfoliants.
â­ Green side for deep exfoliation of stubborn areas, and a white side for the entire body.
â­ Easy to use, carry, and suitable for travel.
â­ Provides revitalized, soft, and hydrated skin.
â­ Suitable for all skin types.

#Mom'sBathRecipe #ExfoliatingLoofah #SkinCare #BodyExfoliation #BodyMoisturizing #HealthySkin #KoreanProducts #SaudiArabia #Jeddah #Riyadh

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Mom's Bath Recipe**:
â­ Rinse the entire body with water.
â­ Open the pouch to take out the loofah and place it in your hand.
â­ Start gently rubbing the body with the white side until foam appears.
â­ Rub the entire body carefully to ensure the rich foam covers all areas.
â­ Use the green side on stubborn areas like elbows and knees.
â­ Rinse the entire body with lukewarm water.
â­ Use the loofah 2-3 times a week.
â­ It's recommended to test the loofah on a small area to ensure no skin sensitivity occurs.

#Mom'sBathRecipe #Mom'sBathRecipe #ExfoliatingLoofah #SkinCare #BodyExfoliation #BodyMoisturizing #HealthySkin #KoreanProducts #SaudiArabia #Jeddah #Riyadh

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Mom's Bath Recipe**:
â­ 8 loofahs per box, each loofah for single use.
â­ Inspired by Korean bath traditions with effective blends.
â­ Contains fruit enzymes like pineapple enzyme (bromelain).
â­ Fermented pumpkin extract to remove dead skin and spots.
â­ Moisturizing elements like sea kelp extract and postbiotics.
â­ Natural ingredients and oils beneficial for the skin.
â­ Raw seaweed extract to enhance hydration and reduce dryness.
â­ Suitable for daily use in a modern way.
â­ Country of Origin: Korea.
â­ Age Group: Adults.

#Mom'sBathRecipe #Mom'sBathRecipe #ExfoliatingLoofah #SkinCare #BodyExfoliation #BodyMoisturizing #HealthySkin #KoreanProducts #SaudiArabia #Jeddah #Riyadh

description_en:
Give your body unparalleled radiance with the Mom's Bath Recipe Lha Vitamin Glow Body Pad. These unique pads, inspired by traditional Korean bath recipes, are enriched with Vitamin C and Sea Buckthorn Oil, along with dual moisturizing technology from Panthenol and Hyaluronic Acid. They deeply moisturize and significantly enhance skin radiance, removing up to 70.83% of dead skin cells and reducing skin roughness by 10.16%, leaving you with soft, renewed skin.

Product Features:
â­ Easy-to-use pads rich in vitamins like Vitamin C for skin freshness.
â­ Effectively gets rid of tough and deep dead skin cells.
â­ Contains Sea Buckthorn Oil, Panthenol, and Hyaluronic Acid for deep hydration.
â­ Effectively soothes and moisturizes the skin, leaving it soft and radiant.
â­ Free from skin irritants and clinically tested for maximum safety.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Mom's Bath Recipe Lha Vitamin Glow Body Pad**:
â­ Use the pad to gently rub all body areas, especially dry ones.
â­ Press the pad during rubbing to stimulate the absorption of active ingredients into the skin.
â­ Focus on areas like elbows, knees, and areas needing an extra boost of radiance.
â­ After use, apply the remaining oils in the pad to your hair for moisture and fragrance.
â­ For best results, regular use is recommended for deep cleansing and sustained skin radiance.
â­ Can be used after a body scrub for enhanced penetration of the effective formula.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Mom's Bath Recipe Lha Vitamin Glow Body Pad**:
â­ Enriched with Vitamin C and Sea Buckthorn Oil.
â­ Contains Panthenol and Hyaluronic Acid for hydration.
â­ Gentle formula, free from irritating substances.

#MomsBath #VitaminWipes #SkinRadiance #BodyExfoliation #BodyMoisturizing #VitaminC #SkinCare #KoreanBeauty #SaudiBeauty #BodyCare

title_ar: Ù…ÙˆÙ…Ø² Ø¨Ø§Ø« Ø±ÙŠØ³Ø¨ÙŠ Ø­Ù„ÙŠØ¨ Ø§Ù„Ø¬Ø³Ù… Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø±Ø·Ø¨
description_en:
Experience deep hydration with **Mom's Bath Recipe Hydrating Body Milk**, a body milk infused with potent nutrients inspired by ancient Korean bath recipes, utilizing Aqua Rock technology for superior absorption. Enriched with yogurt, honey, and milk extract, it provides exceptional moisture and instant soothing without any stickiness, thanks to its light texture and fast-absorbing formula.

Product Features:
â­ Deeply moisturizes and nourishes the skin.
â­ Nourishing natural ingredients: Yogurt, Honey, and Milk Extract.
â­ Soothes skin and provides long-lasting hydration.
â­ Free from skin irritants.
â­ Medically laboratory tested for efficacy and safety.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Mom's Bath Recipe Hydrating Body Milk**:
â­ After showering, apply an appropriate amount to your entire wet body.
â­ Massage gently, then rinse with water and pat dry.
â­ Ideal for post-exfoliation use to enhance skin soothing and moisture.
â­ For a complete ritual, use with Mom's Bath Soy Milk Face Mask.

Caution & Warnings:
â­ Discontinue use if skin irritation occurs.
â­ Rinse eyes immediately with plenty of water if contact occurs.
â­ Keep away from direct sunlight and heat.
â­ Store in a cool, dry place out of reach of children.

description_en:
Discover instant exfoliation and hydration with the **Mom's Bath Recipe** Strong Body Peeling Pad. Designed for simultaneous body cleansing and exfoliation, inspired by Korean bath heritage. This loofah features willow bark extract and gentle natural exfoliants, making it hypoallergenic and eliminating the need for body wash. It has two sides for optimal exfoliation without irritation: a green side for stubborn areas and a white side for the entire body. Each loofah is individually packaged for single use, and the pack contains 8 loofahs, perfect for daily care or travel.

â­ Contains 34.11% moisturizing ingredients like yogurt and honey.
â­ Scented with Hinoki Cypress for stress relief.
â­ Ideal alternative to Moroccan and Turkish baths.
â­ Effectively removes dead skin and revitalizes the skin.
â­ Hypoallergenic due to willow bark extract.
â­ Green side for stubborn areas, white side for the whole body.
â­ Each loofah is for single use; the pack contains 8 loofahs.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Mom's Bath Recipe**:
â­ Rinse the entire body with water.
â­ Open the pouch, take out the loofah, place it on your hand, and gently rub the body with the white, patterned side until foam appears.
â­ Carefully rub the entire body to ensure the rich keratin foam reaches all areas.
â­ Use the green, patterned side to exfoliate stubborn areas like elbows, knees, and ankles.
â­ Rinse the entire body with lukewarm water.
â­ Use the loofah 2-3 times a week.
â­ It is recommended to test on a small area of the body to check for skin allergies.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Mom's Bath Recipe**:
â­ Enriched with willow bark extract.
â­ Contains gentle natural exfoliants.
â­ High percentage of moisturizing ingredients.
â­ Each loofah is for single use.
â­ Country of Origin: Korea.

description_en:
Experience revitalized and radiant skin with **Mom's Bath Recipe Trouble Clear Toner Pad**.

Say goodbye to impurities, excess oil, and dead skin cells with these innovative pads that effectively cleanse your skin, leaving it refreshed and vibrant. Formulated with 10% apple cider vinegar, the **Mom's Bath Recipe Trouble Clear Toner Pad** removes 98.4% of impurities, reduces blackheads by 5.14%, and whiteheads by 28%, aiding your skin in better absorption of skincare products.

These pads feature a unique, laboratory-proven medium-acid plant technology with a 7cm diameter and two distinct sides. The embossed side deeply cleanses pores and effectively removes impurities, while the other side soothes the skin, targeting areas like the nose. Enriched with apple mint extract for an instant refreshing boost.

**More Features of Mom's Bath Recipe Trouble Clear Toner Pad:**
â­ Reduces acne and soothes the skin.
â­ Enhances skin softness, radiance, and hydration.
â­ Patented formulation using fermented rice, lotus leaves, yeast, and BHA.
â­ Fights acne and skin inflammation.
â­ Rejuvenates skin and combats dryness.
â­ Minimizes the appearance of enlarged pores.
â­ Improves symptoms of sun damage.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Mom's Bath Recipe Trouble Clear Toner Pad**:
â­ Wipe the body with it during shower.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Mom's Bath Recipe Trouble Clear Toner Pad**:
â­ Rich in salicylic acid, apple cider vinegar, fermented rice, lotus leaves, yeast, and beta hydroxy acids.
â­ Effectively soothes and moisturizes the skin.
â­ Free from skin irritants and clinically tested.

#MomsBathRecipe #TonerPads #Skincare #KoreanBeauty #SalicylicAcid #AHA #BHA #AppleCiderVinegar #HealthySkin #GlowUp

title_ar: Ù…Ø§Ø³Ùƒ Ø­Ù„ÙŠØ¨ Ø§Ù„ØµÙˆÙŠØ§ Ù„Ù„ÙˆØ¬Ù‡ Ù…Ù† Ù…ÙˆÙ…Ø² Ø¨Ø§Ø« Ø±ÙŠØ³Ø¨ÙŠ
description_en:
Discover the secret to radiant skin with the **Mom's Bath Recipe Soy Milk Sheet Mask Single**. This luxurious mask delivers 25ml of intense moisturizing cream on a bamboo thread sheet, providing the ultimate Korean skincare experience. Its hypoallergenic formula, rich in raw soy milk, combats dry skin and renews skin cells thanks to Vitamin E, boosting collagen production and fighting wrinkles and fine lines. It also unifies skin tone, eliminates dark spots, and protects against UV damage, benefiting from its abundance of essential vitamins, fiber, and proteins like Vitamin B12 and folic acid.

â­ Renews skin cells and enhances freshness and radiance.
â­ Provides deep, long-lasting hydration.
â­ Enriched with nourishing hypoallergenic and raw soy milk.
â­ Effectively soothes, moisturizes, and evens out skin tone.
â­ Free of skin irritants and clinically tested for safety.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Mom's Bath Recipe Soy Milk Sheet Mask Single**:
â­ Apply the mask to a clean face for 20 minutes.
â­ Gently remove the mask without rinsing the face.
â­ Distribute the remaining creamy essence from the sachet onto the face and neck to enhance hydration.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Mom's Bath Recipe Soy Milk Sheet Mask Single**:
â­ Raw Soy Milk: Rich in proteins that fight dry skin and nourish it.
â­ Vitamin E: Helps renew skin cells and combat signs of aging.
â­ Hypoallergenic: Safe and nourishing ingredients for the skin.
â­ Vitamin B12 & Folic Acid: To boost skin health and vitality.

#FaceMask #SoyMilkMask #Skincare #SkinHydration #RadiantSkin #HealthySkin #AntiAging #EvenSkinTone #KoreanBeauty #MomsBath

title_ar: Ù…ÙˆÙ…Ø² Ø¨Ø§Ø« Ø±ÙŠØ³Ø¨ÙŠ ØºØ³ÙˆÙ„ Ø§Ù„Ø¬Ø³Ù… Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø¹Ø§Ù„Ø¬ Ù„Ø­Ø¨ Ø§Ù„Ø´Ø¨Ø§Ø¨
description_en:
Experience ultimate clarity with **Mom's Bath Recipe Salicylic Acid Acne Body Wash**, expertly formulated to combat acne and reveal smoother, clearer skin. This powerful body wash harnesses the exfoliating properties of Alpha Hydroxyl Acids (AHA) and Beta Hydroxyl Acids (BHA) to deeply cleanse and renew your skin. AHAs gently lift away dead skin cells from the surface, while BHAs penetrate pores to dissolve impurities, excess oil, and dirt that lead to breakouts, improving overall skin texture. Enriched with soothing Tea Tree Oil and refreshing Mint extracts, the **Mom's Bath Recipe Salicylic Acid Acne Body Wash** helps to calm irritation, balance moisture levels, and leave your skin feeling revitalized and rebalanced. Achieve a clearer complexion and enjoy a refreshed, healthy-looking body with this dermatologist-tested, irritant-free formula.

â­ Deeply exfoliates skin, removing impurities and accumulated oils.
â­ Effectively targets and eliminates acne and skin inflammation.
â­ Soothes, balances moisture, and enhances skin freshness.
â­ Gentle, irritant-free, and clinically tested formula.
â­ Package capacity: 350 ml.
â­ Brand: Mom's Bath Recipe.
â­ For adult use only.
â­ Made in Korea.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Mom's Bath Recipe Salicylic Acid Acne Body Wash**
â­ Apply a small amount to wet skin.
â­ Gently lather and massage onto the body.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Mom's Bath Recipe Salicylic Acid Acne Body Wash**
â­ Contains Alpha Hydroxyl Acids (AHA) for surface exfoliation and skin renewal.
â­ Features Beta Hydroxyl Acids (BHA) for deep pore cleansing.
â­ Infused with Tea Tree Oil extract for calming and antibacterial properties.
â­ Enriched with Mint extract for a refreshing and balancing effect.

#BodyWash #AcneTreatment #ClearSkin #Skincare #MomsBathRecipe #Exfoliating #SkinHealth #KoreanBeauty #HealthySkin #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Discover the revitalizing power of the **Mom's Bath Recipe** Red Bean Face Mask, meticulously crafted to rejuvenate your skin. Infused with nutrient-rich red bean extract, this mask works wonders in improving skin texture and delivering essential minerals. Enriched with honey and yogurt, it provides deep hydration and instant soothing to stressed skin.

This exceptional mask features a unique bamboo thread fabric, designed to stimulate the penetration of active ingredients deep into the skin. Each mask contains 25 ml of a creamy serum, ensuring your skin is nourished and its elasticity is enhanced.

â­ Renews skin cells and boosts natural radiance.
â­ Delivers deep hydration for dry and tired skin.
â­ Effectively soothes the skin and evens out skin tone.
â­ Free from skin irritants and clinically tested for maximum safety.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Mom's Bath Recipe**:
â­ Cleanse and dry your face thoroughly.
â­ Apply the mask to your face and leave it on for 20 minutes.
â­ Gently remove the mask.
â­ Massage any remaining serum into the skin for enhanced hydration.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Mom's Bath Recipe**:
â­ Red Bean Extract.
â­ Honey.
â­ Yogurt.
â­ Nourishing creamy serum.

description_en:
Discover the secret to soft, radiant skin with the **Mom's Bath Recipe Soy Milk Body & Face Mask**. This mask is one of Korea's ancient recipes for deep skin hydration and nourishment. It works to fill skin pores with intensely moisturizing and nourishing ingredients after they are opened by steam, leaving your skin rejuvenated and glowing.

â­ Deeply nourishes the skin and enhances its natural moisture.
â­ Fights dry skin thanks to its rich protein content.
â­ Renews skin cells and boosts collagen production with Vitamin E.
â­ Protects against wrinkles and fine lines.
â­ Evens out skin tone and eliminates dark spots.
â­ Shields the skin from UV damage.
â­ Rich in essential vitamins and minerals like Vitamin B12 and Folic Acid.
â­ Features a highly moisturizing, non-cracking texture, making it ideal for body and face hydration.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Mom's Bath Recipe Soy Milk Body & Face Mask**:
â­ Apply the mask to the body and face after showering and cleansing for 5-10 minutes, then rinse.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Mom's Bath Recipe Soy Milk Body & Face Mask**:
â­ Raw Soy Milk.
â­ Skin-moisturizing proteins.
â­ Vitamin E.
â­ Vitamin B12.
â­ Folic Acid.

Experience revitalized and radiant skin with **Mom's Bath Recipe Black Sesame Sheet Mask**, enriched with nourishing black sesame, hydrating yogurt, and soothing honey. Crafted from bamboo threads for superior absorption of active ingredients, this mask delivers deep hydration and instant calmness. The **Mom's Bath Recipe Black Sesame Sheet Mask** promotes skin cell regeneration and evens skin tone, being clinically tested and free from irritants for ultimate skin care.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Mom's Bath Recipe Black Sesame Sheet Mask**:
â­ Apply the mask to the skin for 20 minutes.
â­ Remove the mask without rinsing.
â­ Massage any remaining creamy essence onto the face to boost hydration.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Mom's Bath Recipe Black Sesame Sheet Mask**:
â­ Black Sesame Extract.
â­ Yogurt.
â­ Honey.
â­ 25 ml nourishing serum.

description_en:
Discover your lips' natural beauty with the **Moodmatcher Luxe Twist Stick - Green**. This revolutionary lip innovation goes beyond mere color to offer you a uniquely personal experience. With **Moodmatcher Luxe Twist Stick - Green**, say goodbye to guesswork about the right lip color, as its intelligent formula interacts with your body chemistry and skin tone to create a perfectly flattering pink shade that is yours and yours alone.

â­ **Color-changing lipstick that adapts to your pH to create your most flattering shade.**
â­ **Long-lasting up to 12 hours with no touch-ups, accompanying you through every moment of your day.**
â­ **Enriched with Aloe Vera and Vitamin E for superior hydration and soft, kissable lips.**
â­ **Smudgeproof, fadeproof, and kissproof, ensuring color stability all day long.**
â­ **Can be worn alone, as a base under lipstick, or over it for a distinctive touch.**
â­ **Cruelty-free and gentle formula.**

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Moodmatcher Luxe Twist Stick - Green**
â­ Apply **Moodmatcher Luxe Twist Stick - Green** evenly from the center of your lips to the outer edges.
â­ Allow the color to develop for a few minutes to lock in its incredible staying power.
â­ For a bolder lip, repeat application as desired.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Moodmatcher Luxe Twist Stick - Green**
â­ Aloe Vera: For ultra-moisturizing properties that keep lips soft and hydrated.
â­ Vitamin E: An antioxidant that soothes, protects, and rejuvenates chapped lips.

#Lipstick #Makeup #Cosmetics #Lips #LipHydration #LipColor #SaudiMakeup #Fashion #Beauty #LipCare

description_en:
Discover your perfect lip color with the **Moodmatcher Luxe Twist Stick - Brown**. This revolutionary lip makeup innovation adapts to your body chemistry and skin tone to give you a unique, personalized shade. With its tapered tip, you can precisely define your lips, creating flawless definition and luscious, attractive lips in seconds.

The **Moodmatcher Luxe Twist Stick - Brown** stays put for up to 12 hours without the need for touch-ups. Enjoy eating, drinking, and smiling with confidence, as the lip color won't smudge, fade, or bleed. Enriched with Aloe Vera and Vitamin E, it provides superior hydration that lasts all day, leaving your lips soft and moisturized.

â­ Original Lip Color Changer: Delivers a unique, personalized lip shade.
â­ 12-Hour Staying Power: Enjoy long-lasting color without frequent reapplication.
â­ Enriched with Aloe Vera & Vitamin E: For superior hydration and ultimate softness.
â­ Smudge-proof & Fade-proof: Perfect for everyday wear.
â­ Precision Tapered Tip: For easy lip definition.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Moodmatcher Luxe Twist Stick - Brown**
â­ Apply the **Moodmatcher Luxe Twist Stick - Brown** evenly to your lips.
â­ Wait a few minutes for the color to develop and reach its peak personalized shade.
â­ For a bolder color, reapply as needed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Moodmatcher Luxe Twist Stick - Brown**
â­ Super Hydrating Aloe Vera: Keeps your lips soft and moisturized.
â­ Vitamin E: An antioxidant that soothes, protects, and renews lips.

description_en:
Discover the secret to perfect lips with the **Moodmatcher Luxe Twist Stick - Pink**. This product revolutionizes lipstick, working with your body chemistry and skin tone to create a unique, personalized shade of pink that is exclusively yours. Its slender, tapered tip ensures precise definition and a smooth application for more alluring and attractive lips in seconds.

The **Moodmatcher Luxe Twist Stick - Pink** stays put on your lips for up to 12 hours with no touch-ups required. Enjoy eating, drinking, smooching, and smiling without worrying about smudging, feathering, or fading. Its formula, enriched with Aloe Vera and Vitamin E, provides superior hydration that lasts all day, keeping your lips soft, moisturized, and kissably smooth.

Product Features:
â­ 12-hour long-wear lipstick that adapts to your pH to create your most flattering shade of pink.
â­ Enriched with aloe and vitamin E to keep lips soft, hydrated, and deliciously kissable.
â­ Ultra-hydrating and moisturizing, provides continuous hydration for up to 12 hours.
â­ Smudgeproof, fadeproof, and kissproof, guaranteed.
â­ Can be worn alone, below, or over any lip color.
â­ Cruelty-free product.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Moodmatcher Luxe Twist Stick - Pink**
â­ Apply the Twist Stick evenly from the center of your lips to the outer edges.
â­ Let the color develop for a few minutes to lock in the staying power.
â­ TIP: The color develops gradually, so 1-2 even layers is all you need. For a bolder lip, repeat the application.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Moodmatcher Luxe Twist Stick - Pink**
â­ Aloe Vera: Ultra-moisturizing properties that keep your lips soft and hydrated all day long.
â­ Vitamin E: Antioxidant that soothes, protects, and rejuvenates chapped lips.

title_en: Moodmatcher Luxe-Ras-- Red
title_ar: Ù…ÙˆÙˆØ¯ Ù…Ø§ØªØ´Ø± Ù„ÙˆÙƒØ³ ØªÙˆÙŠØ³Øª Ø³ØªÙŠÙƒ - Ø£Ø­Ù…Ø±
description_en:
Discover the natural beauty of your lips with **Moodmatcher Luxe-Ras-- Red**. This makeup innovation gives you a fully customized lip color, reacting with your body chemistry and skin tone to create a unique shade that is yours and yours alone. The slender, tapered tip provides precise control to define your lips and highlight their curves perfectly in seconds.

**Moodmatcher** stays put on your lips for up to 12 hours with no touch-ups needed. Enjoy eating, drinking, smooching, and smiling with confidence, as its formula is resistant to smudging, feathering, bleeding, or fading. Enriched with Aloe Vera and Vitamin E, it provides supreme hydration that lasts all day, keeping your lips soft, moisturized, and kissably smooth.

**Features:**
â­ 12-hour long-wear lipstick that adapts to your pH to create your most flattering shade of pink.
â­ Enriched with aloe and vitamin E to keep lips soft, hydrated, and deliciously kissable.
â­ Ultra-hydrating and moisturizing, provides continuous hydration for up to 12 hours.
â­ Smudgeproof, fadeproof, and kissproof, guaranteed.
â­ Can be worn alone, below, or over a lip color.
â­ Cruelty-free product.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Moodmatcher Luxe-Ras-- Red**
â­ Apply the Twist Stick evenly from the center of your lips to the outer edges.
â­ Let the color develop for a few minutes to lock in the staying power.
â­ TIP: The color develops gradually, so 1-2 even layers are all you need. For a bolder lip, repeat the application.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Moodmatcher Luxe-Ras-- Red**
â­ Aloe Vera: Ultra-moisturizing properties that keep your lips soft and hydrated all day long.
â­ Vitamin E: An antioxidant that soothes, protects, and rejuvenates chapped lips.

#Moodmatcher #Lipstick #SaudiMakeup #LipTint #LipHydration #Beauty #LipCare #MoisturizedLips #DailyMakeup #SaudiFashion

The **Moodmatcher Luxe-Shell- Yellow** features a slender, tapered tip for precise definition, making it easy to highlight the sensual curve of your lips for a perfect pout in seconds. Its unique formulation stays put for up to 12 hours with no touch-ups required, allowing you to eat, drink, smooch, and smile without smudging, feathering, bleeding, or fading. Enriched with Aloe Vera and Vitamin E, this lipstick delivers supreme hydration that lasts all day.

â­ Adapts to your pH to create your most flattering shade of pink.
â­ Enriched with aloe and vitamin E to keep lips soft, hydrated, and deliciously kissable.
â­ Ultra-hydrating and moisturizing, provides continuous hydration for up to 12 hours.
â­ Smudgeproof, fadeproof, and kissproof, guaranteed.
â­ Can be worn alone, below, or over a lip color.
â­ This product is cruelty-free.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Moodmatcher Luxe-Shell- Yellow**:
â­ Apply Twist Stick evenly from the center of your lips to the outer edges.
â­ Let the color develop for a few minutes to lock in the staying power.
â­ TIP: The color develops gradually, so 1-2 even layers are all you need. For a bolder lip, repeat the application.

description_en:
Discover the secret to perfect lips with the **Moodmatcher Lux Twist Stick** - Purple, a revolutionary lipstick that adapts to your unique body chemistry to give you an unparalleled custom shade.

With its innovative formula enriched with Aloe Vera and Vitamin E, the **Moodmatcher Lux Twist Stick** provides supreme hydration that lasts up to 12 hours without the need for touch-ups. Enjoy your food, drinks, hugs, and smiles with confidence, as your lip color will remain vibrant, smudge-proof, and fade-proof.

The slender, tapered tip allows for precise definition of your lip curves, making it easy for you to achieve full, attractive lips in seconds. Whether worn alone, as a base, or over lipstick, this cruelty-free product ensures a captivating and alluring look all day long.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Moodmatcher Lux Twist Stick**:
â­ Apply the stick evenly to your lips from the center to the outer edges.
â­ Allow the color to develop for a few minutes to lock in the staying power.
â­ For a bolder color, repeat the application as needed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Moodmatcher Lux Twist Stick**:
â­ Aloe Vera: For ultra-moisturizing properties that keep lips soft.
â­ Vitamin E: An antioxidant to protect and rejuvenate lips.

shortdescription_en: Unique lip color that adapts to you! 12-hour hydration, smudge & fade proof. Get your perfect pout with Moodmatcher Lux Twist Stick.

title_en: Moodmatcher Luxe-Cadilac - Blue
title_ar: Ù…ÙˆÙˆØ¯ Ù…Ø§ØªØ´Ø± Ù„ÙˆÙƒØ³ ØªÙˆÙŠØ³Øª Ø³ØªÙŠÙƒ - Ø£Ø²Ø±Ù‚
description_en:
**Moodmatcher Luxe-Cadilac - Blue** is the original color-changing lip color that makes lip color easy, eliminating the guesswork. Our unique formulation works with your body chemistry and skin tone to create a totally unique, customized, flattering shade that is yours and yours alone. The Twist Stick Lip Color offers customized control as well as personalized lip color. A slender, tapered tip provides more precise definition, making it easy to highlight the sensual curve of your lips for a perfect pout in seconds. **MOODmatcher** stays put for up to 12 hours, with no touch-ups. You can eat, drink, smooch, and smile without smudging, feathering, bleeding, or fading. Enriched with Aloe Vera and Vitamin E, **MOODmatcher** delivers supreme hydration that will last all day.

**Features:**
â­ 12-hour long-wear lipstick that adapts to your pH to create your most flattering shade of pink.
â­ Enriched with aloe and vitamin E to keep lips soft, hydrated, and deliciously kissable.
â­ Ultra-hydrating and moisturizing, provides continuous hydration for up to 12 hours.
â­ Smudgeproof, fadeproof, and kissproof, guaranteed.
â­ Can be worn alone, below, or over a lip color.
â­ This product is cruelty-free.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Moodmatcher Luxe-Cadilac - Blue**:
â­ Apply the Twist Stick evenly from the center of your lips to the outer edges.
â­ Let the color develop for a few minutes to lock in the staying power.
â­ TIP: The color develops gradually, so 1-2 even layers is all you need. For a bolder lip, repeat the application.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Moodmatcher Luxe-Cadilac - Blue**:
â­ Aloe Vera: Ultra-moisturizing properties that keep your lips soft and hydrated all day long.
â­ Vitamin E: An antioxidant that soothes, protects, and rejuvenates chapped lips.

description_en:
Discover your unique lip shade with the **Moodmatcher Luxe Twist Stick Dark - Blue**. This innovative lipstick combines ease of use with personalization, as its unique formulation interacts with your body chemistry and skin tone to create a custom, perfect shade of pink that is uniquely yours. Its slender, tapered tip offers precise definition for captivating lips, while its ultra-hydrating formula, enriched with Aloe Vera and Vitamin E, ensures your lips stay soft and moisturized for up to 12 hours without needing touch-ups. It's smudge-proof, fadeproof, and kiss-proof, making it the ideal choice for a long-lasting look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Moodmatcher Luxe Twist Stick Dark - Blue**:
â­ Apply the Twist Stick evenly from the center of your lips to the outer edges.
â­ Let the color develop for a few minutes to lock in its staying power.
â­ For a bolder color, repeat the application.
â­ Can be worn alone, as a base before lipstick, or over it.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Moodmatcher Luxe Twist Stick Dark - Blue**:
â­ Aloe Vera: With its ultra-moisturizing properties that keep your lips soft and hydrated all day long.
â­ Vitamin E: An antioxidant that soothes, protects, and rejuvenates chapped lips.

description_en:
Achieve fuller, more defined lips with the **Moodmatcher Young Lips-Plumper**. 

This innovative formula instantly helps you add volume and enhances your lips' appearance all day long. Enriched with Vitamin E and Aloe Vera, the **Moodmatcher Young Lips-Plumper** provides a comfortably locked-in moisture, leaving your lips softer and fuller.

Product Features:
â­ Contains Maxi Lip TM, a plumping peptide complex that easily adds volume and shine to your lips.
â­ Colorless and transparent, it can be used alone or over your lip makeup.
â­ Aloe Vera and Vitamin E extracts ensure a gentle treatment for your lips.
â­ High-quality product from cosmetic giant Fran Wilson.
â­ Moisturizes and nourishes lips with simple steps.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Moodmatcher Young Lips-Plumper**:
â­ Begin by exfoliating your lips to remove dryness and dead skin cells.
â­ Apply a thin layer of primer to moisturize your lips and lighten pigments for a smooth base.
â­ Apply the **Moodmatcher Young Lips-Plumper** within the lip lines for a fuller appearance.
â­ You may feel a slight tingling sensation, which is normal. Wait for it to subside.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Moodmatcher Young Lips-Plumper**:
â­ Maxi Lip TM (Plumping Peptide Complex)
â­ Vitamin E
â­ Aloe Vera
â­ Moisturizing and nourishing base

title_ar: Ù…ÙŠØ¨ÙŠÙ„ÙŠÙ† Ø³Ù† ÙƒÙŠØ³Ø± Ø£Ø­Ù…Ø± Ø®Ø¯ÙˆØ¯ Ø³Ø§Ø¦Ù„ - 05 Ø¨Ù„Ø§Ø²ÙŠÙ†Ø¬ - Ù„ÙˆÙ† Ù…ØªÙˆÙ‡Ø¬
description_en:
Achieve a sun-kissed glow with the **Maybelline Sun Kisser** Liquid Blush in 05 Blazing Nu In. Infused with Vitamin E and melt-to-skin pigments, this liquid blush blends effortlessly onto the skin for buildable, glowing colour that catches the light at every angle. The **Maybelline Sun Kisser** liquid blush grants a radiant, healthy-looking flush that lasts.

â­ Delivers a natural, sun-kissed radiance
â­ Buildable colour for added depth
â­ Lightweight and comfortable liquid formula
â­ Long-lasting wear with a smooth finish
â­ Easy to blend and apply
â­ Vegan and cruelty-free

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Sun Kisser**
â­ Use the plush doe-foot applicator to dot the product onto the apples of your cheeks.
â­ Gently blend with fingertips or a brush for a natural effect.
â­ Layer for more intensity or a sculpted look.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Sun Kisser**
â­ Aqua / Water, Dimethicone, Isododecane, Alcohol Denat., Butylene Glycol, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Peg-10 Dimethicone, Perlite, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Nylon-12, Isopropyl Lauroyl Sarcosinate, Diisopropyl Sebacate, Dipentaerythrityl Tetrahydroxystearate/Tetraisostearate, Tocopherol, Glycerin.
â­ Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Silica, Tin Oxide, Phenoxyethanol, Potassium Sorbate, and [+/- May Contain Mica, Ci 77891 / Titanium Dioxide, Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499 / Iron Oxides, Ci 15850 / Red 7].

description_en:
Introducing lash sensational sky-high mascara for sky-high lash impact from every angle! Achieve the look of lashes that are lifted, lengthened, and full, just like a lash lift.

â­ Achieve lifted, lengthened, and full lashes for a dramatic lash lift effect.
â­ Delivers intense volume and exceptional length.
â­ Effortlessly separates lashes for a flawless finish.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Sky High Lash Sensational Mascara**: 
Step 1: Hold the brush to the base of your lashes and sweep from root to tip.
Step 2: Wiggle the brush through lashes to separate and build volume.
Step 3: Apply a second coat for even more length and dramatic impact.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Sky High Lash Sensational Mascara**: 
â­ Aqua / water,propylene glycol, styrene/acrylates/ammonium methacrylate copolymer, polyurethane-35, cera alba / beeswax, synthetic fluorphlogopite, glyceryl stearate, cetyl alcohol, peg-200 glyceryl stearate, ethylenediamine/stearyl dimer dilinoleate copolymer, copernicia cerifera cera / carnauba wax, stearic acid, palmitic acid,ethylene/va copolymer, alcohol denat, paraffin, aminomethyl propanediol, phenoxyethanol, caprylyl glycol, glycerin, hydroxyethylcellulose, butylene glycol, rayon, xanthan gum, caprylic/capric triglyceride, sodium laureth sulfate, disodium edta, myristic acid, tetrasodium edta, pentaerythrityl tetra-di-t-butyl hydroxyhydrocinnamate, potassium sorbate, silica,soluble collagen,bambusa vulgaris extract, trisodium edta[+/- may contain / peut contenir]ci 77491, ci 77492, ci 77499 / iron oxides, ci 77007 / ultramarines,mica,ci 77891 / titanium dioxide, ci 75470 / carmine, ci 77288 / chromium oxide greens, ci 77742 / manganese violet, ci 77510 / ferric ferrocyanide].

description_en:
Discover the ultimate shine with **Maybelline Super Stay Vinyl Ink** liquid lipstick, offering up to 16 hours of budge-proof vinyl color. Its innovative Color Lock vegan* formula defies smudging and transfer, delivering instant shine and long-lasting wear. Available in 7 vibrant vinyl shades, it contains no animal-derived ingredients or by-products.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Super Stay Vinyl Ink**:
â­ For the perfect vinyl lip, shake the bottle for at least 5 seconds before applying.
â­ Apply to lips using the precise flocked tip applicator.
â­ Let it dry thoroughly and go for a flawless finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Super Stay Vinyl Ink**:
â­ Color Lock vegan formula prevents smudging and transfer.
â­ Provides an instant shine finish.
â­ Free from animal-derived ingredients or by-products.

description_en:
Unleash a firework of lashes with the **Maybelline Lash Sensational Firework Mascara**, designed to deliver 360Â° lash-by-lash impact for a full, flared-out look. Enriched with Pro-Vitamin B5, this mascara strengthens lashes from root to tip. Its custom brush features flex bristles in a unique spiral firework pattern to lift and volumize lashes for an explosive effect.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Lash Sensational Firework Mascara**
â­ Hold the flexible brush gently against lashes.
â­ Sweep from root to tip repeatedly until desired volume and length are achieved.
â­ Do not let mascara dry between coats.
â­ Easily remove mascara with Micellar Cleansing Water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Lash Sensational Firework Mascara**
â­ Enriched with Pro-Vitamin B5 for lash strengthening.
â­ Allergy-tested and suitable for contact lens wearers.
â­ Formulated to be gentle on eyes.

#MaybellineMascara #LongLashes #VoluminousLashes #MaybellineKSA #EyeMakeup #SaudiBeauty #FireworkLashes #LashSensational #BeautySaudi #RiyadhFashion

description_en:
Experience the ultimate with **Maybelline New York Super Stay Vinyl Ink Lipstick, 10 LIPPY**, for a no-budge vinyl color that lasts up to 16 hours. This long-wear lipstick features a vegan* Color Lock formula that defies smudging and transfer, providing an instant shine finish. Available in 7 captivating vinyl shades and free from any animal-derived ingredients or by-products.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline New York Super Stay Vinyl Ink Lipstick, 10 LIPPY**:
â­ First, shake the product for at least 5 seconds for the perfect vinyl lip.
â­ Apply to your lips using the precise flocked tip applicator.
â­ Let it dry thoroughly, and you're ready to go!

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline New York Super Stay Vinyl Ink Lipstick, 10 LIPPY**:
â­ Vegan Color Lock Formula.
â­ No animal-derived ingredients or by-products.

description_en:
Achieve flawless, natural coverage with **Maybelline Fit Me Concealer**. This oil-free concealer is designed to match all skin tones, delivering a more even complexion and concealing redness, flaws, and blemishes for a natural, radiant finish.

**Maybelline Fit Me Concealer** is your go-to for a seamless look, effortlessly blending to cover imperfections and enhance your natural beauty. Its lightweight, buildable formula ensures comfort and a smooth application.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Fit Me Concealer**:
â­ Apply a small amount of concealer under the eyes.
â­ Blend gently using fingertips, a brush, or a sponge.
â­ Achieve your perfect final look.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Fit Me Concealer**:
â­ Oil-free formula.
â­ Matches all skin tones.

#Maybelline #Concealer #Makeup #NaturalCoverage #FlawlessSkin #OilFree #MaybellineNewYork #SaudiMakeup #Beauty #Beige

description_en:
Achieve flawless, natural coverage with **Maybelline Fit Me Concealer 30 Cafe - Brown**. This lightweight, oil-free concealer is designed to match all skin tones, seamlessly concealing redness, blemishes, and imperfections for a more even complexion. Enjoy a radiant, natural-looking finish that enhances your skin's true beauty.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Fit Me Concealer 30 Cafe - Brown**:
â­ Apply a small amount of concealer under the eyes or on areas of imperfection.
â­ Blend the concealer using fingertips, a sponge, or a brush.
â­ Enjoy a natural and perfected final look.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Fit Me Concealer 30 Cafe - Brown**:
â­ Oil-free formula.
â­ Provides natural coverage.
â­ Conceals redness, flaws, and blemishes.
â­ Matches all skin tones.
â­ Blendable liquid form.

description_en:
Discover the secret to perfect skin with **Maybelline Baby Skin** Instant Pore Eraser Primer, your go-to for a baby-smooth, matte finish that lasts all day. This lightweight makeup primer blurs imperfections, controls oil, and moisturizes, leaving your skin looking flawless and feeling refreshed.

â­ Leaves skin with a smooth, matte finish.
â­ Moisturizes skin throughout the day.
â­ Minimizes the appearance of pores and imperfections.
â­ Controls excess oil and prevents shine.
â­ Lightweight formula that doesn't clog pores.
â­ Preps skin for makeup application or can be worn alone for a natural glow.
â­ Non-comedogenic and fragrance-free.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Baby Skin**
â­ Step 1: Apply a thin layer to clean skin.
â­ Step 2: Can be worn with your favorite moisturizer or on its own for a radiant effect.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Baby Skin**
â­ Lightweight formula.
â­ Oil-free.
â­ Non-comedogenic.
â­ Fragrance-free.

title_ar: Ù…ÙŠØ¨ÙŠÙ„ÙŠÙ† Ø³ÙˆØ¨Ø± Ø³ØªØ§ÙŠ ØªÙŠØ¯ÙŠ ØªÙ†Øª - Ù„ÙˆÙ† Ø´ÙØ§Ù‡ Ù†Ø§Ø¹Ù… ÙˆØ«Ø§Ø¨Øª
description_en:
Get ready for teddy-soft lips with **Maybelline Super Stay Teddy Tint**! This innovative lip tint delivers up to 12 hours of long-lasting blurred matte lip color, with no transfer or smudging. Featuring Teddy Fluff technology, you'll experience a light, comfortable feel and rich color that lasts all day. You can apply it in multiple ways for different looks, from a natural blurred effect to bold, or even on your cheeks.

â­ Blurred matte lip color with a teddy-soft finish.
â­ Up to 12-hour wear, transfer-resistant, smudge-proof, and waterproof.
â­ Teddy Fluff technology for a light and comfortable feel on lips.
â­ Creamy texture that glides on smoothly for lightweight wear.
â­ 4 ways to wear: blurred, bold, gradient, or on cheeks.
â­ 5 buildable and blendable shades to create diverse looks.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Super Stay Teddy Tint**
â­ Step 1: Apply the tint in the center of your upper lip and follow the contours of your mouth.
â­ Step 2: Glide the matte liquid lipstick across the entire bottom lip, and as many layers as intended.
â­ Step 3: Allow product to dry fully for 10 to 15 minutes for best effect.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Super Stay Teddy Tint**
â­ Tinted pigments for 12-hour blurred matte color.
â­ Color-hugging flexi film that fits and moves with lips for lasting wear.
â­ Transfer-resistant, smudge-proof, and waterproof formula.

#MaybellineSuperStay #MaybellineKSA #LipTint #MatteLips #LongwearLipstick #MakeupSaudi #SaudiBeauty #RiyadhMakeup #JeddahBeauty #SaudiShopping

description_en:
Achieve salon-lifted lashes from a tube with **Maybelline The Falsies Lash Lift Mascara**. Awarded Best Lengthening Mascara in the 2020 Allure Best of Beauty Awards, this mascara delivers an instant lash lift effect with dramatic length and volume.

â­ Instant lash lift effect.
â­ Dramatic volume and long, lifted lashes for a false lash look.
â­ The spoon-shaped lifting brush and fiber-infused formula grabs lashes at the root to lift, build, and lengthen.
â­ No clumps, no flakes, no burdens â€“ just all-day volume and longer-looking lashes.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline The Falsies Lash Lift Mascara**:
â­ For best results, hold brush against lashes and sweep from root to tip.
â­ Repeat until the desired look is achieved.
â­ Do not let dry between coats.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline The Falsies Lash Lift Mascara**:
â­ Advanced fiber-infused formula for enhanced lift and volume.
â­ Rich, deep black pigments for intense color payoff.

#Maybelline #Mascara #EyeMakeup #LongLashes #VoluminousLashes #LashLift #SaudiMakeup #Beauty #TheFalsiesLashLift #GlamEyes

title_ar: Ø£Ø­Ù…Ø± Ø´ÙØ§Ù‡ Ø³Ø§Ø¦Ù„ Ù…ÙŠØ¨ÙŠÙ„ÙŠÙ† Ø³ÙˆØ¨Ø± Ø³ØªØ§ÙŠ Ù…Ø§Øª Ø¥Ù†Ùƒ - 65 Ø³ÙŠØ¯ÙƒØªØ±Ø³
description_en:
Define your lips with the bold and elegant shade 65 Sedcutress from the **Maybelline Super Stay Matte Ink** Liquid Lipstick. This product delivers an exceptional matte finish that lasts up to 16 hours, keeping up with your day without the need for reapplication. Its unique waterproof formula ensures a consistent color, no matter what you eat, drink, or do. Enjoy an easy and precise application experience thanks to the innovative applicator that precisely follows your lip contours. **Maybelline Super Stay Matte Ink** is available in a wide range of rich colors to suit all tastes and occasions, making it your perfect choice to complete your look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Super Stay Matte Ink**:
â­ Choose the perfect shade that reflects your personality from our diverse collection.
â­ Use the applicator to precisely outline your cupid's bow on your upper lip.
â­ Apply the color evenly to the rest of the upper lip.
â­ For the lower lip, use the precision tip of the applicator to accurately define the lip edges.
â­ Let the color dry for a few minutes for a perfect matte finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Super Stay Matte Ink**:
â­ A liquid formula rich in high-concentration pigments.
â­ Color-fixing ingredients for long-lasting wear.
â­ Waterproof formula that does not smudge.
â­ Innovative applicator for precise distribution.

#Maybelline #MatteLipstick #Lipstick #Makeup #SaudiArabia #Riyadh #Jeddah #LongLastingMakeup #StayPutLips #SuperStayMatteInk

description_en:
Achieve an unparalleled look with **Maybelline SuperStay Vinyl Ink** liquid lipstick in the Nu Int 120 shade. This richly pigmented formula lasts up to 16 hours with a captivating vinyl shine finish, giving you a stunning, unshakeable appearance. Its innovative smudge-proof and transfer-resistant formula ensures vibrant, long-lasting color all day.

â­ No animal-derived ingredients or by-products.
â­ Bold, shiny vinyl color.
â­ Up to 16-hour wear.
â­ Color Lock formula defies smudging and transfer.
â­ Vegan formula.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline SuperStay Vinyl Ink**
â­ For the perfect vinyl lip, shake the tube for at least 5 seconds before applying.
â­ Apply the color to your lips using the precise applicator.
â­ Let the lipstick dry completely and enjoy the look.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline SuperStay Vinyl Ink**
â­ Vegan formula, free from animal-derived ingredients.

description_en:
The **Maybelline Super Stay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick 70 Amazonian** delivers a long-lasting, super-pigmented matte finish, perfect for every occasion. Enjoy gorgeous lip color that stays put for up to 16 hours, is waterproof, and comfortable to wear. It comes with a unique arrow applicator for precise application.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Super Stay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick 70 Amazonian**
1. Choose your perfect shade.
2. Use the precise applicator to trace your cupid's bow.
3. Apply evenly to the upper lip.
4. Use the tip of the applicator for sharp, controlled application along the lower lip contours.
5. Allow the lipstick to dry to a perfect matte finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Super Stay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick 70 Amazonian**
â­ Up to 16-hour matte finish
â­ Waterproof
â­ Available in a range of rich, saturated shades
â­ Unique arrow applicator for easy and precise application
â­ Comfortable formula for your lips

#MaybellineKSA #MatteLipstick #LiquidLipstick #SuperStayMatteInk #RiyadhMakeup #LongLastingLipstick #MaybellineMakeup #StayPutLipstick #WomensMakeup #SaudiBeauty

description_en:
Teddy. Set. Go. With NEW **Super Stay Teddy Tint Plushwear & Transferproof**, Maybelline New Yorkâ€™s teddy-soft lip tint that stays. **Super Stay Teddy Tint Plushwear & Transferproof** delivers up to 12 hours of long-lasting blurred matte lip color with a comfortable, lightweight feel. It's transfer-resistant, smudge-proof, and waterproof for a flawless look.

Create multiple looks with the unique Teddy Fluff technology, tinting your lips in teddy-soft blurred matte with a flexible film that moves with your lips. It can be worn in various ways: blurred, bold, gradient, or even on the cheeks.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Super Stay Teddy Tint Plushwear & Transferproof**:
â­ Step 1: Apply the lip tint in the center of your upper lip and follow the contours of your mouth.
â­ Step 2: Glide the matte liquid lipstick across the entire bottom lip, and as many layers as intended.
â­ Step 3: Allow product to dry fully for 10 to 15 minutes for best effect.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Super Stay Teddy Tint Plushwear & Transferproof**:
â­ Tinted pigments for a 12-hour flush of blurred matte color.
â­ Teddy Fluff Technology: Marshmallow bouncy elastomer.
â­ Color hugging flexi film that fits and moves with lips.
â­ Creamy-soft texture that glides smoothly onto lips.
â­ 5 buildable and blendable shades.

#MaybellineNY #SuperStay #LipTint #LipMakeup #MatteLips #LongLastingMakeup #SaudiBeauty #MaybellineLipstick #ProMakeup #Lip Stain

description_en:
Introducing Maybelline Lash Sensational Sky High Mascara Cosmic Black, your new secret weapon for sky-high lash impact! Achieve an unparalleled combination of volume and length that extends from root to tip. The exclusive Flex Tower brush reaches every lash for a flawless, clump-free application, while the unique formula infused with bamboo extract and fibers nourishes your lashes.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Lash Sensational Sky High Mascara Cosmic Black**:
â­ Step 1: Hold the flexible brush against your lashes and sweep from root to tip for maximum lift and volume.
â­ Step 2: Wiggle the brush back and forth at the lash base to build volume.
â­ Step 3: Apply additional coats to achieve desired length and intensity, ensuring separation between lashes.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Lash Sensational Sky High Mascara Cosmic Black**:
â­ Enriched with Bamboo extract and fibers for lash strengthening and lengthening.
â­ Intense black pigment for a dramatic, deep color payoff.
â­ Long-lasting formula that resists flaking and smudging.

#Maybelline #SkyHighMascara #LashSensational #CosmicBlack #Mascara #FalseLashes #BeautySaudi #MakeupSaudi #SaudiArabiaBeauty #EyeMakeup

Additionally, it is formulated with SPF 28 to protect your skin from harmful sun rays.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Fit Me Matte + Poreless Powder**:

â­ Oil-control powder foundation.

â­ 12-hour wear formula.
â­ Provides a natural, matte finish.

description_en:
Achieve ultimate volume and intense black lashes with **Maybelline Colossal** Mascara.

This incredible mascara delivers 100% black lashes and big, bold volume for an irresistible look. Its collagen-infused formula and iconic Mega Brush provide 15x more volume in just two coats, offering an exceptional eye makeup experience.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Colossal** Mascara:

â­ Step 2: Ensure you don't let the mascara dry in between coats.
â­ Step 3: Apply to the base of upper lashes, sweeping upwards to separate lashes and remove any clumps.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Colossal** Mascara:
â­ Collagen-infused formula for enhanced volume.
â­ 100% black formula.
â­ Iconic Mega Brush for effortless application.

title_ar: ÙƒÙˆÙ†Ø³ÙŠÙ„Ø± Ù…ÙŠØ¨Ù„ÙŠÙ† Ø§Ù†Ø³ØªÙ†Øª Ø§ÙŠØ¬ Ø±ÙŠÙˆØ§ÙŠÙ†Ø¯ Ù„Ø§ÙŠØª 01 - ØªØºØ·ÙŠØ© ÙˆØªØ±Ø·ÙŠØ¨ ÙØ§Ø¦Ù‚
description_en:
Discover the secret to instant radiance with **Maybelline Instant Age Rewind Concealer Light 01**. This multi-use concealer is your ultimate solution that hydrates, conceals, contours, and corrects in one go. Enjoy up to 12 hours of moisturizing wear for crease-resistant coverage, thanks to its innovative sponge applicator. **Maybelline Instant Age Rewind Concealer Light 01** is eco-friendly, vegan, non-comedogenic, and formulated without mineral oil, parabens, or talc, ensuring the best care for your skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Instant Age Rewind Concealer Light 01**:
â­ Step 1: Twist the sponge applicator in the direction of the arrows until the concealer is visible on the sponge.
â­ Step 2: Apply concealer directly to the under-eye area, blending in an outward motion.
â­ Step 3: For extremely dark circles, apply the Neutralizer shade under the concealer shade.
â­ Step 4: For a luminous touch, apply the Brightener shade to the inner corner of the eyes, brow bones, and bridge of the nose.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Instant Age Rewind Concealer Light 01**:
â­ Long-lasting moisturizing formula.
â­ SPF protection (specific to product).
â­ Plant-based extracts for skin soothing.
â­ Free from mineral oil, parabens, and talc.
â­ Precision sponge tip for easy application.

#Maybelline #Concealer #Makeup #Beauty #Skincare #FullCoverage #Hydration #EyeMakeup #SaudiArabia #Jeddah

Discover the power of intense color with **Maybelline New York Superstay Matte Ink 340 EXHI**. This revolutionary formula delivers a flawless matte finish that lasts for an incredible 16 hours. Its precise arrow applicator ensures effortless application for a second-skin feel and statement-making, inked lips that truly last.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline New York Superstay Matte Ink 340 EXHI**:
â­ Apply to the center of your upper lip.
â­ Follow the contours of your mouth for precision.
â­ Glide across the entire bottom lip for full coverage.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline New York Superstay Matte Ink 340 EXHI**:
â­ Rich, concentrated ink color.
â­ Ultra-chic matte finish.
â­ Precise arrow applicator.

Achieve flawless, matte skin with **Maybelline Fit Me Matte + Poreless Powder**, your ultimate 12-hour oil-controlling powder foundation. It seamlessly blends into your skin for an all-day mattifying look and feel, perfect for hot weather. With SPF 28.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Fit Me Matte + Poreless Powder**:
â­ Apply the powder to your face using the provided sponge or a powder brush.
â­ Blend in a downward motion to avoid making fine hairs more visible.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Fit Me Matte + Poreless Powder**:
â­ Oil-controlling powder foundation.
â­ SPF 28 sun protection.
â­ Mattifying formula.
â­ For a natural, poreless look.

description_en:
Discover **Maybelline Lifter Plump** Lip Gloss, your go-to for intensely plumped lips with a sensual heated sensation from Maybelline New York. This game-changing gloss delivers an immediate plumping effect and a glossy shine. The XL wand transforms lips in one swipe, defining and enhancing your pout for a fuller, more irresistible look. Infused with Maxi-Lipâ„¢ and chili pepper, **Maybelline Lifter Plump** is designed to give you that sought-after plush lip.

â­ Delivers an intense heated sensation for instant lip plumping.
â­ Features an XL wand for one-swipe lip definition and enhancement.
â­ Formulated with Maxi-Lipâ„¢ and chili pepper for a fuller-looking pout.
â­ Provides a high-shine, glossy finish for ultimate lip appeal.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Lifter Plump**:
â­ Step 1: Apply the lip gloss with the XL Wandâ„¢ applicator in the center of your upper lip and follow the contours of your mouth.
â­ Step 2: Glide the lip gloss across the entire bottom lip for a perfectly plumped finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Lifter Plump**:
â­ Contains chili pepper for a plumping effect.
â­ Formulated with Maxi-Lipâ„¢ to enhance lip fullness.

Caution & Warnings: This product may cause a temporary tingling sensation, which is normal. Discontinue use if you experience excessive discomfort. Do not touch eyes or use on chapped, damaged, or sensitive lips. Flammable until dry.

#Maybelline #LipGloss #PlumpLips #LipMakeup #LipCare #SaudiMakeup #NaturalBeauty #GlossyLips #Jeddah #Riyadh

Discover flawless, natural coverage with **Fit Me** Concealer from Maybelline New York. This oil-free concealer is designed to perfectly match your skin tone, delivering a more even complexion. It effectively conceals redness, flaws, and blemishes, providing a natural look that complements all skin tones. Achieve a perfected complexion with **Fit Me** Concealer.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Fit Me**:
â­ Apply the concealer under your eyes to brighten and conceal.
â­ Blend the concealer gently with your fingertips or a brush for a seamless finish.
â­ Achieve your final look with a radiant, blemish-free complexion.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Fit Me**:
â­ Flawless, natural coverage.
â­ Oil-free formula.
â­ Conceals redness & flaws.
â­ Matches all skin tones.
â­ For a perfected complexion.

description_en:
Discover the secret to flawless skin with **Maybelline Instant Age Rewind Concealer Sand 07**, the do-it-all concealer that hydrates, conceals, contours, and corrects in a single click.

â­ Up to 12 hours of moisturizing wear.
â­ Crease-resistant coverage with a built-in sponge tip applicator for effortless application.
â­ Vegan and non-comedogenic formula.
â­ Formulated without mineral oil, parabens, or talc.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Instant Age Rewind Concealer**:
â­ Step 1: Twist the sponge applicator in the direction of the arrows until the concealer is visible on the sponge.
â­ Step 2: Apply concealer directly to the under-eye area, blending in an outward motion.
â­ Step 3: For extremely dark circles, apply the Neutralizer shade under the concealer shade.
â­ Step 4: For a luminous touch, apply the Brightener shade to the inner corner of the eyes, brow bones, and bridge of the nose.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Instant Age Rewind Concealer**:
â­ Contains hydrating ingredients for superior care.
â­ Gentle formula suitable for all skin types.
â­ Effectively covers imperfections.

#Maybelline #Concealer #InstantAgeRewind #FaceMakeup #SaudiMakeup #FullCoverage #Hydrating #Beauty #Skincare #ProfessionalMakeup

description_en:
**Maybelline Liquid Lipstick Vinyl Ink Nu Int 100**: Experience no-budge vinyl color that lasts for up to 16 hours. This revolutionary formula locks in color, delivers instant shine, and offers superior resistance to smudging and transfer.

â­ No-budge vinyl color
â­ Up to 16-hour wear
â­ Color Lock formula defies smudging and transfer
â­ 100% vegan formula (no animal-derived ingredients or by-products)
â­ Instant shine finish

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Liquid Lipstick Vinyl Ink Nu Int 100**:
â­ For the perfect vinyl lip, shake up Vinyl Ink for at least 5 seconds before applying.
â­ Apply to lips using its precise flocked tip applicator.
â­ Let it dry fully and go!

description_en:
Discover next-level lashes with **Maybelline Lash Sensational Sky High Mascara Water Proof**. This waterproof mascara delivers sky-high lash impact, incredible length, and full volume from every angle for a captivating, long-lasting look.

âœ¨ **Product Features:**
â­ Delivers sky-high impact, limitless length, and full volume.
â­ Features an exclusive Flex Tower mascara brush that reaches every lash.
â­ Formula is infused with Bamboo extract and fibers.
â­ Waterproof formula for long-lasting wear.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Lash Sensational Sky High Mascara Water Proof**:
â­ Step 1: Hold the flexible brush against lashes and extend from root to tip.
â­ Step 2: Continue applying upwards until desired volume and length is achieved.
â­ Step 3: For a final touch, apply to the base of upper lashes and sweep upwards to separate and remove any clumps.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Lash Sensational Sky High Mascara Water Proof**:
â­ Aqua / Water, Propylene Glycol, Styrene/Acrylates/Ammonium Methacrylate Copolymer, Polyurethane-35, Cera Alba / Beeswax, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Glyceryl Stearate, Cetyl Alcohol, PEG-200 Glyceryl Stearate, Ethylenediamine/Stearyl Dimer Dilinoleate Copolymer, Copernicia Cerifera Cera / Carnauba Wax, Stearic Acid, Palmitic Acid, Ethylene/VA Copolymer, Alcohol Denat., Paraffin, Aminomethyl Propanediol, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Glycerin, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Butylene Glycol, Rayon, Xanthan Gum, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Disodium EDTA, Myristic Acid, Tetrasodium EDTA, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Potassium Sorbate, Silica, Soluble Collagen, Bambusa Vulgaris Extract, Trisodium EDTA.
â­ [+/- May Contain / Peut Contenir]: CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499 / Iron Oxides, CI 77007 / Ultramarines, Mica, CI 77891 / Titanium Dioxide, CI 75470 / Carmine, CI 77288 / Chromium Oxide Greens, CI 77742 / Manganese Violet, CI 77510 / Ferric Ferrocyanide.

#Maybelline #Mascara #Lashes #Eyeshadow #Makeup #VoluminousLashes #LongLashes #WaterproofMascara #SkyHighLashes #SaudiBeauty

description_en:
Experience the allure of long-lasting, high-shine vinyl color with **Maybelline New York Super Stay Vinyl Ink Lipstick**. Its unique vegan Color Lock formula defies smudging and transfer, delivering an instant shine finish that wears for up to 16 hours, ensuring a flawless look all day long.

â­ High-shine vinyl color that lasts up to 16 hours.
â­ Vegan Color Lock formula resists smudging and transfer.
â­ Instant shine finish for captivating lips.
â­ Available in 7 stunning vinyl shades.
â­ Formulated without animal-derived ingredients or by-products.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline New York Super Stay Vinyl Ink Lipstick**:
â­ First, shake up the lipstick for at least 5 seconds for the perfect vinyl lip.
â­ Next, apply to lips using the precise flocked tip applicator.
â­ Lastly, let it dry thoroughly and go!

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline New York Super Stay Vinyl Ink Lipstick**:
â­ Certified vegan formula.
â­ Color Lock technology.
â­ Moisturizing and nourishing ingredients for lips.

description_en:
Introducing Maybelline New York's new next-level lip gloss, **Maybelline Lifter Gloss with Hyaluronic Acid** in shade 04 SILK, for hydrated, fuller-looking lips with high shine. This breakthrough formula with Hyaluronic Acid visibly smoothes lip surface and enhances lip contour, delivering an easy, one-swipe application. Available in a range of modern shades.

â­ Hydrated, and natural fuller-looking lips.
â­ Breakthrough formula with Hyaluronic Acid, smoothes and hydrates lips.
â­ XL size wand enhances lip contour in one swipe.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Lifter Gloss with Hyaluronic Acid**:
â­ For best results, apply lip gloss to the center of your upper lip.
â­ Start from the center towards the outer edges, following your lip's contours.
â­ Glide the lip gloss applicator across the entire bottom lip for even coverage.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Lifter Gloss with Hyaluronic Acid**:
â­ Enriched with Hyaluronic Acid for deep hydration and a natural plumping effect.
â­ High-shine formula for a captivating lip look.
â­ Glides on effortlessly for a smooth, luscious finish.

#Maybelline #Gloss #Lips #Makeup #Beauty #SaudiArabia #LipGloss #HyaluronicAcid #FullerLips #MaybellineKSA

description_en:
Teddy. Set. Go. With NEW **Maybelline Super Stay Teddy Tint Plushwear & Transferproof**, Maybelline New Yorkâ€™s teddy-soft lip tint that stays. Super Stay Teddy Tint Plushwear & Transferproof delivers up to 12 hours of long-lasting blurred matte lip color. 97% agree this lip tint leaves behind a beautiful, smooth blurring matte effect. Experience the comfortable, plush light feel of this lip tint that glides on with ease, delivering a flush of matte color that lasts all day, with no transfer. It's transfer-resistant, smudge-proof, and waterproof, thanks to Teddy fluff technology and a marshmallow bouncy elastomer. Create the look you want, with 4 ways to wear: blurred, bold, gradient, or on cheek.

â­ Delivers up to 12 hours of blurred matte lip color.
â­ Transfer-resistant, smudge-proof, and waterproof.
â­ Buildable lip and cheek tint in 5 blendable shades.
â­ Comfortable, teddy-soft plush, lightweight feel.
â­ Teddy fluff technology for all-day wear.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Super Stay Teddy Tint Plushwear & Transferproof**:
â­ Step 1: Apply the lip tint in the center of your upper lip and follow the contours of your mouth.
â­ Step 2: Glide the matte liquid lipstick across the entire bottom lip, and as many layers as intended.
â­ Step 3: Allow product to dry fully for 10 to 15 minutes for best effect.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Super Stay Teddy Tint Plushwear & Transferproof**:
â­ Tinted pigments for 12-hour wear.
â­ Marshmallow bouncy elastomer.
â­ Blendable and buildable formula for versatile looks.
â­ Matte liquid formula.
â­ Ingredients for long-lasting, no-transfer color.

#Maybelline #SuperStay #LipTint #RiyadhMakeup #MatteLips #JeddahMakeup #LipStain #SaudiMakeup #LipColor #CheekTint

description_en:
Discover the allure of lasting color with **Maybelline New York Super Stay Vinyl Ink**. This revolutionary liquid lipstick delivers a high-shine, vinyl finish that stays put for up to 16 hours, ensuring no budge, no transfer.

The unique, vegan Color Lock formula defies smudging and transfer, providing an instant shine and a bold, vibrant look. **Maybelline New York Super Stay Vinyl Ink** is available in 7 stunning vinyl shades to perfectly complement your style.

â­ Up to 16 hours of no-budge vinyl color.
â­ Vegan Color Lock formula resists smudging and transfer.
â­ Instant shine finish.
â­ Available in 7 captivating vinyl shades.
â­ Formulated without animal-derived ingredients or by-products.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline New York Super Stay Vinyl Ink**:
â­ Shake the product well for at least 5 seconds before application for the perfect vinyl lip.
â­ Apply evenly to your lips using the precise flocked tip applicator.
â­ Allow the lipstick to dry down completely after application.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline New York Super Stay Vinyl Ink**:
â­ Vegan formula featuring Color Lock technology.
â­ Ingredients that provide instant shine and long-lasting vibrancy.

#MaybellineLipstick #SuperStayVinylInk #LiquidLipstick #LipMakeup #MaybellineNewYork #ShinyLips #LongLastingMakeup #VinylInk #LipColor #SaudiBeauty

description_en:
Discover vibrant, transfer-proof wear with **Maybelline SuperStay Vinyl Ink Liquid Lipstick**. Experience a revolutionary vegan, high-pigment formula that locks in color for up to 16 hours, delivering a stunning vinyl finish that defies smudging and transfer. Get your perfect, long-lasting pout with a lustrous shine.

â­ No-budge vinyl color for a flawless finish.
â­ Vegan formula, free from animal-derived ingredients.
â­ Up to 16-hour wear for all-day confidence.
â­ Color Lock technology resists smudging and transfer.
â­ Instant shine finish for a glamorous look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline SuperStay Vinyl Ink Liquid Lipstick**

â­ Shake the product well for at least 5 seconds before application for optimal vinyl payoff.
â­ Apply evenly to lips using the flocked tip applicator.
â­ Allow to dry completely for a long-lasting effect.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline SuperStay Vinyl Ink Liquid Lipstick**

â­ Formulated with vegan ingredients, ensuring no animal by-products.
â­ High-quality components for vibrant color and lasting shine.

#Maybelline #SuperStay #VinylInk #LiquidLipstick #Makeup #SaudiArabia #Riyadh #Jeddah #Beauty #LongLastingLipstick

description_en:
Achieve stunning matte lips with **Maybelline Super Stay Matte Ink** liquid lipstick in Savant, a captivating pink shade. This unique color provides a long-lasting, flawless matte finish for up to 16 hours, with super-pigmented color that ensures a bold and distinctive look for every occasion. Its waterproof formula makes it your perfect companion throughout the day, no matter what you eat or drink. **Maybelline Super Stay Matte Ink** offers an easy and precise application experience thanks to its innovative applicator designed to follow the curves of your lips with precision. Available in a range of rich and diverse shades to suit all tastes and looks.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Super Stay Matte Ink**:
â­ Choose the shade that complements your look.
â­ Use the applicator to precisely define your cupid's bow.
â­ Apply evenly to the upper and lower lips.
â­ Use the tip of the applicator for sharp lip contouring.
â­ Allow the lipstick to dry for a few minutes for a perfect matte finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Super Stay Matte Ink**:
â­ Richly pigmented creamy formula.
â­ Ultra-long-lasting matte texture.
â­ Moisturizing ingredients to keep lips soft.
â­ Free from strong fragrances.

#Maybelline #SuperStayMatteInk #Lipstick #Makeup #MatteLips #SaudiMakeup #Beauty #LongLastingLipstick #MaybellineNewYork #LipCare

description_en:
Elevate your look with **Maybelline New York Colossal Kajal Eyeliner**, designed to deliver intense black color and iconic definition that lasts.

Flaunt captivating eyes with the intense finish of this kajal liner, infused with rich Argan Oil and Vitamin E, ensuring unparalleled brilliance and ultimate eye comfort. Thanks to its highly charged pigments, **Maybelline New York Colossal Kajal Eyeliner** provides an immersive black color that dries quickly within 15 seconds, giving you a mesmerizing smoky effect that lasts up to 12 hours.

â­ Waterproof and smudge-free for flawless wear.
â­ Infused with Argan Oil and Vitamin E for eye comfort.
â­ Quick-drying formula in 15 seconds.
â­ 12-hour smoky effect.
â­ Easy to apply, even on the go.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline New York Colossal Kajal Eyeliner**

â­ Apply a precise line along the upper or lower lash line for a natural or dramatic look.
â­ For added intensity, apply to the waterline.
â­ Gently smudge the liner with a brush or finger for a smoky effect.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline New York Colossal Kajal Eyeliner**

â­ Argan Oil
â­ Vitamin E
â­ Highly Charged Pigments
â­ Waterproof Formula

description_en:
Experience unparalleled comfort with **Maybelline Super Stay Lumi-Matte Foundation 30HR**, 27% lighter than regular foundation, for a matte yet luminous look with a diffused glow that lasts up to 30 hours. This lightweight, buildable full coverage foundation is transfer-proof, waterproof, and sweatproof, without caking or patchiness. Achieve a flawless, radiant complexion all day long.

â­ Long-lasting up to 30 hours with a light-as-air feel.
â­ Transfer-proof, waterproof, and sweatproof.
â­ Lumi-Matte formula with a natural diffused glow.
â­ Buildable full coverage in one swipe.
â­ Vegan formula, dermatologist-tested, non-comedogenic.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Super Stay Lumi-Matte Foundation 30HR**:
â­ Shake well before use.
â­ Apply 1-2 pumps to clean, hydrated skin.
â­ Blend with a foundation brush, fingers, or beauty sponge for an even complexion.
â­ Apply more foundation if needed for extra coverage.

(Please refer to product packaging for the full ingredient list)

description_en:
Experience a foundation revolution with **Maybelline Super Stay Lumi-Matte Foundation**. This innovative formula is 27% lighter than regular foundation, offering an air-like feel with a lasting matte-yet-luminous Lumi-Matte look that stays for up to 30 hours. Designed as a buildable full coverage superhero, it delivers superior staying power in a single swipe, powered by its light wear technology for a uniquely weightless feel and soft glow that lasts. It's transfer-proof, waterproof, and sweat-proof, ensuring no caking or patchiness. Available in 17 shades to complement all skin tones, this vegan formula is dermatologist-tested and allergy-tested, making it non-comedogenic for healthy, beautiful skin.

Product Features:
â­ Longwear goes light as air
â­ 30H longwear that is transfer-proof, waterproof, sweatproof.
â­ New Light wear technology for Lumi-Matte look
â­ Buildable full coverage
â­ Vegan

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Super Stay Lumi-Matte Foundation**:
â­ Shake well before use.
â­ Apply 1-2 pumps to clean, hydrated skin.
â­ Blend with a foundation brush, fingers, or beauty sponge to even out complexion.
â­ If needed, apply more foundation for extra coverage.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Super Stay Lumi-Matte Foundation**:
(Please refer to the packaging for the full ingredient list)

description_en:
Discover the secret to flawless lips with **Maybelline SuperStay Vinyl Ink Liquid Lipstick Nu Int 110**. This revolutionary formula delivers vibrant, vinyl-packed color that lasts for up to 16 hours, boasting an instant shine finish. Its Color Lock technology is designed to defy smudging and transfer, ensuring a bold, glossy look all day. Enjoy this vegan formula, free from any animal-derived ingredients or by-products.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline SuperStay Vinyl Ink Liquid Lipstick Nu Int 110**:
â­ For the perfect vinyl lip, shake the product for at least 5 seconds before applying.
â­ Apply directly to lips using the flocked tip applicator.
â­ Let it dry completely for a lasting vinyl shine.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline SuperStay Vinyl Ink Liquid Lipstick Nu Int 110**:
â­ 100% vegan formula, with no animal-derived ingredients or by-products.
â­ No-budge vinyl color.
â­ Up to 16-hour wear.
â­ Color Lock formula defies smudging and transfer.
â­ Provides an instant shine finish.

description_en:
Discover the secret to flawless, long-lasting skin with **Maybelline Super Stay Lumi-Matte Foundation**. This foundation features a formula that's 27% lighter than normal foundation, giving you a weightless, airy feel all day long. Enjoy the unique Lumi-Matte look that combines a soft glow with a natural radiance, boasting super staying power for up to 30 hours. It provides buildable full coverage in one swipe, with transfer-proof, waterproof, and sweatproof resistance. Moreover, its formula prevents caking and patchiness, ensuring a flawless finish. It's a vegan formula, dermatologist-tested, allergy-tested, and non-comedogenic.

**Product Features:**

â­ Longwear goes light as air, lasting up to 30 hours.
â­ Transfer-proof, waterproof, and sweatproof for an unmovable look.
â­ New Lumi-Matte technology provides a natural glow and soft radiance.
â­ Buildable full coverage to suit your skin's needs.
â­ Vegan and skin-friendly formula.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Super Stay Lumi-Matte Foundation**:

â­ Shake well before use to ensure proper mixing of ingredients.
â­ Apply 1-2 pumps to clean, hydrated skin.
â­ Blend using a foundation brush, fingers, or a beauty sponge for an even complexion.
â­ If extra coverage is needed, apply another layer of foundation.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Super Stay Lumi-Matte Foundation**:

â­ Advanced formula for superior coverage and radiance.

#MaybellineKSA #Foundation #FaceMakeup #FullCoverage #Longwear #ProMakeup #BeautyProducts #RadiantSkin #DailyMakeup #Skincare

title_ar: Ø£Ø­Ù…Ø± Ø´ÙØ§Ù‡ Ø³ÙˆØ¨Ø± Ø³ØªÙŠ Ù…Ø§Øª Ø§Ù†Ùƒ Ø³ 140 - ÙˆØ±Ø¯ÙŠ Ù…Ù† Ù…Ø§ÙŠØ¨ÙŠÙ„ÙŠÙ†
description_en:
Experience the ultimate long-lasting matte lip with **Maybelline New York, Superstay Matte Ink Pinks 140 Soloist**. This revolutionary liquid lipstick delivers a flawless, super-pigmented matte finish in a variety of stunning shades, from subtle nudes and classic reds to elegant mauves and everyday peaches.  **Maybelline New York, Superstay Matte Ink Pinks 140 Soloist** is your go-to for an intense, comfortable matte color that lasts up to 16 hours, proving waterproof against all your daily activities â€“ from bites to sips to kisses!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline New York, Superstay Matte Ink Pinks 140 Soloist**:
â­ Select your perfect shade from our rich color range.
â­ Use the unique arrow applicator to precisely trace your cupid's bow.
â­ Apply evenly to the top lip, then mirror the application on the bottom lip.
â­ For defined lip contours, utilize the precision tip for controlled application.
â­ Allow the lipstick to dry for a few minutes to achieve a perfect matte finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline New York, Superstay Matte Ink Pinks 140 Soloist**:
â­ Long-lasting matte liquid formula.
â­ Rich, super-saturated shades.
â­ Waterproof.
â­ Precision applicator.
â­ Comfortable wear.

#Maybelline #SuperstayMatteInk #LiquidLipstick #SaudiMakeup #BeautyKSA #MatteLips #LongLastingLipstick #MakeupSaudi #LipColor #MaybellineSaudi

description_en:
Meet the new **Maybelline Lifter Plump**, Maybelline New Yorkâ€™s intense lip plumping gloss that delivers fuller, more voluminous lips in just one swipe. This game-changer delivers an intense heated sensation and plump effect instantly and overtime. Achieve incredibly plump lips with long-lasting shine.

â­ Provides an intense heated sensation and instant plump effect.
â­ XL wand transforms lips in one swipe for a defined pout.
â­ Infused with Maxi-Lipâ„¢ and chili pepper for a natural plumping boost.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Lifter Plump**:
â­ Step 1: Apply lip gloss with the XL Wandâ„¢ applicator in the center of your upper lip and follow the contours of your mouth.
â­ Step 2: Glide the lip gloss across the entire bottom lip.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Lifter Plump**:
â­ Formulated with chili pepper extract for a plumping sensation.
â­ Enriched with Maxi-Lipâ„¢ for enhanced lip volume and hydration.

â­ Caution & Warnings: Flammable until dry. Do not use near fire, flame, or heat. This product may cause a temporary tingling sensation which is normal. Discontinue use if you experience excessive discomfort. Do not touch eyes or use on chapped, damaged, or sensitive lip.

description_en:
Discover your perfect lip color with **Maybelline New York SuperStay Matte Ink 80 Ruler**. This liquid lipstick delivers a long-lasting, super-pigmented matte finish, ideal for any occasion. Experience gorgeous, unwavering matte lip color that's waterproof and stands up to your day, from bites to kisses. **Maybelline New York SuperStay Matte Ink 80 Ruler** is your secret weapon for full, captivating lips that last.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline New York SuperStay Matte Ink 80 Ruler**:
â­ Choose your perfect shade.
â­ Use the applicator to precisely define your cupid's bow.
â­ Apply evenly to the top lip, then move to the bottom lip, using the precision tip for sharp lines.
â­ Let the color dry completely for a flawless matte finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline New York SuperStay Matte Ink 80 Ruler**:
â­ Available in a range of super saturated shades.
â­ Features a unique arrow applicator for precise application.
â­ Matte formula that lasts up to 16 hours.

The hydrating lip gloss is available in a full range of modern shades.

Discover perfection with **Maybelline Fit Me Matte & Poreless Foundation** in shade 110 Porcelain. Its innovative formula features blurring micro-powders that refine pores while absorbing shine for a flawless, natural matte finish. This foundation seamlessly blends with your skin, providing a poreless-looking complexion. Ideal for normal to oily skin, it ensures you stay confident all day long.

â­ Suitable for normal to oily skin.

title_ar: Ù…ÙŠØ¨ÙŠÙ„ÙŠÙ† Ø³ÙˆØ¨Ø± Ø³ØªØ§ÙŠ ØªÙŠØ¯ÙŠ ØªÙ†Øª 30 ÙƒÙˆÙƒÙŠÙˆØªÙŠØªØ´: Ù„ÙˆÙ† Ø´ÙØ§Ù‡ Ù…Ø·ÙÙŠ ÙŠØ¯ÙˆÙ… Ø·ÙˆÙŠÙ„Ø§Ù‹ ÙˆÙ…Ù‚Ø§ÙˆÙ… Ù„Ù„Ø§Ù†ØªÙ‚Ø§Ù„
description_en:
Get ready for an unparalleled lip color experience with the NEW **Maybelline Super Stay Teddy Tint**, your ultimate solution for soft, teddy-bear matte lips that last up to 12 hours with no transfer. Enjoy a blurred matte effect that 97% of users agree on, with a comfortable, lightweight feel that glides on effortlessly. 

**Maybelline Super Stay Teddy Tint** is infused with long-lasting tinted pigments for a transfer-resistant, smudge-proof, and waterproof matte finish. Thanks to Teddy Fluff Technology, it features a marshmallow-like bouncy elastomer that tints your lips with a plush, light matte feel that lasts all day, with a color-hugging flexi-film that fits and moves with your lips. Its creamy, soft texture offers a comfortable, weightless feel, making it perfect for everyday wear. Create multiple looks with 4 ways to wear: blurred, bold, gradient, or even on cheeks.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Super Stay Teddy Tint**
â­ Step 1: Apply the lip tint in the center of your upper lip and follow the contours of your mouth.
â­ Step 2: Glide the matte liquid lipstick across the entire bottom lip, and as many layers as intended.
â­ Step 3: Allow product to dry for 10 to 15 minutes for best effect.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Super Stay Teddy Tint**
â­ Tinted pigments for up to 12-hour wear.
â­ Teddy fluff technology for a soft matte effect.
â­ Color-hugging flexi-film for lip movement.
â­ Creamy, soft texture.
â­ Buildable and blendable formula in 5 shades.

#Maybelline #LipTint #MatteLips #SaudiMakeup #RiyadhBeauty #JeddahFashion #KSAFashion #LongLastingLips #Transferproof #DailyMakeup
