description_en:
Discover **Maybelline Super Stay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick 15 Lover**, the liquid lipstick that delivers a long-lasting, flawless matte finish.

The **Maybelline Super Stay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick 15 Lover** boasts a range of super-pigmented shades, from subtle nudes to classic reds, mauve pinks, and everyday peaches, making it perfect for every occasion. Enjoy gorgeous, matte lip color that lasts up to 16 hours, no matter what you eat or drink. With its unique arrow applicator, achieve precise lip application for a perfect pout.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Super Stay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick 15 Lover**

â­ Choose your perfect shade.
â­ Use the applicator to trace your cupid's bow precisely.
â­ Apply evenly to the upper and lower lips.
â­ Use the precision tip for sharp application along the lip edge.
â­ Allow to dry for a few minutes for a perfect matte finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Super Stay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick 15 Lover**

â­ Long-lasting matte liquid formula.
â­ Highly pigmented colors.
â­ Unique arrow applicator.
â­ Waterproof formula.

#Maybelline #Lipstick #Makeup #MatteLips #SuperStay #LipInk #SaudiMakeup #LongLastingLips #Lover #MaybellineSaudi

title_ar: Ù…ÙŠØ¨Ù„ÙŠÙ† ÙƒÙˆÙ†Ø³ÙŠÙ„Ø± Ø§Ù†Ø³ØªÙ†Øª Ø§ÙŠØ¬ Ø±ÙŠÙˆØ§ÙŠÙ†Ø¯ Ù†Ø§ØªØ´ÙˆØ±Ø§Ù„ 06 - ØªØºØ·ÙŠØ© ÙˆØªØ±Ø·ÙŠØ¨ ÙÙˆØ±ÙŠ
description_en:
Achieve a flawless complexion with **Maybelline Concealer Instant Age Rewind Neutral 06**. This multi-use concealer is your go-to solution, hydrating, concealing, contouring, and correcting in just one click! Enjoy up to 12 hours of moisturizing wear for crease-resistant coverage and an easy-to-use sponge applicator.

**Maybelline Concealer Instant Age Rewind Neutral 06** is vegan, non-comedogenic, and formulated without mineral oil, parabens, or talc, making it a safe choice for your skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Concealer Instant Age Rewind Neutral 06**:
â­ Step 1: Twist the sponge applicator in the direction of the arrows until the concealer is visible on the sponge.
â­ Step 2: Apply concealer directly to the under-eye area, blending in an outward motion.
â­ Step 3: For extremely dark circles, apply the Neutralizer shade under the concealer shade.
â­ Step 4: For a luminous touch, apply the Brightener shade to the inner corner of the eyes, brow bones, and bridge of the nose.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Concealer Instant Age Rewind Neutral 06**:
â­ Vegan formula with moisturizing benefits.
â­ Free from mineral oil, parabens, and talc.
â­ Non-comedogenic.
â­ Easy-to-use sponge tip applicator.
â­ Buildable, crease-resistant coverage.

#Maybelline #Concealer #EyeMakeup #FullCoverage #SkinHydration #Beauty #Skincare #UnderEyeConcealer #SaudiMakeup #MaybellineKSA

description_en:
Experience the ultimate long-lasting matte lip with **Maybelline SuperStay Matte Ink 170 Initiator Lipstick**. This liquid lipstick delivers a flawless, super-pigmented matte finish that stays put for up to 16 hours, ensuring your lips look stunning all day long. With its unique arrow applicator, you can achieve precise definition and rich, vibrant color payoff. **Maybelline SuperStay Matte Ink 170 Initiator Lipstick** is perfect for any occasion, offering waterproof and smudge-proof wear for ultimate confidence.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline SuperStay Matte Ink 170 Initiator Lipstick**:
â­ Choose your perfect shade to complement your skin tone and mood.
â­ Use the precise applicator to define your cupid's bow and the upper lip line with accuracy.
â­ Fill in the lower lip similarly, focusing on an even application.
â­ Allow the lipstick to dry for a few minutes for a perfect matte finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline SuperStay Matte Ink 170 Initiator Lipstick**:
â­ Super-stay matte liquid formula.
â­ Precision applicator for lip definition.
â­ Rich and varied color shades.

#Maybelline #Lipstick #SuperStay #MatteInk #MatteLips #SaudiMakeup #RiyadhMakeup #JeddahMakeup #Cosmetics #SaudiBeauty

description_en:
Achieve captivating eyes with **Maybelline Colossal Kajal Argan Oil Eyeliner - Intense Black**. This eyeliner is infused with argan oil and highly concentrated pigments for an intense black color that lasts up to 12 hours. Make your look stand out with a smoky, bold finish that enhances your eyes' beauty.

â­ Intense and rich black color.
â­ Enriched with Argan Oil and Vitamin E to care for your eyes.
â­ Waterproof and long-lasting for up to 12 hours.
â­ Dries quickly within 15 seconds.
â­ Easy to use for a professional application.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Colossal Kajal Argan Oil Eyeliner - Intense Black**:
â­ Start from the outer corner of the eye and draw a precise line.
â­ Continue drawing towards the inner corner of the eye for perfect definition.
â­ You can apply additional layers for increased intensity or to create an attractive winged liner.

description_en:
Experience the allure of **Maybelline New York Super Stay Vinyl Ink Lipstick**, where vibrant vinyl color meets an up to 16-hour wear. This long-wear lipstick features a revolutionary Color Lock vegan* formula that defies smudging and transfer, delivering an instant, bold vinyl shine. Available in 7 captivating vinyl shades, **Maybelline New York Super Stay Vinyl Ink Lipstick** offers a conscious beauty choice, free from animal-derived ingredients or by-products.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline New York Super Stay Vinyl Ink Lipstick**:
â­ First, shake up Vinyl Ink for the perfect vinyl lip for at least 5 seconds before applying.
â­ Next, apply to lips using its precise flocked tip applicator.
â­ Lastly, let it dry thoroughly andâ€¦go!

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline New York Super Stay Vinyl Ink Lipstick**:
â­ Color Lock vegan* formula.
â­ Free from animal-derived ingredients.

description_en:
Discover the perfect lip liner for a fuller, more captivating pout with **Maybelline Lifter Liner** in shade 07 Big Lift. Formulated with Hyaluronic acid, this lip pencil delivers an ultra-smooth feel with no tug, offering creamy, long-lasting, and transfer-proof color. Its sharpenable tip allows for precise, fluid lines with ultimate ease, making it your go-to for professional lip definition. With **Maybelline Lifter Liner**, you can pair it with your favorite lip gloss for the perfect 'Lifter Lip' in just two simple steps.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Lifter Liner**
â­ Define your lips precisely with the pencil tip.
â­ For best results, pair with your favorite lip gloss.
â­ Product not to be used to line the inner lips.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Lifter Liner**
â­ Vegan Formula.
â­ Formulated with Hyaluronic acid.
â­ Long Lasting.
â­ Transfer Proof.

description_en:
Meet the perfect lip liner for fuller, more alluring lips with **Maybelline Lifter Liner**. 

Formulated with Hyaluronic acid, **Maybelline Lifter Liner** delivers a smooth feelâ€”no tugging or dryness. 

â­ Creamy, color-rich formula that lasts long.
â­ Sharpenable tip for ultra-precise lines.
â­ Glides smoothly onto lips for a flawless finish.
â­ Available in 8 shades for endless combo possibilities with your favorite Lifter Gloss.
â­ Achieve perfect lips in two simple steps: line with **Maybelline Lifter Liner** and shine with Lifter Gloss.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Lifter Liner**:
â­ Precisely line the outer edge of your lips with the pencil.
â­ Fill in the lips with color if desired, or use as a base before applying lipstick.
â­ Product not to be used to line the inner lips.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Lifter Liner**:
â­ Vegan Formula.
â­ Long Lasting.
â­ Transfer Proof.

title_ar: Ù…ÙŠØ¨ÙŠÙ„ÙŠÙ† Ø³ÙˆØ¨Ø± Ø³ØªØ§ÙŠ ØªÙŠØ¯ÙŠ ØªÙŠÙ†Øª: Ù„ÙˆÙ† Ø´ÙØ§Ù‡ Ù…Ø·ÙÙŠ ÙŠØ¯ÙˆÙ… Ø·ÙˆÙŠÙ„Ø§Ù‹
description_en:
Experience teddy-soft perfection with **Maybelline Super Stay Teddy Tint Plushwear & Transferproof 25 Baby Tee**. Enjoy up to 12 hours of blurred matte lip color with a lightweight, plush feel that glides on effortlessly. This innovative tint is transfer-resistant, smudge-proof, kiss-proof, and waterproof, offering a natural yet bold look. Get creative with 4 ways to wear: blurred, bold, gradient, or even on your cheeks for a pop of color. Teddy fluff technology delivers a marshmallow-soft finish.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Super Stay Teddy Tint Plushwear & Transferproof 25 Baby Tee**:
â­ Apply the tint to the center of your upper lip and follow your lip's contours.
â­ Glide the matte liquid lipstick across your entire bottom lip, layering as desired.
â­ Allow product to dry completely for 10-15 minutes for the best effect.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Super Stay Teddy Tint Plushwear & Transferproof 25 Baby Tee**:
â­ Tinted pigments for up to 12-hour blurred matte color.
â­ Teddy fluff technology with a marshmallow-like bouncy elastomer.
â­ Color-hugging flexi film that moves with lips.
â­ Creamy, soft texture for smooth application.
â­ 5 blendable and buildable shades.

#Maybelline #SuperStay #TeddyTint #Makeup #Lips #LipTint #SaudiMakeup #Beauty #LipCare #MaybellineMatte

Achieve a long-lasting flawless matte finish with **Maybelline New York SuperStay Matte Ink 20 Pioneer**. This super-pigmented liquid lipstick delivers intense color for every occasion, from subtle nudes to classic reds. Enjoy perfect lips that last up to 16 hours without smudging, thanks to its waterproof formula. Easy to apply with its precise applicator for perfect definition. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline New York SuperStay Matte Ink 20 Pioneer**:
â­ Choose your shade.
â­ Use the applicator to precisely trace your cupidâ€™s bow.
â­ Apply evenly to the rest of the upper and lower lip.
â­ Let it dry for a few minutes for a perfect matte finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline New York SuperStay Matte Ink 20 Pioneer**:
â­ Super-pigmented formula.
â­ Unique arrow applicator.
â­ Lasts up to 16 hours.
â­ Matte finish.

description_en:
Achieve flawless eye definition with ease using the **Maybelline Hyper Easy Eyeliner 800 Pitch - Black**. This liquid eyeliner features an intense pitch black formula that delivers rich color lasting up to 24 hours. The flexible brush tip and hexagonal grip ensure perfect control and a smooth, skip-free application, making it the ultimate choice for captivating eyes. It's ophthalmologist-tested and suitable for sensitive eyes and contact lenses.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Hyper Easy Eyeliner 800 Pitch - Black**
â­ Step 1: Draw a smooth line along the upper lash line, starting from the inner corner of the eye.
â­ Continue drawing towards the outer corner, aiming to create your desired wing shape.
â­ Apply an extra coat for intensified color if desired.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Hyper Easy Eyeliner 800 Pitch - Black**
â­ Liquid formula for intense pitch black color.
â­ High-quality ingredients for long-lasting, smudge-proof wear.
â­ Ophthalmologist-tested.

#Maybelline #Eyeliner #EyeMakeup #PitchBlack #LongLasting #EyeDefinition #SaudiMakeup #Beauty #YourEyes #EasyToUse

description_en:
Discover flawless skin with **Maybelline Fit Me Matte + Poreless Powder Foundation 220 - Natural Beige**. This compact powder is your ultimate solution for 12-hour oil control, blending seamlessly into your skin for an all-day matte look and feel. Perfect for hot weather, it provides a natural, shine-free finish thatâ€™s absolutely poreless. Plus, it's boosted with SPF 28 for added sun protection.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Fit Me Matte + Poreless Powder Foundation 220 - Natural Beige**:
â­ Apply the powder to your face using the included sponge or a powder brush.
â­ Use a downward sweeping motion to ensure a smooth, even application and avoid highlighting fine hairs.
â­ Ideal for everyday wear or setting your liquid foundation.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Fit Me Matte + Poreless Powder Foundation 220 - Natural Beige**:
â­ Lightweight formula that absorbs excess oil.
â­ Contains SPF 28 for sun protection.
â­ Delivers a natural matte finish without cakiness.

description_en:
Achieve hydrated, fuller-looking lips with the latest innovation from Maybelline New York: **Maybelline Lifter Gloss with Hyaluronic Acid 09 TOPAZ**. This breakthrough formula, infused with Hyaluronic Acid, visibly smoothes the lip surface and enhances lip contour with high shine for hydrated, fuller-looking lips in an easy, one-swipe application. **Maybelline Lifter Gloss with Hyaluronic Acid 09 TOPAZ** is available in a full range of modern shades to complement every look.

â­ Hydrated and naturally fuller-looking lips.
â­ Breakthrough formula with Hyaluronic Acid to smooth and hydrate lips.
â­ XL size wand enhances lip contour in one swipe.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Lifter Gloss with Hyaluronic Acid 09 TOPAZ**

â­ For best results, apply the gloss to the center of your upper lip.
â­ Glide the applicator from the center to the outer edges of your lips, following your lip's contour.
â­ Then, apply across the entire bottom lip.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Lifter Gloss with Hyaluronic Acid 09 TOPAZ**

â­ Hyaluronic Acid: For deep hydration and plumpness.
â­ Nourishing Oils: For a smooth, shiny finish.
â­ Lightweight Formula: Non-sticky feel.

#Maybelline #LifterGloss #LipGloss #HyaluronicAcid #FullerLips #HydratedLips #SaudiMakeup #RiyadhBeauty #MakeupKSA #MaybellineLips

Elevate your lip game with **Maybelline Lifter Gloss Surreal - Nu 005 Petal**. Meet Maybelline New York's new next level lip gloss, infused with Hyaluronic Acid for a high shine, hydrated, and fuller-looking pout. This breakthrough formula visibly smoothes lip surface and enhances lip contour with a high shine finish, delivering hydrated, fuller-looking lips in an easy, one-swipe application. Available in a full range of modern shades.

â­ Hydrated, fuller-looking lips.
â­ Breakthrough formula with Hyaluronic Acid to visibly smooth lip surface.
â­ XL wand enhances lip contour in one easy swipe.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Lifter Gloss Surreal - Nu 005 Petal**:
â­ For best results, apply lip gloss to the center of your upper lip and follow the contours of your mouth.
â­ Glide the lip gloss applicator across the entire bottom lip.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Lifter Gloss Surreal - Nu 005 Petal**:
â­ Hyaluronic Acid.
â­ High-shine formula.

description_en:
**Maybelline Instant Age Rewind Concealer Nude 02**: is the do-it-all concealer that hydrates, conceals, contours, and corrects all in one click! Enjoy up to 12 hours of moisturizing wear for crease-resistant coverage with an innovative sponge tip applicator. It's vegan, non-comedogenic, and formulated without mineral oil, parabens, or talc, making it an ideal choice for your skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Instant Age Rewind Concealer Nude 02**:
â­ Step 1: Twist the sponge applicator in the direction of the arrows until the concealer is visible on the sponge.
â­ Step 2: Apply concealer directly to the under-eye area, blending in an outward motion.
â­ Step 3: For extremely dark circles, apply the Neutralizer shade under the concealer shade.
â­ Step 4: For a luminous touch, apply the Brightener shade to the inner corner of the eyes, brow bones, and bridge of the nose.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Instant Age Rewind Concealer Nude 02**:
â­ Hydrating and crease-resistant formula.
â­ Easy-to-use sponge applicator.
â­ Vegan ingredients.
â­ Non-comedogenic.
â­ Free from mineral oil.
â­ Free from parabens.
â­ Free from talc.

#MaybellineKSA #Concealer #UnderEyeConcealer #EyeMakeup #FullCoverage #ProMakeup #Beauty #Cosmetics #Skincare #SaudiInstagram

description_en:
Discover the secret to perfect lips with **Maybelline SuperStay Vinyl Ink Liquid Lipstick**. This product delivers unparalleled vinyl color that lasts up to 16 hours, thanks to its revolutionary smudge-proof and transfer-resistant formula. Enjoy a shiny, captivating look all day long.

â­ No animal-derived ingredients or by-products.
â­ No-budge vinyl color.
â­ Up to 16-hour wear.
â­ Color Lock formula defies smudging and transfer.
â­ 100% vegan formula.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline SuperStay Vinyl Ink Liquid Lipstick**:
â­ For the perfect vinyl lip, shake the product for at least 5 seconds before applying.
â­ Apply color to lips using the precise flocked-tip applicator.
â­ Let it dry completely and go!

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline SuperStay Vinyl Ink Liquid Lipstick**:
â­ Vegan and animal-free ingredients.
â­ High-pigment formula.
â­ Moisturizing agents for a shiny finish.

#Maybelline #SuperStay #VinylInk #LiquidLipstick #Makeup #Longwear #SmudgeProof #Beauty #SaudiArabia #LipGoals
